original: Pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā Prajñāpāramitā II
analyzed: pañcaviṃśati sāhasrikā prajñāpāramitā

original: atha khalu ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mahārājānas te sarve 'nekair devaputrasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva pariṣadi saṃnipatitā
analyzed: atha khalu ye smin tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau mahā rājānaḥ te sarve nekaiḥ deva putra sahasraiḥ sārdham tatra eva pariṣadi saṃnipatitā

original: evaṃ śakro devānām indro yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino brahmapārṣadyā
analyzed: evam śakraḥ devānām indraḥ yāmāḥ tuṣitāḥ nirmāṇa ratayaḥ paranirmita vaśavartinaḥ brahma pārṣadyā

original: yāvan mahābrahmāṇo ye ceha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau parīttābhā yāvac chuddhāvāsakāyikāś
analyzed: yāvat mahābrahmāṇaḥ ye ca iha tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau parītta ābhāḥ yāvat śuddhāvāsa kāyikāḥ

original: ca devaputrā anekaiḥ śuddhāvāsakāyikair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ
analyzed: ca deva putrāḥ anekaiḥ śuddhāvāsa kāyikaiḥ deva putra koṭī niyuta śata sahasraiḥ sārdham

original: tatraiva pariṣadi saṃnipatitā. yaś ca teṣāṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ karmavipākajaḥ. kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
analyzed: tatra eva pariṣadi saṃnipatitāḥ yaḥ ca teṣām cāturmahārājakāyikānām deva putrāṇām karma vipāka jaḥ kāya avabhāsaḥ

original: yaś ca trayastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ yāvac chuddhāvāsakāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
analyzed: yaḥ ca trayastriṃśānām yāmānām tuṣitānām nirmāṇaratīnām paranirmitavaśavartinām yāvat śuddhāvāsakāyikānām devaputrāṇām karma vipāka jaḥ kāya avabhāsaḥ

original: sa tathāgataprakṛtiprabhāyāḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm
analyzed: sa tathāgata prakṛti prabhāyāḥ śatatamīm api kalām na upaiti sahasratamīm api śata sahasratamīm

original: api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniṣadam api nopaiti,
analyzed: api koṭī śata sahasratamīm api saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api upaniṣadam api nā upaiti

original: na kṣamate tathāgataprabhāyāḥ purataḥ sā devānāṃ prabhā. tathāgataprabhaivāgrākhyate
analyzed: na kṣamate tathāgata prabhāyāḥ puratas sā devānām prabhā tathāgata prabhā eva agrā ākhyate

original: jyeṣṭhā śreṣṭhā varā pravarā praṇītā anuttarā niruttarā uttarottarā cākhyāyate. tadyathāpi
analyzed: jyeṣṭhā śreṣṭhā varā pravarā praṇītā anuttarā niruttarā uttarottarā ca ākhyāyate tat yathā api

original: nāma jambūnadasya suvarṇasya purataḥ kṛṣṇalauhaṃ na bhrājate na tapati na virocate,
analyzed: nāma jambūnadasya suvarṇasya puratas kṛṣṇa lauham na bhrājate na tapati na virocate

original: evam eva tathāgatasya prakṛtiprabhāyāḥ purataḥ sā devānāṃ karmavipākajaprabhā na
analyzed: evam eva tathāgatasya prakṛti prabhāyāḥ puratas sā devānām karma vipāka ja prabhā na

original: bhrājate na tapati na virocate. tathāgataprabhaiva teṣām agrākhyāyate jyeṣṭhākhyāyate
analyzed: bhrājate na tapati na virocate tathāgata prabhā eva teṣām agrā ākhyāyate jyeṣṭhā ākhyāyate

original: śreṣṭhā varā pravarā (PSP_2-3:2)
analyzed: śreṣṭhā varā pravarā

original: praṇītā anuttarā niruttarā uttarottarā cākhāyate.
analyzed: praṇītā anuttarā niruttarā uttarottarā ca ākhāyate

original: iti dhyāmīkaraṇabhā deyānām
analyzed: iti dhyāmīkaraṇa bhā deyānām

original: atha khalu śakro devānām indra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu śakraḥ devānām indraḥ āyuṣmantam subhūtim etat avocat

original: ete bhadanta subhūte trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau ye cāturmahārājakāyikā devās
analyzed: ete bhadanta subhūte tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau ye cāturmahārājakāyikāḥ devāḥ

original: trayastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devā yāvac chuddhāvāsakāyikā
analyzed: trayastriṃśāḥ yāmāḥ tuṣitāḥ nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaḥ devāḥ yāvat śuddhāvāsa kāyikā

original: devaputrās te sarve saṃnipatitā āyuṣmataḥ subhūteḥ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaśravaṇāya
analyzed: deva putrāḥ te sarve saṃnipatitāḥ āyuṣmataḥ subhūteḥ prajñāpāramitā nirdeśa śravaṇāya

original: prajñāpāramitopadeśaṃ śrotukāmāḥ. kathaṃ ca bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā upadeśam śrotu kāmāḥ katham ca bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena

original: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam?
analyzed: prajñāpāramitāyām sthātavyam

original: katamā ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā?
analyzed: katamā ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā

original: iti yogyatā
analyzed: iti yogyatā

original: evam ukte, āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
analyzed: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakram devānām indram etat avocat

original: tena hi kauśika upadekṣyāmi buddhānubhāvena buddhādhiṣṭhānena bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yathā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena  #
analyzed: tena hi kauśika upadekṣyāmi buddha anubhāvena buddha adhiṣṭhānena bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām prajñāpāramitām yathā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena

original: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ,
analyzed: prajñāpāramitāyām sthātavyam

original: yaiś ca devaputrair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ notpāditaṃ tair anuttarāyāṃ
analyzed: yaiḥ ca deva putraiḥ anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau cittam na utpāditam taiḥ anuttarāyām

original: samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayitavyam. ye punar avakrāntaniyāmās te 'pratibalā anuttarāyāṃ
analyzed: samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayitavyam ye punar avakrānta niyāmāḥ te pratibalāḥ anuttarāyām

original: samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayituṃ. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayitum tat kasya hetoḥ

original: baddhasīmāno hi te saṃsārasrotasaḥ.
analyzed: baddha sīmānaḥ hi te saṃsāra srotasaḥ

original: iti viṣayapratiniyamaḥ
analyzed: iti viṣaya pratiniyamaḥ

original: api tu khalu punas teṣām apy anumode te ced anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayeyuḥ. iti vyāptiḥ
analyzed: api tu khalu punar teṣām api anumode te ced anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayeyuḥ iti vyāptiḥ

original: nāhaṃ teṣāṃ kuśalapakṣasyāntarāyaṃ karomi.iti svabhāvaḥ
analyzed: na aham teṣām kuśala pakṣasya antarāyam karomi iti svabhāvaḥ

original: viśiṣṭebhyo dharmebhyo viśiṣṭatamā dharmā adhyālambitavyāḥ.
analyzed: viśiṣṭebhyaḥ dharmebhyaḥ viśiṣṭatamāḥ dharmāḥ adhyālambitavyāḥ

original: iti kāritram ity uktāni dhyāmīkaraṇādīni
analyzed: iti kāritram iti uktāni dhyāmīkaraṇa ādīni

original: tatra kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya katamā prajñāpāramitā,
analyzed: tatra kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya katamā prajñāpāramitā

original: iha bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiḥ rūpam anityato
analyzed: iha bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ sarvajña tā pratisaṃyuktaiḥ citta utpādaiḥ rūpam

original: manasikaroti duḥkhato 'nātmataḥ śāntato rogato gaṇḍataḥ śalyato 'ghataḥ parataḥ pralopadharmataś
analyzed: manasikaroti duḥkhataḥ na ātmataḥ śāntataḥ rogataḥ gaṇḍataḥ śalyataḥ paratas pralopa dharmataḥ

original: calataḥ prabhaṅgurato bhayata upasargata upadravato manasikaroti tac cānupalambhayogena,
analyzed: calataḥ prabhaṅgurataḥ bhayataḥ upasargataḥ upadravataḥ manasikaroti tat ca anupalambha yogena

original: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam. evaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo manaḥ,
analyzed: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānam evam cakṣuḥ śrotram ghrāṇam jihvā kāyaḥ manaḥ

original: evaṃ pṛthivīdhātur abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur ākāśadhātur vijñānadhātum anityato manasikaroti duḥkhato (PSP_2-3:3)
analyzed: evam pṛthivī dhātuḥ ap dhātuḥ tejaḥ dhātuḥ vāyu dhātuḥ ākāśa dhātuḥ vijñāna dhātum anityataḥ manasikaroti duḥkhataḥ

original: 'nātmataḥ śāntato rogato gaṇḍataḥ śalyato 'ghataḥ parataḥ pralopadharmataś calataḥ
analyzed: na ātmataḥ śāntataḥ rogataḥ gaṇḍataḥ śalyataḥ paratas pralopa dharmataḥ calataḥ

original: prabhaṅgurato bhayata upasargata upadravato manasikaroti tac cānupalambhayogena sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktena
analyzed: prabhaṅgurataḥ bhayataḥ upasargataḥ upadravataḥ manasikaroti tat ca anupalambha yogena sarvajña tā pratisaṃyuktena

original: cittotpādena. evam avidyāpratyayān saṃskārān anityato manasikaroti duḥkhato 'nātmataḥ
analyzed: citta utpādena evam avidyā pratyayān saṃskārān anityataḥ manasikaroti duḥkhataḥ na ātmataḥ

original: śāntato rogato gaṇḍataḥ śalyato 'ghataḥ parataḥ pralopadharmataś calataḥ prabhaṅgurato
analyzed: śāntataḥ rogataḥ gaṇḍataḥ śalyataḥ paratas pralopa dharmataḥ calataḥ

original: bhayata upasargata upadravataḥ saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānaṃ vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ
analyzed: bhayataḥ upasargataḥ upadravataḥ saṃskāra pratyayam vijñānam vijñāna pratyayam nāma rūpam

original: nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśaḥ sparśapratyayā vedanā vedanāpratyayā
analyzed: nāma rūpa pratyayam ṣaṣ āyatanam ṣaṣ āyatana pratyayaḥ sparśaḥ sparśa pratyayā vedanā vedanā pratyayā

original: tṛṣṇā tṛṣṇāpratyayam upādānam upādānapratyayo bhavo bhavapratyayā jātir jātipratyayā
analyzed: tṛṣṇā tṛṣṇā pratyayam upādānam upādāna pratyayaḥ bhavaḥ bhava pratyayā jātiḥ jāti pratyayā

original: jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsāḥ saṃbhavanti. evam asya kevalasya mahato
analyzed: jarā maraṇa śoka parideva duḥkha daurmanasya upāyāsāḥ saṃbhavanti evam asya kevalasya mahataḥ

original: duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati tac cānityato duḥkhato 'nātmataḥ śāntato rogato
analyzed: duḥkha skandhasya samudayaḥ bhavati tat ca anityataḥ duḥkhataḥ na ātmataḥ śāntataḥ

original: gaṇḍataḥ śalyato 'ghataḥ parataḥ pralopadharmataś calataḥ prabhaṅgurato bhayata upasargata
analyzed: gaṇḍataḥ śalyataḥ paratas pralopa dharmataḥ calataḥ prabhaṅgurataḥ bhayataḥ upasargataḥ

original: upadravato manasikaroti tac cānupalambhayogena sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittotpādena.
analyzed: upadravataḥ manasikaroti tat ca anupalambha yogena sarvajña tā pratisaṃyuktena citta utpādena

original: avidyānirodhāt saṃskāranirodha iti manasikaroti nirātmataḥ śāntato viviktataḥ śūnyato
analyzed: avidyā nirodhāt saṃskāra nirodhaḥ iti manasikaroti nirātmataḥ śāntataḥ viviktataḥ

original: 'nimittato 'praṇihitato 'nabhisaṃskārataḥ saṃskāranirodhād vijñānanirodho vijñānanirodhād
analyzed: praṇihitataḥ na abhisaṃskārataḥ saṃskāra nirodhāt vijñāna nirodhaḥ vijñāna nirodhāt

original: nāmarūpanirodho nāmarūpanirodhāt ṣaḍāyatananirodhaḥ ṣaḍāyatananirodhāt sparśanirodhaḥ
analyzed: nāma rūpa nirodhaḥ nāma rūpa nirodhāt ṣaṣ āyatana nirodhaḥ ṣaṣ āyatana nirodhāt sparśa nirodhaḥ

original: sparśanirodhād vedanānirodho vedanānirodhāt tṛṣṇānirodhas tṛṣṇānirodhād upādānanirodha
analyzed: sparśa nirodhāt vedanā nirodhaḥ vedanā nirodhāt tṛṣṇā nirodhaḥ tṛṣṇā nirodhāt upādāna nirodha

original: upādānanirodhād bhavanirodho bhavanirodhāj jātinirodho jātinirodhāj jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsā
analyzed: upādāna nirodhāt bhava nirodhaḥ bhava nirodhāt jāti nirodhaḥ jāti nirodhāt jarā maraṇa śoka parideva duḥkha daurmanasya upāyāsā

original: nirudhyante. evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati tac ca nirātmataḥ
analyzed: nirudhyante evam asya kevalasya mahataḥ duḥkha skandhasya nirodhaḥ bhavati tat ca nirātmataḥ

original: śāntato viviktataḥ śūnyato 'nimittato 'praṇihitato 'nabhisaṃskārato manasikaroti
analyzed: śāntataḥ viviktataḥ śūnyataḥ nimittataḥ praṇihitataḥ manasikaroti

original: tac cānupalambhayogena sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ.
analyzed: tat ca anupalambha yogena sarvajña tā pratisaṃyuktaiḥ manasikāraiḥ

original: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena catvāri
analyzed: punar aparam kauśika bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ sarvajña tā pratisaṃyuktena cittena catvāri

original: smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayati tac cānupalambhayogena. evaṃ catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catura
analyzed: smṛti upasthānāni bhāvayati tat ca anupalambha yogena evam catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catura

original: ṛddhipādān pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ catvāry
analyzed: ṛddhipādān pañca indriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni ārya aṣṭāṅga mārgam catvāri

original: apramāṇāni catvāri dhyānāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīr daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri
analyzed: apramāṇāni catvāri dhyānāni catasraḥ ārūpya samāpattīḥ daśa tathāgata balāni catvāri

original: vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān (PSP_2-3:4)
analyzed: vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ ṣṭādaśa āveṇikān

original: buddhadharmān bhāvayati sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tac cānupalambhayogena.
analyzed: buddha dharmān bhāvayati sarvajña tā pratisaṃyuktaiḥ manasikāraiḥ tat ca an upalambha yogena

original: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittotpādena
analyzed: punar aparam kauśika bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ sarvajña tā pratisaṃyuktena citta utpādena

original: dānapāramitāṃ carati tac cānupalambhayogena. evaṃ sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiḥ
analyzed: dāna pāramitām carati tat ca anupalambha yogena evam sarvajña tā pratisaṃyuktaiḥ citta utpādaiḥ

original: śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
analyzed: śīla pāramitāyām kṣānti pāramitāyām vīrya pāramitāyām dhyāna pāramitāyām prajñāpāramitāyām

original: carati tac cānupalambhayogena.
analyzed: carati tat ca anupalambha yogena

original: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃdharmeṇa
analyzed: punar aparam kauśika bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran evaṃdharmeṇa

original: dharmān yojayati. evaṃdharmeṇa dharmān abhiṣyandayan pariṣyandayan paripūrayan parisphāran
analyzed: dharmān yojayati evaṃdharmeṇa dharmān abhiṣyandayan pariṣyandayan paripūrayan parisphāran

original: pratyavekṣate nirātmakā hy ete sarvadharmā ātmātmīyavigatāḥ. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: pratyavekṣate nirātmakāḥ hi ete sarva dharmāḥ ātma ātmīya vigatāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi yad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kuśalamūlacittaṃ tad bodhicittenāsamavahitaṃ
analyzed: tathā hi yat bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kuśala mūla cittam tat bodhi cittena asamavahitam

original: yat pariṇāmanācittaṃ tad bodhicittakuśalamūlacittābhyām asamavahitaṃ yad bodhicittaṃ
analyzed: yat pariṇāmanā cittam tat bodhi citta kuśala mūla cittābhyām asamavahitam yat bodhi cittam

original: tat pariṇāmanācittenāsamavahitaṃ. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: tat pariṇāmanā cittena asamavahitam tat kasya hetoḥ

original: yat kauśika bodhicittaṃ tat pariṇāmanācitte na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate. yat pariṇāmanācittaṃ
analyzed: yat kauśika bodhi cittam tat pariṇāmanā citte na saṃvidyate na upalabhyate yat pariṇāmanā cittam

original: tad bodhicitte na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate. iyaṃ kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
analyzed: tat bodhi citte na saṃvidyate na upalabhyate iyam kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya

original: prajñāpāramitā yad evaṃ sarvadharmāṃś ca pratyavekṣate na ca kaṃcid dharmam abhiniviśate nopalabhate.
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā yat evam sarva dharmān ca pratyavekṣate na ca kaṃcid dharmam abhiniviśate na upalabhate

original: evam ukte śakro devānām indraḥ sthaviraṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
analyzed: evam ukte śakraḥ devānām indraḥ sthaviram subhūtim etat avocat

original: kathaṃ bhadanta subhūte pariṇāmanācittaṃ bodhicittenāsamavahitaṃ?
analyzed: katham bhadanta subhūte pariṇāmanā cittam bodhi cittena asamavahitam

original: kathaṃ bodheś cittaṃ pariṇāmanācittenāsamavahitaṃ?
analyzed: katham bodheḥ cittam pariṇāmanā cittena asamavahitam

original: kathaṃ vā pariṇāmanācitte bodhicittaṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate?
analyzed: katham vā pariṇāmanā citte bodhi cittam na saṃvidyate na upalabhyate

original: kathaṃ bodhicitte pariṇāmanācittaṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate?
analyzed: katham bodhi citte pariṇāmanā cittam na saṃvidyate na upalabhyate

original: subhūtir āha :
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: yat kauśika pariṇāmanācittaṃ tad acittaṃ yad bodhicittaṃ tad acittaṃ na hy acittatācittatāyāṃ

analyzed: cakṣuḥ vijñānam cakṣuḥ saṃsparśaḥ cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa jāḥ vedanā svapna upamāḥ māyā upamāḥ evam

original: māyopamā. dānapāramitāpi svapnopamā māyopamā. evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramītā vīryapārmitā

analyzed: dhyāna pāramitā prajñāpāramitā api svapna upamā māyā upamā evam adhyātma śūmyatā bahirdhā śūnyatā adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā

analyzed: evam śāntāyāḥ evam praṇītāyāḥ evam alam āryāyāḥ evam paṇḍita vijña vedanīyāyāḥ deśyamānāyāḥ

original: asyā dharmadṛṣṭeḥ subhūtinā sthavireṇa bhāṣyamāṇāyā yan nu vayaṃ puṣpāṇy abhinirmāya
analyzed: asyāḥ dharma dṛṣṭeḥ subhūtinā sthavireṇa bhāṣyamāṇāyāḥ yat nu vayam puṣpāṇi abhinirmāya

original: taiḥ puṣpair buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ bodhisattvaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca subhūtiṃ ca sthaviram
analyzed: taiḥ puṣpaiḥ buddham bhagavantam bodhisattvam bhikṣu saṃgham ca subhūtim ca sthaviram

original: imāṃ prajñāpāramitām abhyavakirema.
analyzed: imām prajñāpāramitām abhyavakirema

original: atha khalu śakro devānām indras te trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikān devān upādāya yāvad akaniṣṭhā devā divyāni māndāravāṇi  #
analyzed: atha khalu śakraḥ devānām indraḥ te tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikān devān upādāya yāvat akaniṣṭhāḥ devāḥ divyāni māndāravāṇi

original: puṣpāṇy abhinirmāya,
analyzed: puṣpāṇi abhinirmāya

original: taiḥ puṣpair buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ bodhisattvaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca subhūtiṃ ca sthaviram imāṃ ca prajñāpāramitām abhyavakiranti sma,
analyzed: taiḥ puṣpaiḥ buddham bhagavantam bodhisattvam bhikṣu saṃgham ca subhūtim ca sthaviram imām ca prajñāpāramitām abhyavakiranti sma

original: abhiprakiranti sma,
analyzed: abhiprakiranti sma

original: samanantarāvakīrṇāni ca tāni puṣpāṇi śakreṇa devānām indreṇa,
analyzed: samanantara avakīrṇāni ca tāni puṣpāṇi śakreṇa devānām indreṇa

original: taiś ca yāvad akaniṣṭhair devaiḥ.
analyzed: taiḥ ca yāvat akaniṣṭhaiḥ devaiḥ

original: atha khalu sarvasmiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau puṣpasaṃstaraḥ saṃstṛto 'bhūt. upariṣṭāc cāntarīkṣe puṣpakūṭāgāraṃ saṃsthitam abhūt
analyzed: atha khalu sarvasmin tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau puṣpa saṃstaraḥ saṃstṛtaḥ bhūt upariṣṭāt ca antarīkṣe puṣpa kūṭāgāram saṃsthitam abhūt

original: atha khalu subhūteḥ sthavirasyaitad abhavat:
analyzed: atha khalu subhūteḥ sthavirasya etat abhavat

original: na punar imāni puṣpāṇi mayā sarvadevabhavaṇeṣu dṛṣṭapūrvāṇi pracaranti yānīmāni puṣpāṇi devaputrair abhyavakīrṇāni nirmitānīmāni puṣpāṇi na
analyzed: na punar imāni puṣpāṇi mayā sarva deva bhavaṇeṣu dṛṣṭa pūrvāṇi pracaranti yāni imāni puṣpāṇi deva putraiḥ abhyavakīrṇāni nirmitāni imāni puṣpāṇi na

original: yānīmāni devaputrair abhyavakīrṇāni manomayāny etāni puṣpāṇi naitāni puṣpāṇi vṛkṣagulmalatānirjātānīmāni devaputrair abhyavakīrṇāni.
analyzed: yāni imāni deva putraiḥ abhyavakīrṇāni manaḥ mayāni etāni puṣpāṇi na etāni puṣpāṇi vṛkṣa gulma latā nirjātāni imāni deva putraiḥ abhyavakīrṇāni

original: atha khalu śakro devānām indraḥ sthaviraṃ subhūtiṃ etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu śakraḥ devānām indraḥ sthaviram subhūtim etat avocat

original: anirjātānīmāni bhadanta subhūte puṣpāṇi naitāni puṣpāṇi manonirjātāni nāpi (PSP_2-3:21)
analyzed: a nirjātāni imāni bhadanta subhūte puṣpāṇi na etāni puṣpāṇi manaḥ nirjātāni na api

original: vṛkṣagulmalatānirjātāni.
analyzed: vṛkṣa gulma latā nirjātāni

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: yat kauśikaivaṃ vadasi,
analyzed: yat kauśika evam vadasi

original: anirjātānīmāni puṣpāṇi naitāni manonirjātāni nāpi vṛkṣagulmalatānirjātānīti. yāni kauśikānirjātāni na tāni puṣpāṇi śakro devānām indra āha:
analyzed: a nirjātāni imāni puṣpāṇi na etāni manaḥ nirjātāni na api vṛkṣa gulma latā nirjātāni iti yāni kauśika a nirjātāni na tāni puṣpāṇi śakraḥ devānām indraḥ āha

original: kiṃ punar bhadanta subhūte imāny eva puṣpāny anirjātāni,
analyzed: kim punar bhadanta subhūte imāni eva puṣpāni a nirjātāni

original: atha rūpam apy anirjātaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ vijñānam apy anirjātaṃ?
analyzed: atha rūpam api a nirjātam vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānam api a nirjātam

original: subhūtiḥ sthavira āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ āha

original: na kauśika imāny eva puṣpāṇy anirjātāni,
analyzed: na kauśika imāni eva puṣpāṇi a nirjātāni

original: rūpam api kauśikānirjātaṃ yac cānirjātaṃ na tad rūpam. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ vijñānaṃ
analyzed: rūpam api kauśika a nirjātam yat ca a nirjātam na tat rūpam vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānam

original: kauśikānirjātaṃ yac cānirjātaṃ na tad vijñānaṃ. cakṣuḥ kauśikānirjātaṃ yac cānirjātaṃ na tac cakṣuḥ,
analyzed: kauśika a nirjātam yat ca a nirjātam na tat vijñānam cakṣuḥ kauśika a nirjātam yat ca a nirjātam na tat cakṣuḥ

original: evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo manaḥ kauśikānirjātaṃ yac cānirjātaṃ na tan manaḥ. pṛthivīdhātuḥ kauśikānirjāto yaś cānirjāto na sa pṛthivīdhātur,
analyzed: evam śrotram ghrāṇam jihvā kāyaḥ manaḥ kauśika a nirjātam yat ca a nirjātam na tat manaḥ pṛthivī dhātuḥ kauśika a nirjātaḥ yaḥ ca a nirjātaḥ na sa pṛthivī dhātuḥ

original: evam abdhātus tejodhātur ākāśadhātur vijñānadhatuḥ kauśikānirjāto yaś cānirjāto na sa vijñānadhātuḥ. dānapāramitā kauśika anirjātā yā cānirjātā  #
analyzed: evam ap dhātuḥ tejaḥ dhātuḥ ākāśa dhātuḥ vijñāna dhatuḥ kauśika a nirjātaḥ yaḥ ca a nirjātaḥ na sa vijñāna dhātuḥ dāna pāramitā kauśika a nirjātā yā ca a nirjātā

original: na sā dānapāramitā,
analyzed: na sā dāna pāramitā

original: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā kauśika
analyzed: evam śīla pāramitā kṣānti pāramitā vīrya pāramitā dhyāna pāramitā prajñāpāramitā kauśika

original: anirjātā yā cānirjātā na sā prajñāpāramitā. adhyātmaśūnyatā kauśika anirjātā yā cānirjātā
analyzed: a nirjātā yā ca a nirjātā na sā prajñāpāramitā adhyātma śūnyatā kauśika a nirjātā yā ca a nirjātā

original: na sā adhyātmaśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā kauśika anirjātā yā cānirjātā na
analyzed: na sā adhyātma śūnyatā yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā kauśika a nirjātā yā ca a nirjātā na

original: sā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā,
analyzed: sā abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā

original: smṛtyupasthānāni kauśika anirjātāni yāni cānirjātāni na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni,
analyzed: smṛti upasthānāni kauśika a nirjātāni yāni ca a nirjātāni na tāni smṛti upasthānāni

original: evaṃ samyakprahāṇāny ṛddhipādāḥ indriyāṇi balāni bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭaṅgo mārgaḥ kauśika,
analyzed: evam samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādāḥ indriyāṇi balāni bodhyaṅgāni ārya aṣṭaṅgaḥ mārgaḥ kauśika

original: anirjāto yaś cānirjāto na sa mārgaḥ. evam abhijñāḥ satyāny apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo
analyzed: a nirjātaḥ yaḥ ca a nirjātaḥ na sa mārgaḥ evam abhijñāḥ satyāni a pramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattayaḥ

original: daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikābuddhadharmāḥ
analyzed: daśa tathāgata balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ ṣṭādaśa āveṇikā buddha dharmāḥ

original: kauśika anirjātā ye cānirjātā na te buddhadharmāḥ. srotaāpattiphalaṃ kauśika anirjātaṃ
analyzed: kauśika a nirjātāḥ ye ca a nirjātāḥ na te buddha dharmāḥ srotaāpatti phalam kauśika a nirjātam

original: yac cānirjātaṃ na tat srotaāpattiphalaṃ,
analyzed: yat ca anirjātam na tat srotaāpatti phalam

original: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabuddhatvaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ kauśikānirjātaṃ
analyzed: evam sakṛdāgāmi phalam anāgāmi phalam arhat tvam pratyekabuddha tvam sarvajña tvam kauśika a nirjātam

original: yac cānirjātaṃ na tat sarvajñatvaṃ. srotaāpannaḥ kauśika anirjāto yaś cānirjāto na sa srotaāpannaḥ,
analyzed: yat ca a nirjātam na tat sarvajña tvam srotaāpannaḥ kauśika a nirjātaḥ yaḥ ca a nirjātaḥ na sa srotaāpannaḥ

original: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmī,
analyzed: evam sakṛdāgāmī

original: anāgāmī,
analyzed: anāgāmī

original: arhan pratyekabuddhas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kauśikānirjāto yaś cānirjāto na sa samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ. ity adhigamādhāragotram
analyzed: arhan pratyekabuddhaḥ tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kauśika a nirjātaḥ yaḥ ca a nirjātaḥ na sa samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ iti adhigama ādhāra gotram

original: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu śakraḥ devānām indraḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: gambhīraprajño batāyam āryasubhūtiḥ. sthaviro yatprajñaptiṃ ca na virodhayati dharmatāṃ copadiśati.
analyzed: gambhīra prajñaḥ bata ayam ārya subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ yat prajñaptim ca na virodhayati dharmatām ca upadiśati

original: atha khalu bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān śakram devānām indram etat avocat

original: evam etat kauśikaivam etat,
analyzed: evam etat kauśika evam etat

original: gambhīraprajño batāyam āryasubhūtiḥ sthaviro yatprajñaptiṃ ca na virodhayati dharmatāṃ copadiśati.
analyzed: gambhīra prajñaḥ bata ayam ārya subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ yat prajñaptim ca na virodhayati dharmatām ca upadiśati

original: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu śakraḥ devānām indraḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: kathaṃ bhagavan subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ prajñaptiṃ ca na virodhayati dharmatāṃ copadiśati?
analyzed: katham bhagavan subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ prajñaptim ca na virodhayati dharmatām ca upadiśati

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: rūpaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yac ca prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā,
analyzed: rūpam kauśika prajñapti mātram yat ca prajñapti mātram sā dharma tā

original: tāṃ ca subhūtiḥ sthaviro na virodhayaty upadiśasti ca. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yac ca prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā,
analyzed: tām ca subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ na virodhayati upadiśa asti ca vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānam kauśika prajñapti mātram yat ca prajñapti mātram sā dharma tā

original: tāṃ ca subhūtiḥ sthaviro na virodhaty upadiśati ca. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: tām ca subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ na virodhati upadiśati ca tat kasya hetoḥ

original: yā dharmatā sā na virudhyate yā na virudhyate tāṃ ca subhūtiḥ sthavira upadiśati na virodhayati,
analyzed: yā dharmatā sā na virudhyate yā na virudhyate tām ca subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ upadiśati na virodhayati

original: evaṃ vyastasamasteṣu skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāṅgeṣu,
analyzed: evam vyasta samasteṣu skandha dhātu āyatana pratītyasamutpāda aṅgeṣu

original: evaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
analyzed: evam dāna pāramitāyām śīla pāramitāyām kṣānti pāramitāyām vīrya pāramitāyām dhyāna pāramitāyām prajñāpāramitāyām

original: evam adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ. evaṃ smṛtyupasthāneṣu samyakprahāṇeṣv
analyzed: evam adhyātma śūnyatāyām yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatāyām evam smṛti upasthāneṣu samyak prahāṇeṣu

original: ṛddhipādendriyeṣu baleṣu bodhyaṅgeṣv āryāṣṭāṅge mārge 'pramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣv
analyzed: ṛddhipāda indriyeṣu baleṣu bodhyaṅgeṣu ārya aṣṭāṅge mārge pramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattiṣu

original: abhijñāsu satyeṣu daśatathāgatabaleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu,
analyzed: abhijñāsu satyeṣu daśa tathāgata baleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsu aṣṭādaśa āveṇikeṣu buddha dharmeṣu

original: evaṃ srotaāpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale 'nāgāmiphale 'rhattve pratyekabuddhatve sarvajñatve srotaāpanna iti kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ  #
analyzed: evam srotaāpatti phale sakṛdāgāmi phale nāgāmi phale rhat tve pratyekabuddha tve sarvajña tve srotaāpanne iti kauśika prajñapti mātram yat prajñapti mātram

original: sā dharmatā,
analyzed: sā dharmatā

original: tāṃ ca subhūtiḥ sthaviro na virodhayaty upadiśati ca. evaṃ sakṛdāgāmī,
analyzed: tām ca subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ na virodhayati upadiśati ca evam sakṛdāgāmī

original: anāgāmī,
analyzed: anāgāmī

original: arhan pratyekabuddhas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yac ca prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā,
analyzed: arhan pratyekabuddhaḥ tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ iti kauśika prajñapti mātram yat ca prajñapti mātram sā dharma tā

original: tāṃ ca subhūtiḥ sthaviro na virodhayaty upadiśati ca. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: tām ca subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ na virodhayati upadiśati ca tat kasya hetoḥ

original: yā kauśika dharmatā sā na virudhyate,
analyzed: yā kauśika dharmatā sā na virudhyate

original: yā na virudhyate tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthavira upadiśati na ca virodhayati,
analyzed: yā na virudhyate tām subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ upadiśati na ca virodhayati

original: evaṃ hi kauśika subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ prajñaptiṃ ca na virodhayati dharmatāṃ copadiśati.
analyzed: evam hi kauśika subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ prajñaptim ca na virodhayati dharmatām ca upadiśati

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: evam etat kauśikaivam etat. yathā bhagavatā prajñaptimātrāḥ sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā
analyzed: evam etat kauśika evam etat yathā bhagavatā prajñapti mātrāḥ sarva dharmāḥ upadiṣṭā

original: evaṃ hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñaptimātrān sarvadharmān viditvā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
analyzed: evam hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñapti mātrān sarva dharmān viditvā prajñāpāramitāyām

original: śikṣitavyam evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ punaḥ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpe śikṣate
analyzed: śikṣitavyam evam śikṣamāṇaḥ punar kauśika bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ na rūpe śikṣate

original: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne śikṣate. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: na vedanāyām na saṃjñāyām na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: thathā hi rūpaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ
analyzed: thathā hi rūpam na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate vedanām saṃjñām saṃskārān vijñānam

original: na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na
analyzed: na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate evam śikṣamāṇaḥ kauśika bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ na

original: dānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣate. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: dāna pāramitāyām śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi sa dānapāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. evaṃ na śīlapāramitāyāṃ
analyzed: tathā hi sa dāna pāramitām na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate evam na śīla pāramitāyām

original: na kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ na vīryapāramitāyāṃ na dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
analyzed: na kṣānti pāramitāyām na vīrya pāramitāyām na dhyāna pāramitāyām na prajñāpāramitāyām

original: śikṣate. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi sa prajñāpāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. adhyātmaśūnyatāyām api na śikṣate yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyām api na śikṣate.  #
analyzed: tathā hi sa prajñāpāramitām na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate adhyātma śūnyatāyām api na śikṣate yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatāyām api na śikṣate

original: tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi so 'dhyātmaśūnyatāṃ na samanupaśyati yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām api na
analyzed: tathā hi saḥ dhī ātma śūnyatām na samanupaśyati yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatām api na

original: samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. smṛtyupasthāneṣv api na śikṣate. evaṃ samyakprahāneṣv
analyzed: samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate smṛti upasthāneṣu api na śikṣate evam samyak prahāneṣu

original: ṛddhipādeṣv indriyeṣu baleṣu bodhyaṅgeṣv āryāṣṭāṅgeṣu mārgeṣv apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣv
analyzed: ṛddhipādeṣu indriyeṣu baleṣu bodhyaṅgeṣu ārya aṣṭāṅgeṣu mārgeṣu apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattiṣu

original: abhijñāsu satyeṣu baleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣv
analyzed: abhijñāsu satyeṣu baleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsu aṣṭādaśa āveṇikeṣu buddha dharmeṣu

original: api na śikṣate. na srotaāpattiphale na sakṛdāgāmiphale nānāgāmiphale nārhattve na
analyzed: api na śikṣate na srotaāpatti phale na sakṛdāgāmi phale na anāgāmi phale na arhat tve na

original: pratyekabuddhatve śikṣate sarvajñatve 'pi na śikṣate. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: pratyekabuddha tve śikṣate sarvajña tve pi na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi sa sarvajñatvaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
analyzed: tathā hi sa sarvajña tvam na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate

original: atha khalu śakro devānām indraḥ subhūtiṃ sthaviram etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu śakraḥ devānām indraḥ subhūtim sthaviram etat avocat

original: kena kāraṇena bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpaṃ samanupaśyati na vedanāṃ
analyzed: kena kāraṇena bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ na rūpam samanupaśyati na vedanām

original: na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ samanupaśyati. evaṃ vyastasamastān skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādapāramitābodhipakṣyān
analyzed: na saṃjñām na saṃskārān na vijñānam samanupaśyati evam vyasta samastān skandha dhātu āyatana pratītyasamutpāda pāramitā bodhi pakṣyān

original: dharmān na samanupaśyati. apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīr na samanupaśyati. satyāny
analyzed: dharmān na samanupaśyati apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattīḥ na samanupaśyati satyāni

original: abhijñādaśabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān
analyzed: abhijñā daśa balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ ṣṭādaśa āveṇikān buddha dharmān

original: na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate yāvat sarvajñatvaṃ api na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate?
analyzed: na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate yāvat sarvajña tvam api na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: tathā hi kauśika rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ,
analyzed: tathā hi kauśika rūpam rūpeṇa śūnyam

original: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyaṃ. evaṃ vyastasamastāni skandhadhātvāyatanāni (PSP_2-3:24)
analyzed: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānam vijñānena śūnyam evam vyasta samastāni skandha dhātu āyatanāni

original: pratītyasamutpādāḥ pāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā
analyzed: pratītyasamutpādāḥ pāramitāḥ sarva śūnyatāḥ sarva samādhayaḥ sarva dhāraṇīmukhāni saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣyā

original: dharmā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ satyāny abhijñā daśabalāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvido
analyzed: dharmāḥ apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattayaḥ satyāni abhijñāḥ daśa balāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvidaḥ

original: 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā yāvat sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: ṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ yāvat sarva ākāra jña tā sarva ākāra jña tayā śūnyā tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na hi kauśika rūpaśūnyatā rūpaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati yāvan na sarvajñatāśūnyatā sarvajñatāśūnyatāṃ
analyzed: na hi kauśika rūpa śūnyatā rūpa śūnyatām samanupaśyati yāvat na sarvajña tā śūnyatā sarvajña tā śūnyatām

analyzed: samanupaśyati yaḥ kauśikaḥ iha śūnyatāyām śikṣate sa rūpa śūnyatāyām śikṣate a dvaidhīkāreṇa

original: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāreṣu vijñānaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate advaidhīkāreṇa. evaṃ vyastasamasteṣu
analyzed: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskāreṣu vijñāna śūnyatāyām śikṣate a dvaidhīkāreṇa evam vyasta samasteṣu

original: skandhadhātvāyataneṣu pratītyasamutpādapāramitāsu saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣv
analyzed: skandha dhātu āyataneṣu pratītyasamutpāda pāramitāsu saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣeṣu dharmeṣu

original: apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu satyeṣv abhijñāsu sarvaśūnyatāsu sarvasamādhiṣu sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu
analyzed: apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattiṣu satyeṣu abhijñāsu sarva śūnyatāsu sarva samādhiṣu sarva dhāraṇī mukheṣu

original: daśatathāgatabaleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu yāvat sarvajñatāśūnyatāyāṃ
analyzed: daśa tathāgata baleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsu āveṇikeṣu buddha dharmeṣu yāvat sarvajña tā śūnyatāyām

original: śikṣate advaidhīkāreṇa. yaḥ kauśika rūpaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate advaidhīkāreṇa yāvat sarvajñatāśūnyatāyāṃ
analyzed: śikṣate a dvaidhīkāreṇa yaḥ kauśika rūpa śūnyatāyām śikṣate a dvaidhīkāreṇa yāvat sarvajña tā śūnyatāyām

original: śikṣate advaidhīkāreṇa sa dānapāramitāyām api śikṣate advaidhīkāreṇa. evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ
analyzed: śikṣate a dvaidhīkāreṇa sa dāna pāramitāyām api śikṣate a dvaidhīkāreṇa evam śīla pāramitāyām

original: kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām api śikṣate
analyzed: kṣānti pāramitāyām vīrya pāramitāyām dhyāna pāramitāyām prajñāpāramitāyām api śikṣate

original: advaidhīkāreṇa. adhyātmaśūnyatāyām api śikṣate advaidhīkāreṇa yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyām
analyzed: a dvaidhīkāreṇa adhyātma śūnyatāyām api śikṣate a dvaidhīkāreṇa yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatāyām

original: api śikṣate advaidhīkāreṇa. smṛtyupasthāneṣu samyakprahāṇeṣv ṛddhipādeṣv indriyeṣu
analyzed: api śikṣate a dvaidhīkāreṇa smṛti upasthāneṣu samyakprahāṇeṣu ṛddhipādeṣu indriyeṣu

original: baleṣu bodhyaṅgeṣv āryāṣṭāṅge mārge śikṣate advaidhīkāreṇa. apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣv
analyzed: baleṣu bodhyaṅgeṣu ārya aṣṭāṅge mārge śikṣate a dvaidhīkāreṇa a pramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattiṣu

original: abhijñāsu satyeṣu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu
analyzed: abhijñāsu satyeṣu daśasu tathāgata baleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsu āveṇikeṣu buddha dharmeṣu

original: śikṣate advaidhīkāreṇa. sarvasamādhiṣu sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu śikṣate advaidhīkāreṇa.
analyzed: śikṣate a dvaidhīkāreṇa sarva samādhiṣu sarva dhāraṇī mukheṣu śikṣate a dvaidhīkāreṇa

analyzed: asaṃkhyeyeṣu aparimāṇeṣu buddha dharmeṣu śikṣate a dvaidhīkāreṇa srotaāpatti phale

original: sakṛdāgāmiphale 'nāgāmiphale 'rhatve pratyekabuddhatve śikṣate advaidhīkāreṇa. samyaksaṃbuddhatve
analyzed: sakṛdāgāmi phale nāgāmi phale rha tve pratyekabuddha tve śikṣate a dvaidhīkāreṇa samyaksaṃbuddha tve

analyzed: sarva ākārajña tāyām śikṣate a dvaidhīkāreṇa

original: iti pratyekabuddhamārge nirvedhabhāgiya uṣmagatam
analyzed: iti pratyekabuddha mārge nirvedha bhāgiyaḥ uṣma gatam

original: na rūpasya hānaye śikṣate na vṛddhaye śikṣate. na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānasya
analyzed: na rūpasya hānaye śikṣate na vṛddhaye śikṣate na vedanā saṃjñā saṃskāra vijñānasya

original: hānaye śikṣate na vṛddhaye śikṣate. evaṃ vyastasamastānāṃ skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ
analyzed: hānaye śikṣate na vṛddhaye śikṣate evam vyasta samastānām skandha dhātu āyatanānām

original: na hānaye na vṛddhaye śikṣate. pratītyasamutpādasya na (PSP_2-3:25)
analyzed: na hānaye na vṛddhaye śikṣate pratītyasamutpādasya na

original: hānaye na vṛddhaye śikṣate. dānapāramitāyā na hānaye na vṛddhaye śikṣate. evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāḥ
analyzed: hānaye na vṛddhaye śikṣate dāna pāramitāyāḥ na hānaye na vṛddhaye śikṣate evam śīla pāramitāyāḥ

analyzed: ṛddhipādānām indriyāṇām balānām bodhyaṅgānām mārgasya na hānaye na vṛddhaye śikṣate

analyzed: apramāṇānām dhyāna ārūpya samāpattīnām na hānaye na vṛddhaye śikṣate adhyātma śūya tāyāḥ

analyzed: bahirdhā śūnyatāyāḥ adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatāyāḥ yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatāyāḥ na hānaye

analyzed: buddha dharmāṇām yāvat sarvajña tāyāḥ na hānaye na vṛddhaye śikṣate yaḥ rūpasya na hānaye

analyzed: parigrahāya śikṣate na antardhānāya śikṣate na vedanāyāḥ na saṃjñāyāḥ na saṃskārāṇām

analyzed: abhijñānām sarva samādhīnām sarva dhāraṇī mukhānām na parigrahāya śikṣate na antardhānāya

analyzed: śikṣate daśānām tathāgata balānām vaiśāradyānām pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānām

analyzed: buddha dharmāṇām yāvat sarvajña tāyāḥ na parigrahāya na antardhānāya śikṣate

original: iti tatraiva mūrdhagatam
analyzed: iti tatra eva mūrdha gatam

original: śāriputra āha:
analyzed: śāriputraḥ āha

original: kiṃ kāraṇam āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpasya parigrahāya nāntardhānāya śikṣate,
analyzed: kim kāraṇam āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ na rūpasya parigrahāya na antardhānāya śikṣate

original: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya na parigrahāya nāntardhānāya śikṣate yāvat sarvajñatāyā na parigrahāya nāntardhānāya śikṣate?
analyzed: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām vijñānasya na parigrahāya na antardhānāya śikṣate yāvat sarvajña tāyāḥ na parigrahāya na antardhānāya śikṣate

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: tathā hy āyuṣmañ śāriputra rūpasya parigraho nāsti. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: tathā hi āyuṣmam śāriputra rūpasya parigrahaḥ na asti tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na rūpaṃ rūpaṃ parigṛhṇāti. na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārās tathā hy āyuṣmañ śāriputra vijñānasya parigraho nāsti. tat kasya hetos? tathā  #
analyzed: na rūpam rūpam parigṛhṇāti na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ tathā hi āyuṣmam śāriputra vijñānasya parigrahaḥ na asti tat kasya hetoḥ tathā

original: hi na (PSP_2-3:26)
analyzed: hi na

original: vijñānaṃ vijñānaṃ parigṛhṇāti. evaṃ vyastasamastānāṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādānāṃ
analyzed: vijñānam vijñānam parigṛhṇāti evam vyasta samastānām skandha dhātu āyatana pratītyasamutpādānām

original: pāramitānāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ satyānām abhijñānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ sarvasamādhīnāṃ
analyzed: pāramitānām bodhi pakṣyāṇām dharmāṇām satyānām abhijñānām sarva śūnyatānām sarva samādhīnām

original: sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ daśabalavaiśāradyānāṃ pratisaṃvidāveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ
analyzed: sarva dhāraṇī mukhānām daśa bala vaiśāradyānām pratisaṃvid āveṇikānām buddha dharmāṇām

original: parigraho nāsti. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: parigrahaḥ na asti tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hy āveṇikabuddhadharmā nāveṇikabuddhadharmān parigṛhṇanti. tathā hy āyuṣmañ śāriputra sarvajñatāyāḥ parigraho nāsti. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: tathā hi āveṇika buddha dharmāḥ na āveṇika buddha dharmān parigṛhṇanti tathā hi āyuṣmam śāriputra sarvajña tāyāḥ parigrahaḥ na asti tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi sarvajñatā na sarvajñatāṃ parigṛhṇāti. adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām

original: upādāya. etaṃ hy āyuṣmañ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāparigrahāya
analyzed: upādāya etam hi āyuṣmam śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ sarva dharma a parigrahāya

original: sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate sarvajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati.

original: śāriputra āha:

analyzed: evam śikṣamāṇaḥ āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣate sarvajña tāyām niryāsyati

original: subhūtir āha:

analyzed: evam śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣate sarvajña tāyām niryāsyati sarva dharmāṇām a parigraha yogena iti tatra eva

original: śāriputra āha:
analyzed: śāriputraḥ āha

original: evaṃ śikṣamāṇa āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇām aparigrahāya nāntardhānāya śikṣitvā kathaṃ sarvajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati?
analyzed: evam śikṣamāṇaḥ āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ sarva dharmāṇām a parigrahāya na antardhānāya śikṣitvā katham sarvajña tāyām niryāsyati

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: tathā hy āyuṣmañ śariputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpasyotpādaṃ
analyzed: tathā hi āyuṣmam śariputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran na rūpasya utpādam

original: paśyati na nirodhaṃ nodgrahaṃ notsargaṃ na saṃkleśaṃ na vyavadānaṃ nācayaṃ nāpacayaṃ
analyzed: paśyati na nirodham na udgraham na utsargam na saṃkleśam na vyavadānam na ācayam na apacayam

original: na hāniṃ na vṛddhiṃ. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: na hānim na vṛddhim tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hy āyuṣmañ śariputra rūpaṃ rūpasvabhāvena na vidyate,
analyzed: tathā hi āyuṣmam śariputra rūpam rūpa svabhāvena na vidyate

original: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyāyuṣmañ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
analyzed: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām vijñānasya āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ

original: notpādaṃ paśyati na nirodhaṃ nodgrahaṃ notsargaṃ na saṃkleśaṃ na vyavadānaṃ nācayaṃ
analyzed: na utpādam paśyati na nirodham na udgraham na utsargam na saṃkleśam na vyavadānam na ācayam

original: nāpacayaṃ na hāniṃ na vṛddhim. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: na apacayam na hānim na vṛddhim tat kasya hetoḥ

original: athā hy āyuṣmañ śariputra vijñānaṃ vijñānasvabhāvena na vidyate. evaṃ vyastasamastānāṃ
analyzed: athā hi āyuṣmam śariputra vijñānam vijñāna svabhāvena na vidyate evam vyasta samastānām

original: skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ pratītyasamutpādasya pāramitānāṃ saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ
analyzed: skandha dhātu āyatanānām pratītyasamutpādasya pāramitānām saptatriṃśatām bodhi pakṣyāṇām

original: dharmāṇām apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnām abhijñānāṃ sarvasamādhīnāṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ
analyzed: dharmāṇām apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattīnām abhijñānām sarva samādhīnām sarva dhāraṇī mukhānām

original: balānāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ (PSP_2-3:27)
analyzed: balānām vaiśāradyānām

original: pratisaṃvidām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ yāvat sarvajñatāyā notpādaṃ paśyati na nirodhaṃ
analyzed: pratisaṃvidām āveṇikānām buddha dharmāṇām yāvat sarvajña tāyāḥ na utpādam paśyati na nirodham

original: nodgrahaṃ notsargaṃ na saṃkleśaṃ na vyavadānaṃ nācayaṃ nāpacayaṃ na hāniṃ na vṛddhiṃ. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: na udgraham na utsargam na saṃkleśam na vyavadānam na ācayam na apacayam na hānim na vṛddhim tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hy āyuṣmañ śāriputra sarvajñatā sarvajñatāsvabhāvena na saṃvidyate,
analyzed: tathā hi āyuṣmam śāriputra sarvajña tā sarvajña tā svabhāvena na saṃvidyate

original: evaṃ hy āyuṣmañ śariputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇām anutpādāyānirodhāyānudgrahāyānutsargāyāsaṃkleśāyāvyavadānāya
analyzed: evam hi āyuṣmam śariputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ sarva dharmāṇām anutpādāya anirodhāya an udgrahāya an utsargāya a saṃkleśāya a vyavadānāya

original: nācayāya nāpacayāya na hānaye na vṛddhaye śikṣate prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate sarvajñatāyāṃ
analyzed: na ācayāya na apacayāya na hānaye na vṛddhaye śikṣate prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣate sarvajña tāyām

original: niryāsyati aśikṣāniryāṇayogena.
analyzed: niryāsyati a śikṣā niryāṇa yogena

original: iti tatraivāgradharmagatam ity uktaḥ pratyekabuddhamārgaḥ
analyzed: iti tatra eva agra dharma gatam iti uktaḥ pratyekabuddha mārgaḥ

original: atha khalu śakro devānām indra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu śakraḥ devānām indraḥ āyuṣmantam śāriputram etat avocat

original: prajñāpāramitā bhadanta śāriputra kuto gaveṣitavyā?
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā bhadanta śāriputra kutas gaveṣitavyā

original: śāriputra āha:
analyzed: śāriputraḥ āha

original: prajñāpāramitā kauśika subhūteḥ parivartād gaveṣitavyā.
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā kauśika subhūteḥ parivartāt gaveṣitavyā

original: atha khalu śakro devānām indraḥ subhūtiṃ sthaviram etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu śakraḥ devānām indraḥ subhūtim sthaviram etat avocat

original: tavaiva āryasubhūte,
analyzed: tava eva ārya subhūte

original: anubhāvas tavaitad adhiṣṭhānaṃ yad āryaśāriputra,
analyzed: anubhāvaḥ tava etat adhiṣṭhānam yat ārya śāriputra

original: evaṃ vadati;
analyzed: evam vadati

original: prajñāpāramitā kauśikāyuṣmataḥ subhūteḥ parivartād gaveṣitavyeti.
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā kauśika āyuṣmataḥ subhūteḥ parivartāt gaveṣitavyā iti

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: na mamaiṣa kauśikānubhāvaḥ na mamaitad adhiṣṭhānam.
analyzed: na mama eṣa kauśika anubhāvaḥ na mama etat adhiṣṭhānam

original: śakra āha: kasyaiṣo 'nubhāvaḥ kasyaitad adhiṣṭhānam.
analyzed: śakraḥ āha kasya eṣaḥ nubhāvaḥ kasya etat adhiṣṭhānam

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: tathāgatasyaiṣa kauśikānubhāvas tathāgatasyaitad adhiṣṭhānaṃ na cānyatra niradhiṣṭhānadharmatāyās tathāgata upalabhyate,
analyzed: tathāgatasya eṣa kauśika anubhāvaḥ tathāgatasya etat adhiṣṭhānam na ca anyatra niradhiṣṭhāna dharma tāyāḥ tathāgataḥ upalabhyate

original: na cānyatra tathatāyās tathāgata upalabhyate,
analyzed: na ca anyatra tathatāyāḥ tathāgataḥ upalabhyate

original: niradhiṣṭhānā devāndra sarvadharmāḥ.
analyzed: niradhiṣṭhānāḥ deva andra sarva dharmāḥ

original: devendra āha:
analyzed: devendraḥ āha

original: katham āryasubhūte niradhiṣṭhāneṣu sarvadharmeṣu evaṃ vadasi?
analyzed: katham ārya subhūte niradhiṣṭhāneṣu sarva dharmeṣu evam vadasi

original: tathāgatasyaiṣo 'nubhāvas tathāgatasyaitad adhiṣṭhānam iti.
analyzed: tathāgatasya eṣaḥ nubhāvaḥ tathāgatasya etat adhiṣṭhānam iti

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: evam etat kauśikaivam etat,
analyzed: evam etat kauśika evam etat

original: nānyatra niradhiṣṭhānadharmatāyās tathāgata upalabhyate,
analyzed: na anyatra niradhiṣṭhāna dharma tāyāḥ tathāgataḥ upalabhyate

original: nānyatra tathatāyās tathāgata upalabhyate,
analyzed: na anyatra tathatāyāḥ tathāgataḥ upalabhyate

original: na ca niradhiṣṭhānadharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate,
analyzed: na ca niradhiṣṭhāna dharma tāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate

original: na ca tathāgate niradhiṣṭhānadharmatā upalabhyate,
analyzed: na ca tathāgate niradhiṣṭhāna dharma tā upalabhyate

original: na ca tathatayāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate,
analyzed: na ca tathatayām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate

original: na ca tāthāgate tathatopalabhyate,
analyzed: na ca tāthāgate tathatā upalabhyate

original: na rūpatathatāyāṃ tahāgata upalabhyate,
analyzed: na rūpa tathatāyām upalabhyate

original: na ca tathāgate rūpatathatopalabhyate,
analyzed: na ca tathāgate rūpa tathatā upalabhyate

original: na rūpadharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate,
analyzed: na rūpa dharma tāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate

original: na ca tathāgate rūpadharmatā na vedanātathatāyāṃ na saṃjñātathatayāṃ na saṃskāratathatāyāṃ na vijñānatathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate, na ca
analyzed: na ca tathāgate rūpa dharma tā na vedanā tathatāyām na saṃjñā tathatayām na saṃskāra tathatāyām na vijñāna tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate na ca

original: tathāgate vijñānatathatopalabhyate,
analyzed: tathāgate vijñāna tathatā upalabhyate

original: na vijñānadharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate,
analyzed: na vijñāna dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate

original: na ca tathāgate vijñānadharmatā,
analyzed: na ca tathāgate vijñāna dharma tā

original: evaṃ vyastasamasteṣu skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu pāramitābhijñāsatyeṣu
analyzed: evam vyasta samasteṣu skandha dhātu āyatana pratītyasamutpādeṣu pāramitā abhijñā satyeṣu

original: saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣadharmāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu sarvaśūnyatāyāṃ sarvasamādhiṣu
analyzed: saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣa dharma apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattiṣu sarva śūnyatāyām sarva samādhiṣu

original: sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu yāvan na sarvajñatātathatāyāṃ
analyzed: sarva dhāraṇī mukheṣu daśa bala vaiśāradya pratisaṃvid āveṇika buddha dharmeṣu yāvat na sarvajña tā tathatāyām

original: tathāgata upalabhyate,
analyzed: tathāgataḥ upalabhyate

original: na ca tathāgate sarvajñatātathatā upalabhyate,
analyzed: na ca tathāgate sarvajña tā tathatā upalabhyate

original: na sarvajñatādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate,
analyzed: na sarvajña tā dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate

original: na ca tathāgate sarvajñatādharmatā. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: na ca tathāgate sarvajña tā dharma tā tat kasya hetoḥ

original: yaḥ kauśika tathāgato na rūpatathatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyukto vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānatathatāyāṃ
analyzed: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ na rūpa tathatāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskāra vijñāna tathatāyām

original: saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ. yaḥ kauśika tathāgato na rūpadharmatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyukto
analyzed: saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ na rūpa dharmatāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ

original: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānadharmatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ,
analyzed: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskāra vijñāna dharmatāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ

original: na cānyatra rūpatathatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ. na cānyatra rūpadharmatāyāḥ saṃyukto
analyzed: na ca anyatra rūpa tathatāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ na ca anyatra rūpa dharma tāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ

original: na visaṃyuktaḥ. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā na cānyatra vijñānatathatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyukto
analyzed: na visaṃyuktaḥ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ na ca anyatra vijñāna tathatāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ

original: na cānyatra vijñānadharmatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ. vistareṇa yāvad yas tathāgato
analyzed: na ca anyatra vijñāna dharmatāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ vistareṇa yāvat yaḥ tathāgataḥ

original: na sa sarvajñatātathatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ,
analyzed: na sa sarvajña tā tathatāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ

original: na sarvajñatādharmatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ,
analyzed: na sarvajña tā dharmatāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ

original: na cānyatra sarvajñatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ na cānyatra sarvajñatādharmatāyāḥ
analyzed: na ca anyatra sarvajña tāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ na ca anyatra sarvajña tā dharmatāyāḥ

original: saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ yo hi kauśika sarvadharmeṣu na saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ tasyaiṣo
analyzed: saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ yaḥ hi kauśika sarva dharmeṣu na saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ tasya eṣaḥ

original: 'nubhāvas tasyaitad adhiṣṭhānam anadhiṣṭhānayogena. yat punaḥ kauśika evaṃ vadasi:
analyzed: nubhāvaḥ tasya etat adhiṣṭhānam an adhiṣṭhāna yogena yat punar kauśika evam vadasi

original: kuto bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā gaveṣitavyeti?
analyzed: kutas bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā gaveṣitavyā iti

original: na rūpato gaveṣitavyā nānyatra rūpato gaveṣitavyā,
analyzed: na rūpataḥ gaveṣitavyā na anyatra rūpataḥ gaveṣitavyā

original: na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārebhyo na vijñānato gaveṣitavyā nānyatra vijñānād gaveṣitavyā. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: na vedanāyāḥ na saṃjñāyāḥ na saṃskārebhyaḥ na vijñānataḥ gaveṣitavyā na anyatra vijñānāt gaveṣitavyā tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi kauśika yā ca prajñāpāramitā yac ca rūpaṃ yā ca vedanā yā ca saṃjñā ye ca
analyzed: tathā hi kauśika yā ca prajñāpāramitā yat ca rūpam yā ca vedanā yā ca saṃjñā ye ca

original: saṃskārā yac ca vijñānaṃ yā ca gaveṣaṇā sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā
analyzed: saṃskārāḥ yat ca vijñānam yā ca gaveṣaṇā sarve ete dharmāḥ na saṃyuktāḥ na visaṃyuktā

original: arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇāḥ.
analyzed: arūpiṇaḥ nidarśanāḥ apratighāḥ ekalakṣaṇāḥ yat uta alakṣaṇāḥ

original: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā na dhātuto geveṣitavyā
analyzed: punar aparam kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā na dhātutaḥ

original: nāyatanebhyo na pratītyasamutpādebhyo na pāramitābhyo na bodhipakṣyebhyo dharmebhyo
analyzed: na āyatanebhyaḥ na pratītyasamutpādebhyaḥ na pāramitābhyaḥ na bodhi pakṣyebhyaḥ dharmebhyaḥ

original: nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattibhyo na (PSP_2-3:29)
analyzed: na a pramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattibhyaḥ na

original: satyebhyo nābhijñābhyo na samādhibhyo na dhāraṇīmukhebhyo na balebhyo na vaiśāradyebhyo
analyzed: satyebhyaḥ na abhijñābhyaḥ na samādhibhyaḥ na dhāraṇīmukhebhyaḥ na balebhyaḥ na vaiśāradyebhyaḥ

original: na pratisaṃvidbhyo nāṣṭādaśabhya āveṇikebhyo buddhadharmebhyo yāvan na sarvākārajñatāyā
analyzed: na pratisaṃvidbhyaḥ na aṣṭādaśabhyaḥ āveṇikebhyaḥ buddha dharmebhyaḥ yāvat na sarva ākārajña tāyāḥ

original: gaveṣitavyā nānyatra sarvākārajñatāyā gaveṣitavyā. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: gaveṣitavyā na anyatra sarva ākārajña tāyāḥ gaveṣitavyā tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi kauśika yā ca prajñāpāramitā yā ca sarvākārajñatā yā ca gaveṣaṇā sarva ete
analyzed: tathā hi kauśika yā ca prajñāpāramitā yā ca sarva ākāra jña tā yā ca gaveṣaṇā sarve ete

original: dharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇāḥ. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: dharmāḥ na saṃyuktāḥ na visaṃyuktāḥ arūpiṇaḥ nidarśanāḥ apratighāḥ eka lakṣaṇāḥ yat uta alakṣaṇāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi kauśika na rūpaṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra rūpāt prajñāpāramitā na vedanā
analyzed: tathā hi kauśika na rūpam prajñāpāramitā na anyatra rūpāt prajñāpāramitā na vedanā

original: na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ prajñāpāramitā nāpy anyatra vijñānāt prajñāpāramitā
analyzed: na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ na vijñānam prajñāpāramitā na api anyatra vijñānāt prajñāpāramitā

original: evaṃ vyastasamastāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādapāramitāsatyābhijñāsaptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā
analyzed: evam vyasta samastāḥ skandha dhātu āyatana pratītyasamutpāda pāramitā satya abhijñā saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣyā

original: dharmā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni
analyzed: dharmāḥ apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattayaḥ sarva śūnyatāḥ sarva samādhayaḥ sarva dhāraṇī mukhāni

original: daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvida āveṇikabuddhadharmā yāvan na sarvākārajñatā prajñāpāramitā
analyzed: daśa bala vaiśāradya pratisaṃvidaḥ āveṇika buddha dharmāḥ yāvat na sarva ākāra jña tā prajñāpāramitā

original: nānyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā. evaṃ na rūpatathatā prajñāpāramitā nāpy
analyzed: na anyatra sarva ākāra jña tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā evam na rūpa tathatā prajñāpāramitā nā api

original: anyatra rūpatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā na vedanātathatā na saṃjñātathatā na saṃskāratathatā
analyzed: anyatra rūpa tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā na vedanā tathatā na saṃjñā tathatā na saṃskāra tathatā

original: na vijñānatathatā prajñāpāramitā na cānyatra vijñānatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā. na
analyzed: na vijñāna tathatā prajñāpāramitā na ca anyatra vijñāna tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā na

original: rūpadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra rūpadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā na vedanādharmatā
analyzed: rūpa dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra rūpa dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā na vedanā dharma tā

original: na saṃjñādharmatā na saṃskāradharmatā na vijñānadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra
analyzed: na saṃjñā dharma tā na saṃskāra dharma tā na vijñāna dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra

original: vijñānadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā,
analyzed: vijñāna dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā

original: yāvan na sarvajñatātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sarvajñatātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā,
analyzed: yāvat na sarvajña tā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra sarvajña tā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā

original: na sarvajñatādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sarvajñatādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: na sarvajña tā dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra sarvajña tā dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi kauśika sarva ete dharmā na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante. evam eva sarvadharmeṣv asaṃvidyamāneṣv anupalabhyamāneṣu na rūpaṃ prajñāpāramitā  #
analyzed: tathā hi kauśika sarve ete dharmāḥ na saṃvidyante na upalabhyante evam eva sarva dharmeṣu a saṃvidyamāneṣu an upalabhyamāneṣu na rūpam prajñāpāramitā

original: nānyatra rūpāt prajñāpāramitā,
analyzed: na anyatra rūpāt prajñāpāramitā

original: na rūpatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra rūpatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā. na rūpadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra rūpadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā.  #
analyzed: na rūpa tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra rūpa tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā na rūpa dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra rūpa dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā

original: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā,
analyzed: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā

original: na vijñānaṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vijñānāt prajñāpāramitā. na vijñānatathatā prajñāpāramitā
analyzed: na vijñānam prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vijñānāt prajñāpāramitā na vijñāna tathatā prajñāpāramitā

original: nānyatra vijñānatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā. na vijñānadharmatā prajñāpāramitā (PSP_2-3:30)
analyzed: na anyatra vijñāna tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā na vijñāna dharma tā prajñāpāramitā

original: nānyatra vijñānadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā. evaṃ vyastasamasteṣu skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu
analyzed: na anyatra vijñāna dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā evam vyasta samasteṣu skandha dhātu āyatana pratītyasamutpādeṣu

original: pāramitāsatyābhijñāsaptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ
analyzed: pāramitā satya abhijñā saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣyāḥ dharmāḥ a pramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattayaḥ

original: sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ. sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvido
analyzed: sarva śūnyatāḥ sarva samādhayaḥ sarva dhāraṇī mukhāni daśa bala vaiśāradya pratisaṃvidaḥ

original: 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā na sarvākārajñatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ
analyzed: ṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ na sarva ākāra jña tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra sarva ākāra jña tāyāḥ

original: prajñāpāramitā. na sarvākārajñatātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sarvākārajñatātathatāyāḥ
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā na sarva ākāra jña tā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra sarva ākārajña tā tathatāyāḥ

original: prajñāpāramitā. na sarvākārajñatādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sarvākārajñatādharmatāyāḥ prajñāparamitā.
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā na sarva ākāra jña tā dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra sarva ākāra jña tā dharmatāyāḥ prajñāparamitā

original: iti sānuśaṃsaṃ darśanamārgam adhikṛtya duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ
analyzed: iti sa anuśaṃsam darśana mārgam adhikṛtya duḥkhe dharma jñāna kṣāntiḥ

original: atha khalu śakro devānām indra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthaviram etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu śakraḥ devānām indraḥ āyuṣmantam subhūtim sthaviram etat avocat

original: mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
analyzed: mahā pāramitā iyam bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām yat uta prajñāpāramitā

original: apramāṇapāramiteyaṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
analyzed: a pramāṇa pāramitā iyam yat uta prajñāpāramitā

original: aparimāṇapāramiteyaṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
analyzed: aparimāṇa pāramitā iyam yat uta prajñāpāramitā

original: anantapāramiteyaṃ bhadanta subhūte yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
analyzed: ananta pāramitā iyam bhadanta subhūte yat uta prajñāpāramitā

original: yasyāṃ śikṣamāṇaiḥ srotaāpannaiḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptam,
analyzed: yasyām śikṣamāṇaiḥ srotaāpannaiḥ srotaāpatti phalam prāptam

original: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmibhir anāgāmibhir arhadbhiḥ pratyekabuddhaiḥ pratyekabodhiḥ prāptā.
analyzed: evam sakṛdāgāmibhiḥ anāgāmibhiḥ arhadbhiḥ pratyekabuddhaiḥ pratyeka bodhiḥ prāptā

original: bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ sarvākārajñatā 'nuprāptā 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā
analyzed: bodhisattvaiḥ mahāsattvaiḥ sarva ākāra jña tā nuprāptā nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ abhisaṃbuddhā

original: 'bhisaṃbuddhyate 'bhisaṃbhotsyate ca.
analyzed: bhisaṃbuddhyate bhisaṃbhotsyate ca

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: evam etat kauśikaivam etat,
analyzed: evam etat kauśika evam etat

original: mahāpāramiteyam apramāṇapāramiteyam aparimāṇapāramiteyaṃ anantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
analyzed: mahā pāramitā iyam apramāṇa pāramitā iyam aparimāṇa pāramitā iyam ananta pāramitā iyam bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām yat uta prajñāpāramitā

original: yatra śikṣamāṇaiḥ. srotaāpannaiḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptam,
analyzed: yatra śikṣamāṇaiḥ srotaāpannaiḥ srotaāpatti phalam prāptam

original: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmibhir anāgāmibhir arhadbhiḥ pratyekabuddhaiḥ pratyekabodhiḥ prāptā.
analyzed: evam sakṛdāgāmibhiḥ anāgāmibhiḥ arhadbhiḥ pratyekabuddhaiḥ pratyeka bodhiḥ prāptā

original: bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ sarvākārajñatā 'nuprāptā 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā
analyzed: bodhisattvaiḥ mahāsattvaiḥ sarva ākāra jña tā nuprāptā nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ abhisaṃbuddhā

original: 'bhisaṃbuddhyate 'bhisaṃbhotsyate ca. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: bhisaṃbuddhyate bhisaṃbhotsyate ca tat kasya hetoḥ

original: rūpamahattayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: rūpa mahā tayā kauśika mahā pāramitā iyam bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi kauśika rūpasya na pūrvanta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
analyzed: tathā hi kauśika rūpasya na pūrva antaḥ upalabhyate na apara antaḥ upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate

original: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānamahattayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñāna mahā tayā kauśika mahā pāramitā iyam bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi kauśika vijñānasya na (PSP_2-3:31)
analyzed: tathā hi kauśika vijñānasya na

original: pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate. evaṃ vyastasamastānāṃ
analyzed: pūrva antaḥ upalabhyate na apara antaḥ upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate evam vyasta samastānām

original: pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ pāramitānāṃ satyānām abhijñānāṃ saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ
analyzed: pratītyasamutpāda aṅgānām pāramitānām satyānām abhijñānām saptatriṃśatām bodhi pakṣyāṇām

original: dharmāṇām apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ sarvasamādhīnāṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ
analyzed: dharmāṇām apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattīnām sarva śūnyatānām sarva samādhīnām sarva dhāraṇī mukhānām

original: daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām
analyzed: daśānām tathāgata balānām caturṇām vaiśāradyānām catasṛṇām pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām

original: āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatāmahattayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ
analyzed: āveṇikānām buddha dharmāṇām yāvat sarva ākāra jña tā mahat tayā kauśika mahā pāramitā iyam

original: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi kauśika sarvākārajñatāyā na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na
analyzed: tathā hi kauśika sarva ākārajña tāyāḥ na pūrva antaḥ upalabhyate na apara antaḥ upalabhyate na

original: madhyam upalabhyate. anena kauśika paryāyeṇa mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām.
analyzed: madhyam upalabhyate anena kauśika paryāyeṇa mahā pāramitā iyam bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām

original: iti duḥkhe dharmajñānam
analyzed: iti duḥkhe dharma jñānam

original: rūpāpramāṇatayā kauśikāpramāṇapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: rūpa apramāṇa tayā kauśika apramāṇa pāramitā iyam bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi kauśika rūpasya pramāṇaṃ nopalabhyate,
analyzed: tathā hi kauśika rūpasya pramāṇam na upalabhyate

original: tadyathāpi nāma kauśikākāśasya pramāṇaṃ nopalabhyate,
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma kauśika ākāśasya pramāṇam na upalabhyate

original: evam eva kauśika rūpasya pramāṇaṃ nopalabhyate. ākāśāpramāṇatayā ca rūpāpramāṇatā,
analyzed: evam eva kauśika rūpasya pramāṇam na upalabhyate ākāśa apramāṇa tayā ca rūpa apramāṇa tā

original: rūpāpramāṇatayā ca prajñāpāramitāpramāṇatā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānāpramāṇatayā kauśika,
analyzed: rūpa apramāṇa tayā ca prajñāpāramitā pramāṇa tā bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñāna apramāṇa tayā kauśika

original: apramāṇapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: apramāṇa pāramitā iyam bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi kauśika vijñānasya pramāṇaṃ nopalabhyate,
analyzed: tathā hi kauśika vijñānasya pramāṇam na upalabhyate

original: tadyathāpi nāma kauśika,
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma kauśika

original: ākāśasya pramāṇaṃ nopalabhyate,
analyzed: ākāśasya pramāṇam na upalabhyate

original: evam eva kauśika vijñānasya pramāṇaṃ nopalabhyate. ākāśāpramāṇatayā ca vjñānāpramāṇatā,
analyzed: evam eva kauśika vijñānasya pramāṇam na upalabhyate ākāśa apramāṇa tayā ca vjñāna apramāṇa tā

original: vijñānāpramāṇatayā ca prajñāpāramitāpramāṇatā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. evaṃ
analyzed: vijñāna apramāṇa tayā ca prajñāpāramitā pramāṇa tā bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām evam

original: vyastasamastāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāṅgapāramitābodhipakṣyadharmāḥ
analyzed: vyasta samastāḥ skandha dhātu āyatana pratītyasamutpāda aṅga pāramitā bodhi pakṣya dharmāḥ

original: satyābhijñāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhadaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmā
analyzed: satya abhijñā pramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattayaḥ sarva śūnyatāḥ sarva samādhayaḥ sarva dhāraṇī mukha daśa bala vaiśāradya pratisaṃvid āveṇika buddha dharmā

original: yāvat sarvākārajñātatāpraṃāṇatayā kauśika,
analyzed: yāvat sarva ākāra jñāta tā praṃāṇa tayā kauśika

original: apramāṇapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: apramāṇa pāramitā iyam bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi kauśika sarvākārajñatāyāḥ pramāṇaṃ nopalabhyate,
analyzed: tathā hi kauśika sarva ākārajña tāyāḥ pramāṇam na upalabhyate

original: tadyathāpi nāma kauśika,
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma kauśika

original: ākāśasya pramāṇaṃ nopalabhyate,
analyzed: ākāśasya pramāṇam na upalabhyate

original: evam eva kauśika sarvākarajñatāyāḥ pramāṇaṃ nopalabhyate. ākāśāpramāṇatayā ca sarvākārajñatāpramāṇatā,
analyzed: evam eva kauśika sarva ākara jña tāyāḥ pramāṇam na upalabhyate ākāśa apramāṇa tayā ca sarva ākārajña tā pramāṇa tā

original: sarvākārajñatāpramāṇatayā ca prajñāpāramitāpramāṇatā. anena kauśika paryāyeṇāpramāṇapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām.
analyzed: sarva ākāra jña tā pramāṇa tayā ca prajñāpāramitā pramāṇa tā anena kauśika paryāyeṇa a pramāṇa pāramitā iyam bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām

original: iti duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ
analyzed: iti duḥkhe nvaya jñāna kṣāntiḥ

original: rūpāparimāṇatayā kauśika,
analyzed: rūpa aparimāṇa tayā kauśika

original: aparimāṇapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: aparimāṇa pāramitā iyam bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi kauśika rūpasya parimāṇaṃ nopalabhyate,
analyzed: tathā hi kauśika rūpasya parimāṇam na upalabhyate

original: tadyathāpi nāma kauśikākāśasya parimāṇaṃ nopalabhyate,
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma kauśika ākāśasya parimāṇam na upalabhyate

original: evam eva kauśika rūpasya parimāṇaṃ nopalabhyate. ākāśāparimāṇatayā ca rūpāparimāṇatā,
analyzed: evam eva kauśika rūpasya parimāṇam na upalabhyate ākāśa aparimāṇa tayā ca rūpa aparimāṇa tā

original: rūpāparimāṇatayā ca prajñāramitāparimāṇatā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām evaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatā vaktavyā. iti duḥkhe 'nvayajñānam
analyzed: rūpa aparimāṇa tayā ca prajñā āramitā aparimāṇa tā bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām evam yāvat sarva ākāra jña tā vaktavyā iti duḥkhe nvaya jñānam

original: rūpānantatayā kauśikānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: rūpa ananta tayā kauśika ananta pāramitā iyam bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi rūpasya nānto na madhyam upalabhyate. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānānantatayā kauśikānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām.  #
analyzed: tathā hi rūpasya na antaḥ na madhyam upalabhyate vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāṇām vijñāna ananta tayā kauśika ananta pāramitā iyam bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām

original: tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi kauśika vijñānasya nānto na madhyam upalabhyate. evaṃ vyastasamasteṣu skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu
analyzed: tathā hi kauśika vijñānasya na antaḥ na madhyam upalabhyate evam vyasta samasteṣu skandha dhātu āyatana pratītyasamutpādeṣu

original: pāramitābhijñāsatyeṣu smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu
analyzed: pāramitā abhijñā satyeṣu smṛti upasthāna samyakprahāṇa ṛddhipāda indriya bala bodhyaṅga mārga apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattiṣu

original: sarvaśūnyatāsu sarvasamādhiṣu sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu daśabalavaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu
analyzed: sarva śūnyatāsu sarva samādhiṣu sarva dhāraṇī mukheṣu daśa bala vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvid āveṇika buddha dharmeṣu

original: sarvākārajñatānantatayā kauśika,
analyzed: sarva ākāra jña tā ananta tayā kauśika

original: anantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānaṃ. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: ananta pāramitā iyam bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānam tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi kauśika sarvākārajñatāyā nānto na madhyam upalabhyate. anena kauśika paryāyeṇa
analyzed: tathā hi kauśika sarva ākārajña tāyāḥ na antaḥ na madhyam upalabhyate anena kauśika paryāyeṇa

original: anantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ rūpānantatām upādāya yāvat sarvākārajñatānantatām
analyzed: ananta pāramitā iyam bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām rūpa ananta tām upādāya yāvat sarva ākāra jña tā ananta tām

original: upādāya. iti hetupratiṣedhaḥ
analyzed: upādāya iti hetu pratiṣedhaḥ

original: punar aparaṃ kauśikārambaṇānantatayānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
analyzed: punar aparam kauśika ārambaṇa ananta tayā ananta pāramitā iyam bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām yat uta prajñāpāramitā

original: devendra āha:
analyzed: devendraḥ āha

original: kathaṃ bhadanta subhūte ārambaṇānantatayānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā?
analyzed: katham bhadanta subhūte ārambaṇa ananta tayā ananta pāramitā iyam bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām yat uta prajñāpāramitā

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: sarvākārajñatārambaṇānantatayānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā. iti samudayapratiṣedhaḥ
analyzed: sarva ākāra jña tā ārambaṇa ananta tayā ananta pāramitā iyam bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām yat uta prajñāpāramitā iti samudaya pratiṣedhaḥ

original: punar aparaṃ kauśikārambaṇānantatayānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
analyzed: punar aparam kauśika ārambaṇa ananta tayā ananta pāramitā iyam bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām yat uta prajñāpāramitā

original: devendra āha:
analyzed: devendraḥ āha

analyzed: katham bhadanta subhūte ārambaṇa ananta tayā ananta pāramitā iyam

analyzed: devendraḥ āha

original: kathaṃ bhadanta subhūte tathatārambaṇānantatayānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā?

analyzed: evam tathatā ārambaṇa ananta tayā ananta pāramitā iyam bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām yat uta prajñāpāramitā iti pratyaya pratiṣedhaḥ

original: punar aparaṃ kauśika sattvānantatayānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā.

original: aho dharmaḥ,
analyzed: aho dharmaḥ

original: aho dharmaḥ,
analyzed: aho dharmaḥ

analyzed: na ca nāma kaścid dharmaḥ upalabhyate rūpam vā vedanā vā saṃjñā vā saṃskārāḥ vā vijñānam vā yāvat sarva ākārajña tā vā

original: kutaḥ punas trayāṇāṃ yānānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ prajñāyate śrāvakayānasya vā pratyekabuddhayānasya vā mahāyānasya vā.
analyzed: kutas punar trayāṇām yānānām vyavasthānam prajñāyate śrāvaka yānasya vā pratyekabuddha yānasya vā mahā yānasya vā

analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān tān deva putrān āmantrayāmāsa

original: evam etad devaputrā evam etat,
analyzed: evam etat deva putrāḥ evam etat

original: yathā vācaṃ bhāṣadhve na ca nāma kaścid dharma upalabhyate rūpaṃ vā vedanā vā saṃjñā
analyzed: yathā vācam bhāṣadhve na ca nāma kaścid dharmaḥ upalabhyate rūpam vā vedanā vā saṃjñā

analyzed: vā saṃskārāḥ vā vijñānam vā yāvat sarva ākāra jña tā vā trayāṇām ca yānānām vyavasthānam

original: prajñāyate śrāvakayānasya vā pratyekabuddhayānasya vā mahāyānasya vā. tathāgataḥ
analyzed: prajñāyate śrāvaka yānasya vā pratyekabuddha yānasya vā mahā yānasya vā tathāgataḥ

original: sa devaputrā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhārayitavyo yo 'nayā prajñāpāramitayāvirahito

original: bhaviṣyati anupalambhayogena. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: bhaviṣyati anupalambha yogena tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ trīṇi yānāni vistareṇopadiṣṭāni śrāvakayānaṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānaṃ vā mahāyānaṃ vā. na cānyatra dānapāramitāyās  #
analyzed: tathā hi atra prajñāpāramitāyām trīṇi yānāni vistareṇa upadiṣṭāni śrāvaka yānam vā pratyekabuddha yānam vā mahāyānam vā na ca anyatra dāna pāramitāyāḥ

original: tathāgata upalabhyate,
analyzed: tathāgataḥ upalabhyate

original: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyā na cānyatra
analyzed: evam śīla pāramitāyāḥ kṣānti pāramitāyāḥ vīrya pāramitāyāḥ dhyāna pāramitāyāḥ na ca anyatra

original: prajñāpāramitāyās tathāgata upalabhyate. na cānyatrādhyātmaśūnyatāyā na cānyatra
analyzed: prajñāpāramitāyāḥ tathāgataḥ upalabhyate na ca anyatra adhyātma śūnyatāyāḥ na ca anyatra

original: bahirdhāśūnyatāyā na cānyatrādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāḥ,
analyzed: bahirdhā śūnyatāyāḥ na ca anyatra adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatāyāḥ

original: yāvan na cānyatrābhāvasvābhāvaśūnyatāyās tathāgata upalabhyate. na cānyatra smṛtyupasthānebhyas
analyzed: yāvat na ca anyatra abhāva sva abhāva śūnyatāyāḥ tathāgataḥ upalabhyate na ca anyatra smṛti upasthānebhyaḥ

original: tathāgata upalabhyate. evaṃ na cānyatra samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgābhijñāsatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattisamādhidhāraṇīmukhebhyas
analyzed: tathāgataḥ upalabhyate evam na ca anyatra samyakprahāṇa ṛddhipāda indriya bala bodhyaṅga mārga abhijñā satya apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpatti samādhi dhāraṇī mukhebhyaḥ

original: tathāgata upalabhyate. na cānyatra daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmebhyas
analyzed: tathāgataḥ upalabhyate na ca anyatra daśa bala vaiśāradya pratisaṃvid āveṇika buddha dharmebhyaḥ

original: tathāgata upalabhyate. na cānyatra sarvākārajñatāyās tathāgata upalabhyate. bodhisattvā
analyzed: tathāgataḥ upalabhyate na ca anyatra sarva ākāra jña tāyāḥ tathāgataḥ upalabhyate bodhisattvā

original: mahāsattvāś ca devaputrāḥ sarveṣv eva dharmeṣu śikṣante dānapāramitāyām ādiṃ kṛtvā
analyzed: mahāsattvāḥ ca devaputrāḥ sarveṣu eva dharmeṣu śikṣante dāna pāramitāyām ādim kṛtvā

original: yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śikṣante. tasmāt tarhi (PSP_2-3:35)
analyzed: yāvat sarva ākārajña tāyām śikṣante tasmāt tarhi

original: devaputrāḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tathāgata eveti vaktavyo yo 'nayā prajñāpāramitayāvirahitaś
analyzed: deva putrāḥ sa bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ tathāgataḥ evā iti vaktavyaḥ yaḥ nayā prajñāpāramitayā avirahitaḥ

original: carati. yadāhaṃ devaputrā dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike
analyzed: carati yadā aham deva putrāḥ dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya antike

original: dīpavatyāṃ rājadhānyām antarāyaṇamadhyagato dānapāramitayāvirahito bhaveyam. evaṃ
analyzed: dīpavatyām rājadhānyām antarāyaṇa madhya gataḥ dāna pāramitayā avirahitaḥ bhaveyam evam

original: śīlapāramitayā kṣāntipāramitayā vīryapāramitayā dhyānapāramitayā prajñāpāramitayāvirahito
analyzed: śīla pāramitayā kṣānti pāramitayā vīrya pāramitayā dhyāna pāramitayā prajñāpāramitayā avirahitaḥ

original: bhaveyam. evam adhyātmaśūnyatayāvirahito bhaveyam. evaṃ bahirdhāśānyatayādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā
analyzed: bhaveyam evam adhyātma śūnyatayā avirahitaḥ bhaveyam evam bahirdhā śānyatayā adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatayā

original: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayāvirahito bhaveyam. evaṃ smṛtyupasthānair avirahito bhaveyam.
analyzed: yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatayā avirahitaḥ bhaveyam evam smṛti upasthānaiḥ avirahitaḥ bhaveyam

original: evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgair avirahito bhaveyaṃ. evaṃ caturbhir
analyzed: evam samyak prahāṇa ṛddhipāda indriya bala bodhyaṅga mārgaiḥ avirahitaḥ bhaveyam evam caturbhiḥ

original: dhyānaiś caturbir apramāṇaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir aṣṭādaśabhiś cāveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ.
analyzed: dhyānaiḥ caturbiḥ apramāṇaiḥ catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ aṣṭādaśabhiḥ ca āveṇikaiḥ buddha dharmaiḥ

original: mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā cānyaiś cāpramāṇair buddhadharmair avirahito bhaveyaṃ tac
analyzed: mahā maitryā mahā karuṇayā ca anyaiḥ ca apramāṇaiḥ buddha dharmaiḥ avirahitaḥ bhaveyam tat

original: cānupalambhayogena. tadāhaṃ devaputrās tena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena vyākṛto;
analyzed: ca anupalambha yogena tadā aham deva putrāḥ tena tathāgatena arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena vyākṛtaḥ

original: bhaviṣyasi tvam anāgate 'dhvany asminn eva sahālokadhātav asaṃkhyaiḥ kalpaiḥ śākyamunir
analyzed: bhaviṣyasi tvam anāgate dhvani asmin eva sahā lokadhāto asaṃkhyaiḥ kalpaiḥ śākyamuniḥ

original: nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ
analyzed: nāma tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ vidyā caraṇa saṃpannaḥ sugataḥ loka vid anuttaraḥ

original: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyānāṃ ca buddho bhagavān.
analyzed: puruṣa damya sārathiḥ śāstā devānām ca manuṣyānām ca buddhaḥ bhagavān

original: iti samudaye dharmajñānam
analyzed: iti samudaye dharma jñānam

original: atha khalu te devaputrā bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu te deva putrāḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

analyzed: āścaryam bhagavan yāvat iyam prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām sarva ākāra jña tāyāḥ

original: anuparigrāhikā rūpasyāparigrahānutsargayogena. vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyāparigrahānutsargayogena.
analyzed: anuparigrāhikāḥ rūpasya a parigraha an utsarga yogena vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām vijñānasya a parigraha an utsarga yogena

original: evaṃ vyastasamastānāṃ skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ pāramitānāṃ
analyzed: evam vyasta samastānām skandha dhātu āyatanānām pratītyasamutpāda aṅgānām pāramitānām

original: smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgāṇāṃ dhyānārūpyasamāpattināṃ
analyzed: smṛti upasthāna samyakprahāṇa ṛddhipāda indriya bala bodhyaṅga mārgāṇām dhyāna ārūpya samāpattinām

original: sarvaśūnyatānāṃ sarvasamādhīnāṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidaṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ
analyzed: sarva śūnyatānām sarva samādhīnām sarva dhāraṇī mukhānām daśa bala vaiśāradya pratisaṃvid aṣṭādaśa āveṇika buddha dharmāṇām
