original: abhisamayālaṃkārānusāreṇa pariśodhitāyāṃ śakraparivarto nāma dyitīyaḥ.
analyzed: abhisamaya alaṃkāra anusāreṇa pariśodhitāyām śakraparivartaḥ nāma dyitīyaḥ

original: atha khalu bhagavāṃś catasraḥ pariṣado bhikṣubhibhṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā bodhisattvān
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān catasraḥ pariṣadaḥ bhikṣu bhibhṣuṇī upāsaka upāsikāḥ bodhisattvān

original: ca devaputrān saṃnipatitān saṃniṣaṇṇāṃś (PSP_2-3:36)
analyzed: ca deva putrān saṃnipatitān saṃniṣaṇṇān

original: ca sarvān sākṣiṇaḥ sthāpayitvā śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
analyzed: ca sarvān sākṣiṇaḥ sthāpayitvā śakram devānām indram etat avocat

original: ye kecit kauśika bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā vā kulaputrā
analyzed: ye kecid kauśika bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ bhikṣu bhikṣuṇī upāsaka upāsikāḥ vā kula putrāḥ

original: vā kuladuhitaro vā devaputrā devakanyā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti
analyzed: vā kula duhitaraḥ vā deva putrāḥ deva kanyāḥ vā imām prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti

original: vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti bhāvayiṣyanti parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti
analyzed: vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti bhāvayiṣyanti parebhyaḥ ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti

original: yoniśo manasikariṣyanti,
analyzed: yoniśas manasikariṣyanti

original: ye ca sarvākārajñatācittenāvirahitā bhaviṣyanti teṣāṃ mārā vā mārakāyikā vā avatāraṃ na lapsyante. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: ye ca sarva ākāra jña tā cittena avirahitāḥ bhaviṣyanti teṣām mārāḥ vā māra kāyikāḥ vā avatāram na lapsyante tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ca rūpaśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati. evaṃ vedanā saṃjñāsaṃskārāvijñānaśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā  #
analyzed: tathā hi taiḥ kula putraiḥ kula duhitṛbhiḥ ca rūpa śūnyatā eva su adhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati evam vedanā saṃjñā saṃskāra a vijñāna śūnyatā eva su adhiṣṭhitā

original: bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: bhaviṣyati tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na hi śūnyatā śūnyatāyām avatāraṃ labhate,
analyzed: na hi śūnyatā śūnyatāyām avatāram labhate

original: nānimittam ānimitte 'vatāraṃ labhate,
analyzed: na a nimittam ā a nimitte vatāram labhate

original: nāpraṇihitam apraṇihite 'vatāraṃ labhate. evaṃ vyastasamastā skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādaśūnyataiva
analyzed: na apraṇihitam apraṇihite vatāram labhate evam vyasta samastā skandha dhātu āyatana pratītyasamutpāda śūnyatā eva

original: svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati. evaṃ pāramitāsatyābhijñāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiśūnyataiva
analyzed: su adhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati evam pāramitā satya abhijñā pramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpatti śūnyatā eva

original: svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati. evaṃ sarvaśūnyatā sarvasamādhisarvadhāraṇīmukhasmṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgaśūnyataiva
analyzed: su adhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati evam sarva śūnyatā sarva samādhi sarva dhāraṇī mukha smṛti upasthāna samyak prahāṇa ṛddhipāda indriya bala bodhyaṅga mārga śūnyatā eva

original: svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati. evaṃ daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmaśūnyataiva
analyzed: su adhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati evam daśa bala vaiśāradya pratisaṃvid āveṇika buddha dharma śūnyatā eva

original: svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati. yāvat sarvākārajñatāśūnyataiva taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś
analyzed: su adhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati yāvat sarva ākāra jña tā śūnyatā eva taiḥ kula putraiḥ kula duhitṛbhiḥ

original: ca svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: ca su adhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi na śūnyatā śūnyatāyām avatāraṃ labhate,
analyzed: tathā hi na śūnyatā śūnyatāyām avatāram labhate

original: nānimittam ānimitte 'vatāraṃ labhate,
analyzed: na a nimittam ā a nimitte vatāram labhate

original: nāpraṇihitam apraṇihite 'vatāraṃ labhate. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: na apraṇihitam apraṇihite vatāram labhate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi teṣāṃ svabhāvo na saṃvidyate,
analyzed: tathā hi teṣām svabhāvaḥ na saṃvidyate

original: yenāvatāraṃ labheran,
analyzed: yena avatāram labheran

original: yatra vāvatāraṃ labheran,
analyzed: yatra vā avatāram labheran

original: yasya vāvatāraṃ labheran.
analyzed: yasya vā avatāram labheran

original: iti samudaye 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ
analyzed: iti samudaye nvaya jñāna kṣāntiḥ

original: na khalu punaḥ kauśika teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā manuṣyo vāmanuṣyo vāvatāraṃ
analyzed: na khalu punar kauśika teṣām kula putrāṇām kula duhitṛṇām vā manuṣyaḥ vā amanuṣyaḥ vā avatāram

original: lapsyate. tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ca sarvasattvānām antike maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣā
analyzed: lapsyate tathā hi taiḥ kula putraiḥ kula duhitṛbhiḥ ca sarva sattvānām antike maitrī karuṇā muditā upekṣā

original: bhāvitā sā cānupalambhayogena. (PSP_2-3:37)
analyzed: bhāvitā sā ca anupalambha yogena

original: na ca te kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā viṣamāparihāreṇa kālaṃ kariṣyanti tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: na ca te kauśika kula putrāḥ vā kula duhitaraḥ vā viṣama a parihāreṇa kālam kariṣyanti tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ca dānapāramitāyāṃ caradbhiḥ sarvasattvāḥ
analyzed: tathā hi taiḥ kula putraiḥ kula duhitṛbhiḥ ca dāna pāramitāyām caradbhiḥ sarva sattvāḥ

original: samyakparicaryayā upasthitāḥ. yair vā kauśika cāturmahārājakāyikair devaputrair iha
analyzed: samyak paricaryayā upasthitāḥ yaiḥ vā kauśika cāturmahārājakāyikaiḥ deva putraiḥ iha

original: trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau trayastriṃśair vā yāmair vā tuṣitair vā nirmāṇaratibhir
analyzed: tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau trayastriṃśaiḥ vā yāmaiḥ vā tuṣitaiḥ vā nirmāṇa ratibhiḥ

original: vā paranirmitavaśavartibhir vā brahmakāyikair vā brahmapurohitair vā brahmapārṣadyair
analyzed: vā paranirmitavaśavartibhiḥ vā brahmakāyikaiḥ vā brahmapurohitaiḥ vā brahma pārṣadyaiḥ

original: vā yāvad akaniṣṭhair vā devaputrair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpāditaṃ
analyzed: vā yāvat akaniṣṭhaiḥ vā deva putraiḥ anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpāditam

original: na cāyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śrutā nodgrahītā na dhāritā na vācitā na paryavāptā,
analyzed: na ca ayam prajñāpāramitā śrutā na udgrahītā na dhāritā na vācitā na paryavāptā

original: tair devaputrair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śrotavyodgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca manasikartavyā sarvajñatācittenāvirahitaiḥ.
analyzed: taiḥ deva putraiḥ iyam prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśas ca manasi kartavyā sarvajña tā cittena avirahitaiḥ

original: iti samudaye 'nvayasjñānam
analyzed: iti samudaye

original: punar aparaṃ kauśika ye kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyanti
analyzed: punar aparam kauśika ye kula putrāḥ vā kula duhitaraḥ vā imām prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyanti

original: dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti avirahitāḥ
analyzed: dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśas ca manasikariṣyanti avirahitāḥ

original: sarvākārajñatācittena bhaviṣyanti,
analyzed: sarva ākāra jña tā cittena bhaviṣyanti

original: na khalu punaḥ kauśika teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā śūnyāgāragatānāṃ vā abhyavakāśagatānāṃ vā utpathagatānāṃ vā bhayaṃ vā stambhitatvaṃ  #
analyzed: na khalu punar kauśika teṣām kula putrāṇām kula duhitṛṇām vā śūnya āgāra gatānām vā abhyavakāśa gatānām vā utpatha gatānām vā bhayam vā stambhita tvam

original: vā bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: vā bhaviṣyati tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś cādhyātmaśūnyatā subhāvitā anupalambhayogena,
analyzed: tathā hi taiḥ kula putraiḥ kula duhitṛbhiḥ ca adhyātma śūnyatā su bhāvitā anupalambha yogena

original: bahirdhāśūnyatā subhāvitā anupalambhayogena,
analyzed: bahirdhā śūnyatā su bhāvitā anupalambha yogena

original: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā subhāvitā anupalambhayogena yāvad abhāvasvabhāvasunyatā subhāvitā anūpalambhayogena.
analyzed: adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā su bhāvitā anupalambha yogena yāvat abhāva svabhāva sunyatā su bhāvitā anupalambha yogena

original: atha khalu tāvad eva trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau ye cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrās
analyzed: atha khalu tāvat eva tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau ye cāturmahārājakāyikāḥ deva putrāḥ

original: trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paramrmitavaśavartino yāvac chuddhāvāsakāyikā
analyzed: trāyastriṃśāḥ yāmāḥ tuṣitāḥ nirmāṇa ratayaḥ yāvat śuddhāvāsa kāyikā

original: devaputrās te bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: deva putrāḥ te bhagavantam etat avocat

original: vayaṃ bhagavaṃs teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca satatasamitaṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ
analyzed: vayam bhagavan teṣām kula putrāṇām kula duhitṝṇām ca satata samitam rakṣā āvaraṇa guptim

original: saṃvidhāsyāmaḥ ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti
analyzed: saṃvidhāsyāmaḥ ye imām prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti

original: likhiṣyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti avirahitāś ca bhaviṣyanti sarvajñatācittena. (PSP_2-3:38)
analyzed: likhiṣyanti yoniśas ca manasikariṣyanti avirahitāḥ ca bhaviṣyanti sarvajña tā cittena

original: tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi bhagavan bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya nirayā ucchidyante,
analyzed: tathā hi bhagavan bodhisattvam mahāsattvam āgamya nirayāḥ ucchidyante

original: tiryagyoniyamalokā asurāḥ kāyā manuṣyadāridryā upadravā upasargāḥ. sarve 'py ucchidyante.
analyzed: tiryagyoni yama lokāḥ asurāḥ kāyāḥ manuṣya dāridryāḥ upadravāḥ upasargāḥ sarve pi ucchidyante

original: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathanāṃ loke prādurbhāvo
analyzed: bodhisattvam mahāsattvam āgamya daśānām kuśalānām karma pathanām loke

original: bhavati. caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ dānapāramitāyāḥ
analyzed: bhavati caturṇām dhyānānām caturṇām apramāṇānām catasṛṇām ārūpya samāpattīnām dāna pāramitāyāḥ

original: śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā
analyzed: śīla pāramitāyāḥ kṣānti pāramitāyāḥ vīrya pāramitāyāḥ dhyāna pāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ

original: loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati adhyātmaśūnyatāyā bahirdhāśūnyatāyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā
analyzed: loke prādurbhāvaḥ bhaviṣyati adhyātma śūnyatāyāḥ bahirdhā śūnyatāyāḥ adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatāyāḥ

original: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati. caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ
analyzed: yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatāyāḥ loke prādurbhāvaḥ bhaviṣyati caturṇām smṛti upasthānānām

original: caturṇāṃ samyakprahāṇānāṃ caturṇām ṛddhipādānāṃ pañcānām indriyāṇāṃ pañcānāṃ balānāṃ
analyzed: caturṇām samyakprahāṇānām caturṇām ṛddhipādānām pañcānām indriyāṇām pañcānām balānām

original: saptānāṃ bodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṅgikasya mārgasya caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ
analyzed: saptānām bodhyaṅgānām ārya aṣṭāṅgikasya mārgasya caturṇām ārya satyānām caturṇām apramāṇānām

original: ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛnāṃ pratisaṃvidām
analyzed: ṣaṇṇām abhijñānām daśānām tathāgata balānām caturṇām vaiśāradyānām catasṛnām pratisaṃvidām

original: aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati. anekeṣāṃ samādhīnām
analyzed: aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānām buddha dharmāṇām loke prādurbhāvaḥ bhaviṣyati anekeṣām samādhīnām

original: anekeṣāṃ dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ sarvajñatāyā bodhisattvamārgasya loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati.
analyzed: anekeṣām dhāraṇī mukhānām sarvajña tāyāḥ bodhisattva mārgasya loke prādurbhāvaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: punar aparaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni loke prajñāyante,
analyzed: punar aparam bodhisattvam mahāsattvam āgamya kṣatriya mahāśāla kulāni loke prajñāyante

original: brāhmaṇamahāśālakulāni loke prajñāyante,
analyzed: brāhmaṇa mahāśāla kulāni loke prajñāyante

original: gṛhapatimahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
analyzed: gṛhapati mahā śāla kulāni prajñāyante

original: cakravartimahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
analyzed: cakravarti mahā śāla kulāni prajñāyante

original: cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrāḥ prajñāyante. evaṃ trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ
analyzed: cāturmahārājakāyikāḥ deva putrāḥ prajñāyante evam trāyastriṃśāḥ yāmāḥ tuṣitāḥ nirmāṇaratayaḥ

original: paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitā brahmapārṣadyā mahābrahmāṇo yāvad
analyzed: paranirmitavaśavartinaḥ brahmakāyikāḥ brahmapurohitāḥ brahma pārṣadyāḥ mahābrahmāṇaḥ yāvat

original: akaniṣṭhāś ca devaputrā loke prajñāyante.
analyzed: akaniṣṭhāḥ ca deva putrāḥ loke prajñāyante

original: punar aparaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya srotaāpattiphalaṃ prajñāyate,
analyzed: punar aparam bodhisattvam mahāsattvam āgamya srotaāpatti phalam prajñāyate

original: srotaāpannaḥ. prajñāyate. evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmiphalam anāgāmī arhattvam arhal loke prajñāyate,
analyzed: srotaāpannaḥ prajñāyate evam sakṛdāgāmi phalam sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmi phalam anāgāmī arhat tvam arhat loke prajñāyate

original: pratyekabodhiḥ pratyekabuddhā loke prajñāyante.
analyzed: pratyeka bodhiḥ pratyekabuddhāḥ loke prajñāyante

original: punar aparaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya sattvaparipākaḥ prajñāyate,
analyzed: punar aparam bodhisattvam mahāsattvam āgamya sattva paripākaḥ prajñāyate

original: buddhakṣetrapariśuddhiḥ prajñāyate,
analyzed: buddhakṣetra pariśuddhiḥ prajñāyate

original: tathāgato 'rhan (PSP_2-3:39)
analyzed: tathāgataḥ rhan

original: samyaksaṃbuddho loke prajñāyate,
analyzed: samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ loke prajñāyate

original: dharmacakrapravartanaṃ prajñāyate,
analyzed: dharmacakra pravartanam prajñāyate

original: buddharatnaṃ prajñāyate,
analyzed: buddha ratnam prajñāyate

original: dharmaratnaṃ prajñāyate,
analyzed: dharma ratnam prajñāyate

original: saṃgharatnaṃ prajñāyate. anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa boodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvayakṣagaruḍakiṃnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyeṇa
analyzed: saṃgha ratnam prajñāyate anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa boodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sa deva mānuṣa asura gandharva yakṣa garuḍa kiṃnara mahoraga manuṣya amanuṣyeṇa

original: lokena rakṣāvaraṇaguptiḥ saṃvidhātavyā.
analyzed: lokena rakṣā āvaraṇa guptiḥ saṃvidhātavyā

original: evam ukte bhagavāñ śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
analyzed: evam ukte bhagavān śakram devānām indram etat avocat

original: evam etat kauśikaivam etat,
analyzed: evam etat kauśika evam etat

original: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya nirayatiryagyoniyamaloke gataya ucchidyante,
analyzed: bodhisattvam mahāsattvam āgamya niraya tiryagyoni yama loke gatayaḥ ucchidyante

original: devadāridryaṃ manuṣyadāridryam upadravā upasargāḥ sarve 'py ucchidyante. bodhisattvaṃ
analyzed: deva dāridryam manuṣya dāridryam upadravāḥ upasargāḥ sarve pi ucchidyante bodhisattvam

original: mahāsattvam āgamya daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati. daśānāṃ
analyzed: mahāsattvam āgamya daśānām kuśalānām karma pathānām loke prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati daśānām

original: pāramitānāṃ daśānāṃ bodhisattvabhūmīnām apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyāṇāṃ
analyzed: pāramitānām daśānām bodhisattva bhūmīnām apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattīnām saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣyāṇām

original: dharmāṇāṃ satyānām abhijñānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ sarvasamādhīnāṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ
analyzed: dharmāṇām satyānām abhijñānām sarva śūnyatānām sarva samādhīnām sarva dhāraṇī mukhānām

original: loke prādurbhāvo bhavati. daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ
analyzed: loke prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati daśa bala vaiśāradya pratisaṃvid āveṇikānām buddha dharmāṇām

original: sarvākārajñatāyā bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati. kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni
analyzed: sarva ākāra jña tāyāḥ bodhisattvam mahāsattvam āgamya loke prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati kṣatriya mahāśāla kulāni

original: brāhmaṇamahāśālakulāni gṛhapatimahāśālakulāni bodhisattvaṃ mahāsāttvam āgamya loke prajñāyante,
analyzed: brāhmaṇa mahāśāla kulāni gṛhapati mahāśāla kulāni bodhisattvam mahāsāttvam āgamya loke prajñāyante

original: cakravartirājyakulāni loke prajñāyante,
analyzed: cakravarti rājya kulāni loke prajñāyante

original: cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devaputrāḥ prajñāyante,
analyzed: cāturmahārājakāyikāḥ deva putrāḥ yāvat akaniṣṭhāḥ deva putrāḥ prajñāyante

original: srotaāpattiphalaṃ srotaāpannaḥ,
analyzed: srotaāpatti phalam srotaāpannaḥ

original: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmiphalam anāgāmī arhattvam arhaś ca loke prajñāyate,
analyzed: evam sakṛdāgāmi phalam sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmi phalam anāgāmī arhat tvam arhaḥ ca loke prajñāyate

original: pratyekabodhiḥ pratyekabuddhā loke prajñāyante,
analyzed: pratyeka bodhiḥ pratyekabuddhāḥ loke prajñāyante

original: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya sattvaparipākaḥ prajñāyate,
analyzed: bodhisattvam mahāsattvam āgamya sattva paripākaḥ prajñāyate

original: buddhakṣetrapariśuddhiḥ prajñāyate,
analyzed: buddhakṣetra pariśuddhiḥ prajñāyate

original: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke prajñāyate,
analyzed: tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ loke prajñāyate

original: dharmacakrapravartanaṃ loke prajñāyate,
analyzed: dharma cakra pravartanam loke prajñāyate

original: buddharatnasya dharmaratnasya saṃgharatnasya bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya loke
analyzed: buddha ratnasya dharma ratnasya saṃgha ratnasya bodhisattvam mahāsattvam āgamya loke

original: prādurbhāvo bhavati tasmāt tarhi kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa
analyzed: prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati tasmāt tarhi kauśika bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ sa deva mānuṣa asureṇa

original: lokena satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ satatasamitaṃ cātra nu
analyzed: lokena satkartavyaḥ gurukartavyaḥ mānayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ satata samitam ca atra nu

original: rakṣāvaraṇaguptiḥ saṃvidhātavyā,
analyzed: rakṣā āvaraṇa guptiḥ saṃvidhātavyā

original: imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sa kauśika satkartavyāṃ gurukartavyāṃ mānayitavyāṃ pūjayitavyāṃ manyeta yo bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkartavyaṃ gurukartavyaṃ
analyzed: imām prajñāpāramitām sa kauśika satkartavyām gurukartavyām mānayitavyām pūjayitavyām manyeta yaḥ bodhisattvam mahāsattvam satkartavyam gurukartavyam

original: tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevakena (PSP_2-3:40)
analyzed: tasmāt bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ sa devakena

original: lokena satkartavyaḥ satatasamitaṃ cātra nu rakṣāvaraṇaguptiḥ saṃvidhātavyā. yaś ca kauśika imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratipūrṇaṃ,
analyzed: lokena satkartavyaḥ satata samitam ca atra nu rakṣā āvaraṇa guptiḥ saṃvidhātavyā yaḥ ca kauśikaḥ imam tri sāhasra mahā sāhasram lokadhātum śrāvaka pratyekabuddha pratipūrṇam

original: tadyathāpi nāma ikṣuvanaṃ vā naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ vā sālivanaṃ vā tilavanaṃ vā kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā satkuryād  #
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma ikṣu vanam vā naḍa vanam vā veṇu vanam vā śara vanam vā sāli vanam vā tila vanam vā kaścid eva kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā satkuryāt

original: gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed,
analyzed: gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayet

original: yaś ca prathamacittotpādikaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam avirahitaṃ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ
analyzed: yaḥ ca prathama citta utpādikam bodhisattvam mahāsattvam avirahitam ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ

original: satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pujayed ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati tat
analyzed: satkuryāt gurukuryāt mānayet pujayet ayam eva tatas bahutaram puṇyam prasavati tat

original: kasya hetor bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati?
analyzed: kasya hetoḥ bahutaram puṇyam prasavati

original: tathā hi na kauśika śrāvakapratyekabuddhān āgamya bodhisattvās tathāgatāś cārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke prajñāyante,
analyzed: tathā hi na kauśika śrāvaka pratyekabuddhān āgamya bodhisattvāḥ tathāgatāḥ ca arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ loke prajñāyante

original: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ punar āgamya śrāvakapratyekabuddhās tathāgatāś cārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke prajñāyante,
analyzed: bodhisattvam mahāsattvam punar āgamya śrāvaka pratyekabuddhāḥ tathāgatāḥ ca arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ loke prajñāyante

original: tasmāt tarhi kauśika sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ satkartavyo
analyzed: tasmāt tarhi kauśika sa deva mānuṣa asureṇa lokena bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ satkartavyaḥ

original: gurukartavyo mānayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ satatasamitaṃ cātra nu rakṣāvaraṇaguptiḥ saṃvidhātavyā.
analyzed: gurukartavyaḥ mānayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ satata samitam ca atra nu rakṣā āvaraṇa guptiḥ saṃvidhātavyā

original: iti nirodhe dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ
analyzed: iti nirodhe dharma jñāna kṣāntiḥ

original: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu śakraḥ devānām indraḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad amī bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇantaḥ paryavāpnuvanto dhārayanto vācayanto yoniśaś ca manasikurvantaḥ,
analyzed: āścaryam bhagavan yāvat amī bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇantaḥ paryavāpnuvantaḥ dhārayantaḥ vācayantaḥ yoniśas ca manasikurvantaḥ

original: imān dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān parigṛhṇanti,
analyzed: imān dṛṣṭa dhārmikān guṇān parigṛhṇanti

original: sattvāṃś ca paripācayanti buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayanti,
analyzed: sattvān ca paripācayanti buddhakṣetram ca pariśodhayanti

original: buddhakṣetrāc ca buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmanti buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsanāya,
analyzed: buddhakṣetrāt ca buddhakṣetram saṃkrāmanti buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsanāya

original: yaiś ca kuśalamūlair ākāṅkṣeyus tān buddhān bhagavataḥ pūjayituṃ taiḥ pūjayeyus.
analyzed: yaiḥ ca kuśala mūlaiḥ ākāṅkṣeyuḥ tān buddhān bhagavataḥ pūjayitum taiḥ pūjayeyuḥ

original: tac caiṣāṃ tathaiva ṛdhyate. yaṃ ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antike sthitvā dharmaṃ
analyzed: tat ca eṣām tathā eva ṛdhyate yam ca teṣām buddhānām bhagavatām antike sthitvā dharmam

original: śṛṇvanti sa caiṣāṃ dharmas tāvad eva na pramuṣyate yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
analyzed: śṛṇvanti sa ca eṣām dharmaḥ tāvat eva na pramuṣyate yāvat anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim

original: abhisaṃbuddhāḥ. iti kulasaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti jananīsaṃpadaṃ ca parivārasaṃpadaṃ
analyzed: abhisaṃbuddhāḥ iti kula saṃpadam ca parigṛhṇanti jananī saṃpadam ca parivāra saṃpadam

original: ca lakṣaṇasaṃpadaṃ ca prabhāsaṃpadaṃ ca cakṣuḥsaṃpadaṃ ca svarasaṃpadaṃ ca samādhisaṃpadaṃ
analyzed: ca lakṣaṇa saṃpadam ca prabhā saṃpadam ca cakṣuḥ saṃpadam ca svara saṃpadam ca samādhi saṃpadam

original: ca dhāraṇīsaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti. upāyakauśalyena (PSP_2-3:41)
analyzed: ca dhāraṇī saṃpadam ca parigṛhṇanti upāya kauśalyena

original: ātmānaṃ buddhavigrahaṃ nirmāya lokadhātor lokadhātuṃ saṃkrāmanti,
analyzed: ātmānam buddha vigraham nirmāya lokadhātoḥ lokadhātum saṃkrāmanti

original: yatra buddhānāṃ bhagavatām utpādo nāsti te tatra gatvā dānapāramitāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣante.
analyzed: yatra buddhānām bhagavatām utpādaḥ na asti te tatra gatvā dāna pāramitāyāḥ varṇam bhāṣante

original: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā
analyzed: evam śīla pāramitāyāḥ kṣānti pāramitāyāḥ vīrya pāramitāyāḥ dhyāna pāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ

original: varṇaṃ bhāṣante. adhyātmaśūnyatāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣante. evaṃ bahirdhāśūnyatāyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā
analyzed: varṇam bhāṣante adhyātma śūnyatāyāḥ varṇam bhāṣante evam bahirdhā śūnyatāyāḥ adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatāyāḥ

original: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣante. dhyānānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante. apramāṇānām
analyzed: yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatāyāḥ varṇam bhāṣante dhyānānām varṇam bhāṣante apramāṇānām

original: ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante. smṛtyupasthānānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante. evaṃ samyakprahāṇānām
analyzed: ārūpya samāpattīnām varṇam bhāṣante smṛti upasthānānām varṇam bhāṣante evam samyakprahāṇānām

original: ṛddhipādānām indriyāṇāṃ balānāṃ bodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṅgikasya mārgasya varṇaṃ bhāṣante.
analyzed: ṛddhipādānām indriyāṇām balānām bodhyaṅgānām ārya aṣṭāṅgikasya mārgasya varṇam bhāṣante

original: caturṇām āryasatyānām abhijñānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ
analyzed: caturṇām ārya satyānām abhijñānām daśānām tathāgata balānām vaiśāradyānām pratisaṃvidām

original: yāvad aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante. upāyakuśalena ca dharmaṃ
analyzed: yāvat aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānām buddha dharmāṇām varṇam bhāṣante upāya kuśalena ca dharmam

original: deśayanti yānatrayeṇa ca sattvān vinayanti,
analyzed: deśayanti yāna trayeṇa ca sattvān vinayanti

original: śrāvakayānena pratyekabuddhayānena buddhayānena. iti nirodhe dharmajñānam
analyzed: śrāvaka yānena pratyekabuddha yānena buddha yānena iti nirodhe dharma jñānam

original: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu śakraḥ devānām indraḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad anayā gambhīrayā prajñāpāramitāyā parigṛhītayā sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ
analyzed: āścaryam bhagavan yāvat anayā gambhīrayā prajñāpāramitāyā parigṛhītayā sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ

original: parigṛhīta bhavanti. yad uta dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā
analyzed: bhavanti yat uta dāna pāramitā śīla pāramitā kṣānti pāramitā vīrya pāramitā

original: dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā sarve bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni
analyzed: dhyāna pāramitā prajñāpāramitā sarve bodhi pakṣyāḥ dharmāḥ sarva samādhayaḥ sarva dhāraṇīmukhāni

original: sarvaśūnyatā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ satyābhijñā daśabalāni vaiśāradyāni
analyzed: sarva śūnyatā apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattayaḥ satya abhijñāḥ daśa balāni vaiśāradyāni

original: pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ yāvad vyastasamastāḥ skandhadhātava āyatanāni
analyzed: pratisaṃvidaḥ ṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ yāvat vyasta samastāḥ skandha dhātavaḥ āyatanāni

original: pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ca parigṛhītāni bhavanti. srotaāpattiphalaṃ parigṛhītaṃ bhavati.
analyzed: pratītyasamutpāda aṅgāni ca parigṛhītāni bhavanti srotaāpatti phalam parigṛhītam bhavati

original: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabodhiḥ sarvākārajñatā parigṛhitā bhavati.
analyzed: evam sakṛdāgāmi phalam anāgāmi phalam arhat tvam pratyeka bodhiḥ sarva ākāra jña tā parigṛhitā bhavati

original: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
analyzed: evam ukte bhagavān śakram devānām indram etat avocat

original: prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītayā sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ parigṛhitā bhavanti. evaṃ sarve bodhipakṣyā
analyzed: prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītayā sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ parigṛhitāḥ bhavanti evam sarve bodhi pakṣyāḥ

original: dharmāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni sarvaśūnyatā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ
analyzed: dharmāḥ sarva samādhayaḥ sarva dhāraṇī mukhāni sarva śūnyatāḥ apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattayaḥ

original: satyābhijñāḥ sarve kuśalāḥ karmapathā daśabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido
analyzed: satya abhijñāḥ sarve kuśalāḥ karma pathāḥ daśa balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ

original: 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā yāvad vyastasamastāni skandhadhātvāyatanani pratityasamutpādāṅgāni
analyzed: ṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ yāvat vyasta samastāni pratitya samutpāda aṅgāni

original: yāvat sarvākārajñatā parigṛhītā bhavati.
analyzed: yāvat sarva ākārajña tā parigṛhītā bhavati

original: punar aparaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitayā udgṛhītayā dhāritayā vācitayā paryavāptayā
analyzed: punar aparam kauśika prajñāpāramitayā udgṛhītayā dhāritayā vācitayā paryavāptayā

original: likhitayā yoniśo manasikṛtayā yān guṇān sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā pratilabhate
analyzed: likhitayā yoniśas manasi kṛtayā yān guṇān sa kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā pratilabhate

original: dṛṣṭa eva dharme tān śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te. evaṃ bhagavann
analyzed: dṛṣṭe eva dharme tān śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye ham te evam bhagavan

original: iti śakro devānām indro bhagavataḥt pratyaśroṣīt bhagavān etad avocat:
analyzed: iti śakraḥ devānām indraḥ bhagavataḥ pratyaśroṣīt bhagavān etat avocat

original: yaḥ kaścit kauśikānyatīrthikaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā māro vā mārakāyikā vā devatā
analyzed: yaḥ kaścid kauśika anya tīrthikaḥ kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā māraḥ vā māra kāyikā vā devatā

original: abhimāniko vā pudgalo bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam itaḥ prajñāpāramitāto vivecayitukāmo bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: abhimānikaḥ vā pudgalaḥ bodhisattvam mahāsattvam itas prajñāpāramitātaḥ vivecayitu kāmaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: vivaditukāmo bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: vivaditu kāmaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: vigrahītukāmo bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: vigrahītu kāmaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: virodhayitukāmo bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: virodhayitu kāmaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: teṣāṃ vivecayitukāmānāṃ vivaditukāmānāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ virodhayitukāmānām utpannotpannā vigrahā vivādā virodhāḥ kṣipraṃ punar evāntardhāsyanti,
analyzed: teṣām vivecayitu kāmānām vivaditu kāmānām vigrahītu kāmānām virodhayitu kāmānām utpanna utpannāḥ vigrahāḥ vivādāḥ virodhāḥ kṣipram punar eva antardhāsyanti

original: teṣāṃ vivecayitukāmānāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ vivaditukāmānāṃ virodhayitukāmānāṃ na te 'bhiprāyāḥ paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: teṣām vivecayitu kāmānām vigrahītu kāmānām vivaditu kāmānām virodhayitu kāmānām na te bhiprāyāḥ paripūrim gamiṣyanti tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dīrgharātraṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ caratā,
analyzed: tathā hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dīrgharātram dāna pāramitāyām caratā

original: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
analyzed: evam śīla pāramitāyām kṣānti pāramitāyām vīrya pāramitāyām dhyāna pāramitāyām prajñāpāramitāyām

original: caratā. yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvā dīrgharātraṃ vigrahān vivādān virodhān āpadyante te
analyzed: caratā yeṣām kṛtaśas sattvāḥ dīrgharātram vigrahān vivādān virodhān āpadyante te

original: 'dhyātmikabāhyā dharmāḥ sarve sarvadā parityaktā. yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvā dīrgharātraṃ
analyzed: dhyātmika bāhyāḥ dharmāḥ sarve sarvadā parityaktāḥ yeṣām kṛtaśas sattvāḥ dīrgharātram

original: sattvadauḥśīlyam āpadyante tān bodhisattvo mahāsattva ādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajya
analyzed: sattva dauḥśīlyam āpadyante tān bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ ādhyātmika bāhyān dharmān parityajya

original: tān sattvān śīle pratiṣṭhāpayati. yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvā dīrgharātraṃ krodhavyāpādavihiṃsām
analyzed: tān sattvān śīle pratiṣṭhāpayati yeṣām kṛtaśas sattvāḥ dīrgharātram krodha vyāpāda vihiṃsām

original: āpadyante tān bodhisattvo mahāsattva ādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajya tān sattvān
analyzed: āpadyante tān bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ ādhyātmika bāhyān dharmān parityajya tān sattvān

original: kṣāntau pratiṣṭhāpayati. yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvā dīrgharātraṃ kausīdyam āpadyante tān
analyzed: kṣāntau pratiṣṭhāpayati yeṣām kṛtaśas sattvāḥ dīrgharātram kausīdyam āpadyante tān

original: bodhisattvo mahāsattva ādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajya tān sattvān vīryapāramitāyāṃ
analyzed: bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ ādhyātmika bāhyān dharmān parityajya tān sattvān vīrya pāramitāyām

original: pratiṣṭhāpayati. yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvā dīrgharātraṃ vikṣiptacittam āpadyante tān bodhisattvo
analyzed: pratiṣṭhāpayati yeṣām kṛtaśas sattvāḥ dīrgharātram vikṣipta cittam āpadyante tān bodhisattvaḥ

original: mahāsattva ādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajya tān sattvān dhyāne pratiṣṭhāpayati.
analyzed: mahāsattvaḥ ādhyātmika bāhyān dharmān parityajya tān sattvān dhyāne pratiṣṭhāpayati

original: yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvā dīrgharātraṃ dauṣprajñām āpadyante tān bodhisattvo mahāsattva
analyzed: yeṣām kṛtaśas sattvāḥ dīrgharātram dauṣprajñām āpadyante tān bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattva

original: ādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajya tān sattvān mahāprajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati.
analyzed: ādhyātmika bāhyān dharmān parityajya tān sattvān mahā prajñāpāramitāyām pratiṣṭhāpayati

original: yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ kauśika sattvā dīrgharātraṃ saṃsāre saṃsaranti yad utānunayapratighaparyavasthāne

analyzed: tat bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattva

original: upāyakauśalyena teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ vinīya tān sattvāṃś caturṣu dhyāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati. caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati,
analyzed: upāya kauśalyena teṣām sattvānām vinīya tān sattvān caturṣu dhyāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati caturṣu apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣu ārūpya samāpattiṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati

analyzed: baleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu ārya aṣṭāṅgeṣu mārgeṣu śūnyatāyām vā animitte praṇihite samādhi dhāraṇī mukheṣu

original: ca pratiṣṭhāpayati. caturṣv āryasatyeṣv abhijñāsu daśabalavaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsv
analyzed: ca pratiṣṭhāpayati caturṣu ārya satyeṣu abhijñāsu daśa bala vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsu

analyzed: aṣṭādaśasu āveṇikeṣu buddha dharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati srotaāpatti phale sakṛdāgāmi phale

analyzed: samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati ime te kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhisattva cārikām

original: carato dṛṣṭā dhārmikā guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti. saṃparāye cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
analyzed: carataḥ dṛṣṭāḥ dhārmikāḥ guṇa anuśaṃsāḥ bhaviṣyanti saṃparāye ca anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim

analyzed: abhisaṃbudhyate dharmacakram pravartya sattvān yathā praṇidhāne pratiṣṭhāpya nirupadhi śeṣe

analyzed: nirvāṇa dhātau parinirvāpayiṣyanti ime kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sāmparāyikā

analyzed: guṇa anuśaṃsāḥ bhaviṣyanti iti nirodhe nvaya jñāna kṣāntiḥ

original: yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
analyzed: yoniśas ca manasikariṣyanti

analyzed: vigrahāya vivādāya virodhāya uttare ca teṣām guṇa anuśaṃsāḥ bhaviṣyanti yat uta asyāḥ

analyzed: prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śravaṇena anupūrveṇa tribhiḥ yānaiḥ niryāya duḥkhasya antam kariṣyanti

analyzed: tat yathā api nāma kauśika maghi nāma auṣadhī tatra āśīviṣeṇa jantunā bubhukṣitena āhāra arthinā

analyzed: āhāra gaveṣiṇā kaścid eva prāṇaka jātaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ bhavet

analyzed: sa tam prāṇaka jātam punar khāditu kāmaḥ prāṇaka jātam anudhāvet

analyzed: atha khalu sa prāṇa jātaḥ yena sā maghi nāma auṣadhi tena upasaṃkrāmet atha saḥ āśīviṣaḥ tasyāḥ auṣadhyāḥ gandhena pratyudāvartate tat

original: kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: kasya hetoḥ

analyzed: tathā hi tasyāḥ auṣadhyāḥ bhaiṣajya guṇaḥ yat tasya āśīviṣasya tat viṣam abhibhavati

analyzed: vā imām prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśas

analyzed: ca manasikariṣyati tatra kauśika ye utpanna utpannāḥ vigrahāḥ vivādāḥ virodhāḥ bhaviṣyanti

analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

analyzed: tathā hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā sarva dharmāṇam upaśamayitrī na vivardhikā

analyzed: katameṣām dharmāṇām

analyzed: ātma dṛṣṭeḥ sattva dṛṣṭeḥ jīva dṛṣṭeḥ poṣa dṛṣṭeḥ puruṣa dṛṣṭeḥ pudgala dṛṣṭeḥ manuja dṛṣṭeḥ

original: mānavadṛṣṭeḥ kārakadṛṣṭer vedakadṛṣṭer jānakadṛṣṭeḥ paśyakadṛṣṭer ucchedadṛṣṭeḥ śāśvatadṛṣṭer
analyzed: mānava dṛṣṭeḥ kāraka dṛṣṭeḥ vedaka dṛṣṭeḥ jānaka dṛṣṭeḥ paśyaka dṛṣṭeḥ uccheda dṛṣṭeḥ śāśvata dṛṣṭeḥ

original: astidṛṣṭer nāstidṛṣṭer yāvat sarvadṛṣṭikṛtānāṃ mātsaryadauḥśīlyavyāpādasya kauśīdyasya

analyzed: kṣānti pāramitā grāhasya vīrya pāramitā grāhasya dhyāna pāramitā grāhasya prajñāpāramitā grāhasya adhyātma śūnyatā grāhasya

analyzed: smṛti upastāna grāhasya samyakprahāṇa ṛddhipāda indriya bala bodhyaṅga grāhasya apramāṇa dhyāna rūpya samāpatti grāhasya

analyzed: te satata samitam tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣā āvaraṇa guptim saṃvidhāsyanti

analyzed: paryavāpsyati likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati yoniśas ca manasikariṣyati ye pi te daśasu

analyzed: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati yoniśas ca manasikariṣyati

analyzed: kuśalaiḥ dharmaiḥ vivardhiṣyate yat uta dāna pāramitā śīla pāramitā kṣānti pāramitā vīrya pāramitā dhyāna pāramitā prajñāpāramitābhiḥ

original: vivardhiṣyate na parihāsyati anupalambhayogena. adhyātmaśūnyatayā vivardhiṣyate na
analyzed: vivardhiṣyate na parihāsyati anupalambha yogena adhyātma śūnyatayā vivardhiṣyate na

analyzed: parihāsyati evam bahirdhā śūnyatayā adhyātma bahirdhā śūmyatayā yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatayā

analyzed: vivardhiṣyate na parihāsyati anupalambha yogena smṛti upasthāna samyakprahāṇa ṛddhipāda indriya bala bodhyaṅga mārgaiḥ

analyzed: vivardhiṣyate na parihāsyati apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattibhiḥ vivardhiṣyate na parihāsyati

original: satyābhijñābhir daśabalair vaiśāradyaiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair

original: vivardhiṣyate na parihāsyati anupalambhayogena. sarvasamādhibhiḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhair
analyzed: vivardhiṣyate na parihāsyati anupalambha yogena sarva samādhibhiḥ sarva dhāraṇī mukhaiḥ

original: vivardhiṣyate na parihāsyati,
analyzed: vivardhiṣyate na parihāsyati

analyzed: yāvat sarva ākāra jña tayā vivardhiṣyate na parihāsyati anupalambha yogena iti mārge dharma jñānam

original: sa ādeyavacanaś ca mitavacanaś ca bhaviṣyati,

original: na krodhādhibhūto bhaviṣyati,

original: na matsarī bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: na matsarī bhaviṣyati

original: nerṣyālur bhaviṣyati.
analyzed: na īrṣyāluḥ bhaviṣyati

original: ātmanā ca prāṇātipātāt prativirato bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: ātmanā ca prāṇa atipātāt prativirataḥ bhaviṣyati

original: ye 'pi cānye prāṇātipātāt prativiratā bhaviṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.

original: ātmanā cādattādānāt prativirato bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: ātmanā ca a datta ādānāt prativirataḥ bhaviṣyati

original: adattādānavirateś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate, ye 'pi (PSP_2-3:46)
analyzed: adatta ādāna virateḥ ca varṇam bhāṣiṣyate ye

original: cānye 'dattādānāt prativiratā bhaviṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
analyzed: ca anye datta ādānāt prativiratāḥ bhaviṣyanti teṣām api varṇa vādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ

original: ātmanā ca dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyate yāvat tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyate. ātmanā ca caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyate,

analyzed: ye pi ca anye ākāśa anantya āyatana samāpattim samāpadyante teṣām api varṇa vādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ

original: ātmanā ca vijñānānantyāyatanaṃ samāpatsyate. ātmanā cākiṃcanyāyatanaṃ samāpatsyate. ātmanā ca naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ upasaṃpadya vihariṣyati,
analyzed: ātmanā ca vijñāna anantya āyatanam samāpatsyate ātmanā ca ākiṃcanya āyatanam samāpatsyate ātmanā ca na eva saṃjñā na asaṃjñā āyatanam upasaṃpadya vihariṣyati

original: parāṃś ca naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattau samādāpayiṣyati,
analyzed: parān ca na eva saṃjñā na asaṃjñā āyatana samāpattau samādāpayiṣyati

original: naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpatteś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
analyzed: na eva saṃjñā na asaṃjñā āyatana samāpatteḥ ca varṇam bhāṣiṣyate

original: ye 'pi cānye naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
analyzed: ye pi ca anye na eva saṃjñā na asaṃjñā āyatanam upasaṃpadya viharanti teṣām api varṇa vādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ

original: ātmanā ca catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayiṣyati,
analyzed: ātmanā ca catvāri smṛti upasthānāni bhāvayiṣyati

original: parāṃś ca smṛtyupasthānabhāvanāyāṃ samādāpayiṣyati,
analyzed: parān ca smṛti upasthāna bhāvanāyām samādāpayiṣyati

original: smṛtyupasthānabhāvanāyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
analyzed: smṛti upasthāna bhāvanāyāḥ ca varṇam bhāṣiṣyate

original: ye 'pi cānye smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
analyzed: ye pi ca anye smṛti upasthānāni bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇa vādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ

original: evam ātmanā ca catvāri samyakprahāṇāni bhāvayiṣyati,
analyzed: evam ātmanā ca catvāri samyakprahāṇāni bhāvayiṣyati

original: catura ṛddhipādān pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāni,
analyzed: caturaḥ ṛddhipādān pañca indriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni

original: āttnanā cāryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgaṃ bhāvayiṣyati,
analyzed: āttnanā cārya aṣṭāṅgam mārgam bhāvayiṣyati

original: parāṃś ca mārgabhāvanāyāṃ samādāpayiṣyati,
analyzed: parān ca mārga bhāvanāyām samādāpayiṣyati

original: mārgabhāvanāyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
analyzed: mārga bhāvanāyāḥ ca varṇam bhāṣiṣyate

original: ye 'pi cānye mārgaṃ bhāvayanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
analyzed: ye pi ca anye mārgam bhāvayanti teṣām api varṇa vādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ

original: ātmanā ca catvāry āryasatyāni bhāvayiṣyati,
analyzed: ātmanā ca catvāri ārya satyāni bhāvayiṣyati

original: parāṃś ca caturṣv āryasatyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyati,
analyzed: parān ca caturṣu ārya satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyati

original: caturṇāṃ āryasatyānāṃ ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
analyzed: caturṇām ārya satyānām ca varṇam bhāṣiṣyate

original: ye 'pi cānye catvāry āryasatyāni bhāvayanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
analyzed: ye pi ca anye catvāri ārya satyāni bhāvayanti teṣām api varṇa vādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ

original: ātmanā ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitān samādhīn bhāvayiṣyati,
analyzed: ātmanā ca śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihitān samādhīn bhāvayiṣyati

original: parāṃś ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitasamādhibhāvanāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyati,
analyzed: parān ca śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita samādhi bhāvanāyām pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyati

original: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitasamādhibhāvanāyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
analyzed: śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita samādhi bhāvanāyāḥ ca varṇam bhāṣiṣyate

original: ye 'pi cānye śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitān samādhīn bhāvayanti teṣām api varṇavādi bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
analyzed: ye pi ca anye śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihitān samādhīn bhāvayanti teṣām api varṇa vādi bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ

original: ātmanā cāṣṭavimokṣān samāpatsyate,
analyzed: ātmanā ca aṣṭa vimokṣān samāpatsyate

original: parāṃś cāṣṭavimokṣasamāpattau samādāpayiṣyati,
analyzed: parān ca aṣṭa vimokṣa samāpattau samādāpayiṣyati

original: aṣṭānāṃ ca vimokṣāṇāṃ varṇaṃ bhāsiṣyate,
analyzed: aṣṭānām ca vimokṣāṇām varṇam bhāsiṣyate

original: ye 'pi cānye 'ṣṭavimokṣān samāpadyante teṣāṃ api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
analyzed: ye pi ca anye ṣṭa vimokṣān samāpadyante teṣām api varṇa vādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ

original: ātmanā ca navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīḥ samāpatsyate,
analyzed: ātmanā ca nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattīḥ samāpatsyate

original: parāṃś ca navānupūrvavihārasamāpattau samādāpayiṣyati,
analyzed: parān ca nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattau samādāpayiṣyati

original: navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
analyzed: nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattīnām ca varṇam bhāṣiṣyate

original: ye 'pi cānye navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīḥ samāpadyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
analyzed: ye pi ca anye nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattīḥ samāpadyante teṣām api varṇa vādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ

original: ātmanā ca daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ samāpatsyate,
analyzed: ātmanā ca daśa tathāgata balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ samāpatsyate

original: parāṃś ca daśatathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu samādāpayiṣyati
analyzed: parān ca daśa tathāgata baleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu samādāpayiṣyati

original: daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
analyzed: daśānām tathāgata balānām caturṇām vaiśāradyānām catasṛṇām pratisaṃvidām ca varṇam bhāṣiṣyate

original: ye 'pi cānye daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ samāpadyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
analyzed: ye pi ca anye daśa tathāgata balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ samāpadyante teṣām api varṇa vādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ

original: ātmanā cāṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān samāpatsyate,
analyzed: ātmanā ca aṣṭādaśa āveṇikān buddha dharmān samāpatsyate

original: parāṃś cāṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu samādāpayiṣyati,
analyzed: parān ca aṣṭādaśasu āveṇikeṣu buddha dharmeṣu samādāpayiṣyati

original: aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
analyzed: aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānām buddha dharmāṇām ca varṇam bhāṣiṣyate

original: ye 'pi cānye 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
analyzed: ye pi ca anye ṣṭādaśa āveṇikān buddha dharmān samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇa vādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ

original: ātmanā cāsaṃmoṣadharmā bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: ātmanā ca a saṃmoṣa dharmā bhaviṣyati

original: parāṃś cāsaṃmoṣadharmatāyāṃ samādāpayiṣyati,
analyzed: parān ca a saṃmoṣa dharma tāyām samādāpayiṣyati

original: asaṃmoṣadharmatāyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
analyzed: asaṃmoṣa dharmatāyāḥ ca varṇam bhāṣiṣyate

original: ye 'pi cānye 'saṃmoṣadharmatāyāṃ pratiṣṭāpitā bhavanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
analyzed: ye pi ca anye saṃmoṣa dharmatāyām pratiṣṭāpitāḥ bhavanti teṣām api varṇa vādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ

original: ātmanā ca sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pratiṣṭhito bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: ātmanā ca sarva ākārajña tāyām pratiṣṭhitaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: parāṃś ca sarvākārajñatāyāṃ samādāpayiṣyati sarvākārajñatāyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
analyzed: parān ca sarva ākārajña tāyām samādāpayiṣyati sarva ākārajña tāyāḥ ca varṇam bhāṣiṣyate

original: ye 'pi cānye sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pratiṣṭhitā bhavanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ. iti mārge 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ
analyzed: ye pi ca anye sarva ākārajña tāyām pratiṣṭhitāḥ bhavanti teṣām api varṇa vādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ iti mārge nvaya jñāna kṣāntiḥ

original: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran yad dānaṃ dadāti
analyzed: punar aparam kauśika bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran yat dānam dadāti

original: tat sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anupalambhayogena.
analyzed: tat sarva sattva sādhāraṇam kṛtvā anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati an upalambha yogena

original: yac chīlaṃ rakṣati tat sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty (PSP_2-3:51)
analyzed: yat śīlam rakṣati tat sarva sattva sādhāraṇam kṛtvā anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati

original: anupalambhayogena. yāṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayati tāṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyāṃ
analyzed: anupalambha yogena yām kṣāntim bhāvayati tām sarva sattva sādhāraṇam kṛtvā anuttarāyām

original: samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anupalambhayogena. yad vīryam ārabhate tat sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ
analyzed: samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati an upalambha yogena yat vīryam ārabhate tat sarva sattva sādhāraṇam

original: kṛtvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anupalambhayogena. yad dhyānaṃ samāpadyate
analyzed: kṛtvā anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati an upalambha yogena yat dhyānam samāpadyate

original: tat sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anupalambhayogena.
analyzed: tat sarva sattva sādhāraṇam kṛtvā anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati an upalambha yogena

original: yāṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayati tāṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
analyzed: yām prajñām bhāvayati tām sarva sattva sādhāraṇam kṛtvā anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau

original: pariṇāmayaty anupalambhayogena. evaṃ carataḥ kauśika kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur
analyzed: pariṇāmayati anupalambha yogena evam carataḥ kauśika kula putrasya vā kula duhituḥ

original: vā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu smṛtir evam utpadyate:
analyzed: vā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu smṛtiḥ evam utpadyate

original: yady ahaṃ dānaṃ na dāsyāmi,
analyzed: yadi aham dānam na dāsyāmi

original: durgateṣu me kuleṣūpapattir bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: durgateṣu me kuleṣu upapattiḥ bhaviṣyati

original: na ca me sattvaparipāko bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: na ca me sattva paripākaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: na ca me buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhanaṃ bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: na ca me buddhakṣetram pariśodhanam bhaviṣyati

original: na ca sarvajñatāṃ pratilapsye. tasyaivaṃ bhavati:
analyzed: na ca sarvajña tām pratilapsye tasya evam bhavati

original: yady ahaṃ śīlaṃ na rakṣiṣyāmi,
analyzed: yadi aham śīlam na rakṣiṣyāmi

original: tisṛṇaṃ durgatīnāṃ me 'pāvṛtāni dvārāṇi bhaviṣyanti,
analyzed: tisṛṇam durgatīnām me dvārāṇi bhaviṣyanti

original: na devamanuṣyopapattir me bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: na deva manuṣya upapattiḥ me bhaviṣyati

original: na sattvaparipāko na buddhakṣetrapariśodhanaṃ,
analyzed: na sattva paripākaḥ na buddhakṣetra pariśodhanam

original: kuta eva sarvajñatāpratilābhas. tasyaivaṃ bhavati:
analyzed: kutas eva sarvajña tā pratilābhaḥ tasya evam bhavati

original: yady ahaṃ kṣāntiṃ na bhāvayiṣyāmi,
analyzed: yadi aham kṣāntim na bhāvayiṣyāmi

original: indriyāṇi me paribhetsyante,
analyzed: indriyāṇi me pari bhetsyante

original: mukhamaṇḍalaṃ me dhyāmībhaviṣyati,
analyzed: mukha maṇḍalam me dhyāmībhaviṣyati

original: na ca rūpasaṃpadaṃ pratilapsye,
analyzed: na ca rūpa saṃpadam pratilapsye

original: yayā rūpasaṃpadā bodhisattvacārikāṃ me carataḥ. sattvāḥ saha darśanena niyatā bhaviṣyanty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
analyzed: yayā rūpa saṃpadā bodhisattva cārikām me carataḥ sattvāḥ saha darśanena niyatāḥ bhaviṣyanti anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau

original: na ca rūpasaṃpadā sattvān paripācayiṣyāmi,
analyzed: na ca rūpa saṃpadā sattvān paripācayiṣyāmi

original: na buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣyāmi,
analyzed: na buddhakṣetram pariśodhayiṣyāmi

original: kutaḥ punaḥ sarvajñatāṃ pratilapsye. tasyaivaṃ bhavati:
analyzed: kutas punar sarvajña tām pratilapsye tasya evam bhavati

original: saced ahaṃ kusīdo bhaviṣyāmi,
analyzed: saced aham kusīdaḥ bhaviṣyāmi

original: naiva bodhisattvamārgaṃ bhāvayiṣyāmi,
analyzed: na eva bodhisattva mārgam bhāvayiṣyāmi

original: na vīryam ārapsye kathaṃ buddhadharmān paripūrayiṣyāmi,
analyzed: na vīryam ārapsye katham buddha dharmān paripūrayiṣyāmi

original: kuta eva sarvajñatāṃ pratilapsye,
analyzed: kutas eva sarvajña tām pratilapsye

original: tasyaivaṃ bhavati:
analyzed: tasya evam bhavati

original: saced ahaṃ vikṣiptacitto bhaviṣyāmi,
analyzed: saced aham vikṣipta cittaḥ bhaviṣyāmi

original: na śikṣiṣyāmi sarvasamādhipariniṣpādanāya,
analyzed: na śikṣiṣyāmi sarva samādhi pariniṣpādanāya

original: na sattvān paripācayiṣyāmi,
analyzed: na sattvān paripācayiṣyāmi

original: na buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣyāmi,
analyzed: na buddhakṣetram pariśodhayiṣyāmi

original: kutaḥ punaḥ sarvajñatāṃ pratilapsye. tasyaivaṃ bhavati:
analyzed: kutas punar sarvajña tām pratilapsye tasya evam bhavati

original: saced ahaṃ duṣprajño bhaviṣyāmi,
analyzed: saced aham duṣprajñaḥ bhaviṣyāmi

original: prajñopāyakauśalyena śrāvakabhūmiṃ pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ cātikramya sattvān paripācya
analyzed: prajñā upāya kauśalyena śrāvaka bhūmim pratyekabuddha bhūmim ca atikramya sattvān paripācya

original: buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya sarvajñatām abhisaṃboddhuṃ nāhaṃ śikṣiṣyāmi sa evaṃ pratisaṃśikṣate,
analyzed: buddhakṣetram pariśodhya sarvajña tām abhisaṃboddhum na aham śikṣiṣyāmi saḥ evam pratisaṃśikṣate

original: ayuktam (PSP_2-3:52)
analyzed: ayuktam

original: etat mama bhaved,
analyzed: etat mama bhaved

original: yo 'haṃ mātsaryavaśena dānapāramitāṃ na paripūrayeyam,
analyzed: yaḥ ham mātsarya vaśena dāna pāramitām na paripūrayeyam

original: evaṃ dauḥśīlyavaśena śīlapāramitāṃ vyāpādavaśena kṣāntipāramitāṃ kauśīdyavaśena vīryapāramitāṃ
analyzed: evam dauḥśīlya vaśena śīla pāramitām vyāpāda vaśena kṣānti pāramitām kauśīdya vaśena vīrya pāramitām

original: vikṣepavaśena dhyānapāramitāṃ dauṣprajñāvaśena prajñāpāramitāṃ na paripūrayeyaṃ.
analyzed: vikṣepa vaśena dhyāna pāramitām dauṣprajñā vaśena prajñāpāramitām na paripūrayeyam

original: aparipūrayan dānapāramitām evaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ cāparipūrayan
analyzed: a paripūrayan dāna pāramitām evam śīlam kṣāntim vīryam dhyānam prajñāpāramitām ca a paripūrayan

original: na niryāsyāmi sarvākārajñatāyām. evaṃ hi kauśika sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadharmikān
analyzed: na niryāsyāmi sarva ākāra jña tāyām evam hi kauśika sa kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā dṛṣṭadharmikān

original: sāṃparāyikāṃś ca guṇānuśaṃsān pratilabhate ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati vācayiṣyati
analyzed: sāṃparāyikān ca guṇa anuśaṃsān pratilabhate yaḥ imām prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati vācayiṣyati

original: paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
analyzed: paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati yoniśas ca manasikariṣyati

original: avirahitaś ca bhaviṣyati sarvajñatācittena.
analyzed: avirahitaḥ ca bhaviṣyati sarvajña tā cittena

original: iti mārge 'nvayajñānam ity ukto bodhisattvadarśanamārgaḥ
analyzed: iti mārge nvaya jñānam iti uktaḥ bodhisattva darśana mārgaḥ

original: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: evam ukte śakraḥ devānām indraḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ paridamanāya pariṇamanāya ca pratyupasthitā.
analyzed: āścaryam bhagavan yāvat iyam prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām paridamanāya pariṇamanāya ca pratyupasthitā

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: kathaṃ punaḥ kauśika prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ paridamanāya pariṇamanāya ca pratyupasthitā?
analyzed: katham punar kauśika prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām paridamanāya pariṇamanāya ca pratyupasthitā

original: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: evam ukte śakraḥ devānām indraḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: iha bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo laukikyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ caran buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyaḥ pratyekabuddhebhyaḥ śrāvakebhyo dānāṃ dadāti.
analyzed: iha bhagavan bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ laukikyām dāna pāramitāyām caran buddhebhyaḥ bhagavadbhyaḥ pratyekabuddhebhyaḥ śrāvakebhyaḥ dānām dadāti

original: ahaṃ dānaṃ dadāmi buddhabodhisattvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhebhyaḥ kṛpaṇavanīkārthikayācanakebhyaḥ.

analyzed: aham śīla pāramitām paripūrayāmi

original: sa tenonnatiṃ gacchati. tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya (PSP_2-3:53)

original: punaḥ prajñāpāramitā paridamanāya pariṇāmanāya ca pratyupasthitā bhavati.

original: iha punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo lokottareṣu dharmeṣu caran dānaṃ dadad dāyakaṃ nopalabhate,

analyzed: pratigrāhakam na upalabhate

original: pratyupasthito bhavati pariṇāmanāya. evaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣan kṣāntiṃ saṃpādayamāno vīryam

original: ārambhamāṇo dhyānaṃ dhyāyan prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan prajñāṃ nopalabhate. evaṃ smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgān
analyzed: ārambhamāṇaḥ dhyānam dhyāyan prajñāpāramitām bhāvayan prajñām na upalabhate evam smṛti upasthāna samyak prahāṇa ṛddhipāda indriya bala bodhyaṅga mārgān

original: bhāvayan nopalabhate. apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīḥ,
analyzed: bhāvayan na upalabhate a pramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattīḥ

original: āryasatyāny abhijñāṃ bhāvayan nopalabhate. balāni vaiśāradyāṃ pratisaṃvidaḥ,
analyzed: ārya satyāni abhijñām bhāvayan na upalabhate balāni vaiśāradyām pratisaṃvidaḥ

original: aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān bhāvayan nopalabhate. sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvasamādhin sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni
analyzed: aṣṭādaśa āveṇikān buddha dharmān bhāvayan na upalabhate sarva śūnyatāḥ sarva samādhin sarva dhāraṇī mukhāni

original: bhāvayan nopalabhate. evaṃ mahāmaitrīṃ mahākaruṇāṃ ca bhāvayan nopalabhate yāvat
analyzed: bhāvayan na upalabhate evam mahā maitrīm mahā karuṇām ca bhāvayan na upalabhate yāvat

original: sarvākārajñatāṃ bhāvayan nopalabhate. evaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
analyzed: sarva ākāra jña tām bhāvayan na upalabhate evam bhagavan bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām

original: caran paridamanāya pariṇāmanāya ca pratyupasthito bhavati. iti sarvato damananamanakāritram
analyzed: caran paridamanāya pariṇāmanāya ca pratyupasthitaḥ bhavati iti sarvatas damana namana kāritram

original: atha khalu bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:

analyzed: vā dhārayan vā vācayan vā paryavāpnuvan vā pravartayan vā su ādhyāyan vā yoniśas manasikurvan

analyzed: vā saṃgrāma śīrṣam ārūḍhaḥ saṃgrāme vartamāne saṃgrāme vatīrṇaḥ vā śayitaḥ vā atikrāntaḥ

original: vā niṣaṇṇo vā sthito vā syāt,
analyzed: vā niṣaṇṇaḥ vā sthitaḥ vā syāt

original: praharaṇāni pateyuḥ,
analyzed: praharaṇāni pateyuḥ

original: ātmano rāgakāṇḍāni rāgaśastrāṇi nirjitāni bhavanti. pareṣām api rāgakāṇḍāni rāgaśastrāṇi
analyzed: ātmanaḥ rāga kāṇḍāni rāga śastrāṇi nirjitāni bhavanti pareṣām api rāga kāṇḍāni rāga śastrāṇi

original: nirjitāni. ātmano doṣakāṇḍāni doṣaśastrāni mohakāṇḍāni mohaśastrāṇi nirjitāni. pareṣām
analyzed: nirjitāni ātmanaḥ doṣa kāṇḍāni doṣa śastrāni moha kāṇḍāni moha śastrāṇi nirjitāni pareṣām

original: api doṣakāṇḍāni doṣaśastrāṇi mohakāṇḍāni mohaśastrāṇi nirjitām. ātmano dṛṣṭikṛtakāṇḍāni

original: dṛṣṭikṛtaśastrāṇi nirjitāni pareṣām api dṛṣṭikṛtakāṇḍāni dṛṣṭikṛtaśastrāṇi nirjitāni.
analyzed: dṛṣṭi kṛta śastrāṇi nirjitāni pareṣām api dṛṣṭi kṛta kāṇḍāni dṛṣṭi kṛta śastrāṇi nirjitāni

original: ātmanaḥ paryutthānakāṇḍāni paryutthānaśastrāṇi nirjitāni. pareṣām api paryutthānakāṇḍāni
analyzed: ātmanaḥ paryutthāna kāṇḍāni paryutthāna śastrāṇi nirjitāni pareṣām api paryutthāna kāṇḍāni

original: paryutthānaśastrāṇi nirjitāni. ātmano 'nuśayakāṇḍāny anuśayaśastrāṇi nirjitāni. pareṣām
analyzed: paryutthāna śastrāṇi nirjitāni ātmanaḥ anuśaya kāṇḍāni anuśaya śastrāṇi nirjitāni pareṣām

analyzed: api anuśaya kāṇḍāni anuśaya śastrāṇi nirjitāni anena kauśika paryāyeṇa tasya kula putrasya

original: vā kuladuhitur vā kāṇḍaṃ vā śastraṃ vā śarīre kṣiptaṃ na patati. iti kleśanirjayakāritram
analyzed: vā kula duhituḥ vā kāṇḍam vā śastram vā śarīre kṣiptam na patati iti kleśa nirjaya kāritram

original: punar aparaṃ kauśika sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati  #
analyzed: punar aparam kauśika saced kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā imām prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati  /

original: yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
analyzed: yoniśas ca manasikariṣyati

original: avirahitaś ca sarvajñatācittena bhaviṣyati tasya kaścid evābhaiṣajyam avakiret,
analyzed: avirahitaḥ ca sarvajña tā cittena bhaviṣyati tasya kaścid eva a bhaiṣajyam avakiret

original: kākhordaṃ vā kuryād agnikhadāṃ vopanāmayec chastreṇa vā hanyād viṣaṃ vā dadyād udake vainac chorayet sarvāṇy etāni tasya na krāmanti. tat kasya
analyzed: kākhordam vā kuryāt agni khadām vā upanāmayet śastreṇa vā hanyāt viṣam vā dadyāt udake vā enat śorayet sarvāṇi etāni tasya na krāmanti tat kasya

original: mahāvidyaiṣā kauśika yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
analyzed: mahā vidyā eṣā kauśika yat uta prajñāpāramitā

original: anuttaraiṣā (PSP_2-3:55)
analyzed: anuttarā eṣā

original: kauśika vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā. atra hi kauśika śikṣamāṇaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā nātmavyābādhāya cetayate,
analyzed: kauśika vidyā yat uta prajñāpāramitā atra hi kauśika śikṣamāṇaḥ kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā na ātma vyābādhāya cetayate

original: na paravyābādhāya cetayate,
analyzed: na para vyābādhāya cetayate

original: nobhayavyābādhāya cetayate.
analyzed: na ubhaya vyābādhāya cetayate

original: ity upakramādhisahyatākāritram
analyzed: iti upakrama adhi sahya tā kāritram

original: tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi naivātmānam upalabhate. na parān nobhayam upalabhate. na rūpam upalabhate.
analyzed: tathā hi na eva ātmānam upalabhate na parān na ubhayam upalabhate na rūpam upalabhate

original: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānam upalabhate. na yāvad vyastasamastān
analyzed: na vedanām na saṃjñām na saṃskārān na vijñānam upalabhate na yāvat vyasta samastān

original: skandhadhātv āyatana pratītyasamutpādapāramitābodhipakṣyadharmāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattisarvaśūnyatāsarvasamādhisarvadhāraṇīmukhadaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidaṣṭādaśāveṇikān
analyzed: skandha dhātu āyatana pratītyasamutpāda pāramitā bodhi pakṣya dharma apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpatti sarva śūnyatā sarva samādhi sarva dhāraṇī mukha daśa bala vaiśāradya pratisaṃvid aṣṭādaśa āveṇikān

original: buddhadharmān yāvat sarvākārajñatām api nopalabhate. anupalabhamāno nātmavyābādhāya cetayate,
analyzed: buddha dharmān yāvat sarva ākāra jña tām api nā upalabhate an upalabhamānaḥ na ātma vyābādhāya cetayate

original: na paravyābādhāya cetayate,
analyzed: na para vyābādhāya cetayate

original: nobhayavyābādhāya cetayate. anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ pratilabhate sarvasattvāṃś cāvalokayati. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: na ubhaya vyābādhāya cetayate anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim pratilabhate sarva sattvān ca avalokayati tat kasya hetoḥ

original: atra hi vidyāyāṃ śikṣamāṇair atītais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā
analyzed: atra hi vidyāyām śikṣamāṇaiḥ atītaiḥ tathāgataiḥ arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ anuttarā

original: samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā. ye 'pi te bhaviṣyanti tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās
analyzed: samyaksaṃbodhiḥ abhisaṃbuddhā ye pi te bhaviṣyanti tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ

original: te 'py atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante.
analyzed: te pi atra prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣamāṇāḥ anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante

original: ye 'pi te daśadiglokadhātuṣv etarhi pratyutpannās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās
analyzed: ye pi te daśa diś lokadhātuṣu etarhi pratyutpannāḥ tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ

original: te 'py atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
analyzed: te pi atra prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣamāṇāḥ anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante

original: iti samyaksaṃbodhikāritram
analyzed: iti samyaksaṃbodhi kāritram

original: punar aparaṃ kauśika yatremāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti yoniśaś ca
analyzed: punar aparam kauśika yatra imām prajñāpāramitām likhitvā udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti yoniśas ca

original: na tatra maṇuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vā avatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī avatāraṃ lapsyate. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: na tatra maṇuṣyaḥ vā amanuṣyaḥ vā avatāra prekṣī avatāra gaveṣī avatāram lapsyate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pūjārthāya trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā
analyzed: tathā hi atra prajñāpāramitāyām pūjā arthāya tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā

original: devaputrās trayastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikā
analyzed: devaputrāḥ trayastriṃśāḥ yāmāḥ tuṣitāḥ nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaḥ brahmakāyikā

original: brahmapurohitā brahmapārṣadyā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devaputrā,
analyzed: brahma purohitāḥ brahma pārṣadyāḥ yāvat akaniṣṭhāḥ deva putrā

original: ye 'py anyeṣv aprameyeṣv asaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrā yāvad
analyzed: ye pi anyeṣu aprameyeṣu asaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu cāturmahārājakāyikāḥ deva putrāḥ yāvat

original: akaniṣṭhā devāputrās te 'pi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ
analyzed: akaniṣṭhāḥ devāputrāḥ te pi teṣām kula putrāṇām kula duhitṛṇām vā rakṣā āvaraṇa guptim

original: saṃvidhāsyanti. (PSP_2-3:56)
analyzed: saṃvidhāsyanti

original: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti te ca devaputrā agatyemāṃ
analyzed: ye imām prajñāpāramitām likhitvā dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti te ca deva putrāḥ a gatya imām

original: prajñāpāramitāṃ satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti pūjayitvā
analyzed: prajñāpāramitām satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti pūjayitvā

original: pratigamiṣyanti. ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati tasyeme
analyzed: pratigamiṣyanti yaḥ imām prajñāpāramitām likhitvā dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati tasya ime

original: dṛṣṭadhārmikā guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti. tadyathāpi nāma kauśika ye kecid bodhimaṇḍagatā
analyzed: dṛṣṭa dhārmikāḥ guṇa anuśaṃsāḥ bhaviṣyanti tat yathā api nāma kauśika ye kecid bodhimaṇḍa gatāḥ

original: vā bodhimaṇḍaparisāmantagatā vā bodhimaṇḍābhyantaragatā vā tiryagyonigatān apy upādāya
analyzed: vā bodhimaṇḍa parisāmanta gatāḥ vā bodhimaṇḍa abhyantara gatāḥ vā tiryagyoni gatān api upādāya

original: na te śakyante manuṣyeṇa vā amanuṣyeṇa vā viheṭhayituṃ vā vihiṃsayituṃ vā. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: na te śakyante manuṣyeṇa vā amanuṣyeṇa vā viheṭhayitum vā vihiṃsayitum vā tat kasya hetoḥ

original: atra hi niṣadya taiḥ paurvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā
analyzed: atra hi niṣadya taiḥ paurvakaiḥ tathāgataiḥ arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ anuttarā

original: samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā. anāgatair api pratyutpannair api tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ
analyzed: samyaksaṃbodhiḥ abhisaṃbuddhā anāgataiḥ api pratyutpannaiḥ api tathāgataiḥ arhadbhiḥ

original: samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbhotsyate abhisaṃbudhyate ca. abhisaṃbudhya
analyzed: samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ abhisaṃbhotsyate abhisaṃbudhyate ca abhisaṃbudhya

original: ca sarvasattvān sukhe 'bhaye 'nudvege 'vaire 'nuttrāse 'vyābādhe 'sapatne pratiṣṭhāpayanti.
analyzed: ca sarva sattvān sukhe bhaye na udvege vaire na uttrāse vyābādhe sapatne pratiṣṭhāpayanti

original: sukhe 'bhaye 'nudvege 'nuttrāse 'vaire 'vyābādhe 'sapatne pratiṣṭhāpyāprameyān asaṃkhyeyān
analyzed: sukhe bhaye na udvege na uttrāse vaire vyābādhe sapatne pratiṣṭhāpya aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān

original: sattvān divyamānuṣyakāyaṃ saṃpattau pratiṣṭhāpayanti. srotaāpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale
analyzed: sattvān divya mānuṣyakāyam saṃpattau pratiṣṭhāpayanti srotaāpatti phale sakṛdāgāmi phale

original: 'nāgāmiphale 'rhattve pratyekabuddhatve 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayanti. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: na āgāmi phale rhat tve pratyekabuddha tve nuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayanti tat kasya hetoḥ

original: anayaiva kauśika prajñāpāramitayā sapṛthivīpradeśaś caityabhūtaḥ kṛtaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ
analyzed: anayā eva kauśika prajñāpāramitayā sa pṛthivī pradeśaḥ caitya bhūtaḥ kṛtaḥ sarva sattvānām

original: vandanīyaḥ satkaraṇīyo gurukaraṇīyo mānanīyaḥ pūjanīyo 'rcanīyo 'pacāyanīyaḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ.
analyzed: vandanīyaḥ satkaraṇīyaḥ gurukaraṇīyaḥ mānanīyaḥ pūjanīyaḥ arcanīyaḥ pacāyanīyaḥ puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa cīvara chatra dhvaja patākābhiḥ

original: ity ādhāradeśapūjyatākāritram ity uktaṃ kāritram
analyzed: iti ādhāra deśa pūjya tā kāritram iti uktam kāritram

original: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: evam ukte śakraḥ devānām indraḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: yo hi kaścid bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatām
analyzed: yaḥ hi kaścid bhagavan kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā imām prajñāpāramitām likhitvā pustaka gatām

original: api kṛtvā dhārayet tāñ ca puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ
analyzed: api kṛtvā dhārayet tām ca puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa cīvara chatra dhvaja patākābhiḥ

original: samantāc ca dīpamālābhir bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati,
analyzed: samantāt ca dīpa mālābhiḥ bahuvidhābhiḥ ca pūjābhiḥ satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati

original: yaś ca tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya śarīrāṇi stūpeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyati
analyzed: yaḥ ca tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya śarīrāṇi stūpeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyati

original: pratiṣṭhāpya pratigṛhṇīyād dhārayed vācayet tāni ca satkuryād gurukuryād (PSP_2-3:57)
analyzed: pratiṣṭhāpya pratigṛhṇīyāt dhārayet vācayet tāni ca satkuryāt gurukuryāt

original: mānayet pūjayet puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ,
analyzed: mānayet pūjayet puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa cīvara chatra dhvaja patākābhiḥ

original: kataras tato bahupuṇyaṃ prasavati?
analyzed: kataraḥ tatas bahu puṇyam prasavati

original: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
analyzed: evam ukte bhagavān śakram devānām indram etat avocat

original: tena hi kauśika tvām evātra pratiprakṣyāmi,
analyzed: tena hi kauśika tvām eva atra pratiprakṣyāmi

original: yathā te kṣamate tathā vyākuryāḥ. tat kiṃ manyase?
analyzed: yathā te kṣamate tathā vyākuryāḥ tat kim manyase

original: kauśika yeyaṃ tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sarvajñatā yo cāyaṃ tathāgatasyātmabhāvo 'bhinirvṛttaḥ,
analyzed: kauśika yā iyam tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sarvajña tā ca ayam tathāgatasya ātmabhāvaḥ bhinirvṛttaḥ

original: sa katarasyāṃ pratipadi śikṣamāṇena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā ayaṃ cātmabhāvo 'bhinirvṛttaḥ?
analyzed: sa katarasyām pratipadi śikṣamāṇena tathāgatena arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ abhisaṃbuddhā ayam ca ātmabhāvaḥ bhinirvṛttaḥ

original: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: evam ukte śakraḥ devānām indraḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: ihaiva bhagavan śikṣamāṇena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena prajñāpāramitāyām anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā ayaṃ cātmabhāvo 'bhinirvṛttaḥ.
analyzed: iha eva bhagavan śikṣamāṇena tathāgatena arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena prajñāpāramitāyām anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ abhisaṃbuddhā ayam ca ātmabhāvaḥ bhinirvṛttaḥ

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: evam etat kauśikaivam etat,
analyzed: evam etat kauśika evam etat

original: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā ayaṃ cātmabhāvo 'bhinirvṛttaḥ.
analyzed: prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣamāṇena tathāgatena arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ abhisaṃbuddhā ayam ca ātmabhāvaḥ bhinirvṛttaḥ

original: tasmāt tarhi kauśika nānenātmabhāvaśarīrapratilambhena tathāgatas tathāgata iti saṃkhyāṃ
analyzed: tasmāt tarhi kauśika na anena ātma bhāva śarīra pratilambhena tathāgataḥ tathāgataḥ iti saṃkhyām

original: gacchati. sarvajñatāyāṃ tu pratilabdhāyāṃ tathāgatas tathāgata iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati.
analyzed: gacchati sarvajña tāyām tu pratilabdhāyām tathāgataḥ tathāgataḥ iti saṃkhyām gacchati

original: yeyaṃ kauśika sarvajñatā sā prajñāpāramitā nirjātā. evam ayam ātmabhāvaśarīrapratilābhas
analyzed: yā iyam kauśika sarvajña tā sā prajñāpāramitā nirjātā evam ayam ātma bhāva śarīra pratilābhaḥ

original: tathāgatasya prajñāpāramitānirjātatvāt,
analyzed: tathāgatasya prajñāpāramitā nirjāta tvāt

original: sarvajñajñānasyāśrayabhūto bhavati. evaṃ cāśrayaṃ niśritya sarvajñajñānapratilābhaprabhāvanābuddhaprabhāvanādharmaprabhāvanāsaṃghaprabhāvanā
analyzed: sarvajña jñānasya āśraya bhūtaḥ bhavati evam ca āśrayam niśritya sarvajña jñāna pratilābha prabhāvanā buddha prabhāvanā dharma prabhāvanā saṃgha prabhāvanā

original: bhavati. evam asya sarvajñajñānahetuko 'yam ātmabhāvapratilābhaḥ. āśrayabhūtatvāt
analyzed: bhavati evam asya sarvajña jñāna hetukaḥ yam ātma bhāva pratilābhaḥ āśraya bhūta tvāt

original: sarvasattvānāṃ caityabhūto vandanīyaḥ satkaraṇīyo gurukaraṇīyo mānanīyaḥ pūjanīyo
analyzed: sarva sattvānām caitya bhūtaḥ vandanīyaḥ satkaraṇīyaḥ gurukaraṇīyaḥ mānanīyaḥ pūjanīyaḥ

original: 'rcanīyo 'pacāyanīyaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ. evaṃ ca mama parinirvṛtasyāpi sata eṣāṃ śarīrāṇāṃ pūjā bhaviṣyati.
analyzed: rcanīyaḥ pacāyanīyaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ evam ca mama parinirvṛtasya api sataḥ eṣām śarīrāṇām pūjā bhaviṣyati

original: tasmāt tarhi kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā satkāreṇa vācayiṣyati dhārayiṣyati,
analyzed: tasmāt tarhi kauśika yaḥ kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā imām prajñāpāramitām likhitvā pustaka gatām kṛtvā satkāreṇa vācayiṣyati dhārayiṣyati

original: puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ samantāc ca dīpamālābhir bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet  #
analyzed: puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa cīvara chatra dhvaja patākābhiḥ samantāt ca dīpa mālābhiḥ bahuvidhābhiḥ ca pūjābhiḥ satkuryāt gurukuryāt mānayet  /

original: pūjayed arcayed apacāyet,
analyzed: pūjayet arcayet apacāyet

original: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati.
analyzed: ayam eva tatas bahutaram puṇyam prasavati

original: tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: sarvajñajñānasya hi kauśika tena kulaputreṇa vā (PSP_2-3:58)
analyzed: sarvajña jñānasya hi kauśika tena kula putreṇa vā

original: kuladuhitrā vā pūjā kṛtā bhavet. yaḥ kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgatasya
analyzed: kula duhitrā vā pūjā kṛtā bhavet yaḥ kaścid kauśika kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā tathāgatasya

original: parinirvṛtasya saptaratnamaye stūpe śarīraṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet saptaratnamaye vā samudge vā kṛtvā parivahet,
analyzed: parinirvṛtasya sapta ratna maye stūpe śarīram pratiṣṭhāpayet sapta ratna maye vā samudge vā kṛtvā parivahet

original: tac ca satkuryād yāvad apacāyet puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhir,
analyzed: tat ca satkuryāt yāvat apacāyet puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa cīvara chatra dhvaja patākābhiḥ

original: yaś ca iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyāmānāyāṃ vā pustakagatāyāṃ vā satkāraṃ kuryād gurukāraṃ kuryād mānanāṃ pūjanām arcanām apacāyanāṃ kuryāt,
analyzed: yaḥ ca iha prajñāpāramitāyām likhyāmānāyām vā pustaka gatāyām vā satkāram kuryāt gurukāram kuryāt mānanām pūjanām arcanām apacāyanām kuryāt

original: ayaṃ tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
analyzed: ayam tatas bahutaram puṇyam prasavet

original: tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: sarvajñajñānasya tena pūjā kṛtā bhaviṣyati ato nirjātā hi pañcapāramitā,
analyzed: sarvajña jñānasya tena pūjā kṛtā bhaviṣyati atas nirjātā hi pañca pāramitā

original: ato nirjātā adhyātmaśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā,
analyzed: atas nirjātā adhyātma śūnyatā yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā

original: ato nirjātāni smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgābhijñāryasatyāni,
analyzed: atas nirjātāni smṛti upasthāna samyakprahāṇa ṛddhipāda indriya bala bodhyaṅga mārga abhijñā ārya satyāni

original: ato nirjātā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ ato nirjātāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā,
analyzed: atas nirjātāḥ apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattayaḥ atas nirjātāni daśa tathāgata balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ ṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ

original: ato nirjātāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni,
analyzed: atas nirjātāḥ sarva samādhayaḥ sarva dhāraṇīmukhāni

original: ato nirjātaḥ sarvasattvaparipākaḥ,
analyzed: atas nirjātaḥ sarva sattva paripākaḥ

original: ato nirjātā buddhakṣetrapariśuddhiḥ,
analyzed: atas nirjātā buddhakṣetra pariśuddhiḥ

original: ato nirjātā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kulasaṃpad bhogasaṃpad parivārasaṃpad,
analyzed: atas nirjātā bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām kula saṃpad bhoga saṃpad parivāra saṃpad

original: ato nirjātā mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā,
analyzed: atas nirjātā mahā maitrī mahā karuṇā

original: ato nirjātā kṣatriyamahāśālakulatā brāhmaṇamahāśālakulatā gṛhapatimahāśālakulatā,
analyzed: atas nirjātā kṣatriya mahā śāla kula tā brāhmaṇa mahā śāla kula tā gṛhapati mahā śāla kula tā

original: ato nirjātā cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrās trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartmo brahmapārṣadyā brahmapurohitā mahābrahmāṇo  #
analyzed: atas nirjātā cāturmahārājakāyikāḥ devaputrāḥ trāyastriṃśāḥ yāmāḥ tuṣitāḥ nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartmaḥ brahma pārṣadyāḥ brahmapurohitāḥ mahābrahmāṇaḥ

original: yāvad akaniṣṭhā devaputrā,
analyzed: yāvat akaniṣṭhā deva putrā

original: ato nirjātāḥ srotaāpannāḥ sakṛdāgāmino 'nāgāmino 'rhantaḥ pratyekabuddhā,
analyzed: atas nirjātāḥ srotaāpannāḥ sakṛdāgāminaḥ nāgāminaḥ rhantaḥ pratyekabuddhāḥ

original: ato nirjātā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā,
analyzed: atas nirjātāḥ bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvā

original: ato nirjātās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā,
analyzed: atas nirjātāḥ tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā

original: ato nirjātācintyā atulyā anuttarā niruttarā asamā asamasamā sarvākārajñatā.
analyzed: atas nirjātā acintyā atulyā anuttarā niruttarā asamā asamasamā sarva ākārajña tā

original: iti svārthādhimuktimṛdumṛddhī
analyzed: iti svārtha adhimukti mṛdu mṛddhī

original: kiṃ nu bhagavañ jñāsyanti evaṃ maharddhikā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjā kṛtā bhaviṣyatīti,

analyzed: evam mahā anuśaṃsā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjā kṛtā bhaviṣyati iti

original: uta na jñāsyanti?
analyzed: uta na jñāsyanti

analyzed: ye dharme vā iti aprasādena samanvāgatā

analyzed: ye saṃghe vā iti aprasādena samanvāgatā

analyzed: ye buddhe niṣkāṅkṣāḥ ye dharme niṣkāṅkṣāḥ ye saṃghe niṣkāṅkṣā

analyzed: ye buddhe niṣṭhā aṃgatāḥ ye dharme niṣṭhā aṃgatāḥ ye saṃghe niṣṭhā aṃgatāḥ

original: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:

original: ye buddhe niṣkāṅkṣā ye dharme niṣkāṅkṣā ye saṃghe niṣkāṅkṣā,
analyzed: ye buddhe niṣkāṅkṣāḥ ye dharme niṣkāṅkṣāḥ ye saṃghe niṣkāṅkṣā

analyzed: ye buddhe niṣṭhā aṃgatāḥ ye dharme niṣṭhā aṃgatāḥ ye saṃghe niṣṭhā aṃgatāḥ

original: bhagavān āha:

original: tat kiṃ manyase kauśika kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhinaḥ,

analyzed: kiyantaḥ te jāmbūdvīpakāḥ manuṣyāḥ ye catasṛṇām pratisaṃvidām lābhinaḥ

analyzed: kiyantaḥ te jāmbūdvīpakāḥ manuṣyāḥ ye trayāṇām saṃyojanānām prahāṇāt srotaāpannāḥ

analyzed: kiyantaḥ te jāmbūdvīpakāḥ manuṣyāḥ ye rāga doṣa moha tanu tvāt sakṛdāgāminaḥ

analyzed: śakraḥ āha alpatarakāḥ te bhagavan jāmbūdvīpakāḥ manuṣyāḥ ye saptatriṃśatām bodhipakṣyām dharmāṇām lābhinaḥ

original: tato 'lpatarakā ye navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ lābhinas,

analyzed: tatas lpatarakāḥ ye catasṛṇām pratisaṃvidām lābhinaḥ

original: tato 'lpatarakā ye ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhinaḥ. tato 'lpatarakās jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt srotaāpannāḥ,
analyzed: tatas lpatarakāḥ ye ṣaṇṇām abhijñānām lābhinaḥ tatas lpatarakāḥ jāmbūdvīpakāḥ manuṣyāḥ ye trayāṇām saṃyojanānām prahāṇāt srotaāpannāḥ

original: tato 'lpatarakās te ye rāgadoṣamohatanutvāt (PSP_2-3:60)
analyzed: tatas lpatarakāḥ te ye rāga doṣa moha tanu tvāt

original: sakṛdāgāminaḥ,
analyzed: sakṛdāgāminaḥ

original: tato 'lpatarakās te ye pañcānām avarabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāminaḥ,

original: tato 'lpatarakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye pratyekabodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ,
analyzed: tatas lpatarakāḥ te jāmbūdvīpakāḥ manuṣyāḥ ye pratyeka bodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: evam etat kauśikaivam etat,
analyzed: evam etat kauśika evam etat

analyzed: saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣāḥ dharmāḥ śrutāḥ na samādhayaḥ na sarva dhāraṇī mukhāni na a pramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattayāḥ

original: samanvāgatāḥ,
analyzed: samanvāgatāḥ

original: alpakās te sattvā ye buddhe dharme saṃghe niṣkāṅkṣā,

original: alpakās te sattvā ye buddhe dharme saṃghe niṣṭhāṃgatā,
analyzed: alpakāḥ te sattvāḥ ye buddhe dharme saṃghe niṣṭhāṃga tā

analyzed: alpakāḥ te jāmbūdvīpakāḥ manuṣyāḥ ye daśa kuśala karma patha sevinaḥ

original: alpakās te ye dānaśīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñābhāvanā yuktāḥ,
analyzed: alpakāḥ te ye dāna śīla kṣānti vīrya dhyāna prajñā bhāvanāḥ yuktāḥ

original: pañcānām avarabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād ānāgāminaḥ,
analyzed: pañcānām avarabhāgīyānām saṃyojanānām prahāṇāt ānāgāminaḥ

analyzed: samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ tebhyaḥ lpebhyaḥ lpatarakāḥ ye bodhāya caranti

original: prajñāpāramitānirjātā hi kauśika anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ.
