original: tasmāt tarhi kauśika yo hi kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
analyzed: tasmāt tarhi kauśika yaḥ hi kaścid kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā imām prajñāpāramitām

original: likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś
analyzed: likhitvā pustaka gatām kṛtvā udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśas

original: ca manasikariṣyati tāṃ ca satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati arcayiṣyati
analyzed: ca manasikariṣyati tām ca satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati arcayiṣyati

original: apacāyiṣyati puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhiḥ,
analyzed: apacāyiṣyati puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa cīvara chatra dhvaja patākā vaijayantībhiḥ

original: asya puṇyābhisaṃskārasyāsau paurvakaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
analyzed: asya puṇya abhisaṃskārasya asau paurvakaḥ puṇya abhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīm api kalām na upaiti

original: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api yāvat koṭiniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
analyzed: sahasratamīm api śata sahasratamīm api yāvat koṭi niyuta śata sahasratamīm api kalām na upaiti

original: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniṣadam apy upaniśām api na kṣamate.
analyzed: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api upaniṣadam api upaniśām api na kṣamate

original: tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: yāvad iyaṃ hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā jāmbūdvīpe sthāsyati tāvad na buddharatnasyāntardhānaṃ bhaviṣyati na dharmaratnasya na saṃgharatnasyāntardhānaṃ
analyzed: yāvat iyam hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā jāmbūdvīpe sthāsyati tāvat na buddha ratnasya antardhānam bhaviṣyati na dharma ratnasya na saṃgha ratnasya antardhānam

original: tāvad daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā loke bhaviṣyanti catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
analyzed: tāvat daśa kuśalāḥ karma pathāḥ loke bhaviṣyanti catvāri dhyānāni catvāri apramāṇāni catasraḥ ārūpya samāpattayaḥ

original: dānapāramitāyāḥ śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyāḥ
analyzed: dāna pāramitāyāḥ śīla pāramitāyāḥ kṣānti pāramitāyāḥ vīrya pāramitāyāḥ dhyāna pāramitāyāḥ

original: prajñāpāramitāyāḥ smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgānām
analyzed: prajñāpāramitāyāḥ smṛti upasthāna samyak prahāṇa ṛddhipāda indriya bala bodhyaṅga mārgānām

original: āryasatyānāṃ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānām aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ catasṛṇāṃ
analyzed: ārya satyānām ṣaṇṇām abhijñānām aṣṭānām vimokṣāṇām nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattīnām catasṛṇām

original: pratisaṃvidāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ
analyzed: pratisaṃvidām daśānām tathāgata balānām caturṇām vaiśāradyānām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānām

original: buddhadharmāṇāṃ mārgākārajñatāyāḥ sarvajñatāyāḥ sarvākārajñatāyāḥ kṣatryamahāśālakulānāṃ
analyzed: buddha dharmāṇām mārga ākāra jña tāyāḥ sarvajña tāyāḥ sarva ākārajña tāyāḥ kṣatrya mahāśāla kulānām

original: brāhmaṇamahāśālakulānāṃ gṛhapatimahāśālakulānāṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ
analyzed: brāhmaṇa mahāśāla kulānām gṛhapati mahāśāla kulānām cāturmahārājakāyikānām devānām trāyastriṃśānām

original: yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo
analyzed: yāmānām tuṣitānām nirmāṇaratīnām paranirmitavaśavartinām devānām loke prādurbhāvaḥ

original: bhavati yāvad akaniṣṭhānāṃ devānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
analyzed: bhavati yāvat akaniṣṭhānām devānām loke prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati

original: srotaāpattiphalasya sakṛdāgāmiphalasyānāgāmiphalasyārhattvasya pratyekabuddhānāṃ
analyzed: srotaāpatti phalasya sakṛdāgāmi phalasya anāgāmi phalasya arhat tvasya pratyekabuddhānām

original: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ samudāgamo bhavati. anuttarasya buddhajñānasya dharmacakrapravartanasya
analyzed: bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām samudāgamaḥ bhavati anuttarasya buddha jñānasya dharma cakra pravartanasya

original: sattvaparipākasya buddhakṣetrapariśuddhiś ca prajñāyate.
analyzed: sattva paripākasya buddhakṣetra pariśuddhiḥ ca prajñāyate

original: iti svaparārthādhimuktimṛdumṛddhī
analyzed: iti sva para artha adhimukti mṛdu mṛddhī

original: atha khalu ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā (PSP_2-3:69)
analyzed: atha khalu ye smin tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā

original: devā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devaputrās tān śakro devānām indra āmantrayāmāsa:
analyzed: devāḥ yāvat akaniṣṭhāḥ deva putrāḥ tān śakraḥ devānām indraḥ āmantrayāmāsa

original: udgrahītavyā mārṣāḥ prajñāpāramitā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā mārṣāḥ prajñāpāramitā yoniśo manasikartavyā prajñāpāramitā.
analyzed: udgrahītavyā mārṣāḥ prajñāpāramitā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā mārṣāḥ prajñāpāramitā yoniśas manasikartavyā prajñāpāramitā

original: tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: prajñāpāramitāyā mārṣā udgrahītayā dhāritayā vācitayā paryavāptayā sarve 'kuśalā dharmāḥ parihīyante kuśalā dharmā vivardhante divyāḥ kāyā  #
analyzed: prajñāpāramitāyāḥ mārṣāḥ udgrahītayā dhāritayā vācitayā paryavāptayā sarve kuśalāḥ dharmāḥ parihīyante kuśalāḥ dharmāḥ vivardhante divyāḥ

original: vivardhante asurāḥ kāyāḥ parihīyante,
analyzed: vivardhante asurāḥ kāyāḥ parihīyante

original: prajñāpāramitāyā mārṣā udgṛhītayā dhārtitayā vācitayā paryavāptayā na buddhanetrī samucchidyate na dharmanetrī na saṃghanetrī samucchidyate,
analyzed: prajñāpāramitāyāḥ mārṣāḥ udgṛhītayā dhārtitayā vācitayā paryavāptayā na buddha netrī samucchidyate na dharma netrī na saṃgha netrī samucchidyate

original: triratnavaṃśānupacchedāya mārṣāḥ sarvāsāṃ pāramitānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
analyzed: tri ratna vaṃśān upacchedāya mārṣāḥ sarvāsām pāramitānām loke prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati

original: saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām āryasatyānām apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnām
analyzed: saptatriṃśatām bodhi pakṣyāṇām dharmāṇām ārya satyānām apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattīnām

original: aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ
analyzed: aṣṭānām vimokṣa mukhānām nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattīnām ṣaṇṇām abhijñānām daśānām tathāgata balānām

original: caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ
analyzed: caturṇām vaiśāradyānām catasṛṇām pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānām buddha dharmāṇām

original: loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
analyzed: loke prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati

original: sarvaśūnyatānāṃ sarvasamādhīnāṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ mārgākārajñatāyāḥ sarvajñatāyāḥ sarvākārajñatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
analyzed: sarva śūnyatānām sarva samādhīnām sarva dhāraṇī mukhānām mārga ākāra jña tāyāḥ sarvajña tāyāḥ sarva ākārajña tāyāḥ loke prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati

original: bodhisattvacaryāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
analyzed: bodhisattva caryāyāḥ loke prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati

original: srotaāpannasakṛdāgāmyanāgāmyarhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ loke prādurbhāvāḥ prajñāyante.
analyzed: srotaāpanna sakṛdāgāmi anāgāmi arhatām pratyekabuddhānām bodhisattvānām loke prādurbhāvāḥ prajñāyante

original: atha khalu bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān śakram devānām indram etat avocat

original: udgrahāṇa tvaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitāṃ dhāraya vācaya paryavāpnuhi tvaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitām.
analyzed: udgrahāṇa tvam kauśika prajñāpāramitām dhāraya vācaya paryavāpnuhi tvam kauśika prajñāpāramitām

original: tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: yadā kauśika asurāṇām evaṃ samudācārā bhaviṣyanti devais trāyastriṃśaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmayiṣyāma
analyzed: yadā kauśika asurāṇām evam samudācārāḥ bhaviṣyanti devaiḥ trāyastriṃśaiḥ sārdham saṃgrāmayiṣyāma

original: iti tadā tvaṃ kauśika imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāhareḥ svādhyāyeḥ evaṃ teṣām asurāṇāṃ
analyzed: iti tadā tvam kauśika imām prajñāpāramitām samanvāhareḥ su ādhyāyeḥ evam teṣām asurāṇām

original: te samudācārā antardhāsyanti,
analyzed: te samudācārāḥ antardhāsyanti

original: na ca punas tān vigrahacittotpādān utpādayiṣyanti,
analyzed: na ca punar tān vigraha citta utpādān utpādayiṣyanti

original: yeṣāṃ ca devaputrāṇāṃ devakanyānāṃ vā cyutikālo bhavet teṣām api purataḥ svādhyāyaṃ kuryās,
analyzed: yeṣām ca deva putrāṇām deva kanyānām vā cyuti kālaḥ bhavet teṣām api puratas svādhyāyam kuryāḥ

original: te yady ātmano 'pāyopapattiṃ drakṣyanti teṣām enāṃ prajñāpārāmitāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ te 'pāyopapatticittotpādā antardhāsyanti,
analyzed: te yadi pāya upapattim drakṣyanti teṣām enām prajñāpārāmitām śṛṇvatām te pāya upapatti citta utpādāḥ antardhāsyanti

original: tatraiva devabhavane te utpatsyante evaṃ maharddhikā hy asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śravā yasya kasyacit kauśika kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā  #
analyzed: tatra eva deva bhavane te utpatsyante evam maharddhikā hi asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śravāḥ yasya kasyacid kauśika kula putrasya vā kula duhituḥ vā

original: devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā (PSP_2-3:70)
analyzed: deva putrasya vā deva kanyāyāḥ

original: vā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śrotrāvabhāsam āgamiṣyati. sarve te tena kuśalamūlenānupūrveṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante.
analyzed: vā iyam prajñāpāramitā śrotra avabhāsam āgamiṣyati sarve te tena kuśala mūlena anupūrveṇa anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante

original: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: evam ukte śakraḥ devānām indraḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: evam etad bhagavann evam etat sugata tathā hi bhagavan ye 'tīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā abhūvan,
analyzed: evam etat bhagavan evam etat sugata tathā hi bhagavan ye tīte dhvani tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ abhūvan

original: yeṣāṃ śrāvakā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau pratiṣṭhitās te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām
analyzed: yeṣām śrāvakāḥ nirupadhi śeṣe nirvāṇa dhātau pratiṣṭhitāḥ te pi imām eva prajñāpāramitām

original: āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ. ye 'pi te bhagavan bhaviṣyanti anāgate
analyzed: āgamya anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ ye pi te bhagavan bhaviṣyanti anāgate

original: 'dhvani buddhā bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghās te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ
analyzed: buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ sa śrāvaka saṃghāḥ te pi imām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamya anuttarām

original: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante. ye 'pi caitarhi daśadiśi loke pratyutpanne 'dhvani
analyzed: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante ye ca etarhi daśa diśi loke pratyutpanne dhvani

original: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bhagavantaḥ sa śrāvakasaṃghās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante
analyzed: tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ sa śrāvaka saṃghāḥ tiṣṭhanti dhriyante

original: yāpayanti sarve te ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
analyzed: yāpayanti sarve te iha eva prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitvā anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante

original: tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarve buddhadharmā antargatāḥ sarve bodhisattvadharmāḥ sarve pratyekabuddhadharmāḥ sarve śrāvakadharmā antargatāḥ
analyzed: tathā hi prajñāpāramitāyām sarve buddha dharmāḥ antargatāḥ sarve bodhisattva dharmāḥ sarve pratyekabuddha dharmāḥ sarve śrāvaka dharmāḥ antargatāḥ

original: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
analyzed: evam ukte bhagavān śakram devānām indram etat avocat

original: evam etat kauśikaivam etat,
analyzed: evam etat kauśika evam etat

original: mahāvidyeyaṃ kauśika yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
analyzed: mahā vidyā iyam kauśika yat uta prajñāpāramitā

original: anuttareyaṃ kauśika vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
analyzed: anuttarā iyam kauśika vidyā yat uta prajñāpāramitā

original: asamasameyaṃ kauśika vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
analyzed: asamasamā iyam kauśika vidyā yat uta prajñāpāramitā

original: tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi kauśika ye 'tītānāgatapratyutpannā daśadiśi loke tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ
analyzed: tathā hi kauśika ye tīta anāgata pratyutpannāḥ daśa diśi loke tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ

original: sarve te imām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyante
analyzed: sarve te imām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamya anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ abhisaṃbudhyante

original: abhisaṃbhotsyante ca. imām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamya daśakuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ prajñāyante,
analyzed: abhisaṃbhotsyante ca imām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamya daśa kuśalāḥ karma pathāḥ prajñāyante

original: catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ sarvapāramitāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā
analyzed: catvāri dhyānāni catvāri apramāṇāni catasraḥ ārūpya samāpattayaḥ sarva pāramitāḥ saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣyā

original: dharmā āryasatyāny apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ
analyzed: dharmāḥ ārya satyāni apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattayaḥ sarva śūnyatāḥ sarva samādhayaḥ

original: sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido
analyzed: sarva dhāraṇī mukhāni daśa tathāgata balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ

original: 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadhamāḥ prajñāyante. trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni aṣṭa vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ
analyzed: ṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dhamāḥ prajñāyante trīṇi vimokṣa mukhāni aṣṭa vimokṣāḥ nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattayaḥ

original: ṣaḍ abhijñā dharmadhātur bhūtakoṭitathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmatā dharmasthititā
analyzed: ṣaṣ abhijñāḥ dharmadhātuḥ bhūtakoṭi tathatā avitathatā ananya tathatā dharmatā dharma sthiti tā

original: dharmaniyāmatā loke prajñāyate. pañca cakṣūṃṣi srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam
analyzed: dharma niyāma tā loke prajñāyate pañca cakṣūṃṣi srotaāpatti phalam sakṛdāgāmi phalam

original: anāgāmiphalam (PSP_2-3:71)
analyzed: anāgāmi phalam

original: arhattvaṃ pratyekabuddhatvaṃ sarvajñatā loke prajñāyate. bodhisattvaṃ punaḥ kauśikāgamya
analyzed: arhat tvam pratyekabuddha tvam sarvajña tā loke prajñāyate bodhisattvam punar kauśika āgamya

original: daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā loke prabhāvyante. saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmā āryasatyāny
analyzed: daśa kuśalāḥ karma pathāḥ loke prabhāvyante saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣyāḥ dharmāḥ ārya satyāni

original: apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo 'ṣṭa vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayas trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni
analyzed: apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattayaḥ ṣṭa vimokṣāḥ nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattayaḥ trīṇi vimokṣa mukhāni

original: ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśa
analyzed: ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ sarva pāramitāḥ sarva śūnyatāḥ sarva samādhayaḥ sarva dhāraṇīmukhāni daśa

original: tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā
analyzed: tathāgata balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ ṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ

original: mārgākārajñatā sarvajñatā sarvākārajñatā loke prajñāyate. dharmadhātur bhūtakoṭitathatā
analyzed: mārga ākāra jña tā sarvajña tā sarva ākāra jña tā loke prajñāyate dharmadhātuḥ bhūtakoṭi tathatā

original: avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmatā dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā loke prajñāyate.
analyzed: avitatha tā ananya tatha tā dharma tā dharma sthiti tā dharma niyāma tā loke prajñāyate

original: pañca cakṣūṃṣi srotaāpattiphalaṃ srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmiphalam
analyzed: pañca cakṣūṃṣi srotaāpatti phalam srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmi phalam sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmi phalam

original: anāgāmī arhattvam arhan pratyekabodhiḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ,
analyzed: anāgāmī arhat tvam arhan pratyeka bodhiḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ

original: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ. tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke prabhāvyate. tadyathāpi
analyzed: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ loke prabhāvyate tat yathā api

original: nāma kauśika candramaṇḍalam āgamya sarvauṣadhītārāgaṇāḥ prabhāvyante. evam eva kauśika
analyzed: nāma kauśika candra maṇḍalam āgamya sarva oṣadhī tārā gaṇāḥ prabhāvyante evam eva kauśika

original: bodhisattvacandramaṇḍalam āgamya daśakuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ. sarvakuśalacaryā samyakcaryā
analyzed: bodhisattva candra maṇḍalam āgamya daśa kuśalāḥ karma pathāḥ sarva kuśala caryā samyak caryā

original: sarvapāramitāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
analyzed: sarva pāramitāḥ saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣyāḥ dharmāḥ a pramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattayaḥ

original: āryasatyāni aṣṭavimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ ṣaḍabhijñāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ
analyzed: ārya satyāni aṣṭa vimokṣāḥ nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattayaḥ ṣaṣ abhijñāḥ sarva samādhayaḥ

original: sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitasamādhyoṣadhayaḥ prabhāvyante.
analyzed: sarva śūnyatāḥ sarva dhāraṇī mukhāni śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita samādhi oṣadhayaḥ prabhāvyante

original: daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidaṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmauṣadhayaḥ prabhāvyante. sarvaśaikṣāśaikṣasarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhatārānakṣatrāṇi
analyzed: daśa bala vaiśāradya pratisaṃvid aṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharma oṣadhayaḥ prabhāvyante sarva śaikṣa aśaikṣa sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddha tārā nakṣatrāṇi

original: prajñāyante. sarvajñatā prabhāvyate. tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ prabhāvyante.
analyzed: prajñāyante sarvajña tā prabhāvyate tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ prabhāvyante

original: yadāpi buddhā bhagavanto loke nābhisaṃbudhyante notpādas tathāgatānāṃ bhavati,
analyzed: yadā api buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ loke na abhisaṃbudhyante na utpādaḥ tathāgatānām bhavati

original: tadāpi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ. sattvānāṃ laukikāṃś ca lokottarāṃś ca dharmān deśayanti.
analyzed: tadā api te bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ sattvānām laukikān ca lokottarān ca dharmān deśayanti

original: tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: bodhisattvanirjātāni hi devayānamanuṣyayānaśrāvakayānapratyekabuddhayānāni,
analyzed: bodhisattva nirjātāni hi deva yāna manuṣya yāna śrāvaka yāna pratyekabuddha yānāni

original: tac ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopāyakauśalyaṃ prajñāpāramitānirjātaṃ,
analyzed: tat ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya upāya kauśalyam prajñāpāramitā nirjātam

original: yenopāyakauśalyena ṣaḍ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati sarvaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayati sarvasamādhīṃś
analyzed: yena upāya kauśalyena ṣaḍ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati sarva śūnyatām bhāvayati sarva samādhīn

original: ca samāpadyate sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni ca pratilabhate apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīś
analyzed: ca samāpadyate sarva dhāraṇī mukhāni ca pratilabhate a pramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattīḥ

original: ca samāpadyate saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān bhāvayati āryasatyāni bhāvayati aṣṭa
analyzed: ca samāpadyate saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣyān dharmān bhāvayati ārya satyāni bhāvayati aṣṭa

original: vimokṣān bhāvayati navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīś ca samāpadyate abhijñā bhāvayati triṇi
analyzed: vimokṣān bhāvayati nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattīḥ ca samāpadyate abhijñāḥ bhāvayati triṇi

original: vimokṣamukhāni (PSP_2-3:72)
analyzed: vimokṣa mukhāni

original: bhāvayati daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān
analyzed: bhāvayati daśa tathāgata balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ ṣṭādaśa āveṇikān

original: buddhadharmān pratilabhate dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni aśītyanuvyañjanāni pratilabhate.
analyzed: buddha dharmān pratilabhate dvātriṃśat mahāpuruṣa lakṣaṇāni aśīti anuvyañjanāni pratilabhate

original: na ca śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā sākṣāt karoti. sattvāṃś ca paripācayati
analyzed: na ca śrāvaka bhūmim vā pratyekabuddha bhūmim vā sākṣāt karoti sattvān ca paripācayati

original: buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati bodhisattvasaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇāti sarvajñatāṃ cānuprāpnoti.
analyzed: buddhakṣetram ca pariśodhayati bodhisattva saṃpadam ca parigṛhṇāti sarvajña tām ca anuprāpnoti

original: punar aparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati
analyzed: punar aparam kauśika yaḥ kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā imām prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati

original: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati sa ebhiḥ dṛṣṭadhārmikair
analyzed: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśas ca manasikariṣyati saḥ ebhiḥ dṛṣṭa dhārmikaiḥ

original: guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhaviṣyati.
analyzed: guṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ bhaviṣyati

original: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: evam ukte śakraḥ devānām indraḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: katamair bhagavan dṛṣṭadhārmikair guṇaiḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā samanvāgatā
analyzed: katamaiḥ bhagavan dṛṣṭa dhārmikaiḥ guṇaiḥ kula putrāḥ vā kula duhitaraḥ vā samanvāgatā

original: bhaviṣyanti ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti
analyzed: bhaviṣyanti ye imām prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti

original: yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti.
analyzed: yoniśas ca manasikariṣyanti

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: tena hi kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na viṣeṇa kālaṃ kariṣyanti nāgninā na
analyzed: tena hi kauśika kula putrāḥ vā kula duhitaraḥ vā na viṣeṇa kālam kariṣyanti na agninā na

original: śastreṇa nodakena kālaṃ kariṣyanti yāvan na kenacid vyādhinā kālaṃ kariṣyanti sthāpayitvā
analyzed: śastreṇa na udakena kālam kariṣyanti yāvat na kenacid vyādhinā kālam kariṣyanti sthāpayitvā

original: pūrvakarmavipākaṃ na ca rājakulād upadravā bhaviṣyanti. sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
analyzed: pūrva karma vipākam na ca rāja kulāt upadravāḥ bhaviṣyanti saced kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā

original: vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyan rājakulaṃ praviśaty asyāvatāraprekṣiṇo 'vatāragaveṣiṇo
analyzed: vā imām prajñāpāramitām su ādhyāyan rājakulam praviśati asya avatāra prekṣiṇaḥ vatāra gaveṣiṇaḥ

original: 'vatāraṃ na lapsyante.
analyzed: vatāram na lapsyante

original: tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hy asyā eva prajñāpāramitāyās tejasā. sacet kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyaṃs tatra rājakulam upasaṃkramiṣyati,
analyzed: tathā hi asyāḥ eva prajñāpāramitāyāḥ tejasā saced kauśika kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā imām prajñāpāramitām su ādhyāyan tatra rāja kulam upasaṃkramiṣyati

original: te cāsya tatra rājāno vā rājaputrā vā rājamahāmātrā vā pūrvam ālapitavyaṃ maṃsyante abhibhāṣitavyaṃ maṃsyante.
analyzed: te ca asya tatra rājānaḥ vā rāja putrāḥ vā rāja mahāmātrāḥ vā pūrvam ālapitavyam maṃsyante abhibhāṣitavyam maṃsyante

original: tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca sarvasattvānām antike maitracittaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ
analyzed: tathā hi teṣām kula putrāṇām kula duhitṛṇām ca sarva sattvānām antike maitra cittam pratyupasthitam

original: karuṇācittaṃ muditācittam upekṣācittaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati. ebhiḥ sa kauśika
analyzed: karuṇā cittam muditā cittam upekṣā cittam pratyupasthitam bhavati ebhiḥ sa kauśika

original: dṛṣṭadhārmikair guṇaiḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā samanvāgato bhaviṣyati. ya imāṃ
analyzed: dṛṣṭa dhārmikaiḥ guṇaiḥ kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā samanvāgataḥ bhaviṣyati yaḥ imām

original: prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati.
analyzed: prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśas ca manasikariṣyati

original: punar aparaṃ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ebhiḥ sāṃparāyikair (PSP_2-3:73)
analyzed: punar aparam kauśika kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā ebhiḥ sāṃparāyikaiḥ

original: guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhaviṣyati. ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati
analyzed: guṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ bhaviṣyati yaḥ imām prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati

original: vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati. yad uta na jātu daśabhiḥ kuśalaiḥ
analyzed: vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśas ca manasi kariṣyati yat uta na jātu daśabhiḥ kuśalaiḥ

original: karmapathe 'virahito bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: karma pathe virahitaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: na caturbhir dhyānair na caturbhir apramāṇair na catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhir na
analyzed: na caturbhiḥ dhyānaiḥ na caturbhiḥ apramāṇaiḥ na catasṛbhiḥ ārūpya samāpattibhiḥ na

original: pāramitābhir na saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyair dharmair na satyair nāṣṭavimokṣair na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattibhir
analyzed: pāramitābhiḥ na saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣyaiḥ dharmaiḥ na satyaiḥ na aṣṭa vimokṣaiḥ na nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattibhiḥ

original: na tribhir vimokṣamukhair nābhijñābhir na sarvaśūnyatābhir na sarvasamādhibhir na
analyzed: na tribhiḥ vimokṣa mukhaiḥ na abhijñābhiḥ na sarva śūnyatābhiḥ na sarva samādhibhiḥ na

original: sarvadhāraṇīmukhair na daśabhir balair na vaiśāradyair na pratisaṃvidbhir nāṣṭādaśabhir
analyzed: sarva dhāraṇīmukhaiḥ na daśabhiḥ balaiḥ na vaiśāradyaiḥ na pratisaṃvidbhiḥ na aṣṭādaśabhiḥ

original: āveṇikair buddhadharmair virahito bhaviṣyati. na lakṣaṇānuvyañjanair virahito bhaviṣyati.
analyzed: āveṇikaiḥ buddha dharmaiḥ virahitaḥ bhaviṣyati na lakṣaṇa anuvyañjanaiḥ virahitaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: sa na jātu nirayatiryagyoniyamalokeṣūpapatsyate. na jātv indriyavikalo bhaviṣyati
analyzed: sa na jātu niraya tiryagyoni yama lokeṣu upapatsyate na jātu indriya vikalaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: na jātv aṅgahīno bhaviṣyati na jātu daridrakuleṣūpapatsyate na veṇukārakuleṣūpapatsyate
analyzed: na jātu aṅga hīnaḥ bhaviṣyati na jātu daridra kuleṣu upapatsyate na veṇukāra kuleṣu upapatsyate

original: na puṣkasakuleṣūpapatsyate na mauṣṭikakuleṣūpapatsyate na caṇḍālaurabhrikaśākunikakuleṣūpapatsyate
analyzed: na puṣkasa kuleṣu upapatsyate na mauṣṭika kuleṣu upapatsyate na caṇḍāla aurabhrika śākunika kuleṣu upapatsyate

original: na śūdrakuleṣūpapatsyate kṣatriyamahāśālakuleṣu vā brāhmaṇamahāśālakuleṣu vā gṛhapatimahāśālakuleṣu
analyzed: na śūdra kuleṣu upapatsyate kṣatriya mahāśāla kuleṣu vā brāhmaṇa mahāśāla kuleṣu vā gṛhapati mahāśāla kuleṣu

original: vā udārodāreṣūpapatsyate. sa tataḥ prabhṛti satatasamitaṃ dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇānuvyañjanasamalaṃkṛtakāyo
analyzed: vai udāra udāreṣu upapatsyate sa tatas prabhṛti satata samitam dvātriṃśat mahāpuruṣa lakṣaṇa anuvyañjana samalaṃkṛta kāyaḥ

original: bhaviṣyati yatra vā lokadhātau buddhā bhagavanto bhaviṣyanti tatra buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ
analyzed: bhaviṣyati yatra vā lokadhātau buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ bhaviṣyanti tatra buddhānām bhagavatām

original: purataḥ padma aupapāduka upapatsyate. na jātv abhijñā virahito bhaviṣyati. sa ākāṅkṣaṃ
analyzed: puratas padmaḥ aupapādukaḥ upapatsyate na jātu abhijñā virahitaḥ bhaviṣyati saḥ ākāṅkṣam

original: buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati,
analyzed: buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetram saṃkramiṣyati

original: tān buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsituṃ dharmaṃ ca śrotuṃ buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāman sattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
analyzed: tān buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsitum dharmam ca śrotum buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetram saṃkrāman sattvān ca paripācayati

original: buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayiṣyati.
analyzed: buddhakṣetram ca pariśodhayiṣyati

original: tasmāt tarhi kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitā udgṛhītavyā dhārayitavyā
analyzed: tasmāt tarhi kauśika kula putreṇa vā kula duhitrā vā prajñāpāramitā udgṛhītavyā dhārayitavyā

original: vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca manasikartavyā sarvajñatācittena cāvirahitena
analyzed: vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśas ca manasi kartavyā sarvajña tā cittena ca avirahitena

original: bhavitavyaṃ. sa etair dṛṣṭadhārmikair guṇaiḥ sāṃparāyikair guṇair avirahito bhaviṣyati
analyzed: bhavitavyam saḥ etaiḥ dṛṣṭa dhārmikaiḥ guṇaiḥ sāṃparāyikaiḥ guṇaiḥ avirahitaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: yāvan nānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbudhyate iti.
analyzed: yāvat na anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ abhisaṃbudhyate iti

original: atha khalv anyatīrthikānāṃ parivrājakānāṃ śatam upārambhābhiprāyāṇāṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmati sma.
analyzed: atha khalu anya tīrthikānām parivrājakānām śatam upārambha abhiprāyāṇām yena bhagavān tena upasaṃkrāmati sma

original: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasyaitad abhavat:
analyzed: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasya etat abhavat

original: idam anyatīrthikānāṃ parivrājakānāṃ śatam upārambhābhiprāyāṇāṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmati,
analyzed: idam anya tīrthikānām parivrājakānām śatam upārambha abhiprāyāṇām yena bhagavān tena upasaṃkrāmati

original: yan nūnam ahaṃ yāvanmātraṃ mayā bhagavato 'ntikāt prajñāpāramitāyā udgrahītaṃ tāvanmātraṃ svādhyāyeyaṃ yad etad anyatīrthikānāṃ (PSP_2-3:74)
analyzed: yat nūnam aham yāvanmātram mayā bhagavataḥ ntikāt prajñāpāramitāyāḥ udgrahītam tāvanmātram su ādhyāyeyam yat etat anya tīrthikānām

original: parivrājakānāṃ śataṃ na bhagavantam upasaṃkrāmeyur nāntarāyaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ kuryuḥ.
analyzed: parivrājakānām śatam na bhagavantam upasaṃkrāmeyuḥ na antarāyam prajñāpāramitāyām kuryuḥ

original: atha khalu śakro devānām indro yāvad anena bhagavato 'ntikāt prajñāpāramitāyā udgrahītaṃ tāvat svādhyāyati sma.
analyzed: atha khalu śakraḥ devānām indraḥ yāvat anena bhagavataḥ ntikāt prajñāpāramitāyāḥ udgrahītam tāvat su ādhyāyati sma

original: atha khalu te 'nyatīrthikāḥ parivrājakā dūrata eva bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya yenaiva mārgeṇāgatās tenaiva pratigatāḥ.
analyzed: atha khalu te nyatīrthikāḥ parivrājakāḥ dūratas eva bhagavantam pradakṣiṇīkṛtya yena eva mārgeṇa āgatāḥ tena eva pratigatāḥ

original: atha khalv āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitad abhavat:
analyzed: atha khalu āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya etat abhavat

original: kim atra kāraṇaṃ yenaite 'nyatīrthikāḥ parivrājakā upārambhābhiprāyā bhagavantaṃ dūrata eva pradakṣiṇīkṛtya yenaiva mārgeṇāgatās tenaiva pratigatāḥ?
analyzed: kim atra kāraṇam yena ete nyatīrthikāḥ parivrājakāḥ upārambha abhiprāyāḥ bhagavantam dūratas eva pradakṣiṇīkṛtya yena eva mārgeṇa āgatāḥ tena eva pratigatāḥ

original: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayate sma:
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya cetasā eva cetaḥ parivitarkam ājñāya āyuṣmantam śāriputram āmantrayate sma

original: śakreṇa śāriputra devānām indreṇa iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā samanvāhṛtā yenaite 'nyatīrthikāḥ
analyzed: śakreṇa śāriputra devānām indreṇa iyam prajñāpāramitā samanvāhṛtā yena ete nyatīrthikāḥ

original: parivrājakā dūrata eva bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya yenaiva mārgeṇāgatās tenaiva pratigatāḥ
analyzed: parivrājakāḥ dūratas eva bhagavantam pradakṣiṇīkṛtya yena eva mārgeṇa āgatāḥ tena eva pratigatāḥ

original: na hi śāriputra teṣām anyatīrthikānāṃ parivrājakānām ekasyāpi śuklaṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi,
analyzed: na hi śāriputra teṣām anya tīrthikānām parivrājakānām ekasya api śuklam dharmam samanupaśyāmi

original: sarva ete 'nyatīrthikāḥ parivrājakāḥ pratihatacittā upārambhābhiprāyā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante,
analyzed: sarve ete nyatīrthikāḥ parivrājakāḥ pratihata cittāḥ upārambha abhiprāyāḥ upasaṃkramitavyam maṃsyante

original: nāhaṃ taṃ śāriputra samanupaśyāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyām imāṃ prajñāpāramitām upārambhābhiprāyaḥ  #
analyzed: na aham tam śāriputra samanupaśyāmi sa devake loke sa mārake sa brahmake sa śramaṇa brāhmaṇikāyām prajāyām imām prajñāpāramitām upārambha abhiprāyaḥ

original: pratihatacitta upasaṃkrāmen,
analyzed: pratihata cittaḥ upasaṃkrāmet

original: naitat sthānaṃ vidyate.
analyzed: na etat sthānam vidyate

original: tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi śāriputra ya iha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājikās trāyastriṃśā
analyzed: tathā hi śāriputra yaḥ iha tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājikāḥ trāyastriṃśā

original: yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitā brahmapārṣadyā
analyzed: yāmāḥ tuṣitāḥ nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaḥ brahmakāyikāḥ brahmapurohitāḥ brahma pārṣadyā

original: yāvad akaniṣṭhā devaputrā ye 'pi śrāvakā ye 'pi pratyekabuddhā ye 'pi bodhisattvā
analyzed: yāvat akaniṣṭhāḥ deva putrāḥ ye pi śrāvakāḥ ye pi pratyekabuddhāḥ ye pi bodhisattvāḥ

original: mahāsattvās tair apīyaṃ prajñāpāramitā parigṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: mahāsattvāḥ taiḥ api iyam prajñāpāramitā parigṛhītā tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi te prajñāpāramitānirjātāḥ.
analyzed: tathā hi te prajñāpāramitā nirjātāḥ

original: punar aparaṃ śāriputra ye 'pi te pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu
analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra ye pi te pūrvasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu

original: yāvad daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣv ekaikasyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavantaḥ
analyzed: yāvat daśasu dikṣu gaṅgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu ekaikasyām diśi buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ

original: saśrāvakasaṃghāḥ sabodhisattvadevānāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās tair
analyzed: sa śrāvaka saṃghāḥ sa bodhisattva deva anāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa kiṃnara mahoragāḥ taiḥ

original: api sarvair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā parigṛhītā. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: api sarvaiḥ iyam prajñāpāramitā parigṛhītā tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi te prajñāpāramitānirjātāḥ sarve.
analyzed: tathā hi te prajñāpāramitā nirjātāḥ sarve

original: atha khalu mārasya pāpīyasa etad abhavad:
analyzed: atha khalu mārasya pāpīyasaḥ etat abhavat

original: imās tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya catasraḥ pariṣadaḥ saṃmukhaṃ sthitāḥ.
analyzed: imāḥ tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya catasraḥ pariṣadaḥ saṃmukham sthitāḥ

original: amī ca kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrāḥ saṃmukhaṃ sthitā niḥsaṃśayam atra bodhisattvā (PSP_2-3:75)
analyzed: amī ca kāmāvacarāḥ rūpāvacarāḥ ca deva putrāḥ saṃmukham sthitāḥ niḥsaṃśayam atra bodhisattvā

original: mahāsattvā vyākariṣyante 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
analyzed: mahāsattvāḥ vyākariṣyante nuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau

original: yan nūnam ahaṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmeyaṃ vicakṣuḥkaraṇāyeti.
analyzed: yat nūnam aham yena bhagavān tena upasaṃkrāmeyam vicakṣuḥkaraṇāya iti

original: atha khalu māraḥ pāpīyāṃś caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ nirmāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkramitukāmo bhavet.
analyzed: atha khalu māraḥ pāpīyān caturaṅga balakāyam nirmāya yena bhagavān tena upasaṃkramitu kāmaḥ bhavet

original: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasyaitad abhavat:
analyzed: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasya etat abhavat

original: māro batāyaṃ pāpīyāṃś caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ nirmāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkramitukāmaḥ.
analyzed: māraḥ bata ayam pāpīyān caturaṅga balakāyam nirmāya yena bhagavān tena upasaṃkramitu kāmaḥ

original: yo 'yaṃ mārasya pāpīyasaś caturaṅgasya balakāyasyaivaṃrūpo vyūhaḥ. na rājño bimbisārasya
analyzed: yaḥ yam mārasya pāpīyasaḥ caturaṅgasya balakāyasya evaṃrūpaḥ vyūhaḥ na rājñaḥ bimbisārasya

original: caturaṅgasya balakāyasyaivaṃrūpo vyūhaḥ,
analyzed: catur aṅgasya balakāyasya evaṃrūpaḥ vyūhaḥ

original: na prasenajitaś caturaṅgasya balakāyasyaivaṃrūpo vyūhaḥ,
analyzed: na prasenajitaḥ catur aṅgasya balakāyasya evaṃrūpaḥ vyūhaḥ

original: na śākyānāṃ caturaṅgasya balakāyasyaivaṃrūpo vyūhaḥ,
analyzed: na śākyānām catur aṅgasya balakāyasya evaṃrūpaḥ vyūhaḥ

original: na licchavīnāṃ caturaṅgasya balakāyasyaivaṃrūpo vyūhaḥ,
analyzed: na licchavīnām catur aṅgasya balakāyasya evaṃrūpaḥ vyūhaḥ

original: na mallānāṃ caturaṅgasya balakāyasyaivaṃrūpo vyuhaḥ,
analyzed: na mallānām catur aṅgasya balakāyasya evaṃrūpaḥ vyuhaḥ

original: yo 'yaṃ caturaṅgasya balakāyasyaivaṃrūpo māreṇa pāpīyasā nirmitaḥ,
analyzed: yaḥ yam catur aṅgasya balakāyasya evaṃrūpaḥ māreṇa pāpīyasā nirmitaḥ

original: dīrgharātraṃ khalu punar māraḥ pāpīyān bhagavato 'vatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī sattvānāṃ ca viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
analyzed: dīrgharātram khalu punar māraḥ pāpīyān bhagavataḥ vatāra prekṣī avatāra gaveṣī sattvānām ca viheṭhana abhiprāyaḥ

original: yan nūnam aham imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāhareyaṃ smṛtyā svādhyāyaṃ kuryām.
analyzed: yat nūnam aham imām prajñāpāramitām samanvāhareyam smṛtyā svādhyāyam kuryām

original: atha khalu śakro devānām indraḥ prajñāparamitāṃ samanvājahāra smṛtyā svādhyāyam akarot,
analyzed: atha khalu śakraḥ devānām indraḥ prajñāparamitām samanvājahāra smṛtyā svādhyāyam akarot

original: yathā yathā śakro devānām indraḥ smṛtyā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyati sma tathā tathā māraḥ pāpīyāṃs tenaiva mārgeṇa tenaiva dvāreṇa punar  #
analyzed: yathā yathā śakraḥ devānām indraḥ smṛtyai imām prajñāpāramitām su ādhyāyati sma tathā tathā māraḥ pāpīyān tena eva mārgeṇa tena eva dvāreṇa punar

original: eva pratyudāvṛtto 'bhūt.
analyzed: eva pratyudāvṛttaḥ bhūt

original: atha khalu ye 'syāṃ pariṣadi cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devās te divyāni puṣpāṇy abhinirmāyāntarīkṣagatā eva yena bhagavāṃs tenākṣipanti  #
analyzed: atha khalu ye syām pariṣadi cāturmahārājakāyikāḥ devāḥ yāvat akaniṣṭhāḥ devāḥ te divyāni puṣpāṇi abhinirmāya antarīkṣa gatāḥ eva yena bhagavān tena ākṣipanti  /

original: sma tenābhyavakiranti sma.
analyzed: sma tena abhyavakiranti sma

original: evaṃ ca vācam abhāṣanta:
analyzed: evam ca vācam abhāṣanta

original: ciraṃ bateyaṃ prajñāpāramitā jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ pracaratu yāvad iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā
analyzed: ciram bata iyam prajñāpāramitā jāmbūdvīpakānām manuṣyāṇām pracaratu yāvat iyam prajñāpāramitā

original: jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyānāṃ pracariṣyati tāvan na tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntardhānaṃ bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: jāmbūdvīpakānām manuṣyānām pracariṣyati tāvat na tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya antardhānam bhaviṣyati

original: saddharmaś cirasthitiko bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: saddharmaḥ cirasthitikaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: saṃghasya loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati. evaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau,
analyzed: saṃghasya loke prādurbhāvaḥ bhaviṣyati evam tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau

original: evaṃ daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu bodhisattvānāṃ caryāviśeṣaḥ prajñāsyate,
analyzed: evam daśasu dikṣu sarva buddhakṣetreṣu bodhisattvānām caryā viśeṣaḥ prajñāsyate

original: yatra ca digbhāge imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā likhitāṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti pustakalikhitām api kṛtvā sthāpayiṣyanti,
analyzed: yatra ca digbhāge imām prajñāpāramitām te kula putrāḥ vā kula duhitaraḥ vā likhitām dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti pustaka likhitām api kṛtvā sthāpayiṣyanti

original: ālokajātā ca eṣā dig (PSP_2-3:76)
analyzed: āloka jātā ca eṣā diś

original: bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: bhaviṣyati

original: sanāthā vigatatamondhakārā ca eṣā dig bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: sa nāthā vigata tamaḥ undhakārā ca eṣā diś bhaviṣyati

original: yatreyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pracariṣyati.
analyzed: yatra iyam prajñāpāramitā pracariṣyati

original: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
analyzed: evam ukte bhagavān śakram devānām indram etat avocat

original: evam etat kauśikaivam etat,
analyzed: evam etat kauśika evam etat

original: yatra yatra diśi lokadhātuprasare iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pracariṣyati,
analyzed: yatra yatra diśi lokadhātu prasare iyam prajñāpāramitā pracariṣyati

original: pustakalikhitā ālokajātā ca eṣā dig bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: pustaka likhitā āloka jātā ca eṣā diś bhaviṣyati

original: sanāthā vigatatamondhakārā ca eṣā dig bhaviṣyati.
analyzed: sa nāthā vigata tamaḥ undhakārā ca eṣā diś bhaviṣyati

original: atha khalu te devaputrā divyāni kusumāny abhinirmāya yena bhagavāṃs tenābhyavakiranti sma.
analyzed: atha khalu te deva putrāḥ divyāni kusumāni abhinirmāya yena bhagavān tena abhyavakiranti sma

original: evaṃ ca vācam abhāṣanta:
analyzed: evam ca vācam abhāṣanta

original: yaḥ kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati
analyzed: yaḥ kaścid kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā imām prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati

original: vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati na tasya mārā vā mārakāyikā
analyzed: vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśas ca manasikariṣyati na tasya mārā vā māra kāyikā

original: vā devaputrā avatāraṃ lapsyante. vayam api bhagavaṃ tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur
analyzed: vā deva putrāḥ avatāram lapsyante vayam api tasya kula putrasya vā kula duhituḥ

original: vā satatasamitaṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyāmaḥ,
analyzed: vā satata samitam rakṣā āvaraṇa guptim saṃvidhāsyāmaḥ

original: śāstāram iti bhagavaṃs taṃ vayaṃ kulaputraṃ vā kuladuhitaraṃ vā maṃsyāmahe ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati  #
analyzed: śāstāram iti bhagavan tam vayam kula putram vā kula duhitaram vā maṃsyāmahe yaḥ imām prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati  /

original: yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati.
analyzed: yoniśas ca manasikariṣyati

original: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu śakraḥ devānām indraḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: na te bhagavan kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vāvarakeṇa kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
analyzed: na te bhagavan kula putrāḥ vā kula duhitaraḥ vā avarakeṇa kuśala mūlena samanvāgatāḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś
analyzed: ye imām prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśas

original: ca manasikariṣyanti. pūrvajinakṛtādhikārās te bhagavan kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro
analyzed: ca manasikariṣyanti pūrva jina kṛta adhikārāḥ te bhagavan kula putrāḥ vā kula duhitaro

original: vā bhaviṣyanti ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti
analyzed: vā bhaviṣyanti ye imām prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti

original: yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti. bahubuddhaparyupāsitāḥ kalyāṇamitraparigṛhītās te kulaputrāḥ
analyzed: yoniśas ca manasikariṣyanti bahu buddha paryupāsitāḥ kalyāṇa mitra parigṛhītāḥ te kula putrāḥ

original: kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti.
analyzed: kula duhitaraḥ ca bhaviṣyanti

original: tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: ato nirjātā hi sarvajñatā yad uta prajñāpāramitā nirjātā sarvajñatā nirjātā ca prajñāpāramitā.
analyzed: atas nirjātā hi sarvajña tā yat uta prajñāpāramitā nirjātā sarvajña tā nirjātā ca prajñāpāramitā

original: tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi nānyā prajñāpāramitā nānyā sarvajñatā iti hi sarvajñatā ca prajñāpāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
analyzed: tathā hi na anyā prajñāpāramitā na anyā sarvajña tā iti hi sarvajña tā ca prajñāpāramitā ca advayam etat a dvaidhīkāram

original: evam ukte bhagavān sakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat: evam etat (PSP_2-3:77)
analyzed: evam ukte bhagavān sakram devānām indram etat avocat evam etat

original: kauśikaivam etat,
analyzed: kauśika evam etat

original: yathā vadasi sarvajñatā ca prajñāpāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. iti svaparārthādhimuktir mṛdumadhyā
analyzed: yathā vadasi sarvajña tā ca prajñāpāramitā ca advayam etat a dvaidhīkāram iti sva para artha adhimuktiḥ mṛdu madhyā

original: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu āyuṣmān ānandaḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: tathā hi bhagavān na dānapāramitāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati na śīlapāramitāyā na
analyzed: tathā hi bhagavān na dāna pāramitāyāḥ nāmadheyam parikīrtayati na śīla pāramitāyāḥ na

original: kṣāntipāramitāyā na vīryapāramitāyā na dhyānapāramitāyā yathā prajñāpāramitāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati,
analyzed: kṣānti pāramitāyāḥ na vīrya pāramitāyāḥ na dhyāna pāramitāyāḥ yathā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ nāmadheyam parikīrtayati

original: na saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati,
analyzed: na saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣāṇām dharmāṇām nāmadheyam parikīrtayati

original: nāryasatyānāṃ nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati,
analyzed: na ārya satyānām na apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattīnām nāmadheyam parikīrtayati

original: nāṣṭānāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati,
analyzed: na aṣṭānām vimokṣa mukhānām na nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattīnām nāmadheyam parikīrtayati

original: na ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ na sarvāṇāṃ śūnyatānāṃ na samādhīnāṃ na sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati,
analyzed: na ṣaṇṇām abhijñānām na sarvāṇām śūnyatānām na samādhīnām na sarva dhāraṇī mukhānām nāmadheyam parikīrtayati

original: na daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ na vaiśāradyānāṃ na pratisaṃvidāṃ nāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati yathā prajñāpāramitāyā  #
analyzed: na daśānām tathāgata balānām na vaiśāradyānām na pratisaṃvidām na aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānām buddha dharmāṇām nāmadheyam parikīrtayati yathā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ

original: nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati.
analyzed: nāmadheyam parikīrtayati

original: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat:
analyzed: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etat avocat

original: prajñāpāramitā ānanda pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā yad uta ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām āryasatyānām apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ  #
analyzed: prajñāpāramitāḥ ānanda pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā yat uta ṣaṇṇām pāramitānām saptatriṃśatām bodhi pakṣyāṇām dharmāṇām ārya satyānām a pramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattīnām

original: pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā,
analyzed: pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā

original: aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ navānām anupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā,
analyzed: aṣṭānām vimokṣāṇām navānām anupūrva vihāra samāpattīnām śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihitānām vimokṣa mukhānām ṣaṇṇām abhijñānām pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā

original: sarvaśūnyatānāṃ sarvasamādhīnāṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā,
analyzed: sarva śūnyatānām sarva samādhīnām sarva dhāraṇī mukhānām pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā

original: daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā,
analyzed: daśānām tathāgata balānām vaiśāradyānām pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānām buddha dharmāṇām pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā

original: sarvabuddhadharmāṇāṃ pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā prajñāpāramitā.
analyzed: sarva buddha dharmāṇām pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā prajñāpāramitā

original: tat kiṃ manyase?
analyzed: tat kim manyase

original: ānanda apariṇāmitaṃ dānaṃ sarvajñatāyāṃ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate.
analyzed: ānanda apariṇāmitam dānam sarvajña tāyām pāramitā nāmadheyam labhate

original: tat kiṃ manyase?
analyzed: tat kim manyase

original: apariṇāmitaṃ śīlaṃ apariṇāmitā kṣāntir apariṇāmitaṃ vīryam apariṇāmitaṃ dhyānam apariṇāmitā prajñā sarvajñatāyāṃ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate.
analyzed: a pariṇāmitam śīlam a pariṇāmitā kṣāntiḥ a pariṇāmitam vīryam a pariṇāmitam dhyānam a pariṇāmitā prajñā sarvajña tāyām pāramitā nāmadheyam labhate

original: ānanda āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan no hīdaṃ sugata,
analyzed: ānandaḥ āha no hi idam bhagavat no hi idam sugata

original: kathaṃ punar bhagavan dānaṃ sarvajñatāpariṇāmitaṃ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate?
analyzed: katham punar bhagavan dānam sarvajña tā pariṇāmitam pāramitā nāmadheyam labhate

original: kathaṃ punar bhagavan śīlaṃ kṣāntir vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñā sarvajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmitā pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate?
analyzed: katham punar bhagavan śīlam kṣāntiḥ vīryam dhyānam prajñā sarvajña tāyām pariṇāmitā pāramitā nāmadheyam labhate

analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: advayayogenānanda dānaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntir vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñā sarvajñatāyāṃ
analyzed: advaya yogena ānanda dānam pariṇāmitam śīlam kṣāntiḥ vīryam dhyānam prajñā sarvajña tāyām

analyzed: pariṇāmitā pāramitā nāmadheyam labhate anutpāda yogena anupalambha yogena pariṇāmitam

analyzed: dānam yāvat prajñā sarvajña tāyām pāramitā nāmadheyam labhate

original: ānanda āha: kathaṃ bhagavann advayayogena dānaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ sarvajñatāyāṃ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate?
analyzed: ānandaḥ āha katham bhagavan advaya yogena dānam pariṇāmitam sarvajña tāyām pāramitā nāmadheyam labhate

analyzed: evam śīlam kṣāntiḥ vīryam dhyānam katham bhagavan prajñā dvaya yogena pariṇāmitā sarvajña tāyām pāramitā nāmadheyam labhate

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

analyzed: rūpasya ānanda advaya yogena vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām vijñānasya advaya yogena yāvat bodheḥ

original: ānanda āha: kathaṃ bhagavan rūpasyādvayayogena,
analyzed: ānandaḥ āha katham bhagavan rūpasya advaya yogena

original: kathaṃ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ advayayogena,
analyzed: katham vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām advaya yogena

original: kathaṃ vijñānasyādvayayogena,
analyzed: katham vijñānasya advaya yogena

original: kathaṃ yāvad bodher advayayogena?
analyzed: katham yāvat bodheḥ advaya yogena

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: tathā hi ānanda rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ vedanā vedanayā śūnyā saṃjñā saṃjñayā śūnyā saṃskārāḥ saṃskāraiḥ śūnyā vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyam.

original: tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi rūpaṃ ca vedanā ca saṃjñā ca saṃskārā ca vijñānaṃ ca pāramitāś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ yāvad bodhiś ca pāramitāś cādvayam etad
analyzed: tathā hi rūpam ca vedanā ca saṃjñā ca saṃskārāḥ ca vijñānam ca pāramitāḥ ca advayam etat a dvaidhīkāram yāvat bodhiḥ ca pāramitāḥ ca advayam etat

original: tasmāt tarhy ānanda prajñāpāramitā nu pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā sarvapāramitānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ
analyzed: tasmāt tarhi ānanda prajñāpāramitā nu pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā sarva pāramitānām sarva śūnyatānām

original: sarvasamādhīnāṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnām
analyzed: sarva samādhīnām sarva dhāraṇī mukhānām saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣyāṇām dharmāṇām a pramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattīnām

analyzed: āveṇikānām buddha dharmāṇām yāvat bodheḥ sarvajña tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā

analyzed: apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattayaḥ ārya satyāni ṣaḍabhijñāḥ sarva dhāraṇī mukhāni virohanti daśa bala vaiśāradya pratisaṃvid āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ virohanti

original: yāvat sarvajñatā (PSP_2-3:79)
analyzed: yāvat sarvajña tā

original: virohati. sarvajñatāṃ pariniśrāya sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni
analyzed: virohati sarvajña tām pariniśrāya sarva pāramitāḥ sarva śūnyatāḥ sarva samādhayaḥ sarva dhāraṇīmukhāni

analyzed: saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣyāḥ dharmāḥ apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattayaḥ daśa bala vaiśāradya pratisaṃvidaḥ

analyzed: yāvat āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ virohanti tasmāt ānanda prajñāpāramitā eva āsām pāramitānām

analyzed: pariṇāyikāḥ yāvāt aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānām buddha dharmāṇām yāvat sarva ākārajña tāyāḥ

analyzed: iti sva para artha adhimuktiḥ mṛdu adhimātrā

analyzed: aṣṭānām vimokṣāṇām nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattīnām ṣaṇṇām abhijñānām tri yānam vimokṣa mukhānām

original: sarvapāramitānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ sarvasamādhīnāṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ
analyzed: sarva pāramitānām sarva śūnyatānām sarva samādhīnām sarva dhāraṇī mukhānām daśānām tathāgata balānām

analyzed: loke prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati prajñāpāramitayā bhagavan udgrahītayā dhāritayā vācitayā

analyzed: paryavāptayā yoniśas ca manasi kṛtayā gṛhapati mahā śāla kulāni prajñāyante

analyzed: kṣatriya mahāśāla kulāni prajñāyante

analyzed: brāhmaṇa mahāśāla kulāni prajñāyante

analyzed: cāturmahārājakāyikāḥ devāḥ yāvat akaniṣṭhāḥ devāḥ prajñāyante

original: bodhisattvāḥ prajñāyante,
analyzed: bodhisattvāḥ prajñāyante

original: prajñāpāramitayā bhagavann udgrahītayā dhāritayā vācitayā paryavāptayā yoniśaś ca manasikṛtayā tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke prajñāyante.
analyzed: prajñāpāramitayā bhagavan udgrahītayā dhāritayā vācitayā paryavāptayā yoniśas ca manasi kṛtayā tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ loke prajñāyante

analyzed: evam ukte bhagavān śakram devānām indram etat avocat

original: na punaḥ kauśika yaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā dhāritā vācitā paryavāptā yoniśaś ca manasikṛtā teṣām etāvata evaṃ

original: tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: apramāṇena hi kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā śīlaskandhena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti
analyzed: apramāṇena hi kauśika te kula putrāḥ vā kula duhitaraḥ vā śīla skandhena samanvāgatāḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś
analyzed: ye imām prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśas

original: ca manasikariṣyanti sarvajñatācittena cāvirahitā bhaviṣyanti. apramāṇena samādhiskandhena
analyzed: ca manasikariṣyanti sarvajña tā cittena ca avirahitāḥ bhaviṣyanti apramāṇena samādhi skandhena

original: prajñāskandhena vimuktiskandhena vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti
analyzed: prajñā skandhena vimukti skandhena vimukti jñāna darśana skandhena samanvāgatāḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś
analyzed: ye imām prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśas

original: ca manasikariṣyanti sarvajñatācittena cāvirahitā bhaviṣyanti. tathāgatapratimās te
analyzed: ca manasikariṣyanti sarvajña tā cittena ca avirahitāḥ bhaviṣyanti tathāgata pratimāḥ te

original: kauśika kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā veditavyā ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīyanti
analyzed: kauśika kula putrāḥ kula duhitaraḥ vā veditavyāḥ ye imām prajñāpāramitām udgrahīyanti

original: dhārayiyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti sarvajñatācittena
analyzed: dhārayiyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśas ca manasikariṣyanti sarvajña tā cittena

original: cāvirahitā bhaviṣyanti. yaś ca kauśika sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ śīlaskandhaḥ
analyzed: ca avirahitāḥ bhaviṣyanti yaḥ ca kauśika sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddhānām śīla skandhaḥ

original: samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho vimuktiskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaḥ,
analyzed: samādhi skandhaḥ prajñā skandhaḥ vimukti skandhaḥ vimukti jñāna darśana skandhaḥ

original: yaś ca prajñāpāramitāvihāriṇāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ ca prajñāpāramitā vihāriṇām kula putrāṇām kula duhitṛṇām ca śīla skandhaḥ samādhi skandhaḥ

original: prajñāskandho vimuktiskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaḥ asya kauśika śīlaskandhasya
analyzed: prajñā skandhaḥ vimukti skandhaḥ vimukti jñāna darśana skandhaḥ asya kauśika śīla skandhasya

original: samādhiskandhasya prajñāskandhasya vimuktiskandhasya vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhasya
analyzed: samādhi skandhasya prajñā skandhasya vimukti skandhasya vimukti jñāna darśana skandhasya

original: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaḥ
analyzed: sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddhānām śīla samādhi prajñā vimukti vimukti jñāna darśana skandhaḥ

original: śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
analyzed: śatatamīm api kalām na upaiti

original: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
analyzed: sahasratamīm api śata sahasratamīm api kalām na upaiti

original: saṃkhyām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniśām apy upaniṣadam api nopaiti.
analyzed: saṃkhyām api gaṇanām api upamām api upaniśām api upaniṣadam api na upaiti

original: tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmeś cittaṃ vimuktaṃ,
analyzed: tathā hi teṣām kula putrāṇām kula duhitṛṇām ca śrāvaka pratyekabuddha bhūmeḥ cittam vimuktam

original: na ca kaścid dharmo nāvigato na jñātaḥ. ye kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imāṃ
analyzed: na ca kaścid dharmaḥ na a vigataḥ na jñātaḥ ye kauśika kula putrāḥ vā kula duhitaraḥ vā imām

original: prajñāpāramitāṃ satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhis
analyzed: prajñāpāramitām satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa cīvara chatra dhvaja patākābhiḥ

original: teṣām api kulaputrāṇāṃ (PSP_2-3:81)
analyzed: teṣām api kula putrāṇām

original: kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca ime dṛṣṭadhārmikāḥ sāṃparāyikāś ca guṇānuśaṃsāḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyāḥ.
analyzed: kula duhitṛṇām ca ime dṛṣṭa dhārmikāḥ sāṃparāyikāḥ ca guṇa anuśaṃsāḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyāḥ

original: iti svaparārthādhimuktimadhyamṛddhī
analyzed: iti sva para artha adhimukti madhyam ṛddhī

original: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: evam ukte śakraḥ devānām indraḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā satatasamitaṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ
analyzed: aham bhagavan tasya kula putrasya vā kula duhituḥ vā satata samitam rakṣā āvaraṇa guptim

original: saṃvidhāsyāmi ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati
analyzed: saṃvidhāsyāmi yaḥ imām prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati

original: yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
analyzed: yoniśas ca manasikariṣyati

original: avirahitaś ca bhaviṣyati sarvajñatācittena imāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāṃ satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati
analyzed: avirahitaḥ ca bhaviṣyati sarvajña tā cittena imām ca prajñāpāramitām satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati

original: mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ.
analyzed: mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa cīvara chatra dhvaja patākābhiḥ

original: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
analyzed: evam ukte bhagavān śakram devānām indram etat avocat

original: teṣāṃ punaḥ kauśika kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ
analyzed: teṣām punar kauśika kula putrāṇām kula duhitṛṇām vā imām prajñāpāramitām su ādhyāyatām

original: bahūni devaputraśatasahasrāṇi dharmaśravaṇāyopasaṃkramiṣyanti. teṣāṃ khalu punaḥ
analyzed: bahūni devaputra śata sahasrāṇi dharma śravaṇāya upasaṃkramiṣyanti teṣām khalu punar

original: kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ pratibhānaṃ te devaputrā
analyzed: kula putrāṇām kula duhitṛṇām vā prajñāpāramitā pratisaṃyuktam pratibhānam te deva putrāḥ

original: upasaṃhartavyaṃ maṃsyante. yadāpi te dharma bhāṇakā na mantrayitukāmā bhaviṣyanti
analyzed: upasaṃhartavyam maṃsyante yadā api te dharma bhāṇakāḥ na mantrayitu kāmāḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: tadāpi tenaiva devaputrā dharmagauraveṇa pratibhānam upasaṃhartavyaṃ maṃsyante. imam
analyzed: tadā api tena eva deva putrāḥ dharma gauraveṇa pratibhānam upasaṃhartavyam maṃsyante imam

original: api kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaguṇaṃ pratilapsyante ya imāṃ
analyzed: api kauśika kula putrāḥ vā kula duhitaraḥ vā dṛṣṭa dhārmika guṇam pratilapsyante yaḥ imām

original: prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti
analyzed: prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśas ca manasikariṣyanti

original: tāṃ ca likhitvā satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ.
analyzed: tām ca likhitvā satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa cīvara chatra dhvaja patākābhiḥ

original: punar aparaṃ kauśika teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇānāṃ
analyzed: punar aparam kauśika teṣām kula putrāṇām kula duhitṛṇām vā imām prajñāpāramitām bhāṣyamāṇānām

original: catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ purato nāvalīnacittatā bhaviṣyati ko vā mamānuyokṣyate upālapsyate ceti.
analyzed: catasṛṇām parṣadām puratas na avalīna citta tā bhaviṣyati kaḥ vā mama anuyokṣyate upālapsyate ca iti

original: tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā iyam eva prajñāpāramitā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kariṣyati,
analyzed: tathā hi teṣām kula putrāṇām kula duhitṛṇām vā iyam eva prajñāpāramitā rakṣā āvaraṇa guptim kariṣyati

original: tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvadharmā abhinnā laukikāś ca lokottarāś ca sādhāraṇāś
analyzed: tathā hi atra prajñāpāramitāyām sarva dharmāḥ abhinnāḥ laukikāḥ ca lokottarāḥ ca sādhāraṇāḥ

original: ca kuśalāś ca saṃskṛtāś cāsaṃskṛtāś ca śrāvakadharmāś ca pratyekabuddhadharmāś ca
analyzed: ca kuśalāḥ ca saṃskṛtāḥ ca asaṃskṛtāḥ ca śrāvaka dharmāḥ ca pratyekabuddha dharmāḥ ca

original: bodhisattvadharmāś ca buddhadharmāś ca.
analyzed: bodhisattva dharmāḥ ca buddha dharmāḥ ca

original: tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ (PSP_2-3:82)
analyzed: tathā hi te kula putrāḥ vā kula duhitaraḥ vā adhyātma śūnyatāyām

original: sthitvā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitās te upālambhaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na samanupaśyanti,
analyzed: sthitvā yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatāyām sthitāḥ te upālambham prajñāpāramitāyām na samanupaśyanti

original: yo 'py upālabhyeta tam api na samanupaśyanti.
analyzed: yaḥ pi upālabhyeta tam api na samanupaśyanti

original: evaṃ hi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītānām upālambho na bhaviṣyati.
analyzed: evam hi teṣām kula putrāṇām kula duhitṛṇām vā prajñāpāramitā parigṛhītānām upālambhaḥ na bhaviṣyati

original: punar aparaṃ kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇato
analyzed: punar aparam kauśika tasya kula putrasya vā kula duhituḥ vā imām prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇataḥ

original: dhārayato vācayataḥ paryavāpnuvato yoniśaś ca manasikurvataś cittaṃ nāvalīyate na
analyzed: dhārayataḥ vācayataḥ paryavāpnuvataḥ yoniśas ca manasikurvataḥ cittam na avalīyate na

original: saṃlīyate nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate.
analyzed: saṃlīyate na uttrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate

original: tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā vastu na samanupaśyati ya ālīyeta vā saṃlīyeta
analyzed: tathā hi sa kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā vastu na samanupaśyati yaḥ ālīyeta vā saṃlīyeta

original: vā uttrasyed vā saṃtrasyed vā saṃtrāsam āpadyate vā. imān api sa kauśika kulaputro
analyzed: vā uttrasyet vā saṃtrasyet vā saṃtrāsam āpadyate vā imān api sa kauśika kula putraḥ

original: vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān pratigrahīṣyati ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati
analyzed: vā kula duhitā vā dṛṣṭa dhārmikān guṇān pratigrahīṣyati yaḥ imām prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati

original: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati satkariṣyati mānayiṣyati
analyzed: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśas ca manasikariṣyati satkariṣyati mānayiṣyati

original: pūjayiṣyati puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ iti svaparārthādhimuktimadhyamadhyā
analyzed: pūjayiṣyati puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa cīvara chatra dhvaja patākābhiḥ iti sva para artha adhimukti madhya madhyā

original: punar aparaṃ kauśika yo hi kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām
analyzed: punar aparam kauśika yaḥ hi kaścid kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā imām prajñāpāramitām

original: udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati tāṃ
analyzed: udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśas ca manasikariṣyati tām

original: ca likhitvā satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ
analyzed: ca likhitvā satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa cīvara chatra dhvaja patākābhiḥ

original: sa priyo bhaviṣyati mātāpitṛṇāṃ mitrāmātyajñātisālohitānāṃ śramaṇabrāhmaṇānāṃ,
analyzed: sa priyaḥ bhaviṣyati mātā pitṛṇām mitra amātya jñāti sālohitānām śramaṇa brāhmaṇānām

original: ye 'pi te daśadiśi loke sarvalokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvāś ca pratyekabuddhāś
analyzed: ye pi te daśa diśi loke sarva lokadhātuṣu buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ bodhisattvāḥ ca pratyekabuddhāḥ

original: cārhantaś ca sarve śaikṣāḥ sarve cāśaikṣās teṣām api sa bodhisattvaḥ priyo bhaviṣyati
analyzed: ca arhantaḥ ca sarve śaikṣāḥ sarve ca aśaikṣāḥ teṣām api sa bodhisattvaḥ priyaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: sa devakasyāpi lokasya sa mārakasya sa śramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sa devamānuṣāsurāyāḥ
analyzed: sa devakasya api lokasya sa mārakasya sa śramaṇa brāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sa deva mānuṣa asurāyāḥ

original: prajāyāḥ priyo bhaviṣyati manaāpaḥ. iti svaparārthārdhimuktimadhyādhimātrā
analyzed: prajāyāḥ priyaḥ bhaviṣyati manaāpaḥ iti sva para artha ardhi mukti madhya adhimātrā

original: anācchedena ca pratibhānena samanvāgato bhaviṣyati. anācchedyayā dānapāramitayā samanvāgato bhaviṣyati. evam anācchedyayā śīlapāramitayā (PSP_2-3:83)
analyzed: an ācchedena ca pratibhānena samanvāgataḥ bhaviṣyati an ācchedyayā dāna pāramitayā samanvāgataḥ bhaviṣyati evam an ācchedyayā śīla pāramitayā

original: anācchedyayā kṣāntipāramitayā anācchedyayā vīryapāramitayā anācchedyayā dhyānapāramitayā
analyzed: an ācchedyayā kṣānti pāramitayā an ācchedyayā vīrya pāramitayā an ācchedyayā dhyāna pāramitayā

original: anācchedyayā prajñāpāramitayā samanvāgato bhaviṣyati. anācchedyayā adhyātmaśūnyatayā
analyzed: an ācchedyayā prajñāpāramitayā samanvāgataḥ bhaviṣyati an ācchedyayā adhyātma śūnyatayā

original: anācchedyayā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā samanvāgato bhaviṣyati. anācchedyaiḥ smṛtyupasthānaiḥ
analyzed: an ācchedyayā yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatayā samanvāgataḥ bhaviṣyati an ācchedyaiḥ smṛti upasthānaiḥ

original: samanvāgato bhaviṣyati. anācchedyaiḥ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgaiḥ
analyzed: samanvāgataḥ bhaviṣyati an ācchedyaiḥ samyak prahāṇa ṛddhipāda indriya bala bodhyaṅga mārgaiḥ

original: samanvāgato bhaviṣyati. anācchedyair āryasatyair anācchedyābhir apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ,
analyzed: samanvāgataḥ bhaviṣyati an ācchedyaiḥ ārya satyaiḥ an ācchedyābhiḥ a pramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattibhiḥ

original: anācchedyair aṣṭavimokṣamukhair anācchedyair navānupūrvavihārasamāpattyabhijñāryasatyasarvasamādhisarvadhāraṇīmukhair
analyzed: an ācchedyaiḥ aṣṭa vimokṣa mukhaiḥ an ācchedyaiḥ nava anupūrva vihāra samāpatti abhijñā ārya satya sarva samādhi sarva dhāraṇī mukhaiḥ

original: anācchedyair daśabhis tathāgatabalaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir
analyzed: an ācchedyaiḥ daśabhiḥ tathāgata balaiḥ caturbhiḥ vaiśāradyaiḥ catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ

original: aṣṭādaśabhiś cāveṇikair buddhadharmair anācchedyena sattvaparipākena anācchedyayā
analyzed: aṣṭādaśabhiḥ ca āveṇikaiḥ buddha dharmaiḥ an ācchedyena sattva paripākena an ācchedyayā

original: buddhakṣetrapariśuddhyā anācchedyayā sarvākārajñatayā samanvāgato bhaviṣyati. pratibalaś ca bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: buddhakṣetra pariśuddhyā an ācchedyayā sarva ākāra jña tayā samanvāgataḥ bhaviṣyati pratibalaḥ ca bhaviṣyati

original: utpannotpannānāṃ tīrthyavādānāṃ sahadharmeṇaiva nigrahaṃ kariṣyati. imam api kauśika
analyzed: utpanna utpannānām tīrthya vādānām sahadharmeṇa eva nigraham kariṣyati imam api kauśika

original: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ sāṃparāyikaṃ ca guṇaṃ parigṛhṇīyād ya imāṃ
analyzed: kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā dṛṣṭa dhārmikam sāṃparāyikam ca guṇam parigṛhṇīyāt yaḥ imām

original: prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati.
analyzed: prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśas ca manasikariṣyati

original: avirahitaś ca bhaviṣyati sa sarvākārajñātācittena tāṃ ca likhitvā satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati
analyzed: avirahitaḥ ca bhaviṣyati sa sarva ākāra jñātā cittena tām ca likhitvā satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati

original: mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ.
analyzed: mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa cīvara chatra dhvaja patākābhiḥ

original: iti svaparārthādhimuktir adhimātrāmṛddhī
analyzed: iti sva para artha adhimuktiḥ adhimātra āmṛddhī

original: punar aparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitām
analyzed: punar aparam kauśika yaḥ kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā imām prajñāpāramitām pustaka likhitām

original: api kṛtvā dhārāyiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati tatra kauśika ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre
analyzed: api kṛtvā dhārāyiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati tatra kauśika ye tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre

original: lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitās
analyzed: lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikāḥ deva putrāḥ anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ

original: te tatrāgatyaināṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti
analyzed: te tatra āgatya enām prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti

original: manasikariṣyanti vandiṣyanti namaskṛtvā vanditvā ca punar eva prakramiṣyanti. evaṃ
analyzed: manasi kariṣyanti vandiṣyanti namaskṛtvā vanditvā ca punar eva prakramiṣyanti evam

original: trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino brahmapāriṣadyā brahmapurohitā
analyzed: trāyastriṃśāḥ yāmāḥ tuṣitāḥ nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaḥ brahmapāriṣadyāḥ brahmapurohitāḥ

original: mahābrahmāṇaḥ parīttābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā
analyzed: mahābrahmāṇaḥ parīttābhāḥ apramāṇābhāḥ ābhāsvarāḥ parīttaśubhāḥ apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnāḥ

original: anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā brhatphalāḥ śuddhāvāsā avṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhāḥ
analyzed: anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavāḥ brhatphalāḥ śuddhāvāsāḥ avṛhāḥ atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanāḥ akaniṣṭhāḥ

original: tatra ye kauśika mahābrahmāṇo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau kṛtapraṇidhānās te 'pi
analyzed: tatra ye kauśika mahābrahmāṇaḥ nuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau kṛta praṇidhānāḥ te pi

original: tatrāgatyemāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahya paryavāpya dhārayitvā vācayitvā namaskṛtya
analyzed: tatra āgatya imām prajñāpāramitām udgrahya paryavāpya dhārayitvā vācayitvā namaskṛtya

original: punar eva (PSP_2-3:84)
analyzed: punar eva

original: prakramiṣyanti. ye 'pi śuddhāvāsakāyikā avṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhā
analyzed: prakramiṣyanti ye pi śuddhāvāsa kāyikāḥ avṛhāḥ atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanāḥ akaniṣṭhāḥ

original: devaputrās te 'pi tatrāgatyemāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahya paryavāpya dhārayitvā vācayitvā
analyzed: deva putrāḥ te pi tatra āgatya imām prajñāpāramitām udgrahya paryavāpya dhārayitvā vācayitvā

original: namaskṛtya punar eva prakramiṣyanti. tena hi kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā
analyzed: namaskṛtya punar eva prakramiṣyanti tena hi kauśika kula putreṇa vā kula duhitrā vā

original: evaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ:
analyzed: evam cittam utpādayitavyam

original: ye te daśadiglokadhātuṣu devaputrāś cāturmahārājakāyikā yāvad bṛhatphalā ye 'nuttarāyāṃ
analyzed: ye te daśa diś lokadhātuṣu deva putrāḥ cāturmahārājakāyikāḥ yāvat bṛhat phalāḥ ye nu ttarāyām

original: samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprashitā ye 'pi śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrā ye 'pi cānye devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās
analyzed: samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprashitāḥ ye pi śuddhāvāsa kāyikāḥ deva putrāḥ ye pi ca anye deva nāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa kiṃnara mahoragāḥ

original: te 'pīhāgatyemāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahya paryavāpya dhārayitvā vācayitvā pūjayitvā punar gacchantu,
analyzed: te pi iha āgatya imām prajñāpāramitām udgrahya paryavāpya dhārayitvā vācayitvā pūjayitvā punar gacchantu

original: teṣām etad dharmadānaṃ dattaṃ bhavantu. ye 'pi daśadiglokadhātuṣu cāturmahārājakāyikā
analyzed: teṣām etat dharma dānam dattam bhavantu ye daśa diś lokadhātuṣu cāturmahārājakāyikāḥ

original: devaputrā yāvad bṛhatphalā devaputrā ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitā
analyzed: deva putrāḥ yāvat bṛhatphalāḥ deva putrāḥ ye nuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitā

original: ye 'pi śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrās te 'pi tatrāgatyemāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti
analyzed: ye pi śuddhāvāsa kāyikāḥ deva putrāḥ te pi tatra āgatya imām prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti

original: dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti vanditvā namaskṛtya pūjayitvā punar eva
analyzed: dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti vanditvā namaskṛtya pūjayitvā punar eva

original: prakramitavyaṃ maṃsyante. tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā ya iha
analyzed: prakramitavyam maṃsyante tasya khalu punar kula putrasya vā kula duhituḥ vā yaḥ iha

original: trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devā ye
analyzed: tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikāḥ devāḥ yāvat akaniṣṭhāḥ devāḥ ye

original: 'pi te daśadiglokadhātuṣu cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devās te 'pi tasya
analyzed: pi te daśa diś lokadhātuṣu cāturmahārājakāyikāḥ devāḥ yāvat akaniṣṭhāḥ devāḥ te pi tasya

original: kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyanti. nāpy asya kaścid
analyzed: kula putrasya vā kula duhituḥ vā rakṣā āvaraṇa guptim saṃvidhāsyanti na api asya kaścid

original: avatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī avatāraṃ lapsyate sthāpayitvā pūrvakarmavipākaṃ,
analyzed: avatāra prekṣī avatāra gaveṣī avatāram lapsyate sthāpayitvā pūrva karma vipākam

original: imān api kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān parigṛhṇāti.
analyzed: imān api kauśika kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā dṛṣṭa dhārmikān guṇān parigṛhṇāti

original: tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi ye devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitās te 'pi tatrāgantavyaṃ
analyzed: tathā hi ye deva putrāḥ anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ te pi tatra āgantavyam

original: maṃsyante. tathā hi kauśika devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau sarvasattvānāṃ
analyzed: maṃsyante tathā hi kauśika deva putrāḥ anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau sarva sattvānām

original: traṇāya hitasukhāya saṃprasthitāḥ. iti svaparārthādhimuktir adhimātramadhyā
analyzed: hita sukhāya saṃprasthitāḥ iti sva para artha adhimuktiḥ adhimātra madhyā

original: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu śakraḥ devānām indraḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: kathaṃ bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā jñāsyati,
analyzed: katham bhagavan kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā jñāsyati

original: iha cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrā āgacchanti yāvad akaniṣṭhā devaputrā āgacchantīti?
analyzed: iha cāturmahārājakāyikāḥ deva putrāḥ āgacchanti yāvat akaniṣṭhāḥ deva putrāḥ āgacchanti iti

original: evaṃ samantād daśabhyo digbhya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahītuṃ vā dhārayituṃ vā vācayituṃ vā paryavāptuṃ vā satkartuṃ vā gurukartuṃ vā mānayituṃ  #
analyzed: evam samantāt daśabhyaḥ digbhyaḥ imām prajñāpāramitām udgrahītum vā dhārayitum vā vācayitum vā paryavāptum vā satkartum vā gurukartum vā mānayitum

original: vā pūjayituṃ vā.
analyzed: vā pūjayitum vā

original: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
analyzed: evam ukte bhagavān śakram devānām indram etat avocat

original: sacet kauśika (PSP_2-3:85)
analyzed: saced kauśika

original: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā udāram avabhāsaṃ jñāsyati niṣṭhā tena gantavyā mahaujaskā
analyzed: kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā udāram avabhāsam jñāsyati niṣṭhā tena gantavyā mahā ojaskā
