analyzed: mahā ojaskāḥ devāḥ āgātāḥ imām prajñāpāramitām vācayitum udgrahītum paryavāptum dhārayitum

original: satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ vandituṃ namaskartum.
analyzed: satkartum gurukartum mānayitum pūjayitum vanditum namaskartum

original: punar aparaṃ kauśika sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā amānuṣaṃ divyaṃ gandham anāghrātapūrvam
analyzed: punar aparam kauśika saced kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā amānuṣam divyam gandham an āghrāta pūrvam

original: āghrāsyati niṣṭhā tena gantavyā mahaujaskā mahaujaskā iha devaputrā āgatā iti prajñāpāramitāṃ
analyzed: āghrāsyati niṣṭhā tena gantavyā mahā ojaskāḥ mahā ojaskāḥ iha deva putrāḥ āgatāḥ iti prajñāpāramitām

original: vācayituṃ śrotum udgrahītuṃ paryavāptuṃ dhārayituṃ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayitum.
analyzed: vācayitum śrotum udgrahītum paryavāptum dhārayitum satkartum gurukartum mānayitum pūjayitum

original: punar aparaṃ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā caukṣasamudācāro bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: punar aparam kauśika kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā caukṣa samudācāraḥ bhaviṣyati

original: tasya tayā caukṣasamudācāratayā devatā āgatyemāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhya dhārayitvā
analyzed: tasya tayā caukṣa samudācāra tayā devatāḥ āgatya imām prajñāpāramitām udgṛhya dhārayitvā

original: vācayitvā satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvā āttamanaskā bhaviṣyanti. yāś ca
analyzed: vācayitvā satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvā ātta manaskāḥ bhaviṣyanti yāḥ ca

original: tatra pṛthivīpradeśe 'lpaujaskā alpaujaskā devatā bhaviṣyanti tās tato 'pakramitavyaṃ
analyzed: tatra pṛthivī pradeśe lpa ojaskāḥ alpa ojaskāḥ devatāḥ bhaviṣyanti tāḥ upakramitavyam

original: maṃsyante. teṣāṃ mahaujaskānāṃ mahaujaskānāṃ devānāṃ tejaś ca śriyaś cāsahamānāḥ.
analyzed: maṃsyante teṣām mahā ojaskānām mahā ojaskānām devānām tejaḥ ca śriyaḥ ca a sahamānāḥ

original: yathāyathā mahaujaskā mahaujaskā devatā upasaṃkramiṣyanti tathātathā te kulaputrāḥ
analyzed: yathā yathā mahā ojaskāḥ mahā ojaskāḥ devatāḥ upasaṃkramiṣyanti tathā tathā te kula putrāḥ

original: kuladuhitaro vā udārādhimuktikā bhaviṣyanti. tasmiṃś ca pṛthivīpradeśe 'caukṣasamudācāratā na pracārayitavyā,
analyzed: kula duhitaraḥ vā udāra adhimuktikāḥ bhaviṣyanti tasmin ca pṛthivī pradeśe caukṣa samudācāra tā na pracārayitavyā

original: puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacivaracchatradhvajapatākābhiś ca sa pṛthivīpradeśo
analyzed: puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa civara chatra dhvaja patākābhiḥ ca sa pṛthivī pradeśaḥ

original: 'laṃkartavyaḥ gandhalipto muktapuṣpāvakīrṇaḥ kārayitavyaḥ. avasaktapaṭadāmakalāpaś
analyzed: laṃkartavyaḥ gandha liptaḥ mukta puṣpa avakīrṇaḥ kārayitavyaḥ avasakta paṭa dāma kalāpaḥ

original: cailavitānavitataḥ. anekaprakāraṃ ca sa pṛthivīpradeśo 'laṃkartavyaḥ.
analyzed: caila vitāna vitataḥ aneka prakāram ca sa pṛthivī pradeśaḥ laṃkartavyaḥ

original: punar aparaṃ kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā kāyo na klānto bhaviṣyati.
analyzed: punar aparam kauśika tasya kula putrasya vā kula duhituḥ vā kāyaḥ na klāntaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: kāyasukhaṃ bhaviṣyati. kāyalaghutāṃ ca bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya pratipanno
analyzed: kāya sukham bhaviṣyati kāya laghu tām ca bahu jana hitāya bahu jana sukhāya pratipannaḥ

original: bhaviṣyati. sa ca kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā kāyalaghutāṃ kāyakarmaṇyatāṃ
analyzed: bhaviṣyati sa ca kauśika kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā kāya laghu tām kāya karmaṇya tām

original: kāyasukhatāṃ cittalaghutāṃ cittakarmaṇyatāṃ cittasukhatāṃ ca jñāsyati. sukhena sa
analyzed: kāya sukha tām citta laghu tām citta karmaṇya tām citta sukha tām ca jñāsyati sukhena sa

original: rātrau śayyāṃ kalpayiṣyati. imāṃ eva prajñāpāramitām āśayena kalpayan na pāpakān svapnān drakṣyati,
analyzed: rātrau śayyām kalpayiṣyati imām eva prajñāpāramitām āśayena kalpayan na pāpakān svapnān drakṣyati

original: drakṣyaṃś ca punaḥ svapnena tathāgatān evārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān drakṣyati dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇacitritagātrān
analyzed: drakṣyan ca punar svapnena tathāgatān eva arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān drakṣyati dvātriṃśat mahāpuruṣa lakṣaṇa citrita gātrān

original: suvarṇavarṇena samucchrayeṇa bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtān bodhisattvagaṇaparivṛtān dharmaṃ
analyzed: suvarṇa varṇena samucchrayeṇa bhikṣu saṃgha parivṛtān bodhisattva gaṇa parivṛtān dharmam

original: deśayamānāṃs (PSP_2-3:86)
analyzed: deśayamānān

original: tebhyaḥ ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktām eva kathāṃ śroṣyati. saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyadharmapratisaṃyuktāṃ
analyzed: tebhyaḥ ṣaṣ pāramitā pratisaṃyuktām eva kathām śroṣyati saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣya dharma pratisaṃyuktām

original: yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmapratisaṃyuktām eva kathāṃ śroṣyati. tāsāṃ ca pāramitānām
analyzed: yāvat aṣṭādaśa āveṇika buddha dharma pratisaṃyuktām eva kathām śroṣyati tāsām ca pāramitānām

original: arthaṃ śroṣyati yāvad aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānām arthaṃ śroṣyati. bodhivṛkṣaṃ drakṣyati.
analyzed: artham śroṣyati yāvat aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānām artham śroṣyati bodhivṛkṣam drakṣyati

original: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ bodhimaṇḍam upasaṃkramamāṇaṃ drakṣyati. anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
analyzed: bodhisattvam mahāsattvam bodhimaṇḍam upasaṃkramamāṇam drakṣyati anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim

original: abhisaṃbudhyamānaṃ drakṣyati. abhisaṃbudhyādvayaṃ dharmacakrapravartayamānaṃ drakṣyati.
analyzed: abhisaṃbudhyamānam drakṣyati abhisaṃbudhya advayam dharma cakra pravartayamānam drakṣyati

original: bahūni bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi drakṣyati dharmasaṃgītiratāni evaṃ sarvajñatā
analyzed: bahūni bodhisattva koṭī niyuta śata sahasrāṇi drakṣyati dharma saṃgīti ratāni evam sarvajña tā

original: parigrahītavyā evaṃ sattvāḥ paripācayitavyā evaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayitavyam
analyzed: parigrahītavyāḥ evam sattvāḥ paripācayitavyāḥ evam buddhakṣetram pariśodhayitavyam

original: iti. bahunāṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaśataśahasrāṇāṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi śabdaṃ śroṣyati.
analyzed: iti bahunām buddha koṭī niyuta śata śahasrāṇām pūrvasyām diśi śabdam śroṣyati

original: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām ūrdhvam adho vidikṣu bahūnāṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ
analyzed: evam dakṣiṇasyām paścimāyām uttarasyām ūrdhvam adhas vidikṣu bahūnām buddha koṭī niyuta śata sahasrāṇām

original: śabdaṃ śroṣyati. amuṣmin lokadhātau amuko nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ iyadbhir
analyzed: śabdam śroṣyati amuṣmin lokadhātau amukaḥ nāma tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ iyadbhiḥ

original: bodhisattvakoṭīśatasahasrair iyadbhiḥ śrāvakakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto
analyzed: bodhisattva koṭī śata sahasraiḥ iyadbhiḥ śrāvaka koṭī niyuta śata sahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ

original: dharmaṃ deśayati. pūrvasyāṃ diśi bahūni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi drakṣyati parinirvāyamāṇāni
analyzed: dharmam deśayati pūrvasyām diśi bahūni buddha koṭī niyuta śata sahasrāṇi drakṣyati parinirvāyamāṇāni

original: yāvad daśasu dikṣu bahūni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi drakṣyati parinirvāyamāṇāni.
analyzed: yāvat daśasu dikṣu bahūni buddha koṭī niyuta śata sahasrāṇi drakṣyati parinirvāyamāṇāni

original: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ stūpān dhātudharān nānāratnamayān bahūni stūpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi
analyzed: teṣām ca tathāgatānām stūpān dhātudharān nānā ratna mayān bahūni stūpa koṭī niyuta śata sahasrāṇi

original: drakṣyati. tāṃś ca stūpān satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ.
analyzed: drakṣyati tān ca stūpān satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa cīvara chatra dhvaja patākābhiḥ

original: sa khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imān evaṃrūpān bhadrakāṃś ca svapnān
analyzed: sa khalu punar kauśika kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā imān evaṃrūpān bhadrakān ca svapnān

original: drakṣyati. sa sukham eva svapsyati sukhaṃ ca pratibhotsyate ojaḥprakṣiptaṃ ca kāyaṃ
analyzed: drakṣyati sa sukham eva svapsyati sukham ca pratibhotsyate ojaḥ prakṣiptam ca kāyam

original: saṃjñāsyati. laghuṃ ca kāyaṃ saṃjñāsyati na guruṃ. na cāsya balavatī gṛddhir āhāre
analyzed: saṃjñāsyati laghum ca kāyam saṃjñāsyati na gurum na ca asya balavatī gṛddhiḥ āhāre

original: bhaviṣyati. na cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāśanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāragṛddhir bhaviṣyati.
analyzed: bhaviṣyati na cīvara piṇḍapāta śayana aśana glāna pratyaya bhaiṣajya pariṣkāra gṛddhiḥ bhaviṣyati

original: tadyathāpi nāma kauśika yogācārasya bhikṣoḥ samādher vyutthitasya manasikārasaṃtarpitena
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma kauśika yoga ācārasya bhikṣoḥ samādheḥ vyutthitasya manasikāra saṃtarpitena

original: cittena na balavaty āhāre gṛddhir bhavati.
analyzed: cittena na balavati āhāre gṛddhiḥ bhavati

original: evam eva kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā na balavaty āhāre gṛddhir bhaviṣyati.
analyzed: evam eva kauśika tasya kula putrasya vā kula duhituḥ vā na balavati āhāre gṛddhiḥ bhaviṣyati

original: tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi tasyāmanuṣyā ojaḥ kāya upasaṃharanti. ye cāpi (PSP_2-3:87)
analyzed: tathā hi tasya amanuṣyāḥ ojaḥ kāye upasaṃharanti ye ca api

original: daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavantas te 'pi sadevanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragāḥ
analyzed: daśasu dikṣu buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ te pi sa deva nāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa kiṃnara mahoragāḥ

original: ojaḥ kāye prakṣipanti. imaṃ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ
analyzed: ojaḥ kāye prakṣipanti imam sa kauśika kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā dṛṣṭa dhārmikam

original: guṇaṃ parigṛhṇīte ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇīte paryavāpnoti dhārayati vācayati
analyzed: guṇam parigṛhṇīte yaḥ imām prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇīte paryavāpnoti dhārayati vācayati

original: yoniśaś ca manasikaroti avirahitaś ca sarvajñatācittena. iti svaparārthādhimuktir adhimātrādhimātrā
analyzed: yoniśas ca manasikaroti avirahitaḥ ca sarvajña tā cittena iti sva para artha adhimuktiḥ adhimātra adhimātrā

original: kiṃ cāpi sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ nodgṛhṇīyān na dhārayen
analyzed: kim ca api sa kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā imām prajñāpāramitām na udgṛhṇīyāt na dhārayen

original: na vācayen na paryavāpnuyān na yoniśaś ca manasikuryān na parebhyaś ca saṃprakāśayed
analyzed: na vācayet na paryavāpnuyāt na yoniśas ca manasikuryāt na parebhyaḥ ca saṃprakāśayet

original: api tu khalu punaḥ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ.
analyzed: api tu khalu punar pustaka likhitām kṛtvā satkuryāt gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayet puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa cīvara chatra dhvaja patākābhiḥ

original: yaś ca kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇīyād dhārayed
analyzed: yaḥ ca kauśika kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā imām prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇīyāt dhārayet

original: vācayet paryavāpnuyād yoniśaś ca manasikuryāt parebhyaś ca saṃprakāśayet tāṃ ca likhitāṃ
analyzed: vācayet paryavāpnuyāt yoniśas ca manasikuryāt parebhyaḥ ca saṃprakāśayet tām ca likhitām

original: satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ
analyzed: satkuryāt gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayet puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa cīvara chatra dhvaja patākābhiḥ

original: ayaṃ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tato nidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
analyzed: ayam sa kauśika kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā tatas nidānam bahutaram puṇyam prasavet

original: na tv eva yaḥ samantād daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān
analyzed: na tu eva yaḥ samantāt daśasu dikṣu sarva lokadhātuṣu tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān

original: satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet saśrāvakasaṃghāṃś cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāśanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ
analyzed: satkuryāt gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayet sa śrāvaka saṃghān cīvara piṇḍapāta śayana aśana glāna pratyaya bhaiṣajya pariṣkāraiḥ

original: parinirvṛtānāṃ ca teṣāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ
analyzed: parinirvṛtānām ca teṣām tathāgatānām arhatām samyaksaṃbuddhānām sa śrāvaka saṃghānām

original: saptaratnamayān stūpān kārayet,
analyzed: sapta ratna mayān stūpān kārayet

original: tāṃś ca satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ.
analyzed: tān ca satkuryāt gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayet puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa cīvara chatra dhvaja patākābhiḥ

original: iti parārthādhimuktir mṛdumṛddhi stūpasatkāraparivarto nāma tṛtīyaḥ
analyzed: iti parārtha adhimuktiḥ mṛdumṛddhi stūpasatkāraparivartaḥ nāma tṛtīyaḥ

original: atha khalu bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān śakram devānām indram etat avocat

original: yady ayaṃ kauśika jambudvīpaḥ paripūrṇaś cūḍikābaddhas tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ bhavet,
analyzed: yadi ayam kauśika jambudvīpaḥ paripūrṇaḥ cūḍikā baddhaḥ tathāgata śarīrāṇām bhavet

original: tāni te kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā upanāmayed,
analyzed: tāni te kaścid eva kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā upanāmayet

original: yaś cemāṃ te prajñāpāramitām upanāmayet,
analyzed: yaḥ ca imām te prajñāpāramitām upanāmayet

original: tatas tvaṃ tayor dvayor bhāgayoḥ sthāpitayoḥ kaṃ parigṛhṇīyāḥ?
analyzed: tatas tvam tayoḥ dvayoḥ bhāgayoḥ sthāpitayoḥ kam parigṛhṇīyāḥ

original: śakra āha: saced me bhagavann ayaṃ jambudvīpaḥ paripūrṇaś cūḍikābaddhas tathāgataśarīrāṇām upanāmyeta,
analyzed: śakraḥ āha saced me bhagavan ayam jambudvīpaḥ paripūrṇaḥ cūḍikā baddhaḥ tathāgata śarīrāṇām upanāmyeta

original: iyaṃ ca prajñāpāramitā pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā upanāmyeta parikalpam upādāya imām evāhaṃ tayor dvayor (PSP_2-3:88)
analyzed: iyam ca prajñāpāramitā pustaka likhitām kṛtvā upanāmyeta parikalpam upādāya imām eva aham tayoḥ dvayoḥ

original: bhāgayoḥ sthāpitayoḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇīyāṃ. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: bhāgayoḥ sthāpitayoḥ prajñāpāramitām parigṛhṇīyām tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na mama bhagavaṃs teṣu tathāgataśarīreṣv agauravaṃ,
analyzed: na mama bhagavan teṣu tathāgata śarīreṣu a gauravam

original: nāhaṃ bhagavaṃs tathāgataśarirāṇi na satkartukāmo na gurukartukāmo na mānayitukāmo
analyzed: na aham bhagavan tathāgata śarirāṇi na satkartu kāmaḥ na gurukartu kāmaḥ na mānayitu kāmaḥ

original: na pūjayitukāmo. api tu khalu punar me bhagavann evaṃ syāt prajñāpāramitānirjātāni
analyzed: na pūjayitu kāmaḥ api tu khalu punar me bhagavan evam syāt prajñāpāramitā nirjātāni

original: tathāgataśarirāṇi yena tāni satkriyante gurukriyante mānyante pūjyante,
analyzed: tathāgata śarirāṇi yena tāni satkriyante gurukriyante mānyante pūjyante

original: prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi yena tāni pūjāṃ labhante.
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā paribhāvitāni tathāgata śarīrāṇi yena tāni pūjām labhante

original: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ śakram devānām indram etat avocat

original: prajñāpāramitā kauśika agrāhyā anidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇā. tat
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā kauśika agrāhyā anidarśanā apratighā eka lakṣaṇā yat uta alakṣaṇā tat

original: kathaṃ tvam agrāhyāṃ prajñāpāramitām anidarśanām apratighām ekalakṣaṇāṃ yad utālakṣaṇām
analyzed: katham tvam agrāhyām prajñāpāramitām a nidarśanām apratighām eka lakṣaṇām yat uta alakṣaṇām

original: udgrahītavyāṃ manyase?
analyzed: udgrahītavyām manyase

original: tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na hi prajñāpāramitā grahāya anugrahāya vā sthitā,
analyzed: na hi prajñāpāramitā grahāya anugrahāya vā sthitā

original: na hānāya na vṛddhaye notkṣepāya na vikṣepāya na saṃkleśāya na vyavadānāya,
analyzed: na hānāya na vṛddhaye na utkṣepāya na vikṣepāya na saṃkleśāya na vyavadānāya

original: na buddhadharmāṇāṃ dāyikā,
analyzed: na buddha dharmāṇām dāyikā

original: na pṛthagjanadharmāṇāṃ cchorikā,
analyzed: na pṛthagjana dharmāṇām chorikā

original: na bodhisattvadharmāṇāṃ na pratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ na śrāvakadharmāṇāṃ na śaikṣadharmāṇāṃ nāśaikṣadharmāṇāṃ dāyikā,
analyzed: na bodhisattva dharmāṇām na pratyekabuddha dharmāṇām na śrāvaka dharmāṇām na śaikṣa dharmāṇām na aśaikṣa dharmāṇām dāyikā

original: na saṃskṛtadhāto dāyikā,
analyzed: na saṃskṛta dhātaḥ dāyikā

original: nāsaṃskṛtadhāto dāyikā,
analyzed: na a saṃskṛta dhātaḥ dāyikā

original: nādhyātmaśūnyatāyā yāvan nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā dātrī,
analyzed: na adhyātma śūnyatāyāḥ yāvat na abhāva svabhāva śūnyatāyāḥ dātrī

original: na pāramitānāṃ na smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgāṇāṃ
analyzed: na pāramitānām na smṛti upasthāna samyakprahāṇa ṛddhipāda indriya bala bodhyaṅga mārgāṇām

original: nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ na balavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāṃ nāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ
analyzed: na apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattīnām na bala vaiśāradya pratisaṃvidām na aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānām

original: buddhadharmāṇāṃ dātrī,
analyzed: buddha dharmāṇām dātrī

original: na sarvajñatāyā dātrī.
analyzed: na sarvajña tāyāḥ dātrī

original: śakra āha: evam etad bhadanta śāriputra yathā vadasi na prajñāpāramitā buddhadharmāṇāṃ dātrī yāvan na sarvajñatāyā dātrī. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: śakraḥ āha evam etat bhadanta śāriputra yathā vadasi na prajñāpāramitā buddha dharmāṇām dātrī yāvat na sarvajña tāyāḥ dātrī tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na hi prajñāpāramitā dvayaṃ pratyupasthitā,
analyzed: na hi prajñāpāramitā dvayam pratyupasthitā

original: advayā hi prajñāpāramitā,
analyzed: advayā hi prajñāpāramitā

original: evaṃ dhyānapāramitā vīryapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā śīlapāramitā,
analyzed: evam dhyāna pāramitā vīrya pāramitā kṣānti pāramitā śīla pāramitā

original: dānapāramitā na dvayaṃ pratyupasthitā,
analyzed: dāna pāramitā na dvayam pratyupasthitā

original: advayā hi dānapāramitā.
analyzed: advayā hi dāna pāramitā

original: atha khalu bhagavān śakrasya devānām indrasya sādhukāram adāt:
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān śakrasya devānām indrasya sādhukāram adāt

original: sādhu sādhu kauśika evam etad yathā nirdiśasi na prajñāpāramitā dvayaṃ pratyupasthitā,
analyzed: sādhu sādhu kauśika evam etat yathā nirdiśasi na prajñāpāramitā dvayam pratyupasthitā

original: advayā hi prajñāpāramitā,
analyzed: advayā hi prajñāpāramitā

original: evaṃ dhyānapāramitā vīryapāramitā,
analyzed: evam dhyāna pāramitā vīrya pāramitā

original: kṣāntipāramitā śīlapāramitā,
analyzed: kṣānti pāramitā śīla pāramitā

original: dānapāramitā na dvayaṃ pratyupasthitā,
analyzed: dāna pāramitā na dvayam pratyupasthitā

original: advayā hi dānapāramitā.
analyzed: advayā hi dāna pāramitā

original: dharmadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: dharmadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icchet yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ dvayam icchet tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi kauśika dharmadhātuś ca prajñāpāramitā (PSP_2-3:89)
analyzed: tathā hi kauśika dharmadhātuḥ ca prajñāpāramitā

original: cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
analyzed: ca advayam etat a dvaidhīkāram

original: evaṃ dhyānapāramitā ca vīryapāramitā ca kṣāntipāramitā ca śīlapāramitā ca,
analyzed: evam dhyāna pāramitā ca vīrya pāramitā ca kṣānti pāramitā ca śīla pāramitā ca

original: dharmadhātuś ca dānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
analyzed: dharmadhātuḥ ca dāna pāramitā ca advayam etat a dvaidhīkāram

original: tathatāyāḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dvayam icchet,
analyzed: tathatāyāḥ sa kauśika dvayam icchet yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ dvayam icchet

original: tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi kauśika tathatā ca prajñāpāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
analyzed: tathā hi kauśika tathatā ca prajñāpāramitā ca advayam etat a dvaidhīkāram

original: evaṃ dhyānapāramitā ca vīryapāramitā ca kṣāntipāramitā ca śīlapāramitā ca,
analyzed: evam dhyāna pāramitā ca vīrya pāramitā ca kṣānti pāramitā ca śīla pāramitā ca

original: tathatā ca dānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
analyzed: tathatā ca dāna pāramitā ca advayam etat a dvaidhīkāram

original: bhūtakoṭer acintyadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dvayam icchet,
analyzed: bhūtakoṭeḥ acintya dhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icchet yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ dvayam icchet

original: tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi kauśika bhūtakoṭiś cācintyadhātuś ca prajñāpāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
analyzed: tathā hi kauśika bhūtakoṭiḥ ca acintya dhātuḥ ca prajñāpāramitā ca advayam etat a dvaidhīkāram

original: evaṃ dhyānapāramitā ca vīryapāramitā ca kṣāntipāramitā ca śīlapāramitā ca,
analyzed: evam dhyāna pāramitā ca vīrya pāramitā ca kṣānti pāramitā ca śīla pāramitā ca

original: bhūtakoṭiś cācintyadhātuś ca dānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
analyzed: bhūtakoṭiḥ ca acintya dhātuḥ ca dāna pāramitā ca advayam etat a dvaidhīkāram

original: śakra āha: namaskaromi bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena namaskṛtāṃ
analyzed: śakraḥ āha namaskaromi bhagavan prajñāpāramitām sa deva mānuṣa asureṇa lokena namaskṛtām

original: yatra śikṣitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
analyzed: yatra śikṣitvā bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ nuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate

original: yadāhaṃ bhagavan sudharmāyāṃ devasabhāyāṃ tasmin devendrāsane niṣaṇṇo bhavāmi svake
analyzed: yadā aham bhagavan sudharmāyām deva sabhāyām tasmin deva indra āsane niṣaṇṇaḥ bhavāmi svake

original: āsane tatra ye devaputrā mamopasthānāyāgacchanti te māṃ tatra sthaṃ namasyanti. yadāhaṃ
analyzed: āsane tatra ye deva putrāḥ mama upasthānāya āgacchanti te mām tatra stham namasyanti yadā aham

original: tatra na bhavāmi svake siṃhāsane tadā te devaputrās tat mamāsanaṃ namaskṛtya punar eva prakrāmanti,
analyzed: tatra na bhavāmi svake siṃhāsane tadā te deva putrāḥ tat mama asanam namaskṛtya punar eva prakrāmanti

original: iha śakro devānām indro dharmāsane niṣaṇṇas trāyastriṃśānāṃ devānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmāseti.
analyzed: iha śakraḥ devānām indraḥ dharma āsane niṣaṇṇaḥ trāyastriṃśānām devānām dharmam deśayāmāsa iti

original: evam eva bhagavan yatreyaṃ prajñāpāramitā likhitvā sthāsyate svādhyāsyate vā parebhyo vā saṃprakāśayiṣyate,
analyzed: evam eva bhagavan yatra iyam prajñāpāramitā likhitvā sthāsyate su ādhyāsyate vā parebhyaḥ vā saṃprakāśayiṣyate

original: tatra ye te daśabhyo digbhyo devaputrā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragās te tāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ namaskṛtya punar eva prakramiṣyanti,
analyzed: tatra ye te daśabhyaḥ digbhyaḥ deva putrāḥ deva nāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa kinnara mahoragāḥ te tām prajñāpāramitām namaskṛtya punar eva prakramiṣyanti

original: ato nirjātās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
analyzed: atas nirjātāḥ tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ

original: ato nirjātaṃ ca sarvasattvānāṃ sukhopadhānaṃ,
analyzed: atas nirjātam ca sarva sattvānām sukha upadhānam

original: yad api tathāgataśarīrāṇi tad api prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitatvāt pūjāṃ pratilabhante. prajñāpāramitā bhagavan bodhisattvacaryāṃ carataḥ sarvajñānasyāśrayabhūtā,
analyzed: yat api tathāgata śarīrāṇi tat api prajñāpāramitā paribhāvita tvāt pūjām pratilabhante prajñāpāramitā bhagavan bodhisattva caryām carataḥ sarvajñānasya āśraya bhūtā

original: kāraṇabhūtā āhārikā prajñāpāramiteti.
analyzed: kāraṇa bhūtā āhārikā prajñāpāramitā iti

original: tasmād ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ pratyaṃśābhyāṃ prajñāpāramitām eva parigṛhṇīyām.
analyzed: tasmāt aham bhagavan tābhyām dvābhyām pratyaṃśābhyām prajñāpāramitām eva parigṛhṇīyām

original: imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhya svādhyāyaṃ kuryān dharmāntargatena mānasena yasmin samaye
analyzed: imām prajñāpāramitām udgṛhya svādhyāyam kuryāt dharma antargatena mānasena yasmin samaye

original: prajñāpāramitāṃ manasikaromi (PSP_2-3:90)
analyzed: prajñāpāramitām manasikaromi

original: tasmin samaye bhagavan nimittam eva na samanupaśyāmi bhayasya vā stambhitatvasya vā. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: tasmin samaye bhagavat nimittam eva na samanupaśyāmi bhayasya vā stambhita tvasya vā tat kasya hetoḥ

original: animittā hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā aliṅgā anabhilapyā,
analyzed: animittā hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā aliṅgā an abhilapyā

original: apravyāhārā hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā,
analyzed: a pravyāhārā hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā

original: evaṃ dhyānapāramitā vīryapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā śīlapāramitā,
analyzed: evam dhyāna pāramitā vīrya pāramitā kṣānti pāramitā śīla pāramitā

original: animittā hi bhagavan dānapāramitā aliṅgā anabhilapyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan dānapāramitā yāvat sarvajñatā,
analyzed: animittā hi bhagavan dāna pāramitā aliṅgā an abhilapyā a pravyāhārā hi bhagavan dāna pāramitā yāvat sarvajña tā

original: saced bhagavan prajñāpāramitā sanimittā saliṅgā sābhilapyā sapravyāhārābhaviṣyan
analyzed: saced bhagavan prajñāpāramitā sa nimittā sa liṅgā sa abhilapyā sa pravyāhārā abhaviṣyan

original: nānimittā nāliṅgā nānabhilapyā nāpravyāhārā naiva tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ
analyzed: na a nimittāḥ na a liṅgāḥ na an abhilapyāḥ na a pravyāhārāḥ na eva tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ

original: sarvadharmān animittān aliṅgān anabhilapyān apravyāhārān iti viditvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
analyzed: sarva dharmān a nimittān a liṅgān an abhilapyān a pravyāhārān iti viditvā anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim

original: abhisaṃbudhya sattvānām animittam aliṅgam anabhilapyam apravyāhāraṃ dharmam adeśayiṣyat,
analyzed: abhisaṃbudhya sattvānām animittam a liṅgam an abhilapyam a pravyāhāram dharmam adeśayiṣyat

original: yasmād bhagavann iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā animittā aliṅgā anabhilapyā apravyāhārā tasmāt
analyzed: yasmāt bhagavan iyam prajñāpāramitā animittā aliṅgā an abhilapyā a pravyāhārā tasmāt

original: tathāgataḥ sarvadharmān animittān aliṅgān anabhilapyān apravyāhārān viditvā anuttarāṃ
analyzed: tathāgataḥ sarva dharmān animittān a liṅgān an abhilapyān a pravyāhārān viditvā anuttarām

original: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvānām animittam aliṅgam anabhilapyam apravyāhāraṃ dharmaṃ deśayet.
analyzed: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvānām animittam a liṅgam an abhilapyam a pravyāhāram dharmam deśayet

original: iti parārthādhimuktir mṛdumadhyā
analyzed: iti parārtha adhimuktiḥ mṛdu madhyā

original: tasmād bhagavann iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena satkartavyā gurukartavyā
analyzed: tasmāt bhagavan iyam prajñāpāramitā sa deva mānuṣa asureṇa lokena satkartavyā gurukartavyā

original: mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacivaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ.
analyzed: mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa civara chatra dhvaja patākābhiḥ

original: na cāsya narakatiryagyoniyamalokagatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā,
analyzed: na ca asya naraka tiryagyoni yama loka gatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā

original: na śrāvakabhūmir na pratyekabuddhabhūmiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
analyzed: na śrāvaka bhūmiḥ na pratyekabuddha bhūmiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā yāvat anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim

original: abhisaṃbuddho bhaviṣyati. avirahitaś ca bhaviṣyati tathāgatadarśanena sattvaparipākena
analyzed: abhisaṃbuddhaḥ bhaviṣyati avirahitaḥ ca bhaviṣyati tathāgata darśanena sattva paripākena

original: yad uta buddhakṣetram upasaṃkrāmati,
analyzed: yat uta buddhakṣetram upasaṃkrāmati

original: tāṃś ca tathāgatān satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ. iti parārthādhimuktimṛdvadhimātrā
analyzed: tān ca tathāgatān satkartum gurukartum mānayitum pūjayitum puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa cīvara chatra dhvaja patākābhiḥ iti parārtha adhimukti mṛdu adhimātrā

original: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yady ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātus tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇaś cūḍikābaddho 'pi me upanāmyeta,
analyzed: punar aparam bhagavan yadi ayam tri sāhasra mahā sāhasraḥ lokadhātuḥ tathāgata śarīrāṇām paripūrṇaḥ cūḍikā baddhaḥ pi me upanāmyeta

original: imāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitaṃ kṛtvā upanāmyeta,
analyzed: imām ca prajñāpāramitām pustaka likhitam kṛtvā upanāmyeta

original: aham anayor dvayor bhāgayoḥ sthāpitayor imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇīyāṃ. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: aham anayoḥ dvayoḥ bhāgayoḥ sthāpitayoḥ imām eva prajñāpāramitām parigṛhṇīyām tat kasya hetoḥ

original: ato nirjātāni hi tathāgataśarīrāṇi. tena satkriyante gurukriyante mānayante pūjyante
analyzed: atas nirjātāni hi tathāgata śarīrāṇi tena satkriyante gurukriyante mānayante pūjyante

original: yena te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca tāni satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvā na
analyzed: yena te kula putrāḥ kula duhitaraḥ ca tāni satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvā na

original: durgativinipāteṣūpapadyante,
analyzed: durgati vinipāteṣu upapadyante

original: devamanuṣyasaṃpattīr anubhūya yathāpraṇidhānena nirvāsyanti śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā mahāyānena (PSP_2-3:91)
analyzed: deva manuṣya saṃpattīḥ anubhūya yathā praṇidhānena nirvāsyanti śrāvaka yānena vā pratyekabuddha yānena vā mahā yānena

original: vā. api tu khalu punar bhagavan yac ca tathāgatadarśanaṃ yac ca prajñāpāramitādarśanaṃ tulyam etat,
analyzed: vā api tu khalu punar bhagavan yat ca tathāgata darśanam yat ca prajñāpāramitā darśanam tulyam etat

original: tathā hi bhagavan yā prajñāpāramitā yaś ca tathāgato 'dvayam etad advaidhīkāram. iti parārthādhimuktir madhyamṛddhī
analyzed: tathā hi bhagavan yā prajñāpāramitā yaḥ ca tathāgataḥ dvayam etat a dvaidhīkāram iti para artha adhimuktiḥ madhyam ṛddhī

original: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yaś ca tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tribhiḥ prātihāryair dharmaṃ deśayati,
analyzed: punar aparam bhagavan yaḥ ca tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tribhiḥ prātihāryaiḥ dharmam deśayati

original: yad uta dvādaśāṅgaṃ sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ yāvad avadānopadeśā,
analyzed: yat uta dvādaśa aṅgam sūtram geyam vyākaraṇam yāvat avadāna upadeśā

original: yaś ca sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhya paryavāpya parebhyaś ca vistareṇa deśayeta tulyam etat. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: yaḥ ca sa kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā imām prajñāpāramitām udgṛhya paryavāpya parebhyaḥ ca vistareṇa deśayeta tulyam etat tat kasya hetoḥ

original: ato nirjātāni hi bhagavaṃs trīṇi prātihāryāṇi,
analyzed: atas nirjātāni hi bhagavan trīṇi prātihāryāṇi

original: tato nirjātaṃ sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ yāvad avadānopadeśāḥ.
analyzed: tatas nirjātam sūtram geyam vyākaraṇam yāvat avadāna upadeśāḥ

original: punar aparaṃ bhagavan ye pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayanti yad uta sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ yāvad avadānopadeśāḥ  #
analyzed: punar aparam bhagavan ye pūrvasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī vālukā upamāḥ buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ dharmam deśayanti yat uta sūtram geyam vyākaraṇam yāvat avadāna upadeśāḥ

original: tribhiḥ prātihāryair,
analyzed: tribhiḥ prātihāryaiḥ

original: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām ūrdhvam adho yāvad vidikṣu gaṅgānadīvālkopameṣu
analyzed: evam dakṣiṇasyām diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām ūrdhvam adhas yāvat vidikṣu gaṅgā nadī vā alka upameṣu

original: lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayanti tribhiḥ prātihāryair yad uta sūtraṃ
analyzed: lokadhātuṣu buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ dharmam deśayanti tribhiḥ prātihāryaiḥ yat uta sūtram

original: geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ yāvad avadānopadeśāḥ,
analyzed: geyam vyākaraṇam yāvat avadāna upadeśāḥ

original: yaś ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇīyāt yāvat parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayet tulyam etat. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: yaḥ ca kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā imām prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇīyāt yāvat parebhyaḥ ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayet tulyam etat tat kasya hetoḥ

original: ato nirjātāni hi bhagavaṃs trīṇi prātihāryāṇi. tato nirjātaṃ sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ yāvad avadānopādeśāḥ.
analyzed: atas nirjātāni hi bhagavan trīṇi prātihāryāṇi tatas nirjātam sūtram geyam vyākaraṇam yāvat avadāna upādeśāḥ

original: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yaś caikaikasyāṃ diśi yāvanto daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu
analyzed: punar aparam bhagavan yaḥ ca ekaikasyām diśi yāvantaḥ daśasu dikṣu sarva lokadhātuṣu

original: gaṅgānadīvālukopamās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tān satkuryād gurukuryāt
analyzed: gaṅgā nadī vālukā upamāḥ tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ tān satkuryāt gurukuryāt

original: mānayet pūjayet puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhir,
analyzed: mānayet pūjayet puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa cīvara chatra dhvaja patākābhiḥ

original: yaś cemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā satkuryād gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayet puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhis  #
analyzed: yaḥ ca imām prajñāpāramitām pustaka likhitām kṛtvā satkuryāt gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayet puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa cīvara chatra dhvaja patākābhiḥ

original: tulyam etat. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: tulyam etat tat kasya hetoḥ

original: ato nirjātā hi tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ.
analyzed: atas nirjātāḥ hi tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ

original: iti parārthādhimukti madhyamadhyā
analyzed: iti

original: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati
analyzed: punar aparam bhagavan yaḥ kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā imām prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśas ca manasikariṣyati

original: parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati,
analyzed: parebhyaḥ ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati

original: tasya na nirayatiryagyoniyamalokagatiḥ. pratikāṅkṣitavyā na śrāvakabhūmir na pratyekabuddhabhūmiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā,
analyzed: tasya na niraya tiryagyoni yama loka gatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā na śrāvaka bhūmiḥ na pratyekabuddha bhūmiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā

original: tathā hi sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sthito 'vinivartanīyāyāṃ bhūmau. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: tathā hi sa bhagavan bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ sthitaḥ vinivartanīyāyām bhūmau tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā udgṛhṇāti dhārayati
analyzed: tathā hi sa kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā imām prajñāpāramitām likhitvā udgṛhṇāti dhārayati

original: vācayati paryavāpnoti yoniśaś ca manasikaroti tāṃ ca likhitāṃ satkaroti gurukaroti
analyzed: vācayati paryavāpnoti yoniśas ca manasikaroti tām ca likhitām satkaroti gurukaroti

original: mānayati pūjayati puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhis,
analyzed: mānayati pūjayati puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa cīvara chatra dhvaja patākābhiḥ

original: tasya na kutaścid bhayaṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyaṃ. tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan dhanikabhayabhītaḥ puruṣo rājānam upatiṣṭhet,
analyzed: tasya na kutaścid bhayam pratikāṅkṣitavyam tat yathā api nāma bhagavan dhanika bhaya bhītaḥ puruṣaḥ rājānam upatiṣṭhet

original: sa rājānaṃ sevamāno yebhya evāsya bhayaṃ bhavati tair eva sevyate na ca tebhyo bibheti. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: sa rājānam sevamānaḥ yebhyaḥ eva asya bhayam bhavati taiḥ eva sevyate na ca tebhyaḥ bibheti tat kasya hetoḥ

original: evam etat bhagavan balavati niśraye bhayaṃ na bhavati. evam eva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitāni
analyzed: evam etat bhagavan balavati niśraye bhayam na bhavati evam eva bhagavan prajñāpāramitā paribhāvitāni

original: tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante. tatra bhagavan yathā sa rājā evaṃ prajñāpāramitā draṣṭavyā,
analyzed: tathāgata śarīrāṇi pūjām labhante tatra bhagavan yathā sa rājā evam prajñāpāramitā draṣṭavyā

original: yathā sa rājaniḥśritaḥ puruṣaḥ pūjāṃ labhate. evam eva tathāgataśarīrāṇi prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitāni
analyzed: yathā sa rāja niḥśritaḥ puruṣaḥ pūjām labhate evam eva tathāgata śarīrāṇi prajñāpāramitā paribhāvitāni

original: pūjāṃ labhante. yad api bhagavaṃs tat sarvajñajñānaṃ tad api prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitaṃ veditavyaṃ,
analyzed: pūjām labhante yat api bhagavan tat sarvajña jñānam tat api prajñāpāramitā paribhāvitam veditavyam

original: tasmāt tayor dvayor bhāgayoḥ sthāpitayoḥ pratyaṃśam imām evāhaṃ prajñārapāmitāṃ parigṛhṇīyāṃ. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: tasmāt tayoḥ dvayoḥ bhāgayoḥ sthāpitayoḥ pratyaṃśam imām eva aham prajñā rapā mitām parigṛhṇīyām tat kasya hetoḥ

original: ato nirjātāni hi tathāgataśarīrāṇi,
analyzed: atas nirjātāni hi tathāgata śarīrāṇi

original: ato nirjātāni dvātriṃśad mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāny,
analyzed: atas nirjātāni dvātriṃśat mahāpuruṣa lakṣaṇāni

original: ato nirjātāni daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
analyzed: atas nirjātāni daśa tathāgata balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ ṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ

original: ato nirjātā mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā,
analyzed: atas nirjātā mahā maitrī mahā karuṇā

original: ato nirjātāḥ pañca pāramitāḥ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante,
analyzed: atas nirjātāḥ pañca pāramitāḥ pāramitā nāmadheyam labhante

original: ato nirjātā tathāgatasya sarvajñatā.
analyzed: atas nirjātā tathāgatasya sarvajña tā

original: yatra bhagavaṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti
analyzed: yatra bhagavan tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau sattvāḥ imām prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti

original: dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti tatra teṣāṃ
analyzed: dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśas ca manasikariṣyanti tatra teṣām

original: sattvānāṃ manuṣyā vā amanuṣyā vā avatāraprekṣiṇo 'vatāragaveṣiṇo 'vatāraṃ na lapsyante,
analyzed: sattvānām manuṣyāḥ vā amanuṣyāḥ vā avatāra prekṣiṇaḥ vatāra gaveṣiṇaḥ vatāram na lapsyante

original: sarve ca te sattvā anupūrveṇa parinirvāṇadharmāṇo bhaviṣyanti. evaṃ maharddhikā bhagavann
analyzed: sarve ca te sattvāḥ anupūrveṇa parinirvāṇa dharmāṇaḥ bhaviṣyanti evam maharddhikāḥ bhagavan

original: iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā. yatra hi nāma bhagavann iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā trisāhasramahāsāhasre
analyzed: iyam prajñāpāramitā yatra hi nāma bhagavan iyam prajñāpāramitā tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre

original: lokadhātau ye sattvās teṣāṃ buddhakṛtyena pratyupasthitā,
analyzed: lokadhātau ye sattvāḥ teṣām buddha kṛtyena pratyupasthitā

original: buddhotpādo (PSP_2-3:93)
analyzed: buddha utpādaḥ

original: bhagavaṃs tatra lokadhātau pratikāṅkṣitavyo yatra lokadhātau iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā
analyzed: bhagavan tatra lokadhātau pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ yatra lokadhātau iyam prajñāpāramitā

original: pracariṣyati. tadyathāpi nāma bhagavann anarghaṃ yat maṇiratnaiḥ bhavet tat khalu
analyzed: pracariṣyati tat yathā api nāma bhagavan anargham yat maṇi ratnaiḥ bhavet tat khalu

original: punar mahāmaṇiratnam ebhir eva guṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ bhavet. yatrayatra tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ
analyzed: punar mahā maṇi ratnam ebhiḥ eva guṇaiḥ samanvāgatam bhavet yatra yatra tat mahā maṇi ratnam

original: sthāpyeta tatratatrāmanuṣyā avatāraṃ na labhante. yatrayatra cāmanuṣyagṛhītaḥ strī
analyzed: sthāpyeta tatra tatra amanuṣyāḥ avatāram na labhante yatra yatra ca amanuṣya gṛhītaḥ strī

original: vā puruṣo vā bhavet tatratatra tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ praveṣyeta praveśitamātra eva tasmin
analyzed: vā puruṣaḥ vā bhavet tatra tatra tat mahā maṇi ratnam praveṣyeta praveśita mātre eva tasmin

original: mahāmaṇiratne so 'manuṣyaḥ prakrāmet tasya mahāmaṇiratnasya tejo 'sahamānaḥ. pittena
analyzed: mahā maṇi ratne saḥ manuṣyaḥ prakrāmet tasya mahā maṇi ratnasya tejaḥ sahamānaḥ pittena

original: vā dahyamāne śarīre tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta tad api pittaṃ nigṛhṇīyān na vivardhetopaśāmyeta.
analyzed: vā dahyamāne śarīre tat mahā maṇi ratnam sthāpyeta tat api pittam nigṛhṇīyāt na vivardheta upaśāmyeta

original: vātābhibhūte vā śarīre tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta tam api vātaṃ nigṛhṇīyāt. śleṣmaṇā
analyzed: vāta abhibhūte vā śarīre tat mahā maṇi ratnam sthāpyeta tam api vātam nigṛhṇīyāt śleṣmaṇā

original: upastabdhe śarīre tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta taṃ sarvaṃ śleṣmāṇaṃ praśamayet. saṃnipātābhibhūte
analyzed: upastabdhe śarīre tat mahā maṇi ratnam sthāpyeta tam sarvam śleṣmāṇam praśamayet saṃnipāta abhibhūte

original: vā śarīre tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā purataḥ sthāpyeta tasyāpi
analyzed: vā śarīre tat mahā maṇi ratnam kula putrasya vā kula duhituḥ vā puratas sthāpyeta tasya api

original: sa vyādhir upaśāmyeta. tac ca mahāmaṇiratnaṃ rātrāvabhāsaṃ kuryāt. uṣṇakāle ca vartamāne
analyzed: sa vyādhiḥ upaśāmyeta tat ca mahā maṇi ratnam rātra avabhāsam kuryāt uṣṇa kāle ca vartamāne

original: yatra pṛthivīpradeśe tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta sa pṛthivīpradeśaḥ śiśiraḥ parivarteta.
analyzed: yatra pṛthivī pradeśe tat mahā maṇi ratnam sthāpyeta sa pṛthivī pradeśaḥ śiśiraḥ parivarteta

original: śiśirakāle 'pi vartamāne yatra pṛthivīpradeśe tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta sa pṛthivīpradeśo
analyzed: śiśira kāle vartamāne yatra pṛthivī pradeśe tat mahā maṇi ratnam sthāpyeta sa pṛthivī pradeśaḥ

original: gharmaḥ parivarteta. yatra ca tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta sa ca pṛthivīpradeśo nātyuṣṇo
analyzed: gharmaḥ parivarteta yatra ca tat mahā maṇi ratnam sthāpyeta sa ca pṛthivī pradeśaḥ na ati uṣṇaḥ

original: nātiśītaḥ syāt ṛtusukho.
analyzed: na ati śītaḥ syāt

original: yatra pṛthivīpradeśe tan mahāmaṇiratṇaṃ tiṣṭhati tatra pṛthivīpradeśe nāśīviṣā upavicaranti vṛścikādīni vā sarīsṛpāṇi vā,
analyzed: yatra pṛthivī pradeśe tat mahā maṇi ratṇam tiṣṭhati tatra pṛthivī pradeśe na āśīviṣāḥ upavicaranti vṛścika ādīni vā sarīsṛpāṇi vā

original: yaḥ kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā āśīviṣeṇa daṣṭo bhavet tasyāpi tan mahāmaṇiratnam
analyzed: yaḥ kaścid kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā āśīviṣeṇa daṣṭaḥ bhavet tasya api tat mahā maṇi ratnam

original: upadarśyeta tasya saha darśanenaiva tad viṣaṃ vigacchet. ebhir evam ādibhir guṇair
analyzed: upadarśyeta tasya saha darśanena eva tat viṣam vigacchet ebhiḥ evam ādibhiḥ guṇaiḥ

original: yuktaṃ tat mahāmaṇiratnaṃ bhaved,
analyzed: yuktam tat mahā maṇi ratnam bhavet

original: ye 'pi bhagavan striyo vā puruṣā vā nānāvyādhiparigatā bhavanti teṣām api kāye tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta,
analyzed: ye pi bhagavan striyaḥ vā puruṣāḥ vā nānā vyādhi parigatāḥ bhavanti teṣām api kāye tat mahā maṇi ratnam sthāpyeta

original: teṣām api sarve te vyādhaya upaśamaṃ gaccheyuḥ. yatrāpi bhagavann udake tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta tad api sarvam (PSP_2-3:94)
analyzed: teṣām api sarve te vyādhayaḥ upaśamam gaccheyuḥ yatra api bhagavan udake tat mahā maṇi ratnam sthāpyeta tat api sarvam

original: udakaṃ svavarṇasadṛśaṃ kuryāt. saced bhagavaṃs tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ nīlena vāsasā pariveṣṭya
analyzed: udakam sva varṇa sadṛśam kuryāt saced bhagavan tat mahā maṇi ratnam nīlena vāsasā pariveṣṭya

original: udake prakṣipet tad udakaṃ nīlaṃ kuryāt. sacet pītakena sacel lohitakena vastreṇa
analyzed: udake prakṣipet tat udakam nīlam kuryāt saced pītakena saced lohitakena vastreṇa

original: saced māñjiṣṭhavarṇena sacet sphaṭikavarṇena vastreṇa tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ baddhvā
analyzed: saced māñjiṣṭha varṇena saced sphaṭika varṇena vastreṇa tat mahā maṇi ratnam baddhvā

original: udake prakṣipyeta tad varṇam udakaṃ bhavet. nānāraṅgaraktair api vastrais tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ
analyzed: udake prakṣipyeta tat varṇam udakam bhavet nānā raṅga raktaiḥ api vastraiḥ tat mahā maṇi ratnam

original: baddhvā udake prakṣipyeta tad udakaṃ nānāvarṇaṃ kuryāt. yatra ca bhagavann udake
analyzed: baddhvā udake prakṣipyeta tat udakam nānā varṇam kuryāt yatra ca bhagavan udake

original: kaluṣe tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta tat sarvam udakaṃ prasādayed ebhir evam ādibhir
analyzed: kaluṣe tat mahā maṇi ratnam sthāpyeta tat sarvam udakam prasādayet ebhiḥ evam ādibhiḥ

original: guṇaiḥ samupetaṃ tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ bhavet.
analyzed: guṇaiḥ samupetam tat mahā maṇi ratnam bhavet

original: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānandaḥ śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu āyuṣmān ānandaḥ śakram devānām indram etat avocat

original: tat kiṃ manyase?
analyzed: tat kim manyase

original: kauśika divyaṃ tan mahāmaṇiratnam utāho jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇām etad mahāmaṇiratnaṃ vidyate.
analyzed: kauśika divyam tat mahā maṇi ratnam uta aho jāmbūdvīpakānām manuṣyāṇām etat mahā maṇi ratnam vidyate

original: śakra āha: divyaṃ tad bhadanta mahāmaṇiratnaṃ,
analyzed: śakraḥ āha divyam tat bhadanta mahā maṇi ratnam

original: yāni jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ maṇiratnāni tāni parīttāni gurūṇi ca,
analyzed: yāni jāmbūdvīpakānām manuṣyāṇām maṇi ratnāni tāni parīttāni gurūṇi ca

original: yāni punar divyāni tāni mahānti laghūni ca,
analyzed: yāni punar divyāni tāni mahānti laghūni ca

original: tair ākārais tathā suparipūrṇāni jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ maṇiratnāni yathā na
analyzed: taiḥ ākāraiḥ tathā su paripūrṇāni jāmbūdvīpakānām manuṣyāṇām maṇi ratnāni yathā na

original: suparipūrṇāni punar jāmbūdvīpakāni maṇiratnāni divyānāṃ maṇiratnānāṃ saṃkhyām api
analyzed: su paripūrṇāni punar jāmbūdvīpakāni maṇi ratnāni divyānām maṇi ratnānām saṃkhyām api

original: nopayānti kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniśām api nopayānti. tat khalu mahāmaṇiratnaṃ
analyzed: na upayānti kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api upaniśām api na upayānti tat khalu mahā maṇi ratnam

original: yasmin karaṇḍake tiṣṭhati yadā tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ tasmāt karaṇḍakād utkṣiptaṃ bhavati
analyzed: yasmin karaṇḍake tiṣṭhati yadā tat mahā maṇi ratnam tasmāt karaṇḍakāt utkṣiptam bhavati

original: spṛhaṇīyaḥ sa karaṇḍako bhavati,
analyzed: spṛhaṇīyaḥ sa karaṇḍakaḥ bhavati

original: atra tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthitam abhūd iti.
analyzed: atra tat mahā maṇi ratnam sthitam abhūt iti

original: evam etad bhadantānanda yatreyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pṛthivīpradeśe pracariṣyati na tatra
analyzed: evam etat bhadanta ānanda yatra iyam prajñāpāramitā pṛthivī pradeśe pracariṣyati na tatra

original: kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā kāyikā vā caitasikā vā duḥkhopadravā manuṣyakṛtā vā
analyzed: kula putrāṇām kula duhitṛṇām vā kāyikāḥ vā caitasikāḥ vā duḥkha upadravāḥ manuṣya kṛtāḥ vā

original: amanuṣyakṛtā vā bhaviṣyanti. mahāmaṇiratnam iti prajñāpāramitāyā etad adhivacanaṃ
analyzed: amanuṣya kṛtāḥ vā bhaviṣyanti mahā maṇi ratnam iti prajñāpāramitāyāḥ etat adhivacanam

original: sarvajñajñānasya ca. kiyantaḥ śakyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā guṇāḥ?
analyzed: sarvajña jñānasya ca kiyantaḥ śakyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ guṇāḥ

original: parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi prajñāpāramitāyā guṇāḥ. evaṃ dhyānapāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā
analyzed: parikīrtayitum aprameyāḥ hi prajñāpāramitāyāḥ guṇāḥ evam dhyāna pāramitāyāḥ vīrya pāramitāyāḥ

original: kṣāntipāramitāyā śīlapāramitāyā dānapāramitāyā adhyātmaśūnyatāyā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāḥ
analyzed: kṣānti pāramitāyāḥ śīla pāramitāyāḥ dāna pāramitāyāḥ adhyātma śūnyatāyāḥ yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatāyāḥ

original: smṛtyupasthānāṃ samyakprahāṇānām ṛddhipādānām indriyāṇāṃ balānāṃ bodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṅgasya (PSP_2-3:95)
analyzed: smṛti upasthānām samyakprahāṇānām ṛddhipādānām indriyāṇām balānām bodhyaṅgānām ārya aṣṭāṅgasya

original: mārgasyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ caturṇām āryasatyānām aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ
analyzed: mārgasya apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattīnām caturṇām ārya satyānām aṣṭānām vimokṣāṇām nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattīnām

original: ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ sarvasamādhīnāṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ
analyzed: ṣaṇṇām abhijñānām sarva samādhīnām sarva dhāraṇī mukhānām daśānām tathāgata balānām caturṇām

original: vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ sarvajñajñānasyāpi
analyzed: vaiśāradyānām catasṛṇām pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānām buddha dharmāṇām sarvajña jñānasya api

original: dharmadhātor api dharmaniyāmatāyās tathatāyā bhūtakoṭer acintyadhātoḥ sarvajñajñānasyaite
analyzed: dharmadhātoḥ api dharma niyāma tāyāḥ tathatāyāḥ bhūtakoṭeḥ acintya dhātoḥ sarvajña jñānasya ete

original: guṇā yena parinirvṛtasyāpi tathāgatasya śarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante. sarvajñajñānasya
analyzed: guṇāḥ yena parinirvṛtasya api tathāgatasya śarīrāṇi pūjām labhante sarvajña jñānasya

original: sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśaprahāṇasya sadopekṣāvihāritāyā asaṃpramuṣitadharmatāyā eṣāṃ
analyzed: sarva vāsanā anusaṃdhi kleśa prahāṇasya sadā upekṣā vihāri tāyāḥ asaṃpramuṣita dharma tāyāḥ eṣām

original: tathāgataśarirāṇi bhājanabhūtāny abhūvaṃs tenaitāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante.
analyzed: tathāgata śarirāṇi bhājana bhūtāni abhūvan tena etāni tathāgata śarīrāṇi pūjām labhante

original: iti parārthādhimuktimadhyādhimātrā
analyzed: iti parārtha adhimukti madhya adhimātrā

original: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu śakraḥ devānām indraḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: ratnapāramitāyā bhagavann imāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanam abhūt. asaṃkleśāvyavadānapāramitāyā anutpādānirodhapāramitāyā anāgatipāramitāyā  #
analyzed: ratna pāramitāyāḥ bhagavan imāni tathāgata śarīrāṇi bhājanam abhūt a saṃkleśa a vyavadāna pāramitāyāḥ anutpāda anirodha pāramitāyāḥ anāgati pāramitāyāḥ

original: imāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
analyzed: imāni tathāgata śarīrāṇi bhājanam

original: dharmatāpāramitāyās tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
analyzed: dharmatā pāramitāyāḥ tathāgata śarīrāṇi bhājanam

original: dharmatāparibhāvitāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante.
analyzed: dharmatā paribhāvitāni tathāgata śarīrāṇi pūjām labhante

original: punar aparaṃ bhagavaṃs tiṣṭhatu trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātus tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇaś cūḍikābaddhaḥ,
analyzed: punar aparam bhagavan tiṣṭhatu tri sāhasra mahā sāhasraḥ lokadhātuḥ tathāgata śarīrāṇām paripūrṇaḥ cūḍikā baddhaḥ

original: saced bhagavan gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavas tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇāś cūḍikābaddhā bhaveyur,
analyzed: saced bhagavan gaṅgā nadī vālukā upamāḥ lokadhātavaḥ tathāgata śarīrāṇām paripūrṇāḥ cūḍikā baddhāḥ bhaveyuḥ

original: iyaṃ ca prajñāpāramitā pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā upanāmyeta,
analyzed: iyam ca prajñāpāramitā pustaka likhitām kṛtvā upanāmyeta

original: tayor ahaṃ bhagavan dvayor bhāgayoḥ sthāpitayor imām eva prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇīyāṃ. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: tayoḥ aham bhagavan dvayoḥ bhāgayoḥ sthāpitayoḥ imām eva prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇīyām tat kasya hetoḥ

original: ato nirjātāni hi tathāgataśarīrāṇi prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitāni pūjāṃ labhante.
analyzed: atas nirjātāni hi tathāgata śarīrāṇi prajñāpāramitā paribhāvitāni pūjām labhante

original: yaḥ punar bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataśarīrāṇi satkuryād gurukuryāt
analyzed: yaḥ punar bhagavan kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā tathāgata śarīrāṇi satkuryāt gurukuryāt

original: mānayet pūjayet sa tasya kuśalamūlasya parittīkṛtāni divyāni mānuṣyakāṇi ca sukhāni
analyzed: mānayet pūjayet sa tasya kuśala mūlasya parittīkṛtāni divyāni mānuṣyakāṇi ca sukhāni

original: pratyanubhūya kṣatriyamahāśālakuleṣu vā brāhmaṇamahāśālakuleṣu vā gṛhapatimahāśālakuleṣu
analyzed: pratyanubhūya kṣatriya mahāśāla kuleṣu vā brāhmaṇa mahāśāla kuleṣu vā gṛhapati mahāśāla kuleṣu

original: vā cāturmahārājakāyikeṣu vā trāyastriṃśeṣu yāmeṣu tuṣiteṣu nirmāṇaratiṣu paranirmitavaśavartiṣu
analyzed: vā cāturmahārājakāyikeṣu vā trāyastriṃśeṣu yāmeṣu tuṣiteṣu nirmāṇaratiṣu paranirmitavaśavartiṣu

original: deveṣu sukhaṃ pratyanubhūya tena kuśalamūlena duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati.
analyzed: deveṣu sukham pratyanubhūya tena kuśala mūlena duḥkhasya antam kariṣyati

original: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇato dhārayato vācayataḥ paryavāpnuvato yoniśaś ca manasikurvato  #
analyzed: tasya khalu punar kula putrasya vā kula duhituḥ vā imām prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇataḥ dhārayataḥ vācayataḥ paryavāpnuvataḥ yoniśas ca manasikurvataḥ

original: dhyānapāramitā (PSP_2-3:96)
analyzed: dhyāna pāramitā

original: paripūryate dhyānapāramitā paripūrṇā vīryapāramitā paripūryate vīryapāramitā paripūrṇā
analyzed: paripūryate dhyāna pāramitā paripūrṇā vīrya pāramitā paripūryate vīrya pāramitā paripūrṇā

original: kṣāntipāramitā paripūryate kṣāntipāramitā paripurṇā śīlaparamitā paripūryate śīlapāramitā
analyzed: kṣānti pāramitā paripūryate kṣānti pāramitā paripurṇā śīla paramitā paripūryate śīla pāramitā

original: paripūrṇā dānapāramitā paripūryate dānapāramitā paripūrṇā. evaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā
analyzed: paripūrṇā dāna pāramitā paripūryate dāna pāramitā paripūrṇā evam saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣyā

original: dharmā yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ paripūryante,
analyzed: dharmāḥ yāvat aṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ paripūryante

original: so 'tikramya śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramya bodhisattvābhijñāḥ pratilabhya buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati,
analyzed: saḥ u tikramya śrāvaka pratyekabuddha bhūmim bodhisattva niyāmam avakramya bodhisattva abhijñāḥ pratilabhya buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetram saṃkramiṣyati

original: samacintyātmabhāvān pratigṛhīṣyati,
analyzed: sama cintya ātma bhāvān pratigṛhīṣyati

original: yair ātmabhāvaiḥ sattvān paripācayiṣyati. yadi vā cakravartyātmabhāvaṃ paigṛhya kṣatriya
analyzed: yaiḥ ātmabhāvaiḥ sattvān paripācayiṣyati yadi vā cakravartī ātmabhāvam kṣatriya

original: mahāśālakulātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhya brāhmaṇa mahāśālakulātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhya gṛhapatimahāśālakulātmabhāvaṃ
analyzed: mahāśāla kula ātmabhāvam parigṛhya brāhmaṇa mahāśāla kula ātmabhāvam parigṛhya gṛhapati mahāśāla kula ātmabhāvam

original: parigṛhya sattvān paripācayiṣyati. tasmād bhagavan na me tathāgataśarīreṣv agauravam
analyzed: parigṛhya sattvān paripācayiṣyati tasmāt bhagavat na me tathāgata śarīreṣu a gauravam

original: eva me bhagavan nāpi na grahītukāmaḥ. api tu khalu punaḥ prajñāpāramitayā satkṛtayā
analyzed: eva me bhagavat na api na grahītu kāmaḥ api tu khalu punar prajñāpāramitayā satkṛtayā

original: gurukṛtayā mānitayā pūjitayā tathāgataśarīrāṇy api satkṛtāni bhavanti gurukṛtāni
analyzed: gurukṛtayā mānitayā pūjitayā tathāgata śarīrāṇi api satkṛtāni bhavanti gurukṛtāni

original: mānitāni pūjitāni bhavanti.
analyzed: mānitāni pūjitāni bhavanti

original: punar aparaṃ bhagavan ye daśasu dikṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā asaṃkhyeyeṣv
analyzed: punar aparam bhagavan ye daśasu dikṣu tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ asaṃkhyeyeṣu

original: aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti. tāṃś ca
analyzed: aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmam ca deśayanti tān ca

original: dharmakāyena ca rūpakāyena ca draṣṭukāmena iyam eva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyodgrahītavyā
analyzed: dharma kāyena ca rūpa kāyena ca draṣṭu kāmena iyam eva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā

original: dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavyā yoniśaś
analyzed: dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā parebhyaḥ ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavyā yoniśas

original: ca manasikartavyā. sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tān daśasu dikṣu tathāgatān arhataḥ
analyzed: ca manasi kartavyā saced kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā tān daśasu dikṣu tathāgatān arhataḥ

original: samyaksaṃbuddhān icched draṣṭuṃ,
analyzed: samyaksaṃbuddhān icchet draṣṭum

original: tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā buddhānusmṛtir bhāvayitavyā.
analyzed: tena kula putreṇa vā kula duhitrā vā prajñāpāramitāyām caratā buddha anusmṛtiḥ bhāvayitavyā

original: dharmatayā dve ime bhagavatāṃ dharmate. katame dve?
analyzed: dharmatayā dve ime bhagavatām dharmate katame dve

original: yad uta saṃskṛtadharmatā cāsaṃskṛtadharmatā ca.
analyzed: yat uta saṃskṛta dharma tā ca asaṃskṛta dharma tā ca

original: tatra bhagavan katamā saṃskṛtadharmatā?
analyzed: tatra bhagavan katamā saṃskṛta dharmatā

original: yad utādhyātmaśūnyatājñānaṃ bahirdhāśūnyatājñānam adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatājñānaṃ yāvad
analyzed: yat uta adhyātma śūnyatā jñānam bahirdhā śūnyatā jñānam adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā jñānam yāvat

original: abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatājñānaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu yad āryasatyeṣu yad
analyzed: abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā jñānam saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu yat ārya satyeṣu yat

original: apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu yad daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu jñānaṃ,
analyzed: apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattiṣu yat daśasu tathāgata baleṣu jñānam

original: yac caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu (PSP_2-3:97)
analyzed: yat caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu aṣṭādaśa āveṇikeṣu buddha dharmeṣu

original: jñānaṃ, yat kuśalamūleṣu sāsravānāsraveṣu sāvadyānavadyeṣu laukikalokottareṣu saṃkleśavyavadānadharmeṣu jñānam iyam ucyate saṃskṛtadharmatā.
analyzed: jñānam yat kuśala mūleṣu sa āsrava anāsraveṣu sāvadya anavadyeṣu laukika lokottareṣu saṃkleśa vyavadāna dharmeṣu jñānam iyam ucyate saṃskṛta dharmatā

original: tatra katamā asaṃskṛtadharmā ucyate?
analyzed: tatra katamāḥ asaṃskṛta dharmāḥ ucyate

original: yasya dharmasya notpādo na nirodho na sthitir nāsthiḥ,
analyzed: yasya dharmasya na utpādaḥ na nirodhaḥ na sthitiḥ na asthiḥ

original: nānyathātvaṃ na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ na hānir na vṛddhiḥ,
analyzed: na anyathātvam na saṃkleśaḥ na vyavadānam na hāniḥ na vṛddhiḥ

original: yāvat sarvadharmāṇām abhāvasvabhāvatā. katamā sarvadharmāṇām abhāvasvabhāvatā?
analyzed: yāvat sarva dharmāṇām abhāva svabhāva tā katamā sarva dharmāṇām abhāva svabhāva tā

original: yā adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyatā mahāśūnyatā
analyzed: yā adhyātma śūnyatā bahirdhā śūnyatā adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā śūnyatā śūnyatā mahāśūnyatā

original: paramārthaśūnyatā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā atyantaśūnyatā anavarāgraśūnyatā
analyzed: paramārtha śūnyatā saṃskṛta śūnyatā asaṃskṛta śūnyatā atyanta śūnyatā anavara agra śūnyatā

original: anavakāraśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyatā sarvadharmaśūnyatā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā anupalambhaśūnyatā
analyzed: anavakāra śūnyatā prakṛti śūnyatā sarva dharma śūnyatā sva lakṣaṇa śūnyatā anupalambha śūnyatā

original: abhāvaśūnyatā svabhāvaśūnyatā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā parabhāvaśūnyatā. yat sarvadharmāṇāṃ
analyzed: abhāva śūnyatā svabhāva śūnyatā abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā para bhāva śūnyatā yat sarva dharmāṇām

original: prakṛtiśūnyatātvam anupalambho yāvad yā sarvadharmāṇāṃ nirabhilapyatā apravyāhāratā
analyzed: prakṛti śūnyatā tvam anupalambhaḥ yāvat yā sarva dharmāṇām nirabhilapya tā apravyāhāra tā

original: iyam ucyate asaṃskṛtadharmatā.
analyzed: iyam ucyate asaṃskṛta dharmatā

original: iti parārthādhimuktir adhimātramṛddhī
analyzed: iti parārtha adhimuktiḥ adhimātram ṛddhī

original: atha khalu bhagavān sakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān sakram devānām indram etat avocat

original: evam etat kauśikaivam etat. ye 'pi te 'bhūvann atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās
analyzed: evam etat kauśika evam etat ye pi te bhūvan atīte dhvani tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ

original: te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ. ye 'pi
analyzed: te pi imām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamya anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ ye pi

original: te bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'pīmām eva
analyzed: te bhaviṣyanti anāgate dhvani tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ te pi imām eva

original: prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante. ye 'py etarhi daśadiglokadhātuṣu
analyzed: prajñāpāramitām āgamya anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante ye pi etarhi daśa diś lokadhātuṣu

original: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti
analyzed: tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmam ca deśayanti

original: te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ. ye 'pi
analyzed: te pi imām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamya anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ ye pi

original: te 'bhūvann atītānāgatāḥ śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhās te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām
analyzed: te bhūvan atīta anāgatāḥ śrāvakāḥ ye ca pratyekabuddhāḥ te pi imām eva prajñāpāramitām

original: āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbhotsyante,
analyzed: āgamya anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ abhisaṃbhotsyante

original: ye 'pi srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāpsyante prāpnuvanti ca,
analyzed: ye pi srotaāpatti phalam prāpsyante prāpnuvanti ca

original: ye 'pi sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ prāpsyante prāpnuvanti ca. ye 'pi te daśadiśi loke 'saṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu śrāvakā,
analyzed: ye pi sakṛdāgāmi phalam anāgāmi phalam arhat tvam prāpsyante prāpnuvanti ca ye pi te daśa diśi loke saṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu śrāvakāḥ

original: ye ca pratyekabuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamya śrāvakabodhipratyekabodhiprāptās. tat kasya hetos?  #
analyzed: ye ca pratyekabuddhāḥ tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti te pi imām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamya śrāvaka bodhi pratyeka bodhi prāptāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hy (PSP_2-3:98)
analyzed: tathā hi

original: atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ trīṇi yānāni vistareṇopadiṣṭāni,
analyzed: atra prajñāpāramitāyām trīṇi yānāni vistareṇa upadiṣṭāni

original: tāni punar animittayogenānutpādānirodhayogenāsaṃkleśāvyavadānayogenānabhisaṃskārayogenānāyūhāniryūhayogenānutkṣepāprakṣepayogenānudgrahānutsargayogena.
analyzed: tāni punar a nimitta yogena an utpāda anirodha yogena a saṃkleśa a vyavadāna yogena an abhisaṃskāra yogena an āyūha a niryūha yogena an utkṣepa a prakṣepa yogena an udgraha an utsarga yogena

original: tat punar lokavyavahāreṇa na punaḥ paramārthena. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: tat punar lokavyavahāreṇa na punar paramārthena tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na hi prajñāpāramitāyām apāraṃ vā pāraṃ vā sthalaṃ vā nimnaṃ vā samaṃ vā viṣamaṃ
analyzed: na hi prajñāpāramitāyām apāram vā pāram vā sthalam vā nimnam vā samam vā viṣamam

original: vā nimittaṃ vā animittaṃ vā laukikaṃ vā lokottaraṃ vā saṃskṛtaṃ vā asaṃskṛtaṃ vā
analyzed: vā nimittam vā animittam vā laukikam vā lokottaram vā saṃskṛtam vā asaṃskṛtam vā

original: kuśalaṃ vā akuśalaṃ vā atītaṃ vā anāgataṃ vā pratyutpannaṃ vā prajñāyate. na ca kauśika
analyzed: kuśalam vā akuśalam vā atītam vā anāgatam vā pratyutpannam vā prajñāyate na ca kauśika

original: prajñāpāramitā kasyacid dharmasya pradāyikā na pratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ nārhatvadharmāṇāṃ pradāyikā.
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā kasyacid dharmasya pradāyikā na pratyekabuddha dharmāṇām na arhatva dharmāṇām pradāyikā

original: iti parārthādhimuktir adhimātramadhyā
analyzed: iti parārtha adhimuktiḥ adhimātra madhyā

original: śakra āha: mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā. atra hi bhagavan bodhisattvā
analyzed: śakraḥ āha mahā pāramitā iyam bhagavan yat uta prajñāpāramitā atra hi bhagavan bodhisattvāḥ

original: mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaḥ sarvasattvacittacaritāni prajānanti na ca
analyzed: mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyām carantaḥ sarva sattva citta caritāni prajānanti na ca

original: sattvam upalabhante,
analyzed: sattvam upalabhante

original: na jīvaṃ na poṣaṃ na puruṣaṃ na manujaṃ na mānavaṃ na kārakaṃ na vedakaṃ na jānakaṃ na paśyakam upalabhante. na rūpam upalabhante,
analyzed: na jīvam na poṣam na puruṣam na manujam na mānavam na kārakam na vedakam na jānakam na paśyakam upalabhante na rūpam upalabhante

original: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānam upalabhante. na pṛthivīdhātum upalabhante,
analyzed: na vedanām na saṃjñām na saṃskārān na vijñānam upalabhante na pṛthivī dhātum upalabhante

original: nābdhātuṃ na tejodhātuṃ na vāyudhātuṃ nākāśadhātuṃ na vijñānadhātum upalabhante. na cakṣur upalabhante,
analyzed: na ap dhātum na tejaḥ dhātum na vāyu dhātum na ākāśa dhātum na vijñāna dhātum upalabhante na cakṣuḥ upalabhante

original: na rūpam upalabhante,
analyzed: na rūpam upalabhante

original: na cakṣurvijñānam upalabhante,
analyzed: na cakṣuḥ vijñānam upalabhante

original: na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśam upalabhante,
analyzed: na cakṣuḥ saṃsparśam upalabhante

original: yad api tac cakṣūrūpasaṃsparśapratyayād utpadyate vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā
analyzed: yat api tat cakṣuḥ rūpa saṃsparśa pratyayāt utpadyate vedayitam sukham vā duḥkham vā

original: aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā tad api nopalabhante. evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvāṃ kāyaṃ mano nopalabhante.
analyzed: aduḥkha asukham vā tat api na upalabhante evam śrotram ghrāṇam jihvām kāyam manaḥ na upalabhante

original: śabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmān nopalabhante. śrotravijñānaṃ yāvan manovijñānaṃ,
analyzed: śabda gandha rasa spraṣṭavya dharmān na upalabhante śrotra vijñānam yāvat manaḥ vijñānam

original: śrotrasaṃsparśaṃ yāvan manaḥsaṃsparśaṃ nopalabhante yāvad yad api tan manodharmasaṃsparśapratyayād
analyzed: śrotra saṃsparśam yāvat manaḥ saṃsparśam na upalabhante yāvat yat api tat manaḥ dharma saṃsparśa pratyayāt

original: utpadyate vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā tad api nopalabhante. smṛtyupasthānāninopalabhante.
analyzed: utpadyate vedayitam sukham vā duḥkham vā aduḥkha asukham vā tat api na upalabhante smṛti upasthānāni na upalabhante

original: samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgān nopalabhante. apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīr
analyzed: samyakprahāṇa ṛddhipāda indriya bala bodhyaṅga mārgān na upalabhante a pramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattīḥ

original: nopalabhante. nāryasatyāni nāṣṭavimokṣān na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr na ṣaḍabhijñā
analyzed: na upalabhante na ārya satyāni na aṣṭa vimokṣān na nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattīḥ na ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ

original: upalabhante. (PSP_2-3:99)
analyzed: upalabhante

original: na daśatathāgatabalāni na vaiśāradyāni na pratisaṃvido nāṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān upalabhante. nādhyātmaśūnyatām upalabhante,
analyzed: na daśa tathāgata balāni na vaiśāradyāni na pratisaṃvidaḥ na aṣṭādaśa āveṇikān buddha dharmān upalabhante na adhyātma śūnyatām upalabhante

original: na bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvan nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām upalabhante.
analyzed: na bahirdhā śūnyatām na adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatām yāvat na abhāva svabhāva śūnyatām upalabhante

original: na samādhīn na dhāraṇīmukhāny upalabhante. na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāny upalabhante.
analyzed: na samādhīn na dhāraṇī mukhāni upalabhante na śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihitāni upalabhante

original: na bodhiṃ na buddhaṃ na buddhadharmān upalabhante. na hi prajñāpāramitā upalambhayogena
analyzed: na bodhim na buddham na buddha dharmān upalabhante na hi prajñāpāramitā upalambha yogena

original: pratyupasthitā. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: pratyupasthitā tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi svabhāvo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
analyzed: tathā hi svabhāvaḥ na saṃvidyate na upalabhyate

original: yenopalabhyeta yad upalabhyeta yatra copalabhyeta.
analyzed: yena upalabhyeta yat upalabhyeta yatra ca upalabhyeta

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: evam etat kauśikaivam etat,
analyzed: evam etat kauśika evam etat

original: tathā hi kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nupalambhayogena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhim api nopalabhate prāg eva bodhisattvadharmān.
analyzed: tathā hi kauśika bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ n upalambha yogena prajñāpāramitāyām caran bodhim api nā upalabhate prāk eva bodhisattva dharmān

original: śakra āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām eva carati nānyāsu pāramitāsu?
analyzed: śakraḥ āha kim punar bhagavan bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām eva carati na anyāsu pāramitāsu

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: sarvāsu kauśika pāramitāsu bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś carati na kevalaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ.
analyzed: sarvāsu kauśika pāramitāsu bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ carati na kevalam prajñāpāramitāyām

original: tac cānupalambhayogena sa dānapāramitāṃ nopalabhate dāyakam api nopalabhate pratigrāhakam api nopalabhate,
analyzed: tat ca anupalambha yogena sa dāna pāramitām nā upalabhate dāyakam api nā upalabhate pratigrāhakam api nā upalabhate

original: śīlapāramitāṃ nopalabhate śīlavantam api nopalabhate dauḥśīlyam api nopalabhate,
analyzed: śīla pāramitām nā upalabhate śīlavantam api nā upalabhate dauḥśīlyam api nā upalabhate

original: kṣāntipāramitāṃ nopalabhate kṣamiṇam api nopalabhate kṣamyam api nopalabhate vīryapāramitāṃ nopalabhate kartavyam api nopalabhate kāyacittam  #
analyzed: kṣānti pāramitām na upalabhate kṣamiṇam api nā upalabhate kṣamyam api nā upalabhate vīrya pāramitām nā upalabhate kartavyam api nā upalabhate kāya cittam

original: api nopalabhate,
analyzed: api na upalabhate

original: dhyānapāramitāṃ nopalabhate cittam api nopalabhate samādhim api nopalabhate,
analyzed: dhyāna pāramitām nā upalabhate cittam api nā upalabhate samādhim api nā upalabhate

original: prajñāpāramitāṃ nopalabhate prajñāvantam api nopalabhate prajñayam api nopalabhate.
analyzed: prajñāpāramitām na upalabhate prajñāvantam api na upalabhate prajñayam api na upalabhate

original: api tu khalu punaḥ kauśika prajñāpāramitā pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
analyzed: api tu khalu punar kauśika prajñāpāramitā pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya

original: dānaṃ dadataḥ. prajñāpāramitā pūrvaṃgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlaṃ rakṣataḥ
analyzed: dānam dadataḥ prajñāpāramitā pūrvaṃgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlam rakṣataḥ

original: kṣāntiṃ bhāvayato vīryam ārambhamāṇasya dhyānaṃ samāpadyamānasya dharmān vibhāvayato
analyzed: kṣāntim bhāvayataḥ vīryam ārambhamāṇasya dhyānam samāpadyamānasya dharmān vibhāvayataḥ

original: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā sarvadharmāṇām anupalambhayogena.
analyzed: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā sarva dharmāṇām an upalambha yogena

original: evaṃ vyastasamastānāṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāṅgānām anupalambhayogena.
analyzed: evam vyasta samastānām skandha dhātu āyatana pratītyasamutpāda aṅgānām anupalambha yogena

original: saptatriṃśatāṃ (PSP_2-3:100)
analyzed: saptatriṃśatām

original: bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām anupalanibhayogena. āryasatyānām apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnām

analyzed: bhagavān āha
