original: na tv eva jāmbudvīpakān sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: na tu eva jāmbudvīpakān sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karma patheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya tat kasya hetoḥ

original: daśasu kauśika kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu sattvāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā aparimuktā eva nirayatiryagyoniyamalokāsuragatibhyaḥ,
analyzed: daśasu kauśika kuśaleṣu karma patheṣu sattvāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ a parimuktāḥ eva niraya tiryagyoni yama loka asura gatibhyaḥ

original: srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ punaḥ sarvadurgatibhyo mukto bhavati. iti tṛtīyā stutimātrā
analyzed: srotaāpatti phale pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ punar sarva durgatibhyaḥ muktaḥ bhavati iti tṛtīyā stuti mātrā

original: sakṛdāgāmiphale evaṃ sattvaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
analyzed: sakṛdāgāmi phale evam sattvam pratiṣṭhāpya bahutaram puṇyam prasavati

original: na tv eva jāmbudvīpakān sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya. iti caturthī stutimātrā
analyzed: na tu eva jāmbudvīpakān sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karma patheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya iti caturthī stuti mātrā

original: evam anāgāmiphale ekaṃ sattvaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
analyzed: evam anāgāmi phale ekam sattvam pratiṣṭhāpya bahutaram puṇyam prasavati

original: na tv eva jāmbudvīpakān sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya. iti pañcamī stutimātrā
analyzed: na tu eva jāmbudvīpakān sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karma patheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya iti pañcamī stuti mātrā

original: evam ekaṃ sattvam arhattve pratiṣṭhāpya bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
analyzed: evam ekam sattvam arhat tve pratiṣṭhāpya bahutaram puṇyam prasavati

original: na tv eva jāmbudvīpakān sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya. iti ṣaṣṭhī stutimātrā
analyzed: na tu eva jāmbudvīpakān sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karma patheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya iti ṣaṣṭhī stuti mātrā

original: evam ekaṃ sattvaṃ pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpya bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
analyzed: evam ekam sattvam pratyeka bodhau pratiṣṭhāpya bahutaram puṇyam prasavati

original: na tv eva jāmbudvīpakān sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya. iti saptamī stutimātrā
analyzed: na tu eva jāmbudvīpakān sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karma patheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya iti saptamī stuti mātrā

original: yaḥ kaścit kauśika kulaputro vās kuladuhitā vā jāmbudvīpakān sattvān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet,
analyzed: yaḥ kaścid kauśika kula putraḥ kula duhitā vā jāmbudvīpakān sattvān srotaāpatti phale pratiṣṭhāpayet

original: yo vānyaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ekaṃ sattvam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayed ayan tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati. tat kasya
analyzed: yaḥ vā anyaḥ kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā ekam sattvam anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayet ayan tatas bahutaram puṇyam prasavati tat kasya

original: tathā hi buddhanetryāḥ so 'nupacchedāya pratyupasthito bhavati. iti aṣṭamī stutimātrā
analyzed: tathā hi buddha netryāḥ saḥ n upacchedāya pratyupasthitaḥ bhavati iti aṣṭamī stuti mātrā

original: evaṃ yaḥ sarvajāmbudvīpakān sattvān sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayed,
analyzed: evam yaḥ sarva jāmbudvīpakān sattvān sakṛdāgāmi phale pratiṣṭhāpayet

original: yo vānya ekaṃ sattvam anuttarāyāṃ sanyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayed ayan tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati. iti navamī stutimātrety uktā stutiḥ
analyzed: yaḥ vā anyaḥ ekam sattvam anuttarāyām sanyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayet ayan tatas bahutaram puṇyam prasavati iti navamī stuti mātrā iti uktā stutiḥ

original: evaṃ yaḥ sarvajāmbudvīpakān sattvān anāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayed,
analyzed: evam yaḥ sarva jāmbudvīpakān sattvān anāgāmi phale pratiṣṭhāpayet

original: yo vānya ekaṃ sattvam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayed ayan tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati. iti prathamā stobhamātrā
analyzed: yaḥ vā anyaḥ ekam sattvam anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayet ayan tatas bahutaram puṇyam prasavati iti prathamā stobha mātrā

original: evaṃ yaḥ sarvajāmbudvīpakān sattvān arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayed,
analyzed: evam yaḥ sarva jāmbudvīpakān sattvān arhat tve pratiṣṭhāpayet

original: yo vānya ekaṃ sattvam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayed ayan tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati. iti dvitiyā stobhamātrā
analyzed: yaḥ vā anyaḥ ekam sattvam anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayet ayan tatas bahutaram puṇyam prasavati iti dvitiyā stobha mātrā

original: evaṃ yaḥ sarvajāmbudvīpakān sattvān pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayed,
analyzed: evam yaḥ sarva jāmbudvīpakān sattvān pratyeka bodhau pratiṣṭhāpayet

original: yo vānyaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ekaṃ sattvam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayed ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati. tat
analyzed: yaḥ vā anyaḥ kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā ekam sattvam anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayet ayam eva tatas bahutaram puṇyam prasavati tat

original: tathā hi buddhanetryāḥ. so 'nupacchedāya pratyupasthito bhavati,
analyzed: tathā hi buddha netryāḥ saḥ n upacchedāya pratyupasthitaḥ bhavati

original: ya ekaṃ sattvam apy anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: yaḥ ekam sattvam api anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayet tat kasya hetoḥ

original: bodhisattvanirjātā hi kauśika yāvantas tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ. tad anena
analyzed: bodhisattva nirjātāḥ hi kauśika yāvantaḥ tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ tat anena

original: kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ bodhisattvo 'pi pūjayitavyaḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa
analyzed: kauśika paryāyeṇa evam veditavyam bodhisattvaḥ pi pūjayitavyaḥ sa deva mānuṣa asureṇa

original: lokena. iti tṛtīyā stobhamātrā
analyzed: lokena iti tṛtīyā stobha mātrā

original: punar aparaṃ kauśika yaḥ. kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā jāmbudvīpakān sattvān daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
analyzed: punar aparam kauśika yaḥ kaścid kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā jāmbudvīpakān sattvān daśa kuśaleṣu karma patheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet tat kim manyase

original: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
analyzed: kauśika api nu sa kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā tatonidānam bahutaram puṇyam prasavet

original: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
analyzed: śakraḥ āha bahu bhagavan bahu sugata

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
analyzed: atas sa kauśika kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā bahutaram puṇyam prasavet

original: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parasmai dadyād antaśo likhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: yaḥ imām prajñāpāramitām pustaka likhitām kṛtvā parasmai dadyāt antaśas likhanāya api vācanāya api tat kasya hetoḥ

original: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā,
analyzed: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravāḥ dharmāḥ vistareṇa upadiṣṭā

original: yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca śikṣitvā samyaktvaniyāmam avakrāntāś cāvakramiṣyanti
analyzed: yatra kula putrāḥ kula duhitaraḥ ca śikṣitvā samyaktva niyāmam avakrāntāḥ ca avakramiṣyanti

original: cāvakrāmanti ca. yāvad arhattvaṃ prāptāḥ prāpsyante prāpnuvanti ca. pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ
analyzed: ca avakrāmanti ca yāvat arhat tvam prāptāḥ prāpsyante prāpnuvanti ca pratyekām bodhim

original: prāptāḥ prāpsyante prāpnuvanti ca. bodhisattvā bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāntā avakramiṣyanti ca avakrāmanti,
analyzed: prāptāḥ prāpsyante prāpnuvanti ca bodhisattvāḥ bodhisattva niyāmam avakrāntāḥ avakramiṣyanti ca avakrāmanti

original: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbhotsyante abhisaṃbudhyante ca. katame ca te kauśika anāsravā dharmās?
analyzed: anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ abhisaṃbhotsyante abhisaṃbudhyante ca katame ca te kauśika anāsravāḥ dharmāḥ

original: tadyathā pāramitāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmāś catvāry āryasatyāni catvāry apramāṇāni
analyzed: tat yathā pāramitāḥ saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣyāḥ dharmāḥ catvāri ārya satyāni catvāri apramāṇāni

original: catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo 'ṣṭa vimokṣā navānupūrvaṃ vihārasamāpattayaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñā
analyzed: catasraḥ ārūpya samāpattayaḥ ṣṭa vimokṣāḥ nava anupūrvam vihāra samāpattayaḥ śūnyatā nimittā apraṇihitā abhijñā

original: adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā
analyzed: adhyātma śūnyatā bahirdhā śūnyatā adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā

original: sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ
analyzed: sarva samādhayaḥ sarva dhāraṇī mukhāni daśa tathāgata balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ

original: pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā yāvad aparimāṇā buddhadharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭās
analyzed: pratisaṃvidaḥ ṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ yāvat aparimāṇāḥ buddha dharmāḥ vistareṇa upadiṣṭāḥ

original: tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ tad anenāpi te kauśika (PSP_2-3:105)
analyzed: tathāgataiḥ arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ prajñāpāramitāyām tat anena api te kauśika

original: paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam. yaś ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
analyzed: paryāyeṇa evam veditavyam yaḥ ca kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā imām prajñāpāramitām

original: pustakalikhitām api kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāl likhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi ayan tato bahutaraṃ
analyzed: pustaka likhitām api kṛtvā parebhyaḥ dadyāt likhanāya api vācanāya api ayan tatas bahutaram

original: puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: puṇyam prasavet tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā,
analyzed: tathā hi atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyām vistareṇa sarva dharmā upadiṣṭā

original: yair dharmaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni brāhmaṇamahāśālakulāni gṛhapatimahāśālakulāni prajñayante,
analyzed: yaiḥ dharmaiḥ kṣatriya mahā śāla kulāni brāhmaṇa mahā śāla kulāni gṛhapati mahā śāla kulāni prajñayante

original: cāturmahārājakāyikā devāḥ prajñāyante,
analyzed: cāturmahārājakāyikāḥ devāḥ prajñāyante

original: trāyastiṃśā yāmā tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartmo brahmapārṣadyā brahmapurohitā mahābrahmāṇo yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagā  #
analyzed: trāyastiṃśāḥ tuṣitāḥ nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartmaḥ brahma pārṣadyāḥ brahmapurohitāḥ mahābrahmāṇaḥ yāvat na eva saṃjñā na asaṃjñā āyatana upagāḥ

original: devā prajñāyante,
analyzed: devā prajñāyante

original: sarvapāramitāḥ prajñāyante,
analyzed: sarva pāramitāḥ prajñāyante

original: saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ prajñāyante,
analyzed: saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣyāḥ dharmāḥ prajñāyante

original: āryasatyāny aṣṭavimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ prajñāyante,
analyzed: ārya satyāni aṣṭa vimokṣāḥ nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattayaḥ prajñāyante

original: śūnyatānimitāpraṇihitāni ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ prajñāyante,
analyzed: śūnyatā nimita apraṇihitāni ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ prajñāyante

original: sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni prajñāyante,
analyzed: sarva śūnyatāḥ sarva samādhayaḥ sarva dhāraṇī mukhāni prajñāyante

original: daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ prajñāyante,
analyzed: daśa tathāgata balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ ṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ prajñāyante

original: mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā prajñāyante,
analyzed: mahā maitrī mahā karuṇā prajñāyante

original: sarvajñatāḥ prajñāyante,
analyzed: sarvajña tāḥ prajñāyante

original: srotaāpannāḥ prajñāyante,
analyzed: srotaāpannāḥ prajñāyante

original: sakṛdāgāmino 'nāgāmino 'rhantaḥ pratyekabuddhāḥ prajñāyante,
analyzed: sakṛdāgāminaḥ nāgāminaḥ rhantaḥ pratyekabuddhāḥ prajñāyante

original: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ prajñāyante. tiṣṭhantu kauśika jāmbudvīpakāḥ
analyzed: tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ prajñāyante tiṣṭhantu kauśika jāmbudvīpakāḥ

original: sattvā yāvat pratyekāyāṃ bodhau pratiṣṭhāpitā yāvantaḥ kauśika cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau
analyzed: sattvāḥ yāvat pratyekāyām bodhau pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ yāvantaḥ kauśika cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau

original: sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu yāvat
analyzed: sattvāḥ tān kaścid eva kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karma patheṣu yāvat

original: pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
analyzed: pratyeka bodhau pratiṣṭhāpayet tat kim manyase

original: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
analyzed: kauśika api nu sa kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā tatonidānam bahutaram puṇyam prasavet

original: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
analyzed: śakraḥ āha bahu bhagavan bahu sugata

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
analyzed: atas sa kauśika kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā tatonidānam bahutaram puṇyam prasavet

original: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parasmai dadyād antaśo likhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: yaḥ imām prajñāpāramitām pustaka likhitām kṛtvā parasmai dadyāt antaśas likhanāya api vācanāya api tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi kauśika prajñāpāramitānirjātāḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvadharmā
analyzed: tathā hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā nirjātāḥ sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddha bodhisattva dharmā

original: buddhadharmāś ca. tiṣṭhantu kauśika cāturmahādvīpdvīpake lokadhātau sattvā daśasu
analyzed: buddha dharmāḥ ca tiṣṭhantu kauśika cāturmahādvīp dvīpake lokadhātau sattvāḥ daśasu

original: kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu yāvat pratyekabuddhatve pratiṣṭhāpitā,
analyzed: kuśaleṣu karma patheṣu yāvat pratyekabuddha tve pratiṣṭhāpitā

original: yaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ye sāhasre lokadhātau sattvās tan sarvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet,
analyzed: yaḥ kauśika kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā ye sāhasre lokadhātau sattvāḥ tat sarvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karma patheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet

original: srotaāpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale 'nāgāmiphale 'rhattve pratyekabuddhatve pratiṣṭhāpayed,
analyzed: srotaāpatti phale sakṛdāgāmi phale nāgāmi phale rhat tve pratyekabuddha tve pratiṣṭhāpayet

original: yaś ca kulaputro vā (PSP_2-3:106)
analyzed: yaḥ ca kula putraḥ vā

original: kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām antaśaḥ pustakalikhitām api kṛtvā parasmai dadyād antaśo likhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi ayan tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ
analyzed: kula duhitā vā imām prajñāpāramitām antaśas pustaka likhitām api kṛtvā parasmai dadyāt antaśas likhanāya api vācanāya api ayan tatas bahutaram puṇyam

original: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
analyzed: śakraḥ āha bahu bhagavan bahu sugata

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: tiṣṭhantu kauśika sāhasre lokadhātau sattvā yāvat pratyekāyāṃ bodhau pratiṣṭhāpitā,
analyzed: tiṣṭhantu kauśika sāhasre lokadhātau sattvāḥ yāvat pratyekāyām bodhau pratiṣṭhāpitā

original: yaḥ kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ye dvisāhasre lokadhātau sattvās tān sarvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu yāvat pratyekabuddhatve  #
analyzed: yaḥ kaścid kauśika kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā ye dvi sāhasre lokadhātau sattvāḥ tān sarvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karma patheṣu yāvat pratyekabuddha tve

original: pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
analyzed: pratiṣṭhāpayet tat kim manyase

original: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.

original: gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ,

original: yaḍ ca khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām anekaparyāyeṇa
analyzed: ca khalu punar kauśika kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā imām prajñāpāramitām aneka paryāyeṇa

original: parebhyo vistareṇa deśayed artham asyā vijñāpayet saṃprakāśayed vibhāvayed vicared
analyzed: parebhyaḥ vistareṇa deśayet artham asyāḥ vijñāpayet saṃprakāśayet vibhāvayet vicaret

original: uttānīkuryād ayam eva tataḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: uttānīkuryāt ayam eva tatas kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā bahutaram puṇyam prasavati tat kasya hetoḥ

original: atra hi prajñāpāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā tair atītānāgatapratyutpannais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ
analyzed: atra hi prajñāpāpāramitāyām śikṣitvā taiḥ atīta anāgata pratyutpannaiḥ tathāgataiḥ arhadbhiḥ

original: samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhyate abhisaṃbhotsyate
analyzed: samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhyate abhisaṃbhotsyate

original: ca. iti saptamī stobhamātrā
analyzed: ca iti saptamī stobha mātrā

original: punar aparaṃ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā asaṃkhyeyān aparimāṇān kalpān dānaśīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñāpāramitāṃ
analyzed: punar aparam kauśika kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā asaṃkhyeyān aparimāṇān kalpān dāna śīla kṣānti vīrya dhyāna prajñāpāramitām

original: parebhyo vistareṇa saṃprakāśayet kathayed yāvat sūcayet tac cānupalambhayogena,
analyzed: parebhyaḥ vistareṇa saṃprakāśayet kathayet yāvat sūcayet tat ca anupalambha yogena

original: ayan tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tatra kauśika katama upalambhaḥ?
analyzed: ayan tatas bahutaram puṇyam prasavet tatra kauśika katamaḥ upalambhaḥ

original: yad bodhisattvasyopalambhayogena dānan dadataḥ,
analyzed: yat bodhisattvasya upalambha yogena dadataḥ

original: evaṃ bhavati;
analyzed: evam bhavati

original: ahaṃ dānan dadāmi,
analyzed: aham dānan dadāmi

original: idaṃ dānan dadāmi,
analyzed: idam dānan dadāmi

original: parasmai dānan dadato dānam eva sthāsyati,
analyzed: parasmai dadataḥ dānam eva sthāsyati

original: na dānapāramitā. idaṃ śilam,
analyzed: na dāna pāramitā idam śilam

original: ahaṃ śīlavān,
analyzed: aham śīlavān

original: amūn sattvān rakṣāmi neyaṃ śīlapāramitā. ahaṃ kṣāntim ārabhe,
analyzed: amūn sattvān rakṣāmi na iyam śīla pāramitā aham kṣāntim ārabhe

original: imāṃ kṣāntiṃ parasmai kṣamāmi,
analyzed: imām kṣāntim parasmai kṣamāmi

original: asyāṃ kṣāntau sthāsyāmi,
analyzed: asyām kṣāntau sthāsyāmi

analyzed: na iyam kṣānti pāramitā aham vīryam ārabhe

original: idaṃ vīryam eṣām arthāya,
analyzed: idam vīryam eṣām arthāya

analyzed: asmin virye sthāsyāmi

original: neyaṃ vīryapāramitā. ahaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsye,
analyzed: na iyam vīrya pāramitā aham dhyānam samāpatsye

original: idaṃ dhyānam eṣām arthāya samāpatsye,
analyzed: idam dhyānam eṣām arthāya samāpatsye

original: atra dhyāne sthāsyāmi,
analyzed: atra dhyāne sthāsyāmi

original: neyaṃ dhyānapāramitā. ahaṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayāmi,
analyzed: na iyam dhyāna pāramitā aham prajñām bhāvayāmi

original: iyaṃ prajñā eṣām arthāya,
analyzed: iyam prajñā eṣām arthāya

original: asyāṃ prajñāyāṃ sthāsyāmi,
analyzed: asyām prajñāyām sthāsyāmi

original: nāyaṃ prajñāpāramitā. evaṃ hi kauśika upalambhe caritasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā na dānapāramitā paripūryate,
analyzed: na ayam prajñāpāramitā evam hi kauśika upalambhe caritasya kula putrasya vā kula duhituḥ vā na dāna pāramitā paripūryate

original: na śīlapāramitā na kṣāntipāramitā na vīryapāramitā na dhyānapāramitā,
analyzed: na śīla pāramitā na kṣānti pāramitā na vīrya pāramitā na dhyāna pāramitā

original: na prajñāpāramitā paripūryate.
analyzed: na prajñāpāramitā paripūryate

original: śakra āha: kathaṃ carato bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā paripūryate?
analyzed: śakraḥ āha katham carataḥ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dāna pāramitā paripūryate

original: kathaṃ śīlapāramitā paripūryate?

original: kathaṃ kṣāntipāramitā (PSP_2-3:110)

original: paripūryate?
analyzed: paripūryate

original: kathaṃ vīryapāramitā paripūryate?
analyzed: katham vīrya pāramitā paripūryate

original: kathaṃ dhyānapāramitā paripūryate?
analyzed: katham dhyāna pāramitā paripūryate

original: kathaṃ prajñāpāramitā paripūryate?
analyzed: katham prajñāpāramitā paripūryate

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: iha kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānan dadan na dāyakam upalabhate na pratigrāhakam upalabhate na deyam upalabhate,
analyzed: iha kauśika bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ dānan dadan na dāyakam upalabhate na pratigrāhakam upalabhate na deyam upalabhate

original: iyam ucyate dānapāramitā. na śilam upalabhate na śīlavantaṃ na sattvam upalabhate,
analyzed: iyam ucyate dāna pāramitā na śilam upalabhate na śīlavantam na sattvam upalabhate

original: iyam ucyate śīlapāramitā. na kṣāntim upalabhate na kṣamyaṃ na kṣamiṇam upalabhate,
analyzed: iyam ucyate śīla pāramitā na kṣāntim upalabhate na kṣamyam na kṣamiṇam upalabhate

original: iyam ucyate kṣāntipāramitā. na vīryam upalabhate na kāyaṃ na cittam upalabhate,
analyzed: iyam ucyate kṣānti pāramitā na vīryam upalabhate na kāyam na cittam upalabhate

original: iyam ucyate vīryapāramitā. na dhyānam upalabhate na dhyāyinaṃ na dhyātavyam upalabhate,
analyzed: iyam ucyate vīrya pāramitā na dhyānam upalabhate na dhyāyinam na dhyātavyam upalabhate

original: iyam ucyate dhyānapāramitā. na prajñām upalabhate na prajñāvantaṃ na prajñeyam upalabhate yeṣām arthāya bhāvayati,
analyzed: iyam ucyate dhyāna pāramitā na prajñām upalabhate na prajñāvantam na prajñeyam upalabhate yeṣām arthāya bhāvayati

original: iyam ucyate prajñāpāramitā. evaṃ carataḥ kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā paripūryate,
analyzed: iyam ucyate prajñāpāramitā evam carataḥ kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dāna pāramitā paripūryate

original: śīlapāramitā paripūryate kṣāntipāramitā paripūryate vīryapāramitā paripūryate dhyānapāramitā
analyzed: śīla pāramitā paripūryate kṣānti pāramitā paripūryate vīrya pāramitā paripūryate dhyāna pāramitā

original: paripūryate prajñāpāramitā paripūryate. evaṃ hi kauśika kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur
analyzed: paripūryate prajñāpāramitā paripūryate evam hi kauśika kula putrasya vā kula duhituḥ

original: vā anupalambheneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sārthā savyañjanopadeṣṭavyā. evaṃ dhyānapāramitā
analyzed: vā anupalambhena iyam prajñāpāramitā sārthā sa vyañjanā upadeṣṭavyā evam dhyāna pāramitā

original: vīryapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā śīlapāramitā dānapāramitā anupalambheneyaṃ sārthā savyañjanopadeṣṭavyā. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: vīrya pāramitā kṣānti pāramitā śīla pāramitā dāna pāramitā anupalambhena iyam sā arthā sa vyañjanā upadeṣṭavyā tat kasya hetoḥ

original: bhaviṣyanti kauśikānāgate 'dhvani kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca te prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām
analyzed: bhaviṣyanti kauśika anāgate dhvani kula putrāḥ kula duhitaraḥ ca te prajñāpāramitā prativarṇikām

original: upadekṣyanti. tatra kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitasya
analyzed: upadekṣyanti tatra kula putrasya vā kula duhituḥ vā anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitasya

original: prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāśravaṇena vināśayiṣyanti teṣām apīyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sārthā
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā prativarṇikā śravaṇena vināśayiṣyanti teṣām api iyam prajñāpāramitā sa arthā

original: savyañjanopadeṣṭavyā.
analyzed: sa vyañjanā upadeṣṭavyā

original: śakra āha: katamā sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikā?
analyzed: śakraḥ āha katamā sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā prativarṇikā

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: iha kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyāma iti prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām
analyzed: iha kauśika kula putrāḥ vā kula duhitaraḥ vā imām prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyāmaḥ iti prajñāpāramitā prativarṇikām

original: upadekṣyanti. tatreyaṃ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikā rūpam anityam ity upadekṣyanti.
analyzed: upadekṣyanti tatra iyam prajñāpāramitā prativarṇikā rūpam anityam iti upadekṣyanti

original: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānam anityam ity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ copadekṣyanti ya evaṃ
analyzed: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānam anityam iti upadekṣyanti evam ca upadekṣyanti yaḥ evam

original: ca carati sa carati prajñāpāramitāyām iti. yeṣām upadekṣyanti kulaputrāṇāṃ vā kuladuhitṛṇāṃ
analyzed: ca carati sa carati prajñāpāramitāyām iti yeṣām upadekṣyanti kula putrāṇām vā kula duhitṛṇām

original: vā te rūpam anityam iti gaveṣiṣyanti. evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānam anityam
analyzed: vā te rūpam anityam iti gaveṣiṣyanti evam vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānam anityam

original: iti gaveṣiṣyanti. te prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti. te prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ
analyzed: iti gaveṣiṣyanti te prajñāpāramitā prativarṇikām upadekṣyanti te prajñāpāramitā prativarṇikāyām

original: cariṣyanti. te cakṣur anityam ity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano
analyzed: cariṣyanti te cakṣuḥ anityam iti upadekṣyanti evam śrotram ghrāṇam jihvā kāyaḥ manaḥ

original: 'nityam ity upadekṣyanti. rūpam anityam ity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ śabdā gandhā rasāḥ
analyzed: nityam iti upadekṣyanti rūpam anityam iti upadekṣyanti evam śabdāḥ gandhāḥ rasāḥ

original: spraṣṭavyā dharmā anityā ity upadekṣyanti. pṛthivīdhātum anitya ity upadekṣyanti.
analyzed: spraṣṭavyāḥ dharmāḥ anityāḥ iti upadekṣyanti pṛthivī dhātum anityaḥ iti upadekṣyanti

original: abdhātuṃ tejodhātuṃ vāyudhātum (PSP_2-3:111)
analyzed: ap dhātum tejaḥ dhātum vāyu dhātum

original: ākāśadhātuṃ vijñānadhātum anitya ity upadekṣyanti. cakṣurdhātum anitya ity upadekṣyanti.
analyzed: ākāśa dhātum vijñāna dhātum anityaḥ iti upadekṣyanti cakṣuḥ dhātum anityaḥ iti upadekṣyanti

original: śrotradhātuṃ ghrāṇadhātuṃ jihvādhātuṃ kāyadhātuṃ manodhātum anitya ity upadekṣyanti.
analyzed: śrotra dhātum ghrāṇa dhātum jihvā dhātum kāya dhātum manaḥ dhātum anityaḥ iti upadekṣyanti

original: rūpadhātum anitya ity upadekṣyanti. śabdadhātum anitya ity upadekṣyanti. gandhadhātuṃ
analyzed: rūpa dhātum anityaḥ iti upadekṣyanti śabda dhātum anityaḥ iti upadekṣyanti gandha dhātum

original: rasadhātuṃ spraṣṭavyadhātuṃ dharmadhātum anitya ity upadekṣyanti. cakṣurvijñānadhātum
analyzed: rasa dhātum spraṣṭavya dhātum dharma dhātum anityaḥ iti upadekṣyanti cakṣuḥ vijñāna dhātum

original: anītya ity upadekṣyanti. śrotravijñānadhātuṃ ghrāṇavijñānadhātuṃ jihvāvijñānadhātuṃ
analyzed: anītyaḥ iti upadekṣyanti śrotra vijñāna dhātum ghrāṇa vijñāna dhātum jihvā vijñāna dhātum

original: kāyavijñānadhātuṃ manovijñānadhātum anitya ity upadekṣyanti. cakṣuḥsaṃsparśadhātuni
analyzed: kāya vijñāna dhātum manaḥ vijñāna dhātum anityaḥ iti upadekṣyanti cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa dhātuni

original: anitya ity upadekṣyanti. śrotrasaṃsparśadhātuṃ ghrāṇasaṃsparśadhātuṃ jihvāsaṃsparśadhātuṃ
analyzed: anityaḥ iti upadekṣyanti śrotra saṃsparśa dhātum ghrāṇa saṃsparśa dhātum jihvā saṃsparśa dhātum

original: kāyasaṃsparśadhātuṃ manaḥsaṃsparśadhātum anitya ity upadekṣyanti. cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayā
analyzed: kāya saṃsparśa dhātum manaḥ saṃsparśa dhātum anityaḥ iti upadekṣyanti cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa pratyayā

original: vedanā anityā ity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥsaṃsparśapratyayā
analyzed: vedanāḥ anityāḥ iti upadekṣyanti evam śrotra ghrāṇa jihvā kāya manaḥ saṃsparśa pratyayā

original: vedanā anityā ity upadekṣyanti. rūpaṃ duḥkham anityam anātmety aśubham ity upadekṣyanti.
analyzed: vedanāḥ anityāḥ iti upadekṣyanti rūpam duḥkham anityam anātmā iti aśubham iti upadekṣyanti

original: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānaṃ duḥkham anityam anātmety aśubham ity upadekṣyanti.
analyzed: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānam duḥkham anityam anātmā iti aśubham iti upadekṣyanti

original: pṛthivīdhātuṃ duḥkha ity anātmety aśubha ity upadekṣyanti. abdhātuṃ tejodhātuṃ vāyudhātum
analyzed: pṛthivī dhātum duḥkhaḥ iti anātmā iti aśubhaḥ iti upadekṣyanti ap dhātum tejaḥ dhātum vāyu dhātum

original: ākāśadhātuṃ vijñānadhātuṃ duḥkha ity anātmety aśubha ity upadekṣyanti. rūpaśabdagandharasasparśadharmā
analyzed: ākāśa dhātum vijñāna dhātum duḥkhaḥ iti anātmā iti aśubhaḥ iti upadekṣyanti rūpa śabda gandha rasa sparśa dharmā

original: duḥkhā iti anātmāna ity aśubhā ity upadekṣyanti. cakṣur duḥkham ity anātmety aśubham
analyzed: duḥkhāḥ iti anātmānaḥ iti aśubhāḥ iti upadekṣyanti cakṣuḥ duḥkham iti anātmā iti aśubham

original: ity upadekṣyanti. śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano duḥkham ity anātmety aśubham ity
analyzed: iti upadekṣyanti śrotram ghrāṇam jihvā kāyaḥ manaḥ duḥkham iti anātmā iti aśubham iti

original: upadekṣyanti. rūpadhātuṃ śabdadhātuṃ gandhadhātuṃ rasadhātuṃ spraṣṭavyadhātuṃ dharmadhātuṃ
analyzed: upadekṣyanti rūpa dhātum śabda dhātum gandha dhātum rasa dhātum spraṣṭavya dhātum dharmadhātum

original: duḥkha ity anātmety aśubha ity upadekṣyanti. cakṣurdhātuṃ duḥkha ity anātmety aśubha
analyzed: duḥkhaḥ iti anātmā iti aśubhaḥ iti upadekṣyanti cakṣuḥ dhātum duḥkhaḥ iti anātmā iti aśubha

original: ity upadekṣyanti. śrotradhātuṃ ghrāṇadhātuṃ jihvādhātuṃ kāyadhātuṃ manodhātuṃ duḥkha
analyzed: iti upadekṣyanti śrotra dhātum ghrāṇa dhātum jihvā dhātum kāya dhātum manaḥ dhātum duḥkha

original: ity anātmety aśubha ity upadekṣyanti. cakṣurvijñānadhātuṃ duḥkha ity anātmety aśubha ity upadekṣyanti,
analyzed: iti anātmā iti aśubhaḥ iti upadekṣyanti cakṣuḥ vijñāna dhātum duḥkhaḥ iti anātmā iti aśubhaḥ iti upadekṣyanti

original: śrotravijñānadhātuṃ ghrāṇavijñānadhātuṃ jihvāvijñānadhātuṃ kāyavijñānadhātuṃ manovijñānadhātuṃ
analyzed: śrotra vijñāna dhātum ghrāṇa vijñāna dhātum jihvā vijñāna dhātum kāya vijñāna dhātum manaḥ vijñāna dhātum

original: duḥkha ity anātmety aśubha ity upadekṣyanti. cakṣuḥsaṃsparśadhātuṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayā
analyzed: duḥkhaḥ iti anātmā iti aśubhaḥ iti upadekṣyanti cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa dhātum cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa pratyayā

original: vedanā duḥkhety anātmikety aśubhety upadekṣyanti. evaṃ śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥsaṃsparśadhātuṃ
analyzed: vedanā duḥkhā iti anātmikā iti aśubhā iti upadekṣyanti evam śrotra ghrāṇa jihvā kāya manaḥ saṃsparśa dhātum

original: śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥsaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā duḥkhety anātmety (PSP_2-3:112)
analyzed: śrotra ghrāṇa jihvā kāya manaḥ saṃsparśa pratyayāḥ vedanāḥ duḥkhā iti anātmā iti

original: aśubhety upadekṣyanti. evaṃ te prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti. evaṃ dhyānapāramitāprativarṇikāṃ
analyzed: aśubhā iti upadekṣyanti evam te prajñāpāramitā prativarṇikām upadekṣyanti evam dhyāna pāramitā prativarṇikām

original: vīryapāramitāprativarṇikāṃ kṣāntipāramitāprativarṇikāṃ śīlapāramitāprativarṇikāṃ
analyzed: vīrya pāramitā prativarṇikām kṣānti pāramitā prativarṇikām śīla pāramitā prativarṇikām

original: dānapāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti. evaṃ rūpaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānam

original: kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
analyzed: kauśika te kula putrāḥ vā kula duhitaraḥ vā na prajñāpāramitā prativarṇikām upadekṣyanti

original: tasmāt tarhi kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyā artho vyapadeṣṭavyaḥ.
analyzed: tasmāt tarhi kauśika kula putreṇa vā kula duhitrā vā evam prajñāpāramitāyāḥ arthaḥ vyapadeṣṭavyaḥ

original: evam upadiśan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati. na tv eva
analyzed: evam upadiśan kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā bahutaram puṇyam prasaviṣyati na tu eva

original: te pūrvakāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca. ity aṣṭamī stobhamātrā
analyzed: te pūrvakāḥ kula putrāḥ kula duhitaraḥ ca iti aṣṭamī stobha mātrā

original: punar aparaṃ kauśika ye jāmbudvīpakāḥ sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
analyzed: punar aparam kauśika ye jāmbudvīpakāḥ sattvāḥ tān kaścid eva kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā srotaāpatti phale pratiṣṭhāpayet tat kim manyase

original: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
analyzed: kauśika api nu sa kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā bahutaram puṇyam prasavet

original: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
analyzed: śakraḥ āha bahu bhagavan bahu sugata

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
analyzed: atas sa kauśika kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā bahutaram puṇyam prasavet yaḥ imām prajñāpāramitām

original: sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parebhyo naikaiḥ paryāyaiḥ kathayiṣyati deśayiṣyati vibhāvayiṣyati
analyzed: sa arthām sa vyañjanām parebhyaḥ na ekaiḥ paryāyaiḥ kathayiṣyati deśayiṣyati vibhāvayiṣyati

original: uttānīkariṣyati saṃprakāśayiṣyati. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām
analyzed: uttānīkariṣyati saṃprakāśayiṣyati evam ca vakṣyanti ehi tvam kula putra prajñāpāramitām

original: udgṛhṇīṣva paryavāpnuhi dhāraya vācaya yoniśo manasikuru yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
analyzed: udgṛhṇīṣva paryavāpnuhi dhāraya vācaya yoniśas manasikuru yathā upadiṣṭāyām ca prajñāpāramitāyām

original: pratipadyasva. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: pratipadyasva tat kasya hetoḥ

original: ato hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāḥ srotaāpannaś ca srotaāpattiphalaṃ ca prabhāvyate. tiṣṭhantu kauśika jāmbudvīpakāḥ sarvasattvāḥ srotaāpattiphale
analyzed: atas hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāḥ srotaāpannaḥ ca srotaāpatti phalam ca prabhāvyate tiṣṭhantu kauśika jāmbudvīpakāḥ sarva sattvāḥ srotaāpatti phale

original: tiṣṭhantu cāturdvīpakāḥ sarvasattvāḥ srotaāpattiphale vinītās,
analyzed: tiṣṭhantu cāturdvīpakāḥ sarva sattvāḥ srotaāpatti phale vinītāḥ

original: tiṣṭhantu sāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvāḥ srotaāpattiphale vinītās,
analyzed: tiṣṭhantu sāhasre lokadhātau sarva sattvāḥ srotaāpatti phale vinītāḥ

original: tiṣṭhantu dvisāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvāḥ srotaāpattiphale vinītāḥ. tiṣṭhantu kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvsḥ srotaāpattiphale
analyzed: tiṣṭhantu dvi sāhasre lokadhātau sarva sattvāḥ srotaāpatti phale vinītāḥ tiṣṭhantu kauśika tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau sarva sattvsaḥ srotaāpatti phale

original: yāvantaḥ kauśika pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadivālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā (PSP_2-3:116)
analyzed: yāvantaḥ kauśika pūrvasyām diśi gaṅgā nadi vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarva sattvāḥ tān kaścid eva kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā

original: srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet. evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ vidikṣūrdhvam
analyzed: srotaāpatti phale pratiṣṭhāpayet evam dakṣiṇasyām paścimāyām uttarasyām vidikṣu ūrdhvam

original: adho gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
analyzed: adhas gaṅgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ tān kaścid eva kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā

original: vā srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
analyzed: vā srotaāpatti phale pratiṣṭhāpayet tat kim manyase

original: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
analyzed: kauśika api nu sa kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā tatonidānam bahutaram puṇyam prasavet

original: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
analyzed: śakraḥ āha bahu bhagavan bahu sugata

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati. ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
analyzed: atas sa kauśika kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā bahutaram puṇyam prasavati yaḥ imām prajñāpāramitām

original: parebhyaḥ. sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistareṇa kathayed deśayed artham asyāḥ saṃprakāśayed
analyzed: parebhyaḥ sa arthām sa vyañjanām vistareṇa kathayet deśayet artham asyāḥ saṃprakāśayet

original: vibhajed vibhāvayed vicared uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayed,
analyzed: vibhajet vibhāvayet vicaret uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet

original: evaṃ ca vaded ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇīṣva paryavāpnuhi dhāraya vācaya yoniśo manasikuru yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ  #
analyzed: evam ca vadet ehi tvam kula putra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇīṣva paryavāpnuhi dhāraya vācaya yoniśas manasikuru yathā upadiṣṭāyām ca prajñāpāramitāyām

original: pratipadyasva. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: pratipadyasva tat kasya hetoḥ

original: ato hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāḥ srotaāpannaḥ prabhāvyate.
analyzed: atas hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāḥ srotaāpannaḥ prabhāvyate

original: iti navamī stobhamātrety uktaḥ stobhaḥ
analyzed: iti navamī stobha mātrā iti uktaḥ stobhaḥ

original: punar aparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yāvanto jāmbudvīpakāḥ sattvās tān sarvān sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhapayet. iti prathamā praśaṃsāmātrā
analyzed: punar aparam kauśika yaḥ kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā yāvantaḥ jāmbudvīpakāḥ sattvāḥ tān sarvān sakṛdāgāmi phale pratiṣṭhapayet iti prathamā praśaṃsā mātrā

original: yāvad anāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet. iti dvitīyā praśaṃsāmātrā
analyzed: yāvat anāgāmi phale pratiṣṭhāpayet iti dvitīyā praśaṃsā mātrā

original: yāvad arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
analyzed: yāvat arhat tve pratiṣṭhāpayet tat kim manyase

original: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
analyzed: kauśika api nu sa kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā tatonidānam bahutaram puṇyam prasavet

original: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
analyzed: śakraḥ āha bahu bhagavan bahu sugata

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
analyzed: atas sa kauśika kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā bahutaram puṇyam prasavet yaḥ imām prajñāpāramitām

original: sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistareṇopadiśet kathayet saṃprakāśayed vibhajed vibhāvayed vicared uttānīkuryād,
analyzed: sa arthām sa vyañjanām vistareṇa upadiśet kathayet saṃprakāśayet vibhajet vibhāvayet vicaret uttānīkuryāt

original: evaṃ vaded ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa paryavāpnuhi dhāraya vācaya yoniśo manasikuru yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipadyasva.  #
analyzed: evam vadet ehi tvam kula putra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa paryavāpnuhi dhāraya vācaya yoniśas manasikuru yathā upadiṣṭāyām ca prajñāpāramitāyām pratipadyasva

original: tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: ato hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ prajñāyate.
analyzed: atas hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sakṛdāgāmi phalam anāgāmi phalam arhat tvam prajñāyate

original: tiṣṭhantu kauśika jāmbudvīpakāḥ sattvāḥ sakṛdāgāmy anāgāmy arhattve vinītā yaḥ kaścit
analyzed: tiṣṭhantu kauśika jāmbudvīpakāḥ sattvāḥ sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmī arhat tve vinītāḥ yaḥ kaścid

analyzed: kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā cāturdvīpakān sarva sattvān arhat tve pratiṣṭhāpayet sāhasre

original: lokadhātau sarvasattvān arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet. dvisāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvān
analyzed: lokadhātau sarva sattvān arhat tve pratiṣṭhāpayet dvi sāhasre lokadhātau sarva sattvān

original: arhattve pratiṣḥāpayet. trisāhasre (PSP_2-3:117)
analyzed: arhat tve pratiṣṭāpayet tri sāhasre

original: lokadhātau sarvasattvān arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet,
analyzed: lokadhātau sarva sattvān arhat tve pratiṣṭhāpayet

original: yāvantaḥ kauśika pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvās tān
analyzed: yāvantaḥ kauśika pūrvasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarva sattvāḥ tān

original: sarvān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yāvad arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet. evaṃ
analyzed: sarvān kaścid eva kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā yāvat arhat tve pratiṣṭhāpayet evam

analyzed: kauśika api nu sa kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā tatonidānam bahutaram puṇyam prasavet

analyzed: evam vadet ehi tvam kula putra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa paryavāpnuhi dhāraya vācaya

analyzed: yoniśas manasikuru yathā upadiṣṭāyām ca prajñāpāramitāyām pratipadyasva ayam eva

original: bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: bahutaram puṇyam prasavet tat kasya hetoḥ

analyzed: atas hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sakṛdāgāmi anāgāmi arhantaḥ prajñāyante iti tṛtiyā praśaṃsā mātrā

analyzed: diśi sattvāḥ tān sarvān kaścid eva kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā pratyekabuddha tve pratiṣṭhāpayet tat kim manyase

analyzed: kauśika api nu sa kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā tatonidānam bahutaram puṇyam prasavet

analyzed: evam ca kathayet evam vadet ehi tvam kula putra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa paryavāpnuhi

analyzed: atas hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ prabhāvyate iti caturthī praśaṃsā mātrā

original: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
analyzed: kauśika api nu sa kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā tatonidānam bahutaram puṇyam prasavet

original: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
analyzed: śakraḥ āha bahu bhagavan bahu sugata

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,

original: evaṃ vaded ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa dhāraya vācaya deśaya saṃprakāśaya

analyzed: paryavāpnuhi yoniśas manasikuru yathā upadiṣṭāyām ca prajñāpāramitāyām pratipadyasva

analyzed: yathā yathā tvam kula putra yathā upadiṣṭāyām prajñāpāramitāyām pratipatsyase tathā tathā

original: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase tat kasya hetoḥ

original: ato nirjātā hi kauśika prathamacittotpādikā bodhisattvā,
analyzed: atas nirjātāḥ hi kauśika prathama citta utpādikāḥ bodhisattvāḥ

original: ye ca kecana daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvās
analyzed: ye ca kecana daśasu dikṣu ekaikasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvāḥ

original: teṣām api sarveṣāṃ prajñāpāramitānirjātā prathamacittotpādikā bhūmiḥ. iti pañcamī praśaṃsāmātrā
analyzed: teṣām api sarveṣām prajñāpāramitā nirjātā prathama citta utpādikā bhūmiḥ iti pañcamī praśaṃsā mātrā

original: yāyantaś cāturdvīpakāḥ sattvāḥ iti ṣaṣṭhī praśaṃsāmātrā
analyzed: yā āyantaḥ cāturdvīpakāḥ sattvāḥ iti ṣaṣṭhī praśaṃsā mātrā

original: yāyantaḥ sāhasre sattvāḥ. iti saptamī praśaṃsāmātrā
analyzed: yā āyantaḥ sāhasre sattvāḥ iti saptamī praśaṃsā mātrā

original: yāyanto dvisāhasre trisāhasre sattvāḥ.
analyzed: yā āyantaḥ dvi sāhasre tri sāhasre sattvāḥ

original: punar aparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ye daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyāṃ
analyzed: punar aparam kauśika yaḥ kaścid kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā ye daśasu dikṣu ekaikasyām

original: diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tān sarvān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
analyzed: diśi gaṅgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ tān sarvān anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau

original: samādāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
analyzed: samādāpayet tat kim manyase

original: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
analyzed: kauśika api nu sa kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā tatonidānam bahutaram puṇyam prasavet

original: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
analyzed: śakraḥ āha bahu bhagavan bahu sugata

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
analyzed: atas sa kauśika kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā bahutaram puṇyam prasavet

original: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parebhyo vistareṇopadiśed yāvat saṃprakāśayed,
analyzed: yaḥ imām prajñāpāramitām sa arthām sa vyañjanām parebhyaḥ vistareṇa upadiśet yāvat saṃprakāśayet

original: evaṃ ca vaded ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa dhāraya vācaya deśaya saṃprakāśaya
analyzed: evam ca vadet ehi tvam kula putra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa dhāraya vācaya deśaya saṃprakāśaya

original: paryavāpnuhi yoniśo manasikuru yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipadyasva.
analyzed: paryavāpnuhi yoniśas manasikuru yathā upadiṣṭāyām ca prajñāpāramitāyām pratipadyasva

original: yathāyathā (PSP_2-3:119)
analyzed: yathā yathā

original: tvaṃ kulaputra yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipatsyase tathātathā tvaṃ kulaputra
analyzed: tvam kula putra yathā upadiṣṭāyām prajñāpāramitāyām pratipatsyase tathā tathā tvam kula putra

original: sarvajñatāyā lābhī bhaviṣyasi. yathāyathā te sarvajñatāparipūriṃ gamiṣyati tathātathā
analyzed: sarvajña tāyāḥ lābhī bhaviṣyasi yathā yathā te sarvajña tā paripūrim gamiṣyati tathā tathā

original: te bhūyasyā mātrayā prajñāpāramitābhāvanāparipūriṃ gamiṣyati. yathāyathā te prajñāpāramitābhāvanāparipūriṃ
analyzed: te bhūyasyā mātrayā prajñāpāramitā bhāvanā paripūrim gamiṣyati yathā yathā te prajñāpāramitā bhāvanā paripūrim

original: gamiṣyati tathātathā tvam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: gamiṣyati tathā tathā tvam anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase tat kasya hetoḥ

original: ato nirjātā hi kauśika prathamacittotpādikā bodhisattvā ye ca kecana daśasu dikṣv
analyzed: atas nirjātāḥ hi kauśika prathama citta utpādikāḥ bodhisattvāḥ ye ca kecana daśasu dikṣu

original: ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvās teṣām api sarveṣāṃ
analyzed: ekaikasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvāḥ teṣām api sarveṣām

original: prajñāpāramitānirjātā prathamacittotpādikā bhūmiḥ. ity aṣṭamī praśaṃsāmātrā
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā nirjātā prathama citta utpādikā bhūmiḥ iti aṣṭamī praśaṃsā mātrā

original: punar aparaṃ kauśika yāvanto jāmbudvīpakās sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
analyzed: punar aparam kauśika yāvantaḥ jāmbudvīpakāḥ sattvāḥ tān kaścid eva kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā

original: vā avinivartanīyabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpayed yaś ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
analyzed: vā a vinivartanīya bhūmau pratiṣṭhāpayet yaḥ ca kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā imām prajñāpāramitām

original: teṣāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanām upadiśed yāvat saṃprakāśayed,
analyzed: teṣām sarva sattvānām sa arthām sa vyañjanām upadiśet yāvat saṃprakāśayet

original: evaṃ ca vaded ehi tvaṃ kulaputra imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇīṣva dhāraya vācaya paryavāpnuhi yoniśo manasikuru yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
analyzed: evam ca vadet ehi tvam kula putra imām prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇīṣva dhāraya vācaya paryavāpnuhi yoniśas manasikuru yathā upadiṣṭāyām ca prajñāpāramitāyām

original: yathāyathā tvaṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipatsyase tathātathā tvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇo 'vinivartānīyatve sthāsyasi,
analyzed: yathā yathā tvam yathā upadiṣṭāyām prajñāpāramitāyām pratipatsyase tathā tathā tvam prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣamāṇaḥ vinivartānīya tve sthāsyasi

original: anupūrveṇa cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase,
analyzed: anupūrveṇa ca anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase

original: ayaṃ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
analyzed: ayam kauśika kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā bahutaram puṇyam prasavet

original: yāvantaś cāturdvīpake lokadhātau sattvā yāvat sāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvā yāvad
analyzed: yāvantaḥ cāturdvīpake lokadhātau sattvāḥ yāvat sāhasre lokadhātau sarva sattvāḥ yāvat

original: dvisāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvā yāvantaś ca trisāhasramahāsāhasre lohadhātau sarvasattvā
analyzed: dvi sāhasre lokadhātau sarva sattvāḥ yāvantaḥ ca tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lohadhātau sarva sattvāḥ

original: yāvad daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyāṃ diśi gangānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvās
analyzed: yāvat daśasu dikṣu ekaikasyām diśi gangā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarva sattvāḥ

original: tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhita vā avinivartanīyabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpayed,
analyzed: tān kaścid eva kula putraḥ vā kula duhita vā a vinivartanīya bhūmau pratiṣṭhāpayet

original: yaś ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ teṣāṃ sattvānām upadiśed yāvat saṃprakāśayet sārthāṃ savyañjanām,
analyzed: yaḥ ca kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā imām prajñāpāramitām teṣām sattvānām upadiśet yāvat saṃprakāśayet sa arthām sa vyañjanām

original: evaṃ vaded ehi tvaṃ kulaputra imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa dhāraya vācaya deśaya
analyzed: evam vadet ehi tvam kula putra imām prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa dhāraya vācaya deśaya

original: saṃprakāśaya paryavāpnuhi yoniśo manasikuru yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
analyzed: saṃprakāśaya paryavāpnuhi yoniśas manasikuru yathā upadiṣṭāyām ca prajñāpāramitāyām

original: pratipadyasvātra hi tvaṃ pratipadyamāno 'vinivartanīyabhūmau sthāsyasi,
analyzed: pratipadyasva atra hi tvam pratipadyamānaḥ vinivartanīya bhūmau sthāsyasi

original: anupūrveṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase,
analyzed: anupūrveṇa anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase

original: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
analyzed: ayam eva tatas bahutaram puṇyam prasavet

original: punar aparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yāvanto (PSP_2-3:120)
analyzed: punar aparam kauśika yaḥ kaścid kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā yāvantaḥ

original: jāmbudvīpakāḥ sattvās tān sarvān avinivartanīyatve sthāpayed anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
analyzed: jāmbudvīpakāḥ sattvāḥ tān sarvān a vinivartanīya tve sthāpayet anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau

original: tebhyaś ca prajñāpāramitām upadiśet saṃprakāśayed vibhāvayed vicared uttānīkuryād
analyzed: tebhyaḥ ca prajñāpāramitām upadiśet saṃprakāśayet vibhāvayet vicaret uttānīkuryāt

original: vibhajet sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ tebhyo 'nyatarebhyo brūyād ahaṃ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsya iti,
analyzed: vibhajet sārthām sa vyañjanām tebhyaḥ nyatarebhyaḥ brūyāt aham kṣipram anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsye iti

original: tasmin kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vistareṇa sārthaṃ
analyzed: tasmin kaścid eva kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā imām prajñāpāramitām vistareṇa sārtham

original: savyañjanām upadiśed deśayet saṃprakāśayed vibhāvayed vibhajed vistareṇottānikuryād
analyzed: sa vyañjanām upadiśet deśayet saṃprakāśayet vibhāvayet vibhajet vistareṇa uttānikuryāt

original: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved yāvad daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu
analyzed: ayam eva tatas bahutaram puṇyam prasavet yāvat daśasu dikṣu ekaikasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī vālukā upameṣu

original: lokadhātuṣu sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā avinivartanīyatve sthāpayet
analyzed: lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ tān kaścid eva kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā a vinivartanīya tve sthāpayet

original: tebhyaḥ kaścid eva imāṃ prajñāpāramitām upadiśet tebhyaś caikaḥ kaścid evaṃ brūyād
analyzed: tebhyaḥ kaścid eva imām prajñāpāramitām upadiśet tebhyaḥ ca ekaḥ kaścid evam brūyāt

original: ahaṃ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsya iti,
analyzed: aham kṣipram anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsye iti

original: yaś ca tasmai imāṃ prajñāpāramitām upadiśed deśayet saṃprakāśayed vibhāvayed vicared
analyzed: yaḥ ca tasmai imām prajñāpāramitām upadiśet deśayet saṃprakāśayet vibhāvayet vicaret

original: uttānīkuryād vibhajet sārthāṃ savyañjanām ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: uttānīkuryāt vibhajet sa arthām sa vyañjanām ayam eva tatas bahutaram puṇyam prasavet tat kasya hetoḥ

original: avaivartikebhyo hi bodhisattvebhyo 'tyarthaṃ dharma upadeṣṭavyo niyatā hi te saṃbodhiparāyaṇā
analyzed: avaivartikebhyaḥ hi bodhisattvebhyaḥ tyartham dharmaḥ upadeṣṭavyaḥ niyatāḥ hi te saṃbodhi parāyaṇāḥ

original: na te bhūyo vinivartante 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher amī bhūtkaṇṭhitāḥ saṃsārād mahākaruṇāsaṃpīḍitāś
analyzed: na te bhūyas vinivartante nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ amī saṃsārāt mahā karuṇā saṃpīḍitāḥ

original: ca. iti navamī praśaṃsāmātrety uktvā praśaṃsā
analyzed: ca iti navamī praśaṃsā mātrā iti uktvā praśaṃsā

original: śakra āha: yathāyathā bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva āsannībhavaty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhes
analyzed: śakraḥ āha yathā yathā bhagavan bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ āsannībhavati anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ

original: tathātathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vavaditavyo 'nuśāsanīyaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ
analyzed: tathā tathā bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ vavaditavyaḥ nuśāsanīyaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām dhyāna pāramitāyām

original: vīryapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ dānapāramitāyām avavaditavyo 'nuśāsitavyaḥ,
analyzed: vīrya pāramitāyām kṣānti pāramitāyām śīla pāramitāyām dāna pāramitāyām avavaditavyaḥ nuśāsitavyaḥ

original: sarvaśūnyatāsv avavaditavyo 'nuśāsitavyaḥ,
analyzed: sarva śūnyatāsu avavaditavyaḥ nuśāsitavyaḥ

original: smṛtyupasthāṇeṣu samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgeṣv avavaditavyo 'nuśāsitavyaḥ,
analyzed: smṛti upasthāṇeṣu samyakprahāṇa ṛddhipāda indriya bala bodhyaṅga mārgeṣu avavaditavyaḥ nuśāsitavyaḥ

original: apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣv āryasatyeṣu śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣv avavaditavyo 'nuśāsitavyaḥ,
analyzed: apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattiṣu ārya satyeṣu śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihiteṣu avavaditavyaḥ nuśāsitavyaḥ

original: aṣṭavimokṣeṣu navānupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣv abhijñāsv avavaditavyo 'nuśāsitavyaḥ,
analyzed: aṣṭa vimokṣeṣu nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattiṣu abhijñāsu avavaditavyaḥ nuśāsitavyaḥ

original: sarvasamādhiṣu sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu
analyzed: sarva samādhiṣu sarva dhāraṇī mukheṣu daśasu tathāgata baleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu

original: pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśāsv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣv avavaditavyo 'nuśāsitavyaḥ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārair anugrāhyaḥ,
analyzed: pratisaṃvitsu aṣṭādaśāsu āveṇikeṣu buddha dharmeṣu avavaditavyaḥ nuśāsitavyaḥ cīvara piṇḍapāta śayana āsana glāna pratyaya bhaiṣajya pariṣkāraiḥ anugrāhyaḥ

original: sa ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmāmiṣāsaṃgrahābhyām anugrahitavyaḥ. ayam eva dharmāmiṣānugrāhakas tato bahutaraṃ (PSP_2-3:121)
analyzed: sa ca bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ dharma āmiṣa asaṃgrahābhyām anugrahitavyaḥ ayam eva dharma āmiṣa anugrāhakaḥ tatas bahutaram

original: puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: puṇyam prasavet tat kasya hetoḥ

original: evam etad bhavati yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pāramitāsv avavādyate 'nuśāsyate. sarvaśūnyatāsu
analyzed: evam etat bhavati yat bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ pāramitāsu avavādyate nuśāsyate sarva śūnyatāsu

original: sarvabodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣv apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣv āryasatyeṣu śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣv
analyzed: sarva bodhi pakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu a pramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattiṣu ārya satyeṣu śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihiteṣu

original: abhijñāsu samādhiṣu sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsv
analyzed: abhijñāsu samādhiṣu sarva dhāraṇī mukheṣu daśasu tathāgata baleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsu

original: aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣv avabodhyate 'nuśāsyate.
analyzed: aṣṭādaśasu āveṇikeṣu buddha dharmeṣu avabodhyate nuśāsyate

original: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakram devānām indram etat avocat

original: sādhu sādhu kauśika yas tvaṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ cotsāhaṃ dadāsi,
analyzed: sādhu sādhu kauśika yaḥ tvam bodhisattva yānikānām kula putrāṇām kula duhitṛṇām ca utsāham dadāsi

original: evam eva tvayā karaṇīyaṃ ya āryaśrāvakāḥ sattvān anugrahītukāmās te bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām anugrahaṃ kurvanti,
analyzed: evam eva tvayā karaṇīyam ye ārya śrāvakāḥ sattvān anugrahītu kāmāḥ te bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām anugraham kurvanti

original: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau anugṛhṇanti dharmāmiṣānugrahābhyāṃ cānupālayanti. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau anugṛhṇanti dharma āmiṣa anugrahābhyām ca anupālayanti tat kasya hetoḥ

original: ataḥ prabhavo hi bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃghaḥ,
analyzed: atas prabhavaḥ hi bhagavataḥ śrāvaka saṃghaḥ

original: ataḥ pratyekabuddhayānam ato mahāyānam. yadi hi bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ notpāditam abhaviṣyat,
analyzed: atas pratyekabuddha yānam atas mahāyānam yadi hi bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau cittam na utpāditam abhaviṣyat

original: tadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nāśikṣiṣyat ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu na saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyeṣu
analyzed: tadā bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ na aśikṣiṣyat ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu na saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣyeṣu

original: dharmeṣu nāryasatyeṣu nāṣṭasu vimokṣeṣu na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu
analyzed: dharmeṣu na ārya satyeṣu na aṣṭasu vimokṣeṣu na nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattiṣu na apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattiṣu

original: na ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu nādhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ na bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ
analyzed: na ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu na śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihiteṣu na adhyātma śūnyatāyām na bahirdhā śūnyatāyām

original: nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ yāvan nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ na sarvasamādhiṣu na
analyzed: na adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatāyām yāvat na abhāva svabhāva śūnyatāyām na sarva samādhiṣu na

original: sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu na tathāgatabaleṣu na vaiśāradyeṣu na pratisaṃvitsu nāṣṭādaśāsv
analyzed: sarva dhāraṇī mukheṣu na tathāgata baleṣu na vaiśāradyeṣu na pratisaṃvitsu na aṣṭādaśāsu

original: āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣv aśikṣiṣyatāśikṣamāṇe na teṣu dharmeṣu nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
analyzed: āveṇikeṣu buddha dharmeṣu aśikṣiṣyata a śikṣamāṇe na teṣu dharmeṣu na anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim

original: abhisaṃbudhyeta anabhisaṃbudhyamāne tasmin nānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ prajñāyeta na
analyzed: abhisaṃbudhyeta an abhisaṃbudhyamāne tasmin na anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ prajñāyeta na

original: pratyekabuddhabodhir na śrāvakabodhiḥ. yasmāt tarhi kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
analyzed: pratyekabuddha bodhiḥ na śrāvaka bodhiḥ yasmāt tarhi kauśika bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ

original: ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sarvaśūnyatāsu sarvasamādhhiṣu sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu
analyzed: ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sarva śūnyatāsu sarva samādhhiṣu sarva dhāraṇī mukheṣu śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihiteṣu

original: saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣv apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣv āryasatyeṣu cāṣṭasu
analyzed: saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattiṣu ārya satyeṣu ca aṣṭasu

original: vimokṣeṣu navānupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu ṣaṭsv abhijñāsu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu
analyzed: vimokṣeṣu nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattiṣu ṣaṭsu abhijñāsu daśasu tathāgata baleṣu caturṣu

original: vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu yāvat sarvadharmeṣu śikṣate,
analyzed: vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu aṣṭādaśasu āveṇikeṣu buddha dharmeṣu yāvat sarva dharmeṣu śikṣate

original: tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sarvalokadhātor nirayān ucchīnatti,
analyzed: tasmāt bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ nuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sarva lokadhātoḥ nirayān ucchīnatti

original: tiryagyoniṃ pitṛviṣayam ucchīnatti. kṣatriyamahāśālakulaprādurbhāvo bhavati. brāhmaṇamahāśālakulaprādurbhāvo
analyzed: tiryagyonim pitṛ viṣayam ucchīnatti kṣatriya mahāśāla kula prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati brāhmaṇa mahāśāla kula prādurbhāvaḥ

original: bhavati. gṛhapatimahāśālakulaprādurbhāvo bhavati. cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ prādurbhāvo
analyzed: bhavati gṛhapati mahāśāla kula prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati cāturmahārājakāyikānām

original: bhavati. trāyastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ
analyzed: bhavati trāyastriṃśānām yāmānām tuṣitānām nirmāṇaratīnām paranirmitavaśavartinām

original: brahmapārṣadyānāṃ brahmapurohitānāṃ (PSP_2-3:122)
analyzed: brahma pārṣadyānām brahma purohitānām

original: mahābrahmāṇāṃ parīttābhānām apramāṇābhānām ābhāsvarāṇāṃ parīttaśubhānām apramāṇaśubhānāṃ
analyzed: mahābrahmāṇām parīttābhānām apramāṇābhānām ābhāsvarāṇām parīttaśubhānām apramāṇaśubhānām

original: śubhakṛtsnānām anabhrakānāṃ puṇyaprasavānāṃ bṛhatphalānāṃ suddhāvāsānām avṛhāṇām
analyzed: śubhakṛtsnānām anabhrakānām puṇya prasavānām bṛhat phalānām suddha āvāsānām avṛhāṇām

original: atapānāṃ sudṛśānāṃ sudarśanānām akaniṣṭhānām ākāśānatyāyatanopagānāṃ devānāṃ vijñānānantyāyatanopagānāṃ
analyzed: atapānām sudṛśānām sudarśanānām akaniṣṭhānām ākāśānatyāyatana upagānām devānām vijñānānantyāyatana upagānām

original: devānām akiñcanyāyatanopagānāṃ devānāṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagānāṃ devānāṃ loke
analyzed: devānām akiñcanya āyatana upagānām devānām na eva saṃjñā na asaṃjñā āyatana upagānām devānām loke

original: prādurbhāvo bhavati. dānapāramitāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhavati. śīlapāramitāyā loke
analyzed: prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati dāna pāramitāyāḥ loke prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati śīla pāramitāyāḥ loke

original: prādurbhāvo bhavati. kṣāntipāramitāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhāvati. vīryapāramitāyā loke
analyzed: prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati kṣānti pāramitāyāḥ loke prādurbhāvaḥ bhāvati vīrya pāramitāyāḥ loke

original: prādurbhāvo bhavati. dhyānapāramitāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhavati. prajñāpāramitāyā
analyzed: prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati dhyāna pāramitāyāḥ loke prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati prajñāpāramitāyāḥ

original: loke prādurbhāvo bhavati. adhyātmaśūnyatāyā bahirdhāśūnyatāyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā
analyzed: loke prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati adhyātma śūnyatāyāḥ bahirdhā śūnyatāyāḥ adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatāyāḥ

original: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhavati. saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyāṇāṃ
analyzed: yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatāyāḥ loke prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣyāṇām

original: dharmāṇāṃ caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati. apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnām
analyzed: dharmāṇām caturṇām ārya satyānām loke prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattīnām

original: aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānāṃ ṣaṇṇām
analyzed: aṣṭānām vimokṣāṇām nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattīnām śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihitānām ṣaṇṇām

original: abhijñānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati. sarvasamādhīnāṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ bodhisattvabhūmīnāṃ
analyzed: abhijñānām loke prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati sarva samādhīnām sarva dhāraṇī mukhānām bodhisattva bhūmīnām

original: loke prādurbhāvo bhavati. daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ
analyzed: loke prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati daśānām tathāgata balānām caturṇām vaiśāradyānām catasṛṇām

original: pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati. sarvajñatāyā
analyzed: pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānām buddha dharmāṇām loke prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati sarvajña tāyāḥ

original: loke prādurbhāvo bhavati. śrāvakayānasya pratyekabuddhayānasya mahāyānasya ca loke
analyzed: loke prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati śrāvaka yānasya pratyekabuddha yānasya mahāyānasya ca loke

original: prādurbhāvo bhavati.
analyzed: prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati

original: iti stuty ādi padārthopasaṃhāraḥ kṛtaḥ
analyzed: iti stuti ādi padārtha upasaṃhāraḥ kṛtaḥ

original: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ subhūtiṃ sthaviram etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu maitreyaḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ subhūtim sthaviram etat avocat

original: yad bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu
analyzed: yat bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anumodanā sahagatam puṇya kriyā vastu

original: sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmitaṃ tac cānupalambhayogena.
analyzed: sarva sattva sādhāraṇam kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmitam tat ca an upalambha yogena

original: yac ca sarvasattvānām anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu,
analyzed: yat ca sarva sattvānām anumodanā sahagatam puṇya kriyā vastu

original: yac ca śrāvakayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ,
analyzed: yat ca śrāvaka yāna saṃprasthitānām

original: yac ca pratyekabuddhayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu śīlamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu
analyzed: yat ca pratyekabuddha yāna saṃprasthitānām dāna mayam puṇya kriyā vastu śīla mayam puṇya kriyā vastu

original: bhāvanāmayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu tato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu
analyzed: bhāvanā mayam puṇya kriyā vastu tatas bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anumodanā sahagatam puṇya kriyā vastu

original: sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmitam agram ākhyāyate
analyzed: sarva sattva sādhāraṇam kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmitam agram ākhyāyate

original: śreṣṭham ākhyāyate jyeṣṭham ākhyāyate varam ākhyāyate pravaram ākhyāyate praṇītam
analyzed: śreṣṭham ākhyāyate jyeṣṭham ākhyāyate varam ākhyāyate pravaram ākhyāyate praṇītam

original: ākhyāyate (PSP_2-3:123)
analyzed: ākhyāyate

original: uttamam ākhyāyate 'nuttamam ākhyāyate. asamam ākhyāyate asamasamam ākhyāyate. iti viśeṣapariṇāmaḥ
analyzed: uttamam ākhyāyate nuttamam ākhyāyate asamam ākhyāyate asamasamam ākhyāyate iti viśeṣa pariṇāmaḥ

original: tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi yat sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ dānamayaṃ śīlamayaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ
analyzed: tathā hi yat sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddha yānikānām dāna mayam śīla mayam bhāvanā mayam

original: puṇyakriyāvastu sarvaṃ tad ātmadamanāya ātmaśamanāya ātmaparinirvāṇāya yāvat saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā
analyzed: puṇya kriyā vastu sarvam tat ātma damanāya ātma śamanāya ātma parinirvāṇāya yāvat saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣyā

original: dharmāḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitaṃ catvāry āryasatyāny apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
analyzed: dharmāḥ śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihitam catvāri ārya satyāni apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattayaḥ

original: aṣṭavimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaś catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ ṣaḍ abhijñā ātmadamanāya
analyzed: aṣṭa vimokṣāḥ nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattayaḥ catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ ātma damanāya

original: ātmaśamanāya ātmaparinirvāṇāya bhavanti. bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya punar anumodanāsahagataṃ
analyzed: ātma śamanāya ātma parinirvāṇāya bhavanti bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya punar anumodanā sahagatam

original: puṇyakriyāvastu sarvasattvānāṃ damanāya śamanāya parinirvāṇāya anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
analyzed: puṇya kriyā vastu sarva sattvānām damanāya śamanāya parinirvāṇāya anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye

original: pariṇāmitaṃ bhavati. iti pariṇāmanākāritram
analyzed: pariṇāmitam bhavati iti pariṇāmanā kāritram

original: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ maitreyam bodhisattvam mahāsattvam etat avocat

original: yat punar ayaṃ maitreya bodhisattva ye te buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśy asaṃkhyeyāprameyāparimāṇeṣu lokadhātuṣu,
analyzed: yat punar ayam maitreya bodhisattva ye te buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ pūrvasyām diśi asaṃkhyeya aprameya aparimāṇeṣu lokadhātuṣu

original: evaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimottarāsu digvidikṣūrdhvam adhaḥ,
analyzed: evam dakṣiṇa paścima uttarāsu diś vidikṣu ūrdhvam adhas

original: ekaikasyāṃ diśi yāvad asaṃkhyeyāprameyāparimāṇā buddhā bhagavantaḥ parinirvṛtās teṣāṃ
analyzed: ekaikasyām diśi yāvat asaṃkhyeya aprameya aparimāṇāḥ buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ parinirvṛtāḥ teṣām

original: yāvat prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvac cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhānāṃ
analyzed: yāvat prathama citta utpādam upādāya yāvat ca anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhānām

original: yāvad nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtānāṃ yāvat saddharmo nāntarhitaḥ,
analyzed: yāvat nirupadhi śeṣe nirvāṇa dhātau parinirvṛtānām yāvat saddharmaḥ na antarhitaḥ

original: etasminn antare yat kuśalamūlam ṣaṭpāramitiāpratisaṃyuktaṃ,
analyzed: etasmin antare yat kuśala mūlam ṣaṣ pāramitiā pratisaṃyuktam

original: yac ca teṣāṃ śrāvakayānikānāṃ,
analyzed: yat ca teṣām śrāvaka yānikānām

original: yac ca pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ dānamayaṃ śīlamayaṃ bhāvanāmyaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu,
analyzed: yat ca pratyekabuddha yānikānām dāna mayam śīla mayam bhāva nāmyam puṇya kriyā vastu

original: yāni ca śaikṣāny anāsravāṇi kuśalamūlāni,
analyzed: yāni ca śaikṣāni anāsravāṇi kuśala mūlāni

original: yāni cāśaikṣāṇy anāsravāṇi kuśalamūlāni,
analyzed: yāni ca a śaikṣāṇi anāsravāṇi kuśala mūlāni

original: yaś ca teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho vimuktiskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaḥ,
analyzed: yaḥ ca teṣām tathāgatānām śīla skandhaḥ samādhi skandhaḥ prajñā skandhaḥ vimukti skandhaḥ vimukti jñāna darśana skandhaḥ

original: yā ca hitaiṣitā,
analyzed: yā ca hita eṣitā

original: yā ca mahāmaitrī,
analyzed: yā ca mahā maitrī

original: yā ca mahākaruṇā,
analyzed: yā ca mahā karuṇā

original: aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāś ca buddhadharmā,
analyzed: aprameya asaṃkhyeyāḥ ca buddha dharmāḥ

original: yaś ca tair buddhair bhagavadbhir dharmo deśito,
analyzed: yaḥ ca taiḥ buddhaiḥ bhagavadbhiḥ dharmaḥ deśitaḥ

original: ye ca tatra dharmadeśanāyāḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptāḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptā anāgāmiphalaṃ
analyzed: ye ca tatra dharma deśanāyāḥ srotaāpatti phalam prāptāḥ sakṛdāgāmi phalam prāptāḥ anāgāmi phalam

original: prāptā arhattvaṃ prāptāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptā bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāntās teṣāṃ yāni kuśalamūlāni,
analyzed: prāptāḥ arhat tvam prāptāḥ pratyeka bodhim prāptāḥ bodhisattva niyāmam avakrāntāḥ teṣām yāni kuśala mūlāni

original: yaiś ca tatra tathāgateṣv arhatsu vā parinirvṛteṣu vā kuśalamūlāny avaropitāni tat
analyzed: yaiḥ ca tatra tathāgateṣu arhatsu vā parinirvṛteṣu vā kuśala mūlāni avaropitāni tat

original: sarvam abhisaṃkṣipyāgrayā anumodanayā jyeṣṭhayā śreṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā uttamayā
analyzed: sarvam abhisaṃkṣipya agrayā anumodanayā jyeṣṭhayā śreṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā uttamayā

original: anuttamayā asamayā asamasamayā (PSP_2-3:124)
analyzed: anuttamayā asamayā asamasamayā

original: anumodanayā anumodate,
analyzed: anumodanayā anumodate

original: anumodyānumodanāsahagataṃ kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayaty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher āhārakaṃ  #
analyzed: anumodya anumodanā sahagatam kuśala mūlam sarva sattva sādhāraṇam kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ āhārakam

original: bhavatv iti.
analyzed: bhavatu iti

original: yat punar ayaṃ māhāyānika evaṃ tathā cittaṃ pariṇāmayati yair ārambaṇair yair vastubhis tac cittam utpāditam,
analyzed: yat punar ayam māhāyānikaḥ evam tathā cittam pariṇāmayati yaiḥ ārambaṇaiḥ yaiḥ vastubhiḥ tat cittam utpāditam

original: api nu tāni vastūni tāny ārambaṇāni tathā saṃvidyante tathopalabhyante yathā tair mahāyānikaiḥ kulaputrair nimittīkṛtāni?
analyzed: api nu tāni vastūni tāni ārambaṇāni tathā saṃvidyante tathā upalabhyante yathā taiḥ mahāyānikaiḥ kula putraiḥ nimittīkṛtāni

original: maitreya āha:
analyzed: maitreyaḥ āha

original: na tāni bhadanta subhūte vastūni,
analyzed: na tāni bhadanta subhūte vastūni

original: na tāny ārambaṇāni tathopalabhyante yathā tair mahāyānikaiḥ kulaputrair nimittīkṛtyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmitām.
analyzed: na tāni ārambaṇāni tathā upalabhyante yathā taiḥ mahāyānikaiḥ kula putraiḥ nimittīkṛtya anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmitām

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: yadi tāvad asaṃvidyamānair vastubhir asaṃvidyamānair ārambaṇais te buddhā bhagavanto
analyzed: yadi tāvat a saṃvidyamānaiḥ vastubhiḥ a saṃvidyamānaiḥ ārambaṇaiḥ te buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ

original: nimittīkṛtās tadā ye te daśasu dikṣu sarvadiglokadhātuprasareṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante
analyzed: nimittīkṛtāḥ tadā ye te daśasu dikṣu sarva diś lokadhātu prasareṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante

analyzed: yāni ca a śaikṣāṇi anāsravāṇi kuśala mūlāni tāni sarvāṇi abhisaṃkṣipya anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye

analyzed: citta viparyāsaḥ dṛṣṭi viparyāsaḥ bhūt duḥkhe sukham iti

original: anātmīye ātmīyam iti,
analyzed: anātmīye ātmīyam iti

analyzed: aśānte śāntam iti saṃjñā viparyāsaḥ citta viparyāsaḥ dṛṣṭi viparyāsaḥ

analyzed: atha punar kim yathā eva vastu yathā eva ārambaṇam tathā bodhiḥ tathā cittam tathā dāna pāramitā

analyzed: śīla pāramitā kṣānti pāramitā vīrya pāramitā dhyāna pāramitā prajñāpāramitā tathā saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣyā

original: dharmās tathā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
analyzed: dharmāḥ tathā apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattayaḥ

analyzed: tathā aṣṭa vimokṣāḥ tathā nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattayaḥ tathā ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ tathā sarva samādhayaḥ

original: tathā smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgāḥ tathā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayas
analyzed: tathā smṛti upasthāna samyakprahāṇa ṛddhipāda indriya bala bodhyaṅga mārgāḥ tathā apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattayaḥ

analyzed: tathā daśa tathāgata balāni tathā vaiśāradyāni tathā pratisaṃvidaḥ tathā aṣṭādaśā āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ

analyzed: tatra katamat vastu

original: katamad ārambaṇaṃ?
analyzed: katamat ārambaṇam

original: katamā bodhiḥ?
analyzed: katamā bodhiḥ

analyzed: katamat cittam

original: katamāni kuśalamūlāni?
analyzed: katamāni kuśala mūlāni

analyzed: maitreyaḥ āha

analyzed: saced bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvāḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritāḥ abhaviṣyan

analyzed: avaropita kuśala mūlāḥ abhaviṣyan

analyzed: kalyāṇa mitra parigṛhītāḥ abhaviṣyan

analyzed: na te tāni vastūni na tāni ārambaṇāni na tān buddhān bhagavataḥ na tāni kuśala mūlāni

analyzed: na animitta yogena na upalambha yogena na anupalambha yogena na saṃkleśa yogena na vyavadāna yogena

analyzed: na utpāda yogena na nirodha yogena

analyzed: saced punar ete bodhisattvāḥ na ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitāḥ abhaviṣyan

analyzed: na buddha paryupāsitāḥ na avaropita kuśala mūlāḥ na kalyāṇa mitra parigṛhītāḥ na sva lakṣaṇa śūnyeṣu dharmeṣu śikṣitāḥ abhaviṣyan

original: tāni vastūni tāny ārambaṇāni tāni kuśalamūlāni tān anumodanāsahagatāṃś cittotpādān nimittīkṛtyānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayiṣyanti.
analyzed: tāni vastūni tāni ārambaṇāni tāni kuśala mūlāni tān anumodanā sahagatān citta utpādān nimittīkṛtya anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayiṣyanti

analyzed: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya puratas bhāṣitavyā evam dhyāna pāramitā vīrya pāramitā

analyzed: upadiṣṭā nava yāna saṃprasthitasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya puratas bhāṣitavyā

analyzed: vara āpita kuśala mūlaḥ bahu buddha paryupāsita

analyzed: evam ca punar bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anumodanā sahagatam puṇya kriyā vastu

analyzed: cittam kṣīṇam niruddham vigatam viparinatam

analyzed: kim cittena cittam pariṇāmayati

analyzed: na ca yaḥ citta svabhāvaḥ sa śakyaḥ pariṇāmayitum

original: sacet punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ jānīte abhāvaḥ prajñāpāramiteti,

original: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāny abhāvaḥ,
ṣaḍabhijñā abhāvaḥ,
analyzed: ṣaḍabhijñāḥ abhāvaḥ

original: sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāny abhāvo,

analyzed: yadi evam pariṇāmayati pariṇāmitam bhavati anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau

analyzed: katham bhadanta subhūte nava yāna saṃprasthitena kula putreṇa vā kula duhitrā vā tāni

original: kuśalamūlāny. anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmitāni bhavanti. kathaṃ cānumodanāsahagataṃ

analyzed: puṇya kriyā vastu parigṛhya pariṇāmitam bhavati

original: subhūtir āha:

original: sacet maitreya navayānasaṃprasthito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyati,
