analyzed: adhimukti bahulaḥ bhavīṣyati bahirdhā śūnyatāyām adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatāyām yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatāyām

original: adhimuktibahulo bhaviṣyati. apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣv āryasatyeṣv adhimuktibahulo
analyzed: adhimukti bahulaḥ bhaviṣyati a pramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattiṣu ārya satyeṣu adhimukti bahulaḥ

original: bhaviṣyati. aṣṭavimokṣeṣu navānupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣv adhimuktibahulo bhaviṣyati.
analyzed: bhaviṣyati aṣṭa vimokṣeṣu nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattiṣu adhimukti bahulaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣv adhimuktibahulo bhaviṣyati. abhijñāsu sarvasamādhiṣu sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣv
analyzed: śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihiteṣu adhimukti bahulaḥ bhaviṣyati abhijñāsu sarva samādhiṣu sarva dhāraṇī mukheṣu

original: adhimuktibahulo bhaviṣyati. daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu
analyzed: adhimukti bahulaḥ bhaviṣyati daśasu tathāgata baleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu

original: pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣv adhimuktibahulo bhaviṣyati. kalyāṇamitraparigṛhitaś
analyzed: pratisaṃvitsu aṣṭādaśa āveṇikeṣu buddha dharmeṣu adhimukti bahulaḥ bhaviṣyati kalyāṇa mitra parigṛhitaḥ

original: ca bhaviṣyati. tāni cāsya kalyāṇamitrāṇimām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ
analyzed: ca bhaviṣyati tāni ca asya kalyāṇa mitrāṇi imām eva prajñāpāramitām dhyāna pāramitām vīrya pāramitām

original: kṣāntipāramitāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ dānapāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanām upadekṣyanti. tathā
analyzed: kṣānti pāramitām śīla pāramitām dāna pāramitām sa arthām sa vyañjanām upadekṣyanti tathā

original: copadekṣyanti yathā prajñāpāramitayā avirahīto bhaviṣyaty evaṃ sarvābhiḥ pāramitābhir
analyzed: ca upadekṣyanti yathā prajñāpāramitayā avirahītaḥ bhaviṣyati evam sarvābhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ

original: avirahito bhaviṣyati. yāvat sarvaśūnyatābhiḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyair dharmair āryasatyair
analyzed: avirahitaḥ bhaviṣyati yāvat sarva śūnyatābhiḥ saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣyaiḥ dharmaiḥ ārya satyaiḥ

original: apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitair aṣṭābhir vimokṣair navabhir
analyzed: apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattibhiḥ śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihitaiḥ aṣṭābhiḥ vimokṣaiḥ navabhiḥ

original: anupūrvavīhārasamāpattibhiḥ sarvasamādhiḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhair daśabhiḥ tathāgatabalaiś
analyzed: anupūrva vīhāra samāpattibhiḥ sarva samādhiḥ sarva dhāraṇī mukhaiḥ daśabhiḥ tathāgata balaiḥ

original: caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir aṣṭābaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair
analyzed: caturbhiḥ vaiśāradyaiḥ catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ aṣṭābaśabhiḥ āveṇikaiḥ buddha dharmaiḥ

original: avirahito bhaviṣyati. yāvad bodhisattvanyāmam avakrānto bhaviṣyati. mārakarmāṇi copadekṣyanti.
analyzed: avirahitaḥ bhaviṣyati yāvat bodhisattva nyāmam avakrāntaḥ bhaviṣyati māra karmāṇi ca upadekṣyanti

original: tasya tāni mārakarmāṇi śrutvā na hānir na vṛddhir bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: tasya tāni māra karmāṇi śrutvā na hāniḥ na vṛddhiḥ bhaviṣyati tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi teṣāṃ mārakarmaṇāṃ svabhāvo nopadṛśyate. buddhair bhagavadbhir avirahitaḥ
analyzed: tathā hi teṣām māra karmaṇām svabhāvaḥ na upadṛśyate buddhaiḥ bhagavadbhiḥ avirahitaḥ

original: syād yāvan bodhisattvanyāmam avakrānteti. tatra ca kuśalamūlāny avaropayiṣyati. taiś
analyzed: syāt yāvan bodhisattva nyāmam avakrāntā iti tatra ca kuśala mūlāni avaropayiṣyati taiḥ

original: ca kuśalamūlair bodhisattvakulaṃ grahīṣyati. tena ca bodhisattvakulena na jātu virahito
analyzed: ca kuśala mūlaiḥ bodhisattva kulam grahīṣyati tena ca bodhisattva kulena na jātu

original: bhaviṣyati yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddho bhaviṣyati.
analyzed: bhaviṣyati yāvat anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: punar aparaṃ navayānasaṃprasthitena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ
analyzed: punar aparam nava yāna saṃprasthitena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena teṣām buddhānām bhagavatām

original: chinnavartmanāṃ chinnavartmanīnāṃ chinnaprapañcabhavanetrikāṇāṃ paryāttabāṣpāṇāṃ
analyzed: chinna vartmanām chinna vartmanīnām chinna prapañca bhava netrikāṇām paryātta bāṣpāṇām

original: marditakaṇṭakānām apahṛtabhārāṇām anuprāptasvakārthānāṃ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanānāṃ
analyzed: mardita kaṇṭakānām apahṛta bhārāṇām anuprāpta svaka arthānām parikṣīṇa bhava saṃyojanānām

original: samyagājñāsuvimukticittānāṃ sarvacetavaśiparamapāramitāprāptānāṃ,
analyzed: samyak ājñā su vimukti cittānām sarva ceta vaśi parama pāramitā prāptānām

original: ye te daśasu dikṣv aprameyeṣv asaṃkhyeyeṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti
analyzed: ye te daśasu dikṣu aprameyeṣu asaṃkhyeyeṣu tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ tiṣṭhanti

original: dhriyante yāpayanti dharmañ ca deśayanti teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ
analyzed: dhriyante yāpayanti dharmam ca deśayanti teṣām buddhānām bhagavatām sa śrāvaka saṃghānām

original: ye puṇyābhisaṃskārā yair vā tatra kuśalamulāny avaropitāni kṣatriyamahāśālakuleṣu (PSP_2-3:128)
analyzed: ye puṇya abhisaṃskārāḥ yaiḥ vā tatra kuśala mulāni avaropitāni kṣatriya mahāśāla kuleṣu

original: vā brāhmaṇamahāśālakuleṣu vā gṛhapatimahāśālakuleṣu vā cāturmahārājakāyikeṣu vā deveṣu,
analyzed: vā brāhmaṇa mahāśāla kuleṣu vā gṛhapati mahāśāla kuleṣu vā cāturmahārājakāyikeṣu vā deveṣu

original: trāyastriṃśeṣu vā yāmeṣu vā tuṣiteṣu vā nirmāṇaratiṣu vā paranirmitavaśavartiṣu vā deveṣu,
analyzed: trāyastriṃśeṣu vā yāmeṣu vā tuṣiteṣu vā nirmāṇaratiṣu vā paranirmitavaśavartiṣu vā deveṣu

original: brahmapārṣadyeṣu vā brahmapurohiteṣu vā mahābrahmasu vā parīttābheṣu vā apramāṇābheṣu
analyzed: brahma pārṣadyeṣu vā brahmapurohiteṣu vā mahābrahmasu vā parīttābheṣu vā apramāṇābheṣu

original: vā ābhāsvareṣu vā parīttaśubheṣu vā apramāṇaśubheṣu vā śubhakṛtsneṣu vā anabhrakeṣu
analyzed: vā ābhāsvareṣu vā parītta śubheṣu vā apramāṇa śubheṣu vā śubhakṛtsneṣu vā anabhrakeṣu

original: vā puṇyaprasaveṣu vā bṛhatphaleṣu vā suddhāvāseṣu vā avṛheṣu vā atapeṣu vā sudṛśeṣu
analyzed: vā puṇyaprasaveṣu vā bṛhatphaleṣu vā suddhāvāseṣu vā avṛheṣu vā atapeṣu vā sudṛśeṣu

original: vā sudarśaneṣu vā akaniṣṭheṣu vā deveṣu kuśalamūlāny avaropitāni sarvāny abhisaṃkṣipya
analyzed: vā sudarśaneṣu vā akaniṣṭheṣu vā deveṣu kuśala mūlāni avaropitāni sarvāni abhisaṃkṣipya

original: piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā agrayānumodanayā śreṣṭhayā jyeṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā uttamayā
analyzed: piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā agrayā anumodanayā śreṣṭhayā jyeṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā uttamayā

original: anuttamayā anumodanayā anumodetānumodya cānumodanāsahagataṃ kuśalamūlam anuttarāyai
analyzed: anuttamayā anumodanayā anumodeta anumodya ca anumodanā sahagatam kuśala mūlam anuttarāyai

original: samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayitavyam. ity anupalambhapariṇāmaḥ
analyzed: samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayitavyam iti anupalambha pariṇāmaḥ

original: maitreya āha:
analyzed: maitreyaḥ āha

original: saced bhadanta subhūte navayānasaṃprasthito bodhisattvo mahāsattvas teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ
analyzed: saced bhadanta subhūte nava yāna saṃprasthitaḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ teṣām buddhānām

original: bhagavatāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ sarvakuśalamūlāni samanvāhṛtyāgrayā anumodanayā anumodate
analyzed: bhagavatām sa śrāvaka saṃghānām sarva kuśala mūlāni samanvāhṛtya agrayā anumodanayā anumodate

original: anumodya ca yāvad anuttamayā anumodanayā anumodyānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati.
analyzed: anumodya ca yāvat anuttamayā anumodanayā anumodya anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati

original: kathaṃ na bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃjñāviparyāso bhavati,
analyzed: katham na bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃjñā viparyāsaḥ bhavati

original: na citta viparyāso bhavati,
analyzed: na citta viparyāsaḥ bhavati

original: na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati?
analyzed: na dṛṣṭi viparyāsaḥ bhavati

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: sacet maitreya bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tān buddhān bhagavataḥ saśrāvakasaṃghān samanvāharati,
analyzed: saced maitreya bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ tān buddhān bhagavataḥ sa śrāvaka saṃghān samanvāharati

original: tatra na buddhasaṃjñī na śrāvakasaṃjñī bhavati,
analyzed: tatra na buddha saṃjñī na śrāvaka saṃjñī bhavati

original: na kuśalamūlasaṃjñī bhavati. yenāpi cittena pariṇāmayati tatrāpi cittena cittasaṃjñī bhavaty,
analyzed: na kuśala mūla saṃjñī bhavati yena api cittena pariṇāmayati tatra api cittena citta saṃjñī bhavati

original: evaṃ pariṇāmayato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso bhavati,
analyzed: evam pariṇāmayataḥ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃjñā viparyāsaḥ bhavati

original: na cittaviparyāso bhavati,
analyzed: na citta viparyāsaḥ bhavati

original: na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati.
analyzed: na dṛṣṭi viparyāsaḥ bhavati

original: saced bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tān buddhān bhagavatas tāni ca kuśalamūlān samanvāhṛtya
analyzed: saced bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ tān buddhān bhagavataḥ tāni ca kuśala mūlān samanvāhṛtya

original: nimittīkaroti nimittīkṛtyānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayaty evaṃ pariṇāmayataḥ
analyzed: nimittīkaroti nimittīkṛtya anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati evam pariṇāmayataḥ

original: saṃjñāviparyāsaś cittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati.
analyzed: saṃjñā viparyāsaḥ citta viparyāsaḥ dṛṣṭi viparyāsaḥ bhavati

original: sacet punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tān buddhān bhagavatas tāni ca kuśalamūlāni yena
analyzed: saced punar bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ tān buddhān bhagavataḥ tāni ca kuśala mūlāni yena

original: ca cittena samanvāharati tāni tathaiva kṣīṇāni kṣīṇānīty evaṃ prajānāti. yac ca kṣīṇan
analyzed: ca cittena samanvāharati tāni tathā eva kṣīṇāni kṣīṇāni iti evam prajānāti yat ca kṣīṇan

original: na tac chakyaṃ pariṇamayitum. yenāpi cittena pariṇāmayati (PSP_2-3:129)
analyzed: na tat śakyam pariṇamayitum yena api cittena pariṇāmayati

original: tasyāpi cittasya saiva dharmatā. yatrāpi pariṇāmayati tasyāpi saiva dharmatā.
analyzed: tasya api cittasya sā eva dharma tā yatra api pariṇāmayati tasya api sā eva dharma tā

original: saced evaṃ pariṇāmayati samena pariṇāmayati na viṣamena,
analyzed: saced evam pariṇāmayati samena pariṇāmayati na viṣamena

original: na ca mithyā pariṇāmayati,
analyzed: na ca mithyā pariṇāmayati

original: evaṃ pariṇāmayitavyaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena.
analyzed: evam pariṇāmayitavyam bodhisattvena mahāsattvena

original: saced bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yāvat
analyzed: saced bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ tīta anāgata pratyutpannānām buddhānām bhagavatām yāvat

original: prathamacittotpādam upādāya parinirvāṇaṃ yāvad ca saddharmāntardhānaṃ tac chrāvakāṇāṃ
analyzed: prathama citta utpādam upādāya parinirvāṇam yāvat ca saddharma antardhānam tat śrāvakāṇām

original: pratyekabuddhānāṃ ca yāvad yaiś ca tatra pṛthagjanaiḥ kuśalamūlāny avaropitāni,
analyzed: pratyekabuddhānām ca yāvat yaiḥ ca tatra pṛthagjanaiḥ kuśala mūlāni avaropitāni

original: yā ca dharmadeśanā śrutā śrutvā ca yaiś ca tatra devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragaiḥ kuśalamūlāny avaropitāni,
analyzed: yā ca dharma deśanā śrutā śrutvā ca yaiḥ ca tatra deva nāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa kiṃnara mahoragaiḥ kuśala mūlāni avaropitāni

original: kuśatriyamahāśālakulair vā brāhmaṇamahāśālakulair vā gṛhapatimahāśalakulair vā cāturmahārājakāyikair
analyzed: ku śatriya mahā śāla kulaiḥ vā brāhmaṇa mahā śāla kulaiḥ vā gṛhapati mahā śala kulaiḥ vā cāturmahārājakāyikaiḥ

original: vā devair yāvac chuddhāvāsakāyikair vā devaiḥ saddharmaḥ śrutaḥ kuśalamūlāny avaropitāni,
analyzed: vā devaiḥ yāvat śuddhāvāsa kāyikaiḥ vā devaiḥ saddharmaḥ śrutaḥ kuśala mūlāni avaropitāni

original: cittaṃ cotpāditam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tat sarvam abhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā
analyzed: cittam ca utpāditam anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau tat sarvam abhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā

original: tulayitvāgrayānumodanayānumodate jyeṣṭhayā śreṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇitayā uttamayā
analyzed: tulayitvā agrayā anumodanayā anumodate jyeṣṭhayā śreṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇitayā uttamayā

original: anuttamayā asamayā asamasamayā anumodanayā anumodate anumodya tat sarvam anuttarāyāṃ
analyzed: anuttamayā asamayā asamasamayā anumodanayā anumodate anumodya tat sarvam anuttarāyām

original: samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati.
analyzed: samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati

original: sacet punar evaṃ saṃjānīte kṣīṇās te dharmā niruddhā vigatā vipariṇatā so 'pi dharmasvabhāvena
analyzed: saced punar evam saṃjānīte kṣīṇāḥ te dharmāḥ niruddhāḥ vigatāḥ vipariṇatā dharma svabhāvena

original: śūnyo yatrāpi pariṇāmayati. saced evaṃ pariṇāmayati pariṇāmitaṃ bhavaty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
analyzed: śūnyaḥ yatra api pariṇāmayati saced evam pariṇāmayati pariṇāmitam bhavati anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau

original: sacet punar evaṃ saṃjānīte na ca dharmādharmān pariṇāmayanti. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: saced punar evam saṃjānīte na ca dharma adharmān pariṇāmayanti tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi svabhāvaśūnyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ.
analyzed: tathā hi svabhāva śūnyāḥ sarva dharmāḥ

original: saced evaṃ pariṇāmayati pariṇāmitaṃ bhavaty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. evaṃ hi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ,
analyzed: saced evam pariṇāmayati pariṇāmitam bhavati anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau evam hi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyām carataḥ

original: evaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ carato na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso  #
analyzed: evam dhyāna pāramitāyām vīrya pāramitāyām kṣānti pāramitāyām śīla pāramitāyām dāna pāramitāyām carataḥ na saṃjñā viparyāsaḥ na citta viparyāsaḥ na dṛṣṭi viparyāsaḥ

original: bhavati. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: bhavati tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tāṃ pariṇāmanāṃ nābhiniviśate,
analyzed: tathā hi bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ tām pariṇāmanām na abhiniviśate

original: tāni kuśalamūlāni tadbodhicittaṃ ca na samanupaśyati yatrābhiniveśeta,
analyzed: tāni kuśala mūlāni tat bodhi cittam ca na samanupaśyati yatra abhiniveśeta

original: idaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānuttaraṃ pariṇāmanam. ity aviparyastalakṣaṇapariṇāmaḥ
analyzed: idam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anuttaram pariṇāmanam iti aviparyasta lakṣaṇa pariṇāmaḥ

original: sacet punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ puṇyakriyāvastv abhisaṃskāraṃ viviktaṃ saṃjānīte skandhadhātvāyatanaiḥ,
analyzed: saced punar bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ tam puṇya kriyā vastu abhisaṃskāram viviktam saṃjānīte skandha dhātu āyatanaiḥ

original: prajñāpāramitayā viviktaṃ saṃjānīte. evaṃ dhyānapāramitayā vīryapāramitayā kṣāntipāramitayā śīlapāramitayā (PSP_2-3:130)
analyzed: prajñāpāramitayā viviktam saṃjānīte evam dhyāna pāramitayā vīrya pāramitayā kṣānti pāramitayā śīla pāramitayā

original: dānapāramitayā viviktaṃ saṃjānīte. adhyātmaśūnyatayā viviktaṃ saṃjānīte yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā
analyzed: dāna pāramitayā viviktam saṃjānīte adhyātma śūnyatayā viviktam saṃjānīte yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatayā

original: viviktaṃ saṃjānīte. saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣair dharmair viviktaṃ saṃjānīte. daśabhir
analyzed: viviktam saṃjānīte saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣaiḥ dharmaiḥ viviktam saṃjānīte daśabhiḥ

original: balaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair
analyzed: balaiḥ caturbhiḥ vaiśāradyaiḥ catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ aṣṭādaśabhiḥ āveṇikaiḥ buddha dharmaiḥ

original: viviktaṃ saṃjānīte. evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena puṇyakriyāvastv abhisaṃskāraḥ
analyzed: viviktam saṃjānīte evam bodhisattvena mahāsattvena puṇya kriyā vastu abhisaṃskāraḥ

original: pariṇāmito bhavaty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
analyzed: pariṇāmitaḥ bhavati anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau

original: sacet punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'numodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu svabhāvena viviktaṃ saṃjānīte,
analyzed: saced punar bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ numodanā sahagatam puṇya kriyā vastu svabhāvena viviktam saṃjānīte

original: viviktās te buddhā bhagavanto buddhasvabhāvena,
analyzed: viviktāḥ te buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ buddha svabhāvena

original: kuśalamūlāny api kuśalamūlasvabhāvena viviktāni,
analyzed: kuśala mūlāni api kuśala mūla svabhāvena viviktāni

original: abhisaṃskārā abhisaṃskārasvabhāvena viviktāḥ,
analyzed: abhisaṃskārāḥ abhisaṃskāra svabhāvena viviktāḥ

original: bodhicittaṃ bodhicittasvabhāvena viviktaṃ,
analyzed: bodhi cittam bodhi citta svabhāvena viviktam

original: pariṇāmanācittaṃ pariṇāmanācittasvabhāvena viviktaṃ,
analyzed: pariṇāmanā cittam pariṇāmanā citta svabhāvena viviktam

original: bodhir api bodhisvabhāvena viviktā,
analyzed: bodhiḥ api bodhi svabhāvena viviktā

original: prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvena viviktā,
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitā svabhāvena viviktā

original: dhyānapāramitā dhyānapāramitāsvabhāvena viviktā,
analyzed: dhyāna pāramitā dhyāna pāramitā svabhāvena viviktā

original: vīryapāramitā vīryapāramitāsvabhāvena viviktā,
analyzed: vīrya pāramitā vīrya pāramitā svabhāvena viviktā

original: kṣāntipāramitā kṣāntipāramitāsvabhāvena viviktā,
analyzed: kṣānti pāramitā kṣānti pāramitā svabhāvena viviktā

original: śīlapāramitā śīlapāramitāsvabhāvena viviktā,
analyzed: śīla pāramitā śīla pāramitā svabhāvena viviktā

original: dānapāramitā dānapāramitāsvabhāvena viviktā,
analyzed: dāna pāramitā dāna pāramitā svabhāvena viviktā

original: adhyātmaśūnyatā adhyātmaśūnyatāsvabhāvena viviktā,
analyzed: adhyātma śūnyatā adhyātma śūnyatā svabhāvena viviktā

original: bahirdhāśūnyatā bhirdhāśūnyatāsvabhāvena viviktā,
analyzed: bahirdhā śūnyatā bhirdhā śūnyatā svabhāvena viviktā

original: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāsvabhāvena viviktā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvena viviktā,
analyzed: adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā svabhāvena viviktā yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā svabhāvena viviktā

original: evaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ catvāry āryasatyāny apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattavo
analyzed: evam saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣyāḥ dharmāḥ catvāri ārya satyāni

original: 'ṣṭavimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni ṣaḍabhijñāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ
analyzed: ṣṭa vimokṣāḥ nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattayaḥ śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihitāni ṣaṣ abhijñāḥ sarva samādhayaḥ

original: sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvido,
analyzed: sarva dhāraṇī mukhāni daśa bala vaiśāradya pratisaṃvidaḥ

original: 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā buddhadharmasvabhāvena viviktāḥ. evaṃ hi bodhisattvena
analyzed: ṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ buddha dharma svabhāvena viviktāḥ evam hi bodhisattvena

original: mahāsattvena viviktāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
analyzed: mahāsattvena viviktāyām prajñāpāramitāyām caritavyam iyam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya

original: prajñāpāramitā. iti viviktapariṇāmaḥ.
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā iti vivikta pariṇāmaḥ

original: punar aparaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yat kuśalamūlaṃ
analyzed: punar aparam bodhisattvena mahāsattvena teṣām buddhānām bhagavatām yat kuśala mūlam

original: tat sarvam anusmaratā evaṃ pariṇāmayitavyaṃ yādṛśa eva sa pariṇāmas tādṛśam eva tac
analyzed: tat sarvam anusmaratā evam pariṇāmayitavyam yādṛśaḥ eva sa pariṇāmaḥ tādṛśam eva tat

original: cittaṃ yena pariṇāmayati tajjātikaṃ tatsvabhāvam.
analyzed: cittam yena pariṇāmayati tad jātikam tad svabhāvam

original: saced evaṃ saṃjānīte pariṇāmitaṃ bhavaty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
analyzed: saced evam saṃjānīte pariṇāmitam bhavati anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau

original: evaṃ pariṇāmayato na saṃjñāviparyāso bhavati na cittaviparyāso bhavati na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati.
analyzed: evam pariṇāmayataḥ na saṃjñā viparyāsaḥ bhavati na citta viparyāsaḥ bhavati na dṛṣṭi viparyāsaḥ bhavati

original: sacet punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prañāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittayogena (PSP_2-3:131)
analyzed: saced punar bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prañāpāramitāyām caran nimitta yogena

original: teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tāni kuśalamūlāni saṃjānīte,
analyzed: teṣām buddhānām bhagavatām tāni kuśala mūlāni saṃjānīte

original: na pariṇāmayaty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
analyzed: na pariṇāmayati anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau

original: ye cātītā buddhā bhagavantaḥ parinirvṛtā animittā aviṣayāḥ.
analyzed: ye ca atītāḥ buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ parinirvṛtāḥ animittāḥ aviṣayāḥ

original: saced evam api samanvāharati nimittīkaroti,
analyzed: saced evam api samanvāharati nimittīkaroti

original: na pariṇāmayati tāni kuśalamūlāny anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
analyzed: na pariṇāmayati tāni kuśala mūlāni anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau

original: evaṃ cāsya saṃjñāviparyāso bhavati cittaviparyāso bhavati dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati.
analyzed: evam ca asya saṃjñā viparyāsaḥ bhavati citta viparyāsaḥ bhavati dṛṣṭi viparyāsaḥ bhavati

original: sacet tān buddhān bhagavatas tāni kuśalamulāni tāṃś cābhisaṃskārāṃs tāṃś cittotpādān saṃjānīte na nimittīkaroti,
analyzed: saced tān buddhān bhagavataḥ tāni kuśala mulāni tān ca abhisaṃskārān tān citta utpādān saṃjānīte na nimittīkaroti

original: pariṇāmitāni tāni kuśalamūlāny anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye bhavati. evaṃ ca bodhisattvasya
analyzed: pariṇāmitāni tāni kuśala mūlāni anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye bhavati evam ca bodhisattvasya

original: mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso bhavati na cittaviparyāso bhavati na dṛṣṭiviparyāso
analyzed: mahāsattvasya na saṃjñā viparyāsaḥ bhavati na citta viparyāsaḥ bhavati na dṛṣṭi viparyāsaḥ

original: bhavati. iti buddhakuśalamulajātīyasvabhāvānusmṛtipariṇāmaḥ
analyzed: bhavati iti buddha kuśala mula jātīya svabhāva anusmṛti pariṇāmaḥ

original: maitreya āha:
analyzed: maitreyaḥ āha

original: kathaṃ bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na nimittīkaroti pariṇāmayati ca?
analyzed: katham bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ na nimittīkaroti pariṇāmayati ca

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: atra hi tāni bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām upāyakauśalāni śikṣitavyām. ata eva ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyām  #
analyzed: atra hi tāni bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām upāya kauśalāni śikṣitavyām atas eva ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyām

original: upāyakauśalaṃ veditavyaṃ,
analyzed: upāya kauśalam veditavyam

original: na ca prajñāpāramitām anāgamya śakyaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu pariṇāmayitum.
analyzed: na ca prajñāpāramitām an āgamya śakyam puṇya kriyā vastu pariṇāmayitum

original: maitreya āha:
analyzed: maitreyaḥ āha

original: mā haivāsya syād bhadanta subhūte vacanīyam. na te buddhā bhagavantaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṃvidyante. nāpi tāni kuśalamūlāni,
analyzed: mā ha eva asya syāt bhadanta subhūte vacanīyam na te buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām saṃvidyante na api tāni kuśala mūlāni

original: nāpi te 'bhisaṃskārā,
analyzed: na api te bhisaṃskārā

original: nāpi te cittotpādā yāvan nānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati.
analyzed: na api te citta utpādāḥ yāvat na anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evaṃ vyupaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
analyzed: tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām caratā evam vyupaparīkṣitavyam

original: niruddhās te ātmabhāvā tāni ca kuśalamūlāni te cābhisaṃskārās te ca cittotpādāḥ.
analyzed: niruddhāḥ te ātma bhāvā tāni ca kuśala mūlāni te ca abhisaṃskārāḥ te ca citta utpādāḥ

original: atha ca punar nimittīkṛtya vikalpyante te buddhā bhagavantas tāni ca kuśalamūlāni
analyzed: atha ca punar nimittīkṛtya vikalpyante te buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ tāni ca kuśala mūlāni

original: te cābhisaṃskārās te ca cittotpādā nimittīkṛtya vikalpyante. na ca tathāgatā arhantaḥ
analyzed: te ca abhisaṃskārāḥ te ca citta utpādāḥ nimittīkṛtya vikalpyante na ca tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ

original: samyaksaṃbuddhā evaṃ nimittayogena pariṇāmayato 'numodanām abhyanujānanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ evam nimitta yogena pariṇāmayataḥ numodanām abhyanujānanti tat kasya hetoḥ

original: eṣa evāsya mahān upalambho yat parinirvṛtān buddhān bhagavato nimittīkaroti vikalpayati
analyzed: eṣaḥ eva asya mahān upalambhaḥ yat parinirvṛtān buddhān bhagavataḥ nimittīkaroti vikalpayati

original: copalabhate tasmād bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmayitukāmena na
analyzed: ca upalabhate tasmāt bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kuśala mūlāni pariṇāmayitu kāmena na

original: copalabhya nimittīkṛtya pariṇāmayitavyāni. na copalambhasaṃjñino na nimittasaṃjñinas,
analyzed: ca upalabhya nimittīkṛtya pariṇāmayitavyāni na ca upalambha saṃjñinaḥ na nimitta saṃjñinaḥ

original: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ pariṇāmatāṃ maharddhikām iti vadanti. tat hasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ pariṇāma tām maharddhikām iti vadanti tat hasya hetoḥ

original: saviṣaḥ saśalya eṣa pariṇāmaḥ.
analyzed: sa viṣaḥ sa śalyaḥ eṣa pariṇāmaḥ

original: ity upāyakauśalapariṇāmaḥ
analyzed: iti upāya kauśala pariṇāmaḥ

original: tadyathāpi nāma praṇītabhojanaṃ viṣasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ varṇena gandhena copetaṃ tad eva bālajātīyaḥ puruṣaḥ paribhoktavyaṃ manyeta,
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma praṇīta bhojanam viṣa saṃsṛṣṭam varṇena gandhena ca upetam tat eva bāla jātīyaḥ puruṣaḥ paribhoktavyam manyeta

original: tasya tat paribhuñjānasya varṇato 'pi gandhato 'pi roceta,
analyzed: tasya tat paribhuñjānasya varṇataḥ pi gandhataḥ pi roceta

original: pariṇāme ca duṣkhavipākaṃ syāt. evam eva ihaikatyā durgṛhītena durupalakṣitena duḥsvādhyātena cārtham ajānanto 'budhyamānā evam upadekṣyanti,
analyzed: pariṇāme ca duṣkha vipākam syāt evam eva iha ekatyāḥ durgṛhītena durupalakṣitena duḥsvādhyātena ca artham a jānantaḥ budhyamānāḥ evam upadekṣyanti

original: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prathamacittotpādam
analyzed: ehi tvam kula putra atīta anāgata pratyutpannānām buddhānām bhagavatām prathama citta utpādam

original: upādāya yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhānāṃ yāvac ca nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau
analyzed: upādāya yāvat anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhānām yāvat ca nirupadhi śeṣe nirvāṇa dhātau

original: parinirvṛtānāṃ yāvac ca saddharmāṇāṃ antarhitaḥ,
analyzed: parinirvṛtānām yāvat ca saddharmāṇām antarhitaḥ

original: yāny etasmin antare prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caradbhiḥ kuśalamūlāny abhisaṃskṛtāni,
analyzed: yāni etasmin antare prajñāpāramitāyām caradbhiḥ kuśala mūlāni abhisaṃskṛtāni

original: evaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ
analyzed: evam dhyāna pāramitāyām vīrya pāramitāyām kṣānti pāramitāyām śīla pāramitāyām dāna pāramitāyām

original: caradbhiḥ kuśālamūlāny abhisaṃskṛtāni. yāni ca caturdhyānapratisaṃyuktāni caturapramāṇapratisaṃyuktāni
analyzed: caradbhiḥ kuśāla mūlāni abhisaṃskṛtāni yāni ca catur dhyāna pratisaṃyuktāni catur apramāṇa pratisaṃyuktāni

original: caturārūpyasamāpattipratisaṃyuktāni saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyadharma pratisaṃyuktāni
analyzed: catur ārūpya samāpatti pratisaṃyuktāni saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣya dharma pratisaṃyuktāni

original: catur āryasatya pratisaṃyuktāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitapratisaṃyuktāny aṣṭavimokṣa
analyzed: catuḥ ārya satya pratisaṃyuktāni śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita pratisaṃyuktāni aṣṭa vimokṣa

original: navānupūrvavihārasamāpattipratisaṃyuktāny abhijñāpratisaṃyuktāni sarvaśūnyatādhāraṇīmukhapratisaṃyuktāni
analyzed: nava anupūrva vihāra samāpatti pratisaṃyuktāni abhijñā pratisaṃyuktāni sarva śūnyatā dhāraṇī mukha pratisaṃyuktāni

original: daśatathāgatabalapratisaṃyuktāni caturvaiśāradyapratisaṃyuktāni,
analyzed: daśa tathāgata bala pratisaṃyuktāni catur vaiśāradya pratisaṃyuktāni

original: catuḥpratisaṃvitpratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlāny abhisaṃskṛtāni,
analyzed: catur pratisaṃvid pratisaṃyuktāni kuśala mūlāni abhisaṃskṛtāni

original: aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmapratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlāny abhisaṃskṛtāni,
analyzed: aṣṭādaśa āveṇika buddha dharma pratisaṃyuktāni kuśala mūlāni abhisaṃskṛtāni

original: yaiś ca kuśalamūlābhisaṃskārair buddhakṣetrāni pariśodhitāni sattvāś ca paripācitāḥ,
analyzed: yaiḥ ca kuśala mūla abhisaṃskāraiḥ buddhakṣetrāni pariśodhitāni sattvāḥ ca paripācitāḥ

original: yaś ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho vimuktiskandho
analyzed: yaḥ ca teṣām buddhānām bhagavatām śīla skandhaḥ samādhi skandhaḥ prajñā skandhaḥ vimukti skandhaḥ

original: vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaḥ sarvākārajñatājñānam asaṃpramuṣitadharmatājñānaṃ sadopekṣāvihāritā
analyzed: vimukti jñāna darśana skandhaḥ sarva ākāra jña tā jñānam asaṃpramuṣita dharmatā jñānam sadā upekṣāvihāri tā

original: teṣāṃ ca śrāvakāṇāṃ,
analyzed: teṣām ca śrāvakāṇām

original: yaiś ca tatra kuśalamūlāny abhisaṃskṛtāni,
analyzed: yaiḥ ca tatra kuśala mūlāni abhisaṃskṛtāni

original: ye ca pratyekabuddhatve vyākṛtā,
analyzed: ye ca pratyekabuddha tve vyākṛtā

original: yaiś ca tatra devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragaiḥ kuśalamūlāny abhisaṃskṛtāni
analyzed: yaiḥ ca tatra deva nāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa kiṃnara mahoragaiḥ kuśala mūlāni abhisaṃskṛtāni

original: tāni sarvāny abhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati.
analyzed: tāni sarvāni abhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati

original: evaṃ hi pariṇāmo nimittayogenopalambhayogena ca pariṇāmito viṣatvāya kalpayate. tadyathāpi
analyzed: evam hi pariṇāmaḥ nimitta yogena upalambha yogena ca pariṇāmitaḥ viṣa tvāya kalpayate tat yathā api

original: nāma tat saviṣaṃ bhojanaṃ nāsty upalambhasaṃjñinaḥ pariṇāmaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: nāma tat sa viṣam bhojanam na asti upalambha saṃjñinaḥ pariṇāmaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: saviṣo hy upalambhaḥ sanimittaḥ sahetukaḥ sapratyayo ya evaṃ pariṇāmayati tena tathāgato
analyzed: sa viṣaḥ hi upalambhaḥ sa nimittaḥ sa hetukaḥ sa pratyayaḥ yaḥ evam pariṇāmayati tena tathāgataḥ

original: 'bhyākhyāto bhavati. na ca sa tathāgatasyoktavādī bhavati na ca dharmavādī. tatra
analyzed: bhyākhyātaḥ bhavati na ca sa tathāgatasya ukta vādī bhavati na ca dharma vādī tatra

original: bodhisattvayānikaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitrbhiś ca naivaṃ śikṣitavyam.
analyzed: bodhisattva yānikaiḥ kula putraiḥ kula duhitrbhiḥ ca na evam śikṣitavyam

original: ity animittapariṇāmaḥ
analyzed: iti animitta pariṇāmaḥ

original: maitreya āha:
analyzed: maitreyaḥ āha

original: kathaṃ punar atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ kuśalamūlāny anumodya pariṇāmayitavyāni?
analyzed: katham punar atīta anāgata pratyutpannānām buddhānām bhagavatām kuśala mūlāni anumodya pariṇāmayitavyāni

original: prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhānāṃ yāvad
analyzed: prathama citta utpādam upādāya yāvat anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhānām yāvat

original: anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtānāṃ yāvac ca saddharmasthitiḥ saśrāvakasaṃghānām
analyzed: an upadhi śeṣe nirvāṇa dhātau parinirvṛtānām yāvat ca saddharma sthitiḥ sa śrāvaka saṃghānām

original: etasminn antare yāni prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā kuśalamūlāny abhisaṃskṛtāni yāvat sarvajñatā
analyzed: etasmin antare yāni prajñāpāramitāyām caratā kuśala mūlāni abhisaṃskṛtāni yāvat sarvajña tā

original: prāptā yāvad yaiś ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyaiḥ
analyzed: prāptāḥ yāvat yaiḥ ca deva nāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa kiṃnara mahoraga manuṣya amanuṣyaiḥ

original: kuśalamūlāny avaropitāni?
analyzed: kuśala mūlāni avaropitāni

original: kathaṃ cānumodya pariṇāmayitavyāni?
analyzed: katham ca anumodya pariṇāmayitavyāni

original: kathaṃ ca pariṇāmayatas tāni kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmitāni bhavanty anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye?
analyzed: katham ca pariṇāmayataḥ tāni kuśala mūlāni pariṇāmitāni bhavanti anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye

original: subhūtir aha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ aha

original: iha mahāyānikena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā tathāgatam anabhyākhyātukāmena,
analyzed: iha mahāyānikena kula putreṇa vā kula duhitrā vā prajñāpāramitāyām caratā tathāgatam an abhyākhyātu kāmena

original: evaṃ pariṇāmayitavyaṃ yathā te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā jānanti niruttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye.
analyzed: evam pariṇāmayitavyam yathā te tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ jānanti niruttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: iha mahāyānikena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā tathāgatam anabhyākhyātukāmena,
analyzed: iha mahāyānikena kula putreṇa vā kula duhitrā vā prajñāpāramitāyām caratā tathāgatam an abhyākhyātu kāmena

original: evaṃ pariṇāmayitavyaṃ yathā te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā jānanti niruttareṇa buddhajñānena,
analyzed: evam pariṇāmayitavyam yathā te tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ jānanti niruttareṇa buddha jñānena

original: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni yajjātikāni yatsvabhāvāni yallakṣaṇāni yayā dharmatayā saṃvidyante.
analyzed: tāni ca kuśala mūlāni yad jātikāni yad svabhāvāni yad lakṣaṇāni yayā dharmatayā saṃvidyante

original: tathāham apy anumode yathā te buddhā bhagavanto jānanti tathāham api pariṇāmayāmy
analyzed: tathā aham api anumode yathā te buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ jānanti tathā aham api pariṇāmayāmi

original: anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye. evaṃ mahāyānikena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tāni
analyzed: anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye evam mahāyānikena kula putreṇa vā kula duhitrā vā tāni

original: kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmayitavyāny anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye.
analyzed: kuśala mūlāni pariṇāmayitavyāni anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye

original: evaṃ ca pariṇāmayitukāmena pariṇāmayitavyaṃ yathā te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā jānanti niruttareṇa buddhajñānena,
analyzed: evam ca pariṇāmayitu kāmena pariṇāmayitavyam yathā te tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ jānanti niruttareṇa buddha jñānena

original: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni yajjātikāni yatsvabhāvāni yallakṣaṇāni yayā dharmatayā saṃvidyante.
analyzed: tāni ca kuśala mūlāni yad jātikāni yad svabhāvāni yad lakṣaṇāni yayā dharmatayā saṃvidyante

original: tathāham apy anumode yathā te buddhā bhagavanto jānanti tathāham api pariṇāmayāmy
analyzed: tathā aham api anumode yathā te buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ jānanti tathā aham api pariṇāmayāmi

original: anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye. evaṃ mahāyānikena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tāni
analyzed: anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye evam mahāyānikena kula putreṇa vā kula duhitrā vā tāni

original: kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmayitavyāny anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye. evaṃ ca pariṇāmayaṃs
analyzed: kuśala mūlāni pariṇāmayitavyāni anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye evam ca pariṇāmayan

original: tathāgatān nābhyācaṣṭe uktavādī ca bhavati. tathāgatasya dharmavādī,
analyzed: tathāgatān na abhyācaṣṭe ukta vādī ca bhavati tathāgatasya dharma vādī

original: caivaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariṇāmo nirviṣo bhavati.
analyzed: ca evam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariṇāmaḥ nirviṣaḥ bhavati

original: iti buddhānujñātapariṇāmaḥ
analyzed: iti buddha anujñāta pariṇāmaḥ

original: punar aparaṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ (PSP_2-3:134)
analyzed: punar aparam mahāyāna saṃprasthitena kula putreṇa vā kula duhitrā vā prajñāpāramitāyām

original: carataivaṃ tāni kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmayitavyāni,
analyzed: caratā evam tāni kuśala mūlāni pariṇāmayitavyāni

original: yathā rūpam aparyāpannaṃ kāmadhātuṃ rūpadhātum ārūpyadhātum,
analyzed: yathā rūpam a paryāpannam kāmadhātum rūpadhātum ārūpya dhātum

original: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānam aparyāpannaṃ kāmadhātuṃ rūpadhātum ārūpyadhātum,
analyzed: evam vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānam a paryāpannam kāmadhātum rūpadhātum ārūpya dhātum

original: evaṃ dhātava āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādaḥ prajñāpāramitāpy aparyāpannā kāmadhātuṃ rūpadhātum ārūpyadhātum,
analyzed: evam dhātavaḥ āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādaḥ prajñāpāramitā api a paryāpannā kāmadhātum rūpadhātum ārūpya dhātum

original: evaṃ dhyānapāramitā vīryapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā śīlapāramitā dānapāramitāpy aparyāpannā kāmadhātuṃ rūpadhātum ārūpyadhātuṃ,
analyzed: evam dhyāna pāramitā vīrya pāramitā kṣānti pāramitā śīla pāramitā dāna pāramitā api a paryāpannā kāmadhātum rūpadhātum ārūpya dhātum

original: yā cāparyāpannā na sātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā,
analyzed: yā ca a paryāpannā na sā atītā na anāgatā na pratyutpannā

original: evam adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā aparyāpannā kāmarūpārūpyadhātum,
analyzed: evam adhyātma śūnyatā bahirdhā śūnyatā adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā a paryāpannā kāmarūpa ārūpya dhātum

original: apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattaya āryasatyāny aparyāpannāni kāmarūpārūpyadhātum,
analyzed: apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattayaḥ ārya satyāni a paryāpannāni kāmarūpa ārūpya dhātum

original: aṣṭavimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo 'paryāpannāḥ kāmarūpārūpyadhātuṃ,
analyzed: aṣṭa vimokṣāḥ nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattayaḥ paryāpannāḥ kāmarūpa ārūpya dhātum

original: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni ṣaḍabhijāā aparyāpannāḥ kāmarūpārūpyadhātuṃ,
analyzed: śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihitāni ṣaṭ abhijāāḥ a paryāpannāḥ kāmarūpa ārūpya dhātum

original: sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāny aparyāpannāni kāmarūpārūpyadhātuṃ,
analyzed: sarva samādhayaḥ sarva dhāraṇī mukhāni a paryāpannāni kāmarūpa ārūpya dhātum

original: daśabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā aparyāpannāḥ kāmarūpārūpyadhātum,
analyzed: daśa balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ ṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ a paryāpannāḥ kāmarūpa ārūpya dhātum

original: evaṃ tathatā avitathatā anayatathatā dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmaniyāmatā dharmasthititā bhūtakoṭir acintyadhātur aparyāpannaḥ kāmarūpārūpyadhātuṃ,
analyzed: evam tathatā avitatha tā anaya tathatā dharmatā dharmadhātuḥ dharma niyāma tā dharma sthiti tā bhūtakoṭiḥ acintya dhātuḥ a paryāpannaḥ kāmarūpa ārūpya dhātum

original: śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanāni sarvākārajñatā asaṃpramuṣitadharmatā sadā copekṣāvihāritā aparyāpannā kāmarūpārūpyadhātuṃ,
analyzed: śīla samādhi prajñā vimukti vimukti jñāna darśanāni sarva ākāra jña tā a saṃpramuṣita dharma tā sadā ca upekṣāvihāri tā a paryāpannā kāmarūpa ārūpya dhātum

original: yac cāparyāpannaṃ tan nātītaṃ nānāgataṃ na pratyutpannaṃ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: yat ca a paryāpannam tat na atītam na anāgatam na pratyutpannam tat kasya hetoḥ

original: yathaiva tad aparyāpannam evaṃ pariṇāmo 'py aparyāpanno,
analyzed: yathā eva tat a paryāpannam evam pariṇāmaḥ pi a paryāpannaḥ

original: yatrāpi dharme pariṇāmayati te 'pi dharmā aparyāpannā,
analyzed: yatra api dharme pariṇāmayati te pi dharmāḥ a paryāpannā

original: yo 'pi pariṇāmayati so 'py aparyāpannas,
analyzed: yaḥ pi pariṇāmayati saḥ pi a paryāpannaḥ

original: te 'pi buddhā bhagavanto 'paryāpannāḥ kāmarūpārūpyadhātuṃ,
analyzed: te pi buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ paryāpannāḥ kāmarūpa ārūpya dhātum

original: tāny api kuśalamūlāny aparyāpannāni kāmarūpārūpyadhātuṃ,
analyzed: tāni api kuśala mūlāni a paryāpannāni kāmarūpa ārūpya dhātum

original: te 'pi śrāvakapratyekabuddhā aparyāpannāḥ kāmarūpārūpya dhātuṃ,
analyzed: te pi śrāvaka pratyekabuddhāḥ a paryāpannāḥ dhātum

original: teṣām api tāni kuśalamūlāny aparyāpannāni kāmarūpārūpyadhātuṃ,
analyzed: teṣām api tāni kuśala mūlāni a paryāpannāni kāmarūpa ārūpya dhātum

original: yac cāparyāpannaṃ tan nātītan nānāgatan na pratyutpannam.
analyzed: yat ca a paryāpannam tat na atītan na anāgatan na pratyutpannam

original: saced bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ saṃjānīte,
analyzed: saced bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran evam saṃjānīte

original: yad rūpaṃ tat kāmadhāturūpadhātvārūpyadhātum aparyāpamam,
analyzed: yat rūpam tat kāmadhātu rūpadhātu ārūpya dhātum a paryāpamam

original: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā yad vijñānaṃ tat kāmadhāturūpadhātvārūpyadhātum aparyāpannam,
analyzed: evam vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ yat vijñānam tat kāmadhātu rūpadhātu ārūpya dhātum a paryāpannam

original: evaṃ dhātava āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgānīti kāmadhāturūpadhātvārūpyadhātvaparyāpannāni.
analyzed: evam dhātavaḥ āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpāda aṅgāni iti kāmadhātu rūpadhātu ārūpya dhātu a paryāpannāni

original: saced bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ saṃjānīte, yad (PSP_2-3:135)
analyzed: saced bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran evam saṃjānīte yat

original: rūpaṃ tat kāmadhāturūpadhātvārūpyadhātum aparyāpannaṃ,
analyzed: rūpam tat kāmadhātu rūpadhātu ārūpya dhātum a paryāpannam

original: tan nātītan tan nānāgatan na pratyutpannan tan na śakyaṃ nimittayogena copalambhayogena vā pariṇāmayitum. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: tat na atītan tat na anāgatan na pratyutpannan tat na śakyam nimitta yogena ca upalambha yogena vā pariṇāmayitum tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na hi tasya svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate. yasya ca svabhāvo na saṃvidyate so 'bhāvo. na cābhāvo
analyzed: na hi tasya svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate yasya ca svabhāvaḥ na saṃvidyate saḥ bhāvaḥ na ca abhāvaḥ

original: 'bhāvena śakyaḥ pariṇāmayitum. evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānaṃ dhātava āyatanāni
analyzed: bhāvena śakyaḥ pariṇāmayitum evam vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānam dhātavaḥ āyatanāni

original: pratītyasamutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāny,
analyzed: pratītyasamutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpāda aṅgāni

original: evaṃ dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā,
analyzed: evam dāna pāramitā śīla pāramitā kṣānti pāramitā vīrya pāramitā dhyāna pāramitā prajñāpāramitā

original: evaṃ adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā,
analyzed: evam adhyātma śūnyatā bahirdhā śūnyatā adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā

original: evaṃ yāvat saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmā āryasatyāny apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo
analyzed: evam yāvat saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣyāḥ dharmāḥ ārya satyāni a pramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattayaḥ

original: 'ṣṭavimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni ṣaḍabhijñā daśatathāgatabalāni
analyzed: ṣṭa vimokṣāḥ nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattayaḥ śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihitāni ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ daśa tathāgata balāni

original: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ sarvajñatā
analyzed: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ ṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ sarvajña tā

original: asaṃpramuṣitadharmatā sadopekṣāvihāritā na kāmadhātuparyāpannā na rūpadhātuparyāpannā
analyzed: asaṃpramuṣita dharma tā sadā upekṣā vihāri tā na kāmadhātu paryāpannā na rūpadhātu paryāpannā

original: nārūpyadhātuparyāpannā,
analyzed: na ārūpya dhātu paryāpannā

original: yā cāparyāpannā na sātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā na sā śakyā nimittayogena na copalambhayogena vā pariṇāmayitum. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: yā ca a paryāpannā na sā atītā na anāgatā na pratyutpannā na sā śakyā nimitta yogena na ca upalambha yogena vā pariṇāmayitum tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na hi tasyāḥ svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate. yo na saṃvidyate so 'bhāvo. na cābhāvo 'bhāvena śakyaḥ pariṇāmayitum. evaṃ hi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya  #
analyzed: na hi tasyāḥ svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate yaḥ na saṃvidyate saḥ bhāvaḥ na ca abhāvaḥ bhāvena śakyaḥ pariṇāmayitum evam hi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya

original: pariṇāmo nirviṣo bhavati.
analyzed: pariṇāmaḥ nirviṣaḥ bhavati

original: yaḥ punar mahāyānasaṃprasthitaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā nimittayogena copalambhayogena
analyzed: yaḥ punar mahāyāna saṃprasthitaḥ kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā nimitta yogena ca upalambha yogena

original: ca tāni kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmayati tāni mithyā pariṇāmayati na ca mithyā pariṇāmaṃ
analyzed: ca tāni kuśala mūlāni pariṇāmayati tāni mithyā pariṇāmayati na ca mithyā pariṇāmam

original: samyakpariṇāmaṃ buddhā bhagavanto varṇayanti. yaṃ buddhā bhagavantaḥ pariṇāmaṃ na
analyzed: samyak pariṇāmam buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ varṇayanti yam buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ pariṇāmam na

original: varṇayanti sa tena pariṇāmayati. na dānapāramitāyāṃ pariṇāmayati na śīlapāramitāyāṃ
analyzed: varṇayanti sa tena pariṇāmayati na dāna pāramitāyām pariṇāmayati na śīla pāramitāyām

original: na kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ na vīryapāramitāyāṃ na dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
analyzed: na kṣānti pāramitāyām na vīrya pāramitāyām na dhyāna pāramitāyām na prajñāpāramitāyām

original: pariṇāmayati. na ṣaḍpāramitāḥ paripūrayiṣyati. na saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān
analyzed: pariṇāmayati na ṣaḍ pāramitāḥ paripūrayiṣyati na saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣyān dharmān

original: paripūrayiṣyati. nādhyātmaśūnyatāṃ na bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ
analyzed: paripūrayiṣyati na adhyātma śūnyatām na bahirdhā śūnyatām na adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatām

original: na yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattir nāryasatyāni nāṣṭavimokṣān
analyzed: na yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatām na apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattiḥ na ārya satyāni na aṣṭa vimokṣān

original: na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattir na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni nābhijñā na daśatathāgatabalāni
analyzed: na nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattiḥ na śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihitāni na abhijñāḥ na daśa tathāgata balāni

original: na vaiśāradyāni na pratisaṃvido nāṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān paripūrayiṣyati. na
analyzed: na vaiśāradyāni na pratisaṃvidaḥ na aṣṭādaśa āveṇikān buddha dharmān paripūrayiṣyati na

original: samādhīn na dhāraṇīmukhāni paripūrayiṣyati. na buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣyati. na
analyzed: samādhīn na dhāraṇī mukhāni paripūrayiṣyati na buddhakṣetram pariśodhayiṣyati na

original: sattvān paripācayiṣyati. (PSP_2-3:136)
analyzed: sattvān paripācayiṣyati

original: yo na buddhakṣetrāṃ pariśodhayiṣyati na sattvān paripācayiṣyati sa nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: yaḥ na buddhakṣetrām pariśodhayiṣyati na sattvān paripācayiṣyati sa na anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hy asya pariṇāmaḥ saviṣaḥ.
analyzed: tathā hi asya pariṇāmaḥ sa viṣaḥ

original: punar aparaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
analyzed: punar aparam bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyam

original: yathā buddhā bhagavanto jānanti,
analyzed: yathā buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ jānanti

original: anayā ca dharmatayā tat kuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayitavyam ity,
analyzed: anayā ca dharmatayā tat kuśala mūlam pariṇāmayitavyam iti

original: evaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ bhavatīti,
analyzed: evam pariṇāmitam bhavati iti

original: tathāham api tayā dharmatayā pariṇāmayāmy anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye.
analyzed: tathā aham api tayā dharma tayā pariṇāmayāmi anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye

original: iti traidhātukāparyāpannapariṇāmaḥ
analyzed: iti traidhātuka a paryāpanna pariṇāmaḥ

original: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim āmantrayāmāsa:
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantam subhūtim āmantrayāmāsa

original: sādhu sādhu subhūte sādhu khalu punas tvaṃ subhūte yas tvam eva bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pariṇāmanāskandham upadiśasi,

analyzed: puṇya prasavāḥ vṛhat phalāḥ śuddhāvāsāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanāḥ avṛhāḥ atapāḥ akaniṣṭhāḥ

original: anekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sardhāṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmann upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya śabdam akārṣuḥ,
analyzed: anekaiḥ devaputra koṭī niyuta śata sahasraiḥ sardhām yena bhagavān tena upasaṃkrāman upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā abhivandya śabdam akārṣuḥ

original: ghoṣam udīrayāmāsuh:
analyzed: ghoṣam udīrayāmāsuh

original: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yathāpi nāma bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītā,
analyzed: āścaryam bhagavan yathā api nāma bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītā

original: upāyakauśalena ca teṣāṃ paurvakānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca aupalambhikānāṃ tāni kuśalamūlāny abhibhavanti.
analyzed: upāya kauśalena ca teṣām paurvakānām bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām kula putrāṇām kula duhitṛṇām ca aupalambhikānām tāni kuśala mūlāni abhibhavanti

original: atha khalu bhagavāṃś cāturmahārājakāyikān devaputrān yāvad akaniṣṭhān devaputrān āmantrayāmāsa:
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān cāturmahārājakāyikān deva putrān yāvat akaniṣṭhān deva putrān āmantrayāmāsa

original: yadi devaputrā ye trisāharamahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitā bhaveyus,
analyzed: yadi deva putrāḥ ye trisāhara mahā sāhasre lokadhātau sattvāḥ te sarve nuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ bhaveyuḥ

original: te sarve 'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ
analyzed: te sarve tīta anāgata pratyutpannānām tathāgatānām arhatām samyaksaṃbuddhānām sa śrāvaka saṃghānām

original: sapratyekabuddhānāṃ yāni kuśalamūlāni prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad anuttarāṃ
analyzed: sa pratyekabuddhānām yāni kuśala mūlāni prathama citta utpādam upādāya yāvat anuttarām

original: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhānāṃ yāvac ca nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtānāṃ
analyzed: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhānām yāvat ca nirupadhi śeṣe nirvāṇa dhātau parinirvṛtānām

original: yāvat saddharmasthitir etasminn antare teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ teṣāṃ ca śrāvakāṇāṃ
analyzed: yāvat saddharma sthitiḥ etasmin antare teṣām buddhānām bhagavatām teṣām ca śrāvakāṇām

original: teṣāṃ ca pratyekabuddhānāṃ tato 'nyeṣāṃ ca sarvasattvānāṃ yat kuśalamūlaṃ dānapāramitā
analyzed: teṣām ca pratyekabuddhānām tatas nyeṣām ca sarva sattvānām yat kuśala mūlam dāna pāramitā

original: nirjātam evaṃ śīlapāramitākṣāntipāramitāvīryapāramitādhyānapāramitāprajñāpāramitānirjātaṃ
analyzed: nirjātam evam śīla pāramitā kṣānti pāramitā vīrya pāramitā dhyāna pāramitā prajñāpāramitā nirjātam

original: śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho vimuktiskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandho
analyzed: śīla skandhaḥ samādhi skandhaḥ prajñā skandhaḥ vimukti skandhaḥ vimukti jñāna darśana skandhaḥ

original: 'nye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmās tat sarvam abhisaṃkṣipyānumodyānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
analyzed: nye ca aparimāṇāḥ buddha dharmāḥ tat sarvam abhisaṃkṣipya anumodya anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye

original: pariṇāmayeyur upalambhayogena. yaś ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
analyzed: pariṇāmayeyuḥ upalambha yogena yaḥ ca kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau

original: saṃprasthito bhavet so 'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ
analyzed: saṃprasthitaḥ bhavet saḥ tīta anāgata pratyutpannānām buddhānām bhagavatām sa śrāvaka saṃghānām

original: sapratyekabuddhānāṃ prathamacittotpādam upādāya (PSP_2-3:140)
analyzed: sa pratyekabuddhānām prathama citta utpādam upādāya

original: yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhānāṃ yāvad anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau
analyzed: yāvat anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhānām yāvat an upadhi śeṣe nirvāṇa dhātau

original: parinirvṛtānāṃ yāvat saddharmasthitir etasminn antare teṣāṃ sarveṣām anyeṣāṃ ca sarvasattvānāṃ
analyzed: parinirvṛtānām yāvat saddharma sthitiḥ etasmin antare teṣām sarveṣām anyeṣām ca sarva sattvānām

original: yat kuśalamūlaṃ dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramita dhyānapāramitā
analyzed: yat kuśala mūlam dāna pāramitā śīla pāramitā kṣānti pāramitā vīrya pāramita dhyāna pāramitā

original: prajñāpāramitā yāvad aparimāṇā buddhadharmās tat sarvam abhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā yāvat aparimāṇāḥ buddha dharmāḥ tat sarvam abhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā

original: tulayitvā anupalambhayogenādvayayogenānimittayogena nirupalepayogena nirīhadharmayogena,
analyzed: tulayitvā an upalambha yogena a dvaya yogena a nimitta yogena nirupalepa yogena nirīha dharma yogena

original: agrayānumodanayānumodita anumodyānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayed,
analyzed: agrayā anumodanayā anumodita anumodya anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayet

original: evaṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā teṣāṃ pūrvakānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇām antikād
analyzed: evam sa kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā teṣām pūrvakānām kula putrāṇām kula duhitṛṇām antikāt

original: bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. idaṃ ca kuśalamūlaṃ tasya pūrvakasya kuśalamūlasya śatatamīm
analyzed: bahutaram puṇyam prasavet idam ca kuśala mūlam tasya pūrvakasya kuśala mūlasya śatatamīm

original: api kalāṃ nopaiti yāvad upaniṣadam api na kṣamate. idaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānupalambhayogena
analyzed: api kalām nā upaiti yāvat upaniṣadam api na kṣamate idam bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anupalambha yogena

original: pariṇāmitam agram ākhyāyate yāvad niruttaram ākhyāyate.
analyzed: pariṇāmitam agram ākhyāyate yāvat niruttaram ākhyāyate

original: iti pariṇāmakāritram ity uktaḥ pariṇāmamanaskāraḥ
analyzed: iti pariṇāma kāritram iti uktaḥ pariṇāma manaskāraḥ

original: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: yo bhagavaṃs tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā sa ca kuśalamūlānumodanāpariṇāmanāpuṇyaskandha
analyzed: yaḥ bhagavan tasya kula putrasya vā kula duhituḥ vā sa ca kuśala mūla anumodanā pariṇāmanā puṇya skandha

original: ekataḥ piṇḍīkṛto 'grayānumodanayā numoditaḥ. kathaṃ bhagavann agrānumodanā bhavati
analyzed: ekatas piṇḍīkṛtaḥ grayā anumodanayā numoditaḥ katham bhagavan agrā anumodanā bhavati

original: yāvan niruttarānumodanā bhavati?
analyzed: yāvat niruttarā anumodanā bhavati

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: yadā sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ arhatāṃ
analyzed: yadā sa kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā atīta anāgata pratyutpannānām tathāgatānām arhatām

original: samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ sapratyekabuddhānām anyeṣāṃ ca sarvasattvānāṃ
analyzed: samyaksaṃbuddhānām sa śrāvaka saṃghānām sa pratyekabuddhānām anyeṣām ca sarva sattvānām

original: kuśalān dharmān na gṛhṇāti na muñcati na manyate nāvamanyate nopalabhate. evaṃ cāsya
analyzed: kuśalān dharmān na gṛhṇāti na muñcati na manyate na avamanyate na upalabhate evam ca asya

original: bhavati naivātra kaścid dharma utpadyate na nirudhyate na saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate,
analyzed: bhavati na eva atra kaścid dharmaḥ utpadyate na nirudhyate na saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate

original: na ca teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ hānir na vṛddhir nāgamo na nirgamo na rāśir nābhāvaḥ,
analyzed: na ca teṣām dharmāṇām hāniḥ na vṛddhiḥ na āgamaḥ na nirgamaḥ na rāśiḥ na abhāvaḥ

original: etena paryāyeṇa yac caiṣām atītānāgatapratyutpannāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tathatāvitathatānanyatathatā
analyzed: etena paryāyeṇa yat ca eṣām atīta anāgata pratyutpannām dharmāṇām tathatā avitathatā an anya tathatā

original: dharmatā dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā tathāham anumode anumodyānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
analyzed: dharma tā dharma sthiti tā dharma niyāma tā tathā aham anumode anumodya anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye

original: pariṇāmayāmīti pariṇāmayet. evam anumodamānasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyagrānumodanā
analyzed: pariṇāmayāmi iti pariṇāmayet evam anumodamānasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya agrā anumodanā

original: bhavati yāvan niruttarānumodanā bhavati. asyāḥ khalu punaḥ subhūte anumodanāyā anyā
analyzed: bhavati yāvat niruttarā anumodanā bhavati asyāḥ khalu punar subhūte anumodanāyāḥ anyā

original: yā anumodanās tāḥ. sarvā śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopayānti yāvad upaniṣadam api na kṣamante.
analyzed: yāḥ anumodanāḥ tāḥ sarvāḥ śatatamīm api kalām na upayānti yāvat upaniṣadam api na kṣamante

original: iyaṃ cānumodanā anyābhyo 'numodanābhyo 'gra ākhyāyate.
analyzed: iyam ca anumodanā anyābhyaḥ numodanābhyaḥ gre ākhyāyate

original: punar aparaṃ subhūte navayānasaṃprasthitena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā (PSP_2-3:141)

original: vā teṣāṃ atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ
analyzed: vā teṣām atīta anāgata pratyutpannānām tathāgatānām arhatām samyaksaṃbuddhānām sa śrāvaka saṃghānām

original: sapratyekabuddhānāṃ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvac cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
analyzed: sa pratyekabuddhānām prathama citta utpādam upādāya yāvat ca anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim

original: abhisaṃbuddhānāṃ yāvad anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtānāṃ yāvat saddharmasthitir
analyzed: abhisaṃbuddhānām yāvat an upadhi śeṣe nirvāṇa dhātau parinirvṛtānām yāvat saddharma sthitiḥ

original: etasminn antare yat kuśalamūlaṃ dānapāramitāpratisaṃyuktam evaṃ śilaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ
analyzed: etasmin antare yat kuśala mūlam dāna pāramitā pratisaṃyuktam evam śilam kṣāntim vīryam

original: dhyānaṃ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ yāvad aparimāṇabuddhadharmapratisaṃyuktaṃ,
analyzed: dhyānam prajñāpāramitā pratisaṃyuktam yāvat aparimāṇa buddha dharma pratisaṃyuktam

original: tato 'nyeṣām api sarvasattvānāṃ yāni kuśalamūlāni dānamayāni śilamayāni bhāvanāmayāni tāni sarvāṇy anumoditukāmena evam anumoditavyam. yathādhimuktis  #
analyzed: tatas nyeṣām api sarva sattvānām yāni kuśala mūlāni dāna mayāni śila mayāni bhāvanā mayāni tāni sarvāṇi anumoditu kāmena evam anumoditavyam yathā adhimuktiḥ

original: tathā dānam,
analyzed: tathā dānam

original: evaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ yathādhimuktis tathā prajñā,
analyzed: evam śīlam kṣāntim vīryam dhyānam yathā adhimuktiḥ tathā prajñā

original: yathādhimuktis tathā rūpaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ yathādhimuktis tathā vijñānaṃ,
analyzed: yathā adhimuktiḥ tathā rūpam vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ yathā adhimuktiḥ tathā vijñānam

original: yathādhimuktis tathā dhātava āyatanāni yathādhimuktis tathā pratītyasamutpādaḥ,
analyzed: yathā adhimuktiḥ tathā dhātavaḥ āyatanāni yathā adhimuktiḥ tathā pratītyasamutpādaḥ

original: yathādhimuktis tathādhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvāśūnyatā,
analyzed: yathā adhimuktiḥ tathā adhyātma śūnyatā bahirdhā śūnyatā adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā yāvat abhāva svabhāva aśūnyatā

original: yathādhimuktis tathā saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ,
analyzed: yathā adhimuktiḥ tathā saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣyāḥ dharmāḥ

original: yathādhimuktis tathāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
analyzed: yathā adhimuktiḥ tathā pramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattayaḥ

original: yathādhimuktis tathāryasatyāny aṣṭavimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ,
analyzed: yathā adhimuktiḥ tathā ārya satyāni aṣṭa vimokṣāḥ nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattayaḥ

original: yathādhimuktis tathā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni ṣaḍabhijñāḥ,
analyzed: yathā adhimuktiḥ tathā śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukhāni ṣaḍabhijñāḥ

original: yathādhimuktis tathā sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni,
analyzed: yathā adhimuktiḥ tathā sarva samādhayaḥ sarva dhāraṇī mukhāni

original: yathādhimuktis tathā daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
analyzed: yathā adhimuktiḥ tathā daśa bala vaiśāradya pratisaṃvidaḥ ṣṭādaśā āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ

original: yathādhimuktis tathā vimuktijñānadarśanaṃ,
analyzed: yathā adhimuktiḥ tathā vimukti jñāna darśanam

original: yathādhimuktis tathānumodanā,
analyzed: yathā adhimuktiḥ tathā anumodanā

original: yathādhimuktis tathā te 'tītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhadharmāḥ,
analyzed: yathā adhimuktiḥ tathā te tīta anāgata pratyutpannāḥ buddha dharmāḥ

original: yathādhimuktis tathā buddhā bhagavantaḥ,
analyzed: yathā adhimuktiḥ tathā buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ

original: yathādhimuktis tathā teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām abhisaṃbodhiḥ,
analyzed: yathā adhimuktiḥ tathā teṣām buddhānām bhagavatām abhisaṃbodhiḥ

original: yathādhimuktis tathā teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ parinirvāṇaṃ,
analyzed: yathā adhimuktiḥ tathā teṣām buddhānām bhagavatām parinirvāṇam

original: yathādhimuktis tathā teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śrāvakāḥ pratyekabuddhāḥ,
analyzed: yathā adhimuktiḥ tathā teṣām buddhānām bhagavatām śrāvakāḥ pratyekabuddhāḥ

original: yathādhimuktis tathā śrāvakapratyekabuddhaparirvāṇaṃ,
analyzed: yathā adhimuktiḥ tathā śrāvaka pratyekabuddha parirvāṇam

original: yathādhimuktis tathā teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmatā,
analyzed: yathā adhimuktiḥ tathā teṣām buddhānām bhagavatām dharmatā

original: yathādhimuktis tathā teṣāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ dharmatā,
analyzed: yathā adhimuktiḥ tathā teṣām śrāvaka pratyekabuddhānām dharmatā

original: yathādhimuktis tathā sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ muktānām aśāntānām akliṣṭānām aviśuddhānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā,
analyzed: yathā adhimuktiḥ tathā sarva dharmāṇām sarva sattvānām muktānām aśāntānām akliṣṭānām aviśuddhānām dharmāṇām dharma tā

original: ajātānām asaṃjātānām anutpannānām aniruddhānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā,
analyzed: a jātānām a saṃjātānām an utpannānām a niruddhānām dharmāṇām dharma tā

original: 'tathānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayaty asaṃkrāntyavināśitām upādāya. iyaṃ
analyzed: tathā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati a saṃkrānti a vināśi tām upādāya iyam

original: sā subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām agrā anumodanā yāvan niruttarā anumodanā.
analyzed: sā subhūte bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām agrā anumodanā yāvat niruttarā anumodanā

original: anayā ca subhūte anumodanayā samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ (PSP_2-3:142)
analyzed: anayā ca subhūte anumodanayā samanvāgataḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ kṣipram anuttarām

original: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
analyzed: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate

original: punar aparaṃ subhūte daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye te buddhā bhagavantaḥ. saśrāvakasaṃghās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante
analyzed: punar aparam subhūte daśasu dikṣu ekaikasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye te buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ sa śrāvaka saṃghāḥ tiṣṭhanti dhriyante

original: tān kaścid eva mahāyānasaṃprasthitaḥ. kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgatan arhataḥ
analyzed: tān kaścid eva mahāyāna saṃprasthitaḥ kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā tathāgatan arhataḥ

original: samyaksaṃbuddhān saśrāvakasaṃghān yāvajjīvaṃ sarvasukhopadhānena satkuryād gurukuryād
analyzed: samyaksaṃbuddhān sa śrāvaka saṃghān yāvajjīvam sarva sukha upadhānena satkuryāt gurukuryāt

original: mānayet pūjayec cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ parinirvṛtānāṃ
analyzed: mānayet pūjayet cīvara piṇḍapāta śayana āsana glāna pratyaya bhaiṣajya pariṣkāraiḥ parinirvṛtānām

original: ca teṣāṃ buddhāṃ bhagavatāṃ rātriṃdivam autsukyam āpadyeta satkaraṇagurukaraṇamānanapūjanaiḥ

analyzed: pariṇāmayati asya puṇya abhisaṃskārasya kuśala mūla abhisaṃskārasya ca asau paurvakaḥ puṇya abhisaṃskāraḥ

original: iti śreṣṭhatā
analyzed: iti śreṣṭha tā

analyzed: prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā sarva dharma an abhinirhārāya prajñāpramitā abhinirhartavyā

original: prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā.
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā

original: śariputra āha:

original: kathaṃ bhagavan rūpasyānabhinirhārāya prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā?

analyzed: yāvat sarva ākārajña tā an abhisaṃskārataḥ n utpādataḥ bhāvataḥ jātitaḥ vināśataḥ n upalabdhitaḥ prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

analyzed: yat kauśikaḥ evam vadasi

analyzed: prajñāpāramitā kauśika na kaṃcid dharmam arpayati na upalabhate sarva ākāra jña tām api na arpayati na upalabhate

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

analyzed: na hi kauśika prajñāpramitā yathā nāma yathā nimittam yathā abhisaṃskāraḥ tathā arpayati

original: devendra āha:
analyzed: devendraḥ āha

analyzed: kathaiḥ punar bhagavan arpayati

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: yathā nopaiti nopādadāti nadhitiṣṭhati na prajahāti nābhiniviśate (PSP_2-3:146)
analyzed: yathā na upaiti na upādadāti na adhitiṣṭhati na prajahāti na abhiniviśate

analyzed: tathā arpayati yathā na kaṃcid dharmam arpayati muñcati na pratigṛhṇāti evam hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā sarva dharmān na arpayati na muñcati na

original: śakra āha: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sarvadharmāṇām anutpādāya anirodhāya anabhisaṃskārāya anupalabdhaye avināśāya pratyupasthitā.

original: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:

original: prajñāpāramitā sarvadharmān nārpayatīti,
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā sarva dharmān na arpayati iti

analyzed: riñciṣyati bhagavan prajñāpāramitām dūrīkariṣyati bhagavan prajñāpāramitām

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

analyzed: asti subhūte paryāyaḥ yena paryāyeṇa bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ riñcan prajñāpāramitām

analyzed: dūrīkuryān prajñāpāramitām saced bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran evam saṃjñāsyati

analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: prajñāpāramitayā subhūte pratyarpitayā na rūpaṃ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: prajñāpāramitayā subhūte pratyarpitayā na rūpam pratyarpitam bhavati

analyzed: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ na vijñānam pratyarpitam bhavati na cakṣuḥ pratyarpitam bhavati

original: na śrotraṃ na ghrāṇaṃ na jihvā na kāyo na manaḥ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati. na rūpaṃ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: na śrotram na ghrāṇam na jihvā na kāyaḥ na manaḥ pratyarpitam bhavati na rūpam pratyarpitam bhavati

analyzed: na śabdaḥ na gandhaḥ na rasaḥ na spraṣṭavyam na dharmāḥ pratyarpitāḥ bhavanti na dāna pāramitā pratyarpitā bhavati

analyzed: bhavati nā adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā pratyarpitā bhavati yāvat nā abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā

analyzed: pratyarpitā bhavati na saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣyāḥ dharmāḥ pratyarpitāḥ bhavanti na

analyzed: daśa bala vaiśāradyāni na pratisaṃvidaḥ na aṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ pratyarpitāḥ bhavanti

analyzed: katham bhagavan prajñāpāramitayā pratyarpitayā na rūpam pratyarpitam bhavati yāvat na sarva ākārajña tā pratyarpitā bhavati

analyzed: rūpasya subhūte n upalabdhyā prajñāpāramitā pratyarpitā bhavati yāvat sarva ākāra jña tā an upalabdhyā

analyzed: prajñāpāramitā pratyarpitā bhavati evam khalu subhūte prajñāpāramitayā pratyarpitayā

analyzed: na rūpam pratyarpitam bhavati yāvat na sarva ākārajña tā bhavati

analyzed: tat kim manyase

original: subhūtir āha:

analyzed: na bhagavan rūpam mahatkaroti na alpīkaroti

analyzed: pratītyasamutpāda aṅgāni na mahatkaroti na alpīkaroti na dāna pāramitām mahatkaroti na alpīkaroti

analyzed: evam śīlam kṣāntim vīryam dhyānam na prajñāpāramitām mahatkaroti na alpīkaroti na adhyātma śūnyatām

analyzed: mahatkaroti na alpīkaroti yāvat na abhāva svabhāva śūnyatām mahatkaroti na alpīkaroti na

analyzed: na vaiśāradyāni na pratisaṃvidaḥ na aṣṭādaśa āveṇikān buddha dharmān mahatkaroti na alpīkaroti

original: na bodhiṃ mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti. na buddhadharmaṃ mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti. yāvan
analyzed: na bodhim mahatkaroti na alpīkaroti na buddha dharmam mahatkaroti na alpīkaroti yāvan

original: na buddhaṃ mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti. na rūpaṃ vipulīkaroti na parittīkaroti. na rūpaṃ
analyzed: na buddham mahatkaroti na alpīkaroti na rūpam vipulīkaroti na parittīkaroti na rūpam

original: mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā. sacet punar navayānasaṃprasthito bodhisattvo
analyzed: mahāsattvānām yat uta prajñāpāramitā saced punar nava yāna saṃprasthitaḥ bodhisattvaḥ

original: mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitām āgamya dhyānapāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ
analyzed: mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitām āgamya dhyāna pāramitām vīrya pāramitām kṣānti pāramitām

original: śīlapāramitāṃ dānapāramitām āgamya evaṃ jñāsyati na prajñāpāramitā rūpaṃ mahatkaroti
analyzed: śīla pāramitām dāna pāramitām āgamyaḥ evam jñāsyati na prajñāpāramitā rūpam mahatkaroti

original: nālpīkaroti yāvan na buddhadharmaṃ mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti. na rūpaṃ balavatkaroti
analyzed: na alpīkaroti yāvat na buddha dharmam mahatkaroti na alpīkaroti na rūpam balavatkaroti

original: na durbalīkaroti. evaṃ saṃjānan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: na durbalīkaroti evam saṃjānan bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ na carati prajñāpāramitāyām tat kasya hetoḥ

original: naiṣa bhagavan niṣyandaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ. yad rūpaṃ mahad alpaṃ vā kuryād yāvad buddhadharmaṃ mahad alpaṃ vā kuryān naiṣa prajñāpāramitāyā  #
analyzed: na eṣa bhagavat nisyandaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ yat rūpam mahat alpam vā kuryāt yāvat buddha dharmam mahat alpam vā kuryāt na eṣa prajñāpāramitāyāḥ

original: niṣyandaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: nisyandaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: draṣṭavyā. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānājātitaḥ prajñāpāramitājātitā draṣṭavyā yāvad
analyzed: draṣṭavyāḥ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñāna a jātitaḥ prajñāpāramitā jāti tā draṣṭavyā yāvat
