analyzed: buddha ajātitaḥ prajñāpāramitā jāti tā draṣṭavyā sattva asvabhāva tayā prajñāpāramitā svabhāva tā

original: draṣṭavyā. rūpāsvabhāvatayā prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvatā draṣṭavyā. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā
analyzed: draṣṭavyā rūpa asvabhāva tayā prajñāpāramitā svabhāva tā draṣṭavyā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā

original: vijñānāsvabhāvatayā prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvatā draṣṭayyā yāvad buddhāsvabhāvatayā prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvatā
analyzed: vijñāna asvabhāva tayā prajñāpāramitā svabhāva tā draṣṭayyā yāvat buddha asvabhāva tayā prajñāpāramitā svabhāva tā

original: draṣṭavyā. rūpābhāvatayā prajñāpāramitābhāvatā veditavyā. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānābhāvatayā
analyzed: draṣṭavyā rūpa abhāva tayā prajñāpāramitā bhāva tā veditavyā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñāna abhāva tayā

original: prajñāpāramitābhāvatā veditavyā yāvad buddhābhāvatayā prajñāpāramitābhāvatā veditavyā.
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā bhāva tā veditavyā yāvat buddha abhāva tayā prajñāpāramitā bhāva tā veditavyā

original: sattvaśūnyatayā prajñāpāramitā śūnyatā veditavyā. rūpaśūnyatayā prajñāpāramitā śūnyatā
analyzed: sattva śūnyatayā prajñāpāramitā śūnyatā veditavyā rūpa śūnyatayā prajñāpāramitā śūnyatā

original: veditavyā. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānaśūnyatayā prajñāpāramitā śūnyatā veditavyā
analyzed: veditavyāḥ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñāna śūnyatayā prajñāpāramitā śūnyatā veditavyā

original: yāvad buddhaśūnyatayā prajñāpāramitā śūnyata veditavyā. evaṃ sattvānimittatayā sattvāpraṇihitatayā
analyzed: yāvat buddha śūnyatayā prajñāpāramitā śūnyata veditavyā evam sattva animitta tayā sattva apraṇihita tayā

original: prajñāpāramitānimittatāpraṇihitatā. rūpānimittatayāpraṇihitatayā prajñāpāramitānimittatāpraṇihitatā.
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā nimitta tā a praṇihita tā rūpa a nimitta tayā a praṇihita tayā prajñāpāramitā nimitta tā a praṇihita tā

original: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānānimittatayāpraṇihitatayā prajñāpāramitānimittatāpraṇihitatā
analyzed: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñāna a nimitta tayā a praṇihita tayā prajñāpāramitā nimitta tā a praṇihita tā

original: yāvad buddhānimittatayāpraṇihitatayā prajñāpāramitānimittatāpraṇihitatā. evaṃ sattvāsattayā
analyzed: yāvat buddha a nimitta tayā a praṇihita tayā prajñāpāramitā nimitta tā a praṇihita tā evam sattva asattayā

original: prajñāpāramitāsattā veditavyā. sattvācintyatayā prajñāpāramitācintyatā veditavyā.
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā sattā veditavyā sattva acintya tayā prajñāpāramitā acintya tā veditavyā

original: sattvāvināśitayā prajñāpāramitāvināśitā veditavyā. sattvānabhisaṃbodhanatayā prajñāpāramitānabhisaṃbodhanatā
analyzed: sattva avināśi tayā prajñāpāramitā vināśi tā veditavyā sattva an abhisaṃbodhana tayā prajñāpāramitā an abhisaṃbodhana tā

original: veditavyā. rūpānabhisaṃbodhanatayā prajñāpāramitānabhisaṃbodhanatā veditavyā. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā
analyzed: veditavyā rūpa an abhisaṃbodhana tayā prajñāpāramitā an abhisaṃbodhana tā veditavyā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā

original: vijñānānabhisaṃbodhanatayā prajñāpāramitānabhisaṃbodhanatā veditvayā yāvad buddhānabhisaṃbodhanatayā
analyzed: vijñāna an abhisaṃbodhana tayā prajñāpāramitā an abhisaṃbodhana tā veditvayā yāvat buddha an abhisaṃbodhana tayā

original: prajñāpāramitānabhisaṃbodhanatā veditavyā. sattvabalāsamanvāgatatayā prajñāpāramitā
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā an abhisaṃbodhana tā veditavyā sattva bala a samanvāgata tayā prajñāpāramitā

original: balāsamanvāgatatā veditavyā. rūpabalāsamanvāgatatayā prajñāpāramitā balāsamanvāgatatā
analyzed: bala a samanvāgata tā veditavyā rūpa bala a samanvāgata tayā prajñāpāramitā bala a samanvāgata tā

original: veditavyā. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānabalāsamanvāgatayā prajñāpāramitā balāsamanvāgatatā
analyzed: veditavyāḥ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñāna bala a samanvāgatayā prajñāpāramitā bala a samanvāgata tā

original: veditavyā yāvad buddhabalāsamanvāgatatayā prajñāpāramitā balāsamanvāgatatā vedjtavyā.
analyzed: veditavyā yāvat buddha bala a samanvāgata tayā prajñāpāramitā bala a samanvāgata tā vedjtavyā

original: anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
analyzed: anena api bhagavan paryāyeṇa mahā pāramitā iyam bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām yat uta prajñāpāramitā

original: iti mahārthatety ukto 'bhinirhāraḥ
analyzed: iti mahārtha tā iti uktaḥ bhinirhāraḥ

original: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: yo 'yaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitām adhimokṣyate,
analyzed: yaḥ yam bhagavan bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitām adhimokṣyate

original: kutaś cyutvā sa ihāgato bhaviṣyati?
analyzed: kutas cyutvā saḥ iha āgataḥ bhaviṣyati

original: kiyaccirasaṃprasthitaḥ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā abhūd anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
analyzed: kiyat cira saṃprasthitaḥ sa kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā abhūt anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau

original: kiyanto vānena tathāgatāḥ paryupāsitāḥ?
analyzed: kiyantaḥ vā anena tathāgatāḥ paryupāsitāḥ

original: kiyacciraṃ (PSP_2-3:149)
analyzed: kiyat ciram

original: sa dānapāramitāyāṃ caritaḥ?
analyzed: sa dāna pāramitāyām caritaḥ

original: kiyacciraṃ śīlapāramitāṃ caritaḥ?
analyzed: kiyat ciram śīla pāramitām caritaḥ

original: kiyacciraṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caritaḥ?
analyzed: kiyat ciram kṣānti pāramitāyām caritaḥ

original: kiyacciraṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ caritaḥ?
analyzed: kiyat ciram vīrya pāramitāyām caritaḥ

original: kiyacciraṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caritaḥ?
analyzed: kiyat ciram dhyāna pāramitāyām caritaḥ

original: kiyacciraṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carito ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām arthataś ca nayataś cādhimokṣyate?
analyzed: kiyat ciram prajñāpāramitāyām caritaḥ yaḥ imām prajñāpāramitām arthataḥ ca nayataḥ ca adhimokṣyate

original: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
analyzed: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam śāriputram etat avocat

original: sa khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo daśasu dikṣu tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān paryupāsyehāgata ihopapanno bhaviṣyati. iti
analyzed: sa khalu punar śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ daśasu dikṣu tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān paryupāsya iha āgataḥ iha upapannaḥ bhaviṣyati iti

original: yaḥ khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'saṃkhyeyāny aprameyāṇi kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi samudāgato 'bhūd anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
analyzed: yaḥ khalu punar śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ saṃkhyeyāni aprameyāṇi kalpa koṭī niyuta śata sahasrāṇi samudāgataḥ bhūt anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau

original: sa prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānapāramitāyāṃ caritaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ caritaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
analyzed: sa prathama citta utpādam upādāya dāna pāramitāyām caritaḥ śīla pāramitāyām caritaḥ kṣānti pāramitāyām

original: carito vīryapāramitāyāṃ carito dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caritaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritaḥ
analyzed: caritaḥ vīrya pāramitāyām caritaḥ dhyāna pāramitāyām caritaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caritaḥ

original: sann ihāgato bhaviṣyati. sa khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā
analyzed: san iha āgataḥ bhaviṣyati sa khalu punar śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā

original: dṛṣṭayā śrutayā vā śāstā mayā dṛṣṭa iti cittam utpādayiṣyati,
analyzed: dṛṣṭayā śrutayā vā śāstā mayā dṛṣṭaḥ iti cittam utpādayiṣyati

original: śāstā mayā śruta iti cittam utpādayiṣyati. sa khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ prajñāpāramitām arthataś ca nayataś cādhigamiṣyaty
analyzed: śāstā mayā śrutaḥ iti cittam utpādayiṣyati sa khalu punar śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ imām prajñāpāramitām arthataḥ ca nayataḥ ca adhigamiṣyati

original: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: śakyā punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitā draṣṭuṃ vā śrotuṃ vā?
analyzed: śakyā punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitā draṣṭum vā śrotum vā

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: no hīdaṃ subhūte na hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śrotāro draṣṭāro na prajñāpāramitāṃ
analyzed: no hi idam subhūte na hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śrotāraḥ draṣṭāraḥ na prajñāpāramitām

original: te paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharmajaḍatām upādaya. evaṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ
analyzed: te paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharma jaḍa tām upādayaḥ evam dhyāna pāramitām vīrya pāramitām

original: kṣāntipāramitāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ dānapāramitāṃ te na paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharmajaḍatām
analyzed: kṣānti pāramitām śīla pāramitām dāna pāramitām te na paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharma jaḍa tām

original: upādāya. adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ na paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharmajaḍatām
analyzed: upādāya adhyātma śūnyatām yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatām na paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharma jaḍatām

original: upādāya. smṛtyupasthānāni na paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharmajaḍatām upādāya. evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgān
analyzed: upādāya smṛti upasthānāni na paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharma jaḍa tām upādāya evam samyak prahāṇa ṛddhipāda indriya bala bodhyaṅga mārgān

original: na paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharmajaḍatām upādāya. evam āryasatyāny apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ
analyzed: na paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharma jaḍa tām upādāya evam ārya satyāni apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattayaḥ

original: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāny abhijñāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśatathāgatabalāni
analyzed: śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihitāni abhijñāḥ sarva samādhayaḥ sarva dhāraṇī mukhāni daśa tathāgata balāni

original: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān na paśyanti
analyzed: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ ṣṭādaśa āveṇikān buddha dharmān na paśyanti

original: na śṛṇvanti. buddhabodhiṃ na paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharmajaḍatām upādāya.
analyzed: na śṛṇvanti buddha bodhim na paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharma jaḍa tām upādāya

original: iti dānādipāramitāsamudāgamaḥ
analyzed: iti dāna ādi pāramitā samudāgamaḥ

original: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: kiyacciraṃ caritaḥ sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyati ya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpatsyate?
analyzed: kiyat ciram caritaḥ sa bhagavan bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ bhaviṣyati yaḥ iha gambhīrāyām prajñāpāramitāyām yogam āpatsyate

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: vibhajyaitat subhūte vyākartavyaṃ,
analyzed: vibhajya etat subhūte vyākartavyam

original: syāt subhūte paryāyo yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya gambhīrāyāṃ
analyzed: syāt subhūte paryāyaḥ yaḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prathama citta utpādam upādāya gambhīrāyām

original: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate. evaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
analyzed: prajñāpāramitāyām yogam āpadyate evam dhyāna pāramitāyām vīrya pāramitāyām kṣānti pāramitāyām

original: śīlapāramitāyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate. tac copāyakauśalena na ca kaṃcid
analyzed: śīla pāramitāyām dāna pāramitāyām yogam āpadyate tat ca upāya kauśalena na ca kaṃcid

original: dharmaṃ pratikṣipati yathā nopacayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ,
analyzed: dharmam pratikṣipati yathā na upacayam paśyati na apacayam

original: na jātu ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir virahito bhavati na buddhair bhagavadbhir,
analyzed: na jātu ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ virahitaḥ bhavati na buddhaiḥ bhagavadbhiḥ

original: yaiś ca pūjāviśeṣair ākāṅkṣet tān buddhān bhagavataḥ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ
analyzed: yaiḥ ca pūjā viśeṣaiḥ ākāṅkṣet tān buddhān bhagavataḥ satkartum gurukartum mānayitum

original: pūjayituṃ tasya te pūjāviśeṣāḥ sahacittotpādenaiva saṃṛdhyante. buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ
analyzed: pūjayitum tasya te pūjā viśeṣāḥ saha citta utpādena eva saṃṛdhyante buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetram

original: saṃkrāmati. na jātu mātuḥ kukṣāv upapadyate. na ca jātu virahito bhavati abhijñābhir.
analyzed: saṃkrāmati na jātu mātuḥ kukṣau upapadyate na ca jātu virahitaḥ bhavati abhijñābhiḥ

original: na ca kenacit kleśena sārdhaṃ saṃvasati. na śrāvakacittena na pratyekabuddhacittena
analyzed: na ca kenacid kleśena sārdham saṃvasati na śrāvaka cittena na pratyekabuddha cittena

original: sārdhaṃ saṃvasati. buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati sattvāṃś ca paripācayan
analyzed: sārdham saṃvasati buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetram saṃkrāmati sattvān ca paripācayan

original: buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayan. ayaṃ subhūte bobhisattvo mahāsattvo yo 'syāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ
analyzed: buddhakṣetram ca pariśodhayan ayam subhūte bobhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ yaḥ syām gambhīrāyām

original: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yogam āpatsyate. ity upāyakauśalam
analyzed: prajñāpāramitāyām prathama citta utpādam upādāya yogam āpatsyate iti upāya kauśalam

original: santi punaḥ subhūte mahāyānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca yair bahūni buddhaśatāni
analyzed: santi punar subhūte mahā yānikāḥ kula putrāḥ kula duhitaraḥ ca yaiḥ bahūni buddha śatāni

original: bahūni buddhasahasrāṇi bahūni buddhaśatasahasrāṇi bahūni buddhakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi
analyzed: bahūni buddha sahasrāṇi bahūni buddha śata sahasrāṇi bahūni buddha koṭi niyuta śata sahasrāṇi

original: dṛṣṭāni bhavanti. tebhyaś cāntike śikṣamāṇair dānāni dattāni bhavanti,
analyzed: dṛṣṭāni bhavanti tebhyaḥ ca antike śikṣamāṇaiḥ dānāni dattāni bhavanti

original: śīlaṃ rakṣitaṃ kṣāntir bhāvitā vīryam ārabdhaṃ dhyānam āsevitaṃ prajñā bhāvitā bhavati
analyzed: śīlam rakṣitam kṣāntiḥ bhāvitā vīryam ārabdham dhyānam āsevitam prajñā bhāvitā bhavati

original: sā copalambhayogena. te 'syāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ parṣaḍbhyo
analyzed: sā ca upalambha yogena te syām gambhīrāyām prajñāpāramitāyām bhāṣyamāṇāyām parṣaḍbhyaḥ

original: 'pakramiṣyanti. te punaḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cāgauravatayāsyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
analyzed: pakramiṣyanti te punar kula putrāḥ kula duhitaraḥ ca a gaurava tayā asyām gambhīrāyām prajñāpāramitāyām

original: bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād apakramiṣyanti. ihaiva te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś
analyzed: bhāṣyamāṇāyām buddhānām bhagavatām antikāt apakramiṣyanti iha eva te kula putrāḥ kula duhitaraḥ

original: ca mahāyānikāḥ saṃnipatitā ye gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyām apakramiṣyanti. tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: ca mahāyānikāḥ saṃnipatitāḥ ye gambhīrāyām prajñāpāramitāyām bhāṣyamāṇāyām apakramiṣyanti tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca pūrvānte 'pi gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyām apakrāntā,
analyzed: tathā hi te kula putrāḥ kula duhitaraḥ ca pūrva ante gambhīrāyām prajñāpāramitāyām bhāṣyamāṇāyām apakrāntā

original: etarhy api gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyām apakrāmānti. na kāyena na
analyzed: etarhi api gambhīrāyām prajñāpāramitāyām bhāṣyamāṇāyām apakrāmānti na kāyena na

original: cittena samagrīn dāsyanti duṣprajñasaṃvartanīyaṃ karmopaceṣyanti. te tena dauṣprajñasaṃvartanīyena
analyzed: cittena samagrīn dāsyanti duṣprajña saṃvartanīyam karma upaceṣyanti te tena dauṣprajña saṃvartanīyena

original: karmaṇā kṛtenopacitena imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ pratyākhyāsyanti,
analyzed: karmaṇā kṛtena upacitena imām gambhīrām prajñāpāramitām bhāṣyamāṇām pratyākhyāsyanti

original: taiḥ pratyākhyāya atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvajñatāpratyākhyātā
analyzed: taiḥ pratyākhyāya atīta anāgata pratyutpannānām buddhānām bhagavatām sarvajña tā pratyākhyātā

original: bhavati. te tena sarvajñatāpratyākhyānena dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā kṛtenopacitena
analyzed: bhavati te tena sarvajña tā pratyākhyānena dharma vyasana saṃvartanīyena karmaṇā kṛtena upacitena

original: bahūni varṣāṇi bahūni varṣaśatāni bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi (PSP_2-3:151)
analyzed: bahūni varṣāṇi bahūni varṣa śatāni bahūni varṣa sahasrāṇi

original: bahūni varṣakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi mahāniraye prakṣepsyante. teṣāṃ mahānirayān mahānirayaṃ
analyzed: bahūni varṣa koṭī niyuta śata sahasrāṇi mahāniraye prakṣepsyante teṣām mahānirayāt mahānirayam

original: saṃkrāmatāṃ tejaḥsaṃvartanī vā apsaṃvartanī vā vāyusaṃvartanī vā prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati.
analyzed: saṃkrāmatām tejaḥ saṃvartanī vā ap saṃvartanī vā vāyu saṃvartanī vā prādurbhāvaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: te tāsu saṃvartanīṣu prādurbhātāsv anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ye mahānirayās teṣu prakṣepsyante.
analyzed: te tāsu saṃvartanīṣu prādurbhātāsu anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ye mahānirayāḥ teṣu prakṣepsyante

original: te tatropapannāḥ samānāḥ,
analyzed: te tatra upapannāḥ samānāḥ

original: mahānirayān mahānirayaṃ saṃkramiṣyanti. teṣāṃ mahānirayān mahānirayaṃ saṃkrāmatāṃ
analyzed: mahānirayāt mahānirayam saṃkramiṣyanti teṣām mahānirayāt mahānirayam saṃkrāmatām

original: punar eva saṃvartanīyaḥ prādurbhaviṣyanti. tāsu saṃvartanīṣu prādurbhūtāsu pūrvasyāṃ diśi prakṣepsyante,
analyzed: punar eva saṃvartanīyaḥ prādurbhaviṣyanti tāsu saṃvartanīṣu prādurbhūtāsu pūrvasyām diśi prakṣepsyante

original: dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ vidikṣūrdhvam adho diśi yo mahānirayās teṣu prakṣepsyante.
analyzed: dakṣiṇasyām paścimāyām uttarasyām vidikṣu ūrdhvam adhas diśi yaḥ mahānirayāḥ teṣu prakṣepsyante

original: tebhyo 'pi punaḥ saṃvartanīṣu prādurbhūtāsv anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ye mahānirayās teṣu
analyzed: tebhyaḥ pi punar saṃvartanīṣu prādurbhūtāsu anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ye mahānirayāḥ teṣu

original: prakṣepsyante. teṣu punar api tebhyo lokadhātubhyaḥ saṃvartanīṣu prādurbhūtāsu tebhyo
analyzed: prakṣepsyante teṣu punar api tebhyaḥ lokadhātubhyaḥ saṃvartanīṣu prādurbhūtāsu tebhyaḥ

original: mahānirayebhaś cyutās tena dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇākṣīṇena punar eva ihopapatsyante.
analyzed: cyutāḥ tena dharma vyasana saṃvartanīyena karmaṇā akṣīṇena punar eva iha upapatsyante

original: te punar eva mahānirayān mahānirayaṃ saṃkramiṣyanti. te teṣu mahānirayeṣūpapannā
analyzed: te punar eva mahānirayāt mahānirayam saṃkramiṣyanti te teṣu mahānirayeṣu upapannā

original: bahūni tīvrāṇi mahākaṭukāni mahānirayaduḥkhāni pratyanubhaviṣyanti. tāvad eva te
analyzed: bahūni tīvrāṇi mahā kaṭukāni mahāniraya duḥkhāni pratyanubhaviṣyanti tāvat eva te

original: tāni nirayaduḥkhāṃ pratyanubhaviṣyanti yāvat punar eva saṃvartanīyaḥ prādurbhaviṣyanti.
analyzed: tāni niraya duḥkhām pratyanubhaviṣyanti yāvat punar eva saṃvartanīyaḥ prādurbhaviṣyanti

original: saṃvartanīṣu prādurbhūtāsv itaś cyutā anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu punar eva mahānirayeṣūpapatsyante.
analyzed: saṃvartanīṣu prādurbhūtāsu itas cyutāḥ anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu punar eva mahānirayeṣu upapatsyante

original: evaṃ samantāt punar api daśasu dikṣu tiryagyoniṣūpapatsyante. punar eva daśasu dikṣu
analyzed: evam samantāt punar api daśasu dikṣu tiryagyoniṣu upapatsyante punar eva daśasu dikṣu

original: yamalokeṣūpapannā mahātīvrāṃ mahākaṭukāṃ mahāduṣkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayantas tat karma
analyzed: yama lokeṣu upapannāḥ mahā tīvrām mahā kaṭukām mahā duṣkhām vedanām vedayantaḥ tat karma

original: kṣepayiṣyanti. te bahuduḥkhavedanīyaṃ karma kṣepayitvā kadācit karhicit mānuṣyakam
analyzed: kṣepayiṣyanti te bahu duḥkha vedanīyam karma kṣepayitvā kadācid karhicit mānuṣyakam

original: ātmabhāvaṃ pratilapsyante. te yatra yatropapatsyante tatra tatra jātyandhā bhaviṣyanti.
analyzed: ātma bhāvam pratilapsyante te yatra yatra upapatsyante tatra tatra jāti andhāḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: jātyandhakuleṣūpapatsyante. caṇḍālakuleṣu vā puṣkasakuleṣu vā śākunikuleṣu vā sukarikuleṣu
analyzed: jāti andha kuleṣu upapatsyante caṇḍāla kuleṣu vā puṣkasa kuleṣu vā śākuni kuleṣu vā sukari kuleṣu

original: vā aurabhikakuleṣu vā nīceṣu vā kutsiteṣu vā kuleṣu vā nīcavṛttisu vā upapatsyante.
analyzed: vā aurabhika kuleṣu vā nīceṣu vā kutsiteṣu vā kuleṣu vā nīca vṛttisu vā upapatsyante

original: te teṣūpapannā andhā vā bhaviṣyanti kāṇā vā ajihvā vā ahastā vā apādā vā akarṇakā
analyzed: te teṣu upapannāḥ andhāḥ vā bhaviṣyanti kāṇāḥ vā a jihvāḥ vā a hastāḥ vā a pādāḥ vā a karṇakāḥ

original: vā anāsikā vā yatra buddhaśabdaṃ na śroṣyanti na dharmaśabdaṃ na saṃghaśabdaṃ na
analyzed: vā anāsikāḥ vā yatra buddha śabdam na śroṣyanti na dharma śabdam na saṃgha śabdam na

original: bodhisattvaśabdaṃ na pratyekabuddhaśabdaṃ śroṣyanti nārhacchabdaṃ śroṣyanti te tenaiva
analyzed: bodhisattva śabdam na pratyekabuddha śabdam śroṣyanti na arhat śabdam śroṣyanti te tena eva

original: dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā kṛtenopacitena.
analyzed: dharma vyasana saṃvartanīyena karmaṇā kṛtena upacitena

original: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: pañca bhagavann ānantaryāṇy asya dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyasya karmaṇaḥ kṛtasyopacitasya prativarṇikā api na bhavanti?
analyzed: pañca bhagavan ānantaryāṇi asya dharma vyasana saṃvartanīyasya karmaṇaḥ kṛtasya upacitasya prativarṇikāḥ api na bhavanti

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: prativarṇiketi śāriputra na vaktavyāsya dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyakarmaṇaḥ kṛtasyopacitasya. ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ pratibādhitavyāṃ
analyzed: prativarṇikā iti śāriputra na vaktavyā asya dharma vyasana saṃvartanīya karmaṇaḥ kṛtasya upacitasya ye prajñāpāramitāyām bhāṣyamāṇāyām pratibādhitavyām

original: nātra śikṣitavyaṃ naiṣa dharmo naiṣa vinayo naitac (PSP_2-3:152)
analyzed: na atra śikṣitavyam na eṣa dharmaḥ na eṣa vinayaḥ na etat

original: chāstuḥ śāsanaṃ naitat tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair bhāṣitam iti bhāṣyante,
analyzed: chāstuḥ śāsanam na etat tathāgataiḥ arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ bhāṣitam iti bhāṣyante

original: ta ātmanā ca prativahitavyāṃ maṃsyante,
analyzed: te ātmanā ca prativahitavyām maṃsyante

original: anyāṃś ca sattvān vivecayiṣyanti. te svasaṃtānāny upahatya parasaṃtānāny upahantavyāni
analyzed: anyān ca sattvān vivecayiṣyanti te sva saṃtānāni upahatya para saṃtānāni upahantavyāni

original: maṃsyante. te svasaṃtānaṃ saviṣaṃ kṛtvā parasaṃtānāny api saviṣāṇi kariṣyanti. te
analyzed: maṃsyante te sva saṃtānam sa viṣam kṛtvā para saṃtānāni api sa viṣāṇi kariṣyanti te

original: svayaṃ naṣṭāḥ. parān api nāśayiṣyanti. svayaṃ ca gambhīrāṃ prajñāramitām ajānanto
analyzed: svayam naṣṭāḥ parān api nāśayiṣyanti svayam ca gambhīrām prajñā ramitām a jānantaḥ

original: 'buddhyamānāḥ prativahitavyāṃ maṃsyante,
analyzed: buddhyamānāḥ prativahitavyām maṃsyante

original: parāṃś ca tathaiva grāhayiṣyanti. nāhaṃ śāriputra teṣāṃ pudgalānāṃ śravaṇam apy abhyanujānāmi kaḥ punar vādo darśanaṃ kuta eva sthānaṃ,
analyzed: parān ca tathā eva grāhayiṣyanti na aham śāriputra teṣām pudgalānām śravaṇam api abhyanujānāmi kaḥ punar vādaḥ darśanam kutas eva sthānam

original: tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: dharmadūṣakā hi te śāriputra tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ kaśaṃbakajātīyāḥ kṛṣṇā
analyzed: dharma dūṣakāḥ hi te śāriputra tathārūpāḥ pudgalāḥ veditavyāḥ kaśaṃbaka jātīyāḥ kṛṣṇā

analyzed: hi jātayaḥ śāriputra tathārūpāḥ pudgalāḥ veditavyāḥ teṣām khalu punar śāriputra tathārūpāṇām

original: pudgalānāṃ ye śrotavyaṃ śraddhātavyaṃ maṃsyante te 'nayena vyasanam āpatsyante. yaś
analyzed: pudgalānām ye śrotavyam śraddhātavyam maṃsyante te nayena vyasanam āpatsyante yaḥ

original: cemāṃ śāriputra prajñāpāramitāṃ dūṣayiṣyati dharmadūṣakaḥ sa pudgalo veditavyaḥ.
analyzed: ca imām śāriputra prajñāpāramitām dūṣayiṣyati dharma dūṣakaḥ sa pudgalaḥ veditavyaḥ

original: śāriputra āha:
analyzed: śāriputraḥ āha

original: na khalu punar bhagavaṃs tasya dharmadūṣakasya pudgalasya bhagavatā tatropapannasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇam ākhyātam.
analyzed: na khalu punar bhagavan tasya dharma dūṣakasya pudgalasya bhagavatā tatra upapannasya ātma bhāvasya pramāṇam ākhyātam

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: tiṣṭhatu śāriputra tasya dharmadūṣakasya pudgalasya tatropapannasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tiṣṭhatu śāriputra tasya dharma dūṣakasya pudgalasya tatra upapannasya ātma bhāvasya pramāṇam tat kasya hetoḥ

original: maraṇaṃ vā nigacchet maraṇamātrakaṃ vā,
analyzed: maraṇam vā nigacchet maraṇa mātrakam vā

original: duḥkhaṃ śrutvā śokaśalpasamarpito vā bhavet. ucchoṣyed vā mlāyed vā nīlo vā harito vā lūno vā yāvad idaṃ tasya dharmadūṣakasya pudgalasya dṛśasyātmabhāvapratilābhasya  #
analyzed: duḥkham śrutvā śoka śalpa samarpitaḥ vā bhavet ucchoṣyet vā mlāyet vā nīlaḥ vā haritaḥ vā lūnaḥ vā yāvat idam tasya dharma dūṣakasya pudgalasya dṛśasya ātma bhāva pratilābhasya

original: pramāṇam iti,
analyzed: pramāṇam iti

original: yasyāyam īdṛśo doṣaḥ saṃvidyata iti. na bhagavān āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyāvakāśaṃ karotīdaṃ tasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti.
analyzed: yasya ayam īdṛśaḥ doṣaḥ saṃvidyate iti na bhagavān āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya avakāśam karoti idam tasya ātma bhāvasya pramāṇam bhaviṣyati iti

original: śāriputra āha:
analyzed: śāriputraḥ āha

original: ākhyātu bhagavān paścimāyā janatāyā ālokāḥ kṛto bhaviṣyaty anena dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā kṛtenopacitena dharmadūṣakāḥ pudgalā īdṛśam  #

original: ātmabhāvaṃ parigrahīṣyantīti.
analyzed: ātma bhāvam parigrahīṣyanti iti

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: evam eva śāriputra paścimāyā janatāyā ālokaḥ kṛto bhaviṣyaty anenāsau dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena
analyzed: evam eva śāriputra paścimāyāḥ janatāyāḥ ālokaḥ kṛtaḥ bhaviṣyati anena asau dharma vyasana saṃvartanīyena

original: karmaṇā kṛtenopacitena mahānirayeṣu duḥkham anubhaviṣyati. yā etasyaiva duḥkhasyāpramāṇatā
analyzed: karmaṇā kṛtena upacitena mahānirayeṣu duḥkham anubhaviṣyati yā etasya eva duḥkhasya apramāṇa tā

analyzed: bahutaram ca iyat ciram duḥkhāni pratyanubhaviṣyanti iti

original: eṣa eva śuklāṃśikasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā tebhyo dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyebhyaḥ.
analyzed: eṣaḥ eva śukla aṃśikasya kula putrasya vā kula duhituḥ vā tebhyaḥ dharma vyasana saṃvartanīyebhyaḥ

original: karmabhyo nirvṛttir bhaviṣyati. te jivitahetor api dharmaṃ na pratikṣepsyanti. mā
analyzed: karmabhyaḥ nirvṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati te jivita hetoḥ api dharmam na pratikṣepsyanti mā

original: bhūd asmākam īdṛśair duḥkhaiḥ samavadhānam iti.
analyzed: bhūt asmākam īdṛśaiḥ duḥkhaiḥ samavadhānam iti

original: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:

analyzed: su saṃvṛta kāya vāc manaḥ karmaṇā

original: bhagavan kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitā vā bhavitavyaṃ mā bhūd īdṛśānāṃ duḥkhānām anubhavanam
analyzed: bhagavan kula putreṇa vā kula duhitā vā bhavitavyam mā bhūt īdṛśānām duḥkhānām anubhavanam

original: iti tathāgataṃ vā na drakṣyāma iti dharmaṃ vā na śroṣyāma iti saṃghaṃ vā na drakṣyāma
analyzed: iti tathāgatam vā na drakṣyāmaḥ iti dharmam vā na śroṣyāmaḥ iti saṃgham vā na drakṣyāma

original: ity apagatabuddhotpādeṣu vā buddhakṣetreṣūpapatsyāmaha iti manuṣyadaridreṣu vā agrāhyavacanā
analyzed: iti apagata buddha utpādeṣu vā buddhakṣetreṣu upapatsyāmahe iti manuṣya daridreṣu vā agrāhya vacanā

original: vā bhaviṣyāma ity. anena bhagavan dharmapratikṣepavākkarmaṇā kṛtenopacitena vyasanasaṃvartanīyaṃ
analyzed: vā bhaviṣyāmaḥ iti anena bhagavan dharma pratikṣepa vāc karmaṇā kṛtena upacitena vyasana saṃvartanīyam

original: karmakṛtam upacitaṃ bhavati.
analyzed: karma kṛtam upacitam bhavati

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: anena subhūte sarvadharmapratikṣepavākkarmaṇā kṛtenopacitena dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyaṃ
analyzed: anena subhūte sarva dharma pratikṣepa vāc karmaṇā kṛtena upacitena dharma vyasana saṃvartanīyam

analyzed: karma kṛtam bhavati upacitam iha eva te subhūte moha puruṣāḥ su ākhyāte dharma vinaye

original: pravrajitā bhaviṣyanti. ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dūṣayitavyāṃ maṃsyante pratibādhitavyāṃ
analyzed: pravrajitāḥ bhaviṣyanti ye imām prajñāpāramitām dūṣayitavyām maṃsyante pratibādhitavyām

original: maṃsyante. prajñāpāramitayā subhūte dūṣitayā pratibādhitayā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ
analyzed: maṃsyante prajñāpāramitayā subhūte dūṣitayā pratibādhitayā buddhānām bhagavatām

original: bodhir dūṣitā pratibādhitā bhavati,
analyzed: bodhiḥ dūṣitā pratibādhitā bhavati

analyzed: buddhānām bhagavatām bodhyā dūṣitayā pratibādhitayā atīta anāgata pratyutpannānām buddhānām

analyzed: bhagavatām sarvajña tā dūṣitā bhavati pratibādhitā sarvajña tayā dūṣitayā pratibādhitayā

analyzed: dharmaḥ pratibādhitaḥ bhavati dharmeṇa pratibādhitena saṃghaḥ pratibādhitaḥ bhavati

original: saṃghena pratibādhitena laukikī samyagdṛṣṭir lokottarā ca samyakdṛṣṭiḥ pratibādhitā
analyzed: saṃghena pratibādhitena laukikī samyakdṛṣṭiḥ lokottarā ca samyakdṛṣṭiḥ pratibādhitā

original: bhavati. evaṃ ṣaṭpāramitāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmā āryasatyāny apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ.
analyzed: bhavati evam ṣaḍ pāramitāḥ saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣyāḥ dharmāḥ ārya satyāni a pramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattayaḥ

original: pratibādhitā bhavanti. śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāny aṣṭavimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ
analyzed: pratibādhitāḥ bhavanti śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukhāni aṣṭa vimokṣāḥ nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattayaḥ

original: ṣaḍabhijñāḥ pratibādhitā bhavanti. adhyātmaśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā sarvasamādhayaḥ
analyzed: ṣaṣ abhijñāḥ pratibādhitāḥ bhavanti adhyātma śūnyatā yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā sarva samādhayaḥ

original: sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśabodhisattvabhūmayaḥ pratibādhitā bhavanti. daśatathāgatabalāni
analyzed: sarva dhāraṇī mukhāni daśa bodhisattva bhūmayaḥ pratibādhitāḥ bhavanti daśa tathāgata balāni

original: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ pratibādhitā
analyzed: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ ṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ pratibādhitā

original: bhavanti. yāvat sarvajñatā pratibādhitā bhavati. sarvajñatayā pratibādhitayāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇo
analyzed: bhavanti yāvat sarvajña tā pratibādhitā bhavati sarvajña tayā pratibādhitayā aprameya asaṃkhyeya aparimāṇaḥ

original: 'puṇyaskandhaḥ parigṛhīto bhavati. tena vāpuṇyaskandhena parigṛhitenāprameyam asaṃkhyeyam
analyzed: puṇya skandhaḥ parigṛhītaḥ bhavati tena vā a puṇya skandhena parigṛhitena aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam

original: aparimāṇaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ parigṛhītaṃ bhavati.
analyzed: aparimāṇam duḥkha daurmanasyam parigṛhītam bhavati

original: iti dharmavyasanasaṃvartanakarma
analyzed: iti dharma vyasana saṃvartana karma

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: ya ime bhagavan mohapuruṣā gambhirāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pratibādhiṣyanti,
analyzed: ye ime bhagavat moha puruṣāḥ gambhirām prajñāpāramitām pratibādhiṣyanti

original: katamair ākārair imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pratibādhiṣyanti?
analyzed: katamaiḥ ākāraiḥ imām prajñāpāramitām pratibādhiṣyanti

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: caturbhiḥ subhūte ākārais te mohapuruṣā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pratibādhiṣyanti. katamaiś caturbhir?
analyzed: caturbhiḥ subhūte ākāraiḥ te moha puruṣāḥ imām gambhīrām prajñāpāramitām pratibādhiṣyanti katamaiḥ caturbhiḥ

original: yad uta mārādhiṣṭhitāś ca te mohapuruṣā bhaviṣyanti. anabhiyuktāś ca gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu bhaviṣyanti (PSP_2-3:154)
analyzed: yat uta māra adhiṣṭhitāḥ ca te moha puruṣāḥ bhaviṣyanti anabhiyuktāḥ ca gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu bhaviṣyanti

original: na ca prasādaṃ pratilapsyante. abhiniviṣṭāś ca te pañcaskandheṣu bhaviṣyanti pāpamitrahastagatā.
analyzed: na ca prasādam pratilapsyante abhiniviṣṭāḥ ca te pañca skandheṣu bhaviṣyanti pāpa mitra hasta gatā

original: doṣacaritāś ca te mohapuruṣā bhaviṣyanty ātmotkarṣakāḥ parapaṃsakāḥ. ebhiḥ subhūte
analyzed: doṣa caritāḥ ca te moha puruṣāḥ bhaviṣyanti ātma utkarṣakāḥ parapaṃsakāḥ ebhiḥ subhūte

original: caturbhir ākāraiḥ samanvāgatās te mohapuruṣā gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pratikṣepsyanti.
analyzed: caturbhiḥ ākāraiḥ samanvāgatāḥ te moha puruṣāḥ gambhīrām prajñāpāramitām pratikṣepsyanti

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: duradhimocyā bhagavan gambhīrā prajñāpāramitānabhiyuktena kuśalamūlavirahitena pāpamitrahastagatena.
analyzed: duradhimocyā bhagavan gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā anabhiyuktena kuśala mūla virahitena pāpa mitra hasta gatena

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: evam etat subhūte duradhimocyā gambhīrā prajñāpāramitānabhiyuktaiḥ kuśalamūlavirahitaiḥ pāpamitrahastagataiḥ.
analyzed: evam etat subhūte duradhimocyā gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā anabhiyuktaiḥ kuśala mūla virahitaiḥ pāpa mitra hasta gataiḥ

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: kiyad bhagavan gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā yeyaṃ duradhimocyā?
analyzed: kiyat bhagavan gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā yā iyam duradhimocyā

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: rūpaṃ subhūte 'baddham amuktaṃ. tat kasya heto?
analyzed: rūpam subhūte baddham amuktam tat kasya heto

original: rūpāsvabhāvo hi subhūte rūpaṃ,
analyzed: rūpa asvabhāvaḥ hi subhūte rūpam

original: vedanāsvabhāvo hi vedanā,
analyzed: vedanā svabhāvaḥ hi vedanā

original: saṃjñāsvabhāvo hi saṃjñā,
analyzed: saṃjñā svabhāvaḥ hi saṃjñā

original: saṃskārāsvabhāvo hi saṃskārā,
analyzed: saṃskāra asvabhāvaḥ hi saṃskārā

original: vijñānaṃ subhūte 'baddham amuktam. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: vijñānam subhūte baddham amuktam tat kasya hetoḥ

original: vijñānāsvabhāvo hi vijñānam. dānapāramitā subhūte 'baddhāmuktā. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: vijñāna asvabhāvaḥ hi vijñānam dāna pāramitā subhūte baddhāmuktā tat kasya hetoḥ

original: dānapāramitāsvabhāvā hi dānapāramitā. evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā subhūte 'baddhāmuktā. tat  #
analyzed: dāna pāramitā svabhāvā hi dāna pāramitā evam śīla pāramitā kṣānti pāramitā vīrya pāramitā dhyāna pāramitā prajñāpāramitā subhūte baddhāmuktā tat

original: kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: kasya hetoḥ

original: prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvā hi prajñāpāramitā. adhyātmaśūnyatā subhūte 'baddhāmuktā. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā svabhāvā hi prajñāpāramitā adhyātma śūnyatā subhūte baddhāmuktā tat kasya hetoḥ

original: adhyātmaśūnyatāsvabhāvā hy adhyātmaśūnyatā,
analyzed: adhyātma śūnyatā svabhāvā hi adhyātma śūnyatā

original: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā subhūte 'baddhāmuktā. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā subhūte baddhāmuktā tat kasya hetoḥ

original: abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvā hy abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā. smṛtyupasthānāni subhūte 'baddhāny amuktāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā a svabhāvā hi abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā smṛti upasthānāni subhūte baddhāni amuktāni tat kasya hetoḥ

original: smṛtyupasthānāsvabhāvā hi smṛtyupasthānām. evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabodhyaṅgāni mārgāḥ subhūte 'baddhā amuktās. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: smṛti upasthāna asvabhāvāḥ hi smṛti upasthānām evam samyak prahāṇa ṛddhipāda indriya bodhyaṅgāni mārgāḥ subhūte baddhāḥ amuktāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: mārgāsvabhāvā hi mārgāḥ. evaṃ daśabalāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ sarvākārajñatā subhūte 'baddhāmuktā. tat kasya
analyzed: mārga asvabhāvāḥ hi mārgāḥ evam daśa balāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvidaḥ ṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ sarva ākārajña tā subhūte baddha amuktā tat kasya

original: sarvākārajñatāsvabhāvo hi subhūte sarvākārajñatā. rūpasya subhūte pūrvānto 'baddho 'muktas. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: sarva ākāra jña tā svabhāvaḥ hi subhūte sarva ākāra jña tā rūpasya subhūte pūrva antaḥ baddhaḥ muktaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: pūrvāntābhāvasvabhāvo hi subhūte rūpaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ vijñānasya subhūte pūrvānto 'baddho 'muktas. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: pūrva anta abhāva svabhāvaḥ hi subhūte rūpam vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānasya subhūte pūrva antaḥ baddhaḥ muktaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: pūrvāntābhāvasvabhāvo hi subhūte vijñānam,
analyzed: pūrva anta abhāva svabhāvaḥ hi subhūte vijñānam

original: evaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāḥ subhūte pūrvānto 'baddho 'muktas. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: evam yāvat sarva ākārajña tāyāḥ subhūte pūrva antaḥ baddhaḥ muktaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: pūrvānto 'bhāvasvabhāvo hi subhūte sarvākārajñatā. rūpasya subhūte 'parānto 'baddho 'muktas. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: pūrva antaḥ bhāva svabhāvaḥ hi subhūte sarva ākāra jña tā rūpasya subhūte para antaḥ baddhaḥ muktaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: aparānto 'bhāvasvabhāvo hi subhūte rūpaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānasya subhūte 'parānto 'baddho 'muktaḥ. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: apara antaḥ bhāva svabhāvaḥ hi subhūte rūpam vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānasya subhūte para antaḥ baddhaḥ muktaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: aparāntābhāvasvabhāvo (PSP_2-3:155)
analyzed: apara anta abhāva svabhāvaḥ

original: hi subhūte vijñānam. evaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāḥ subhūte 'parānto 'baddho 'muktaḥ. tat kasya hetor?
analyzed: hi subhūte vijñānam evam yāvat sarva ākārajña tāyāḥ subhūte parāntaḥ baddhaḥ muktaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: aparāntābhāvasvabhāvo hi subhūte sarvākārajñatā. rūpaṃ subhūte pratyutpannam abaddham amuktaṃ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: apara anta abhāva svabhāvaḥ hi subhūte sarva ākāra jña tā rūpam subhūte pratyutpannam abaddham amuktam tat kasya hetoḥ

original: pratyutpannābhāvasvabhāvo hi subhūte rūpaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā,
analyzed: pratyutpanna abhāva svabhāvaḥ hi subhūte rūpam vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā

original: vijñānaṃ subhūte pratyutpannam abaddham amuktaṃ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: vijñānam subhūte pratyutpannam abaddham amuktam tat kasya hetoḥ

original: pratyutpannābhāvasvabhāvo hi subhūte vijñānaṃ. yāvat sarvākārajñatā pratyutpannābaddhāmuktā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: pratyutpanna abhāva svabhāvaḥ hi subhūte vijñānam yāvat sarva ākāra jña tā pratyutpannā abaddha amuktā tat kasya hetoḥ

original: pratyutpannābhāvasvabhāvo hi subhūte sarvākārajñatā.
analyzed: pratyutpanna abhāva svabhāvaḥ hi subhūte sarva ākārajña tā

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: duradhimocyā bhagavan prajñāpāramitānabhiyuktair anavaropitakuśalamūlaiḥ pāpamitrahastagatair māravaśagataiḥ kuśīdair hīnavīryair muṣitasmṛtibhir
analyzed: duradhimocyā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā anabhiyuktaiḥ an avaropita kuśala mūlaiḥ pāpa mitra hasta gataiḥ māra vaśa gataiḥ kuśīdaiḥ hīna vīryaiḥ muṣita smṛtibhiḥ

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: evam etat subhūte duradhimocyā subhūte prajñāpāramitānabhiyuktair anavaropitakuśalamūlaiḥ pāpamitrahastagatair māravaśagataiḥ kuśīdair hīnavīryair  #
analyzed: evam etat subhūte duradhimocyā subhūte prajñāpāramitā anabhiyuktaiḥ an avaropita kuśala mūlaiḥ pāpa mitra hasta gataiḥ māra vaśa gataiḥ kuśīdaiḥ hīna vīryaiḥ  /

original: muṣitasmṛtibhir asaṃprajānaiḥ.
analyzed: muṣita smṛtibhiḥ a saṃprajānaiḥ

original: iti karmāvaraṇasya catvāro hetavaḥ
analyzed: iti karma āvaraṇasya catvāraḥ hetavaḥ

original: yā subhūte rūpasya viśuddhiḥ phalaviśuddhir eva sā,
analyzed: yā subhūte rūpasya viśuddhiḥ phala viśuddhiḥ eva sā

original: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ,
analyzed: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām

original: yā vijñānasya viśuddhiḥ phalaviśuddhir eva sā. yā dānapāramitāyā viśuddhiḥ phalaviśuddhir eva sā. evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā
analyzed: yā vijñānasya viśuddhiḥ phala viśuddhiḥ eva sā yā dāna pāramitāyāḥ viśuddhiḥ phala viśuddhiḥ eva sā evam śīla pāramitāyāḥ kṣānti pāramitāyāḥ vīrya pāramitāyāḥ

original: yā prajñāpāramitāyā viśuddhiḥ phalaviśuddhir eva sā. yādhyātmaśūnyatāyā viśuddhiḥ
analyzed: yā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ viśuddhiḥ phala viśuddhiḥ eva sā yā adhyātma śūnyatāyāḥ viśuddhiḥ

original: phalaviśuddhir eva sā. yāvad yābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā viśuddhiḥ phalaviśuddhir eva
analyzed: phala viśuddhiḥ eva sā yāvat yā abhāva svabhāva śūnyatāyāḥ viśuddhiḥ phala viśuddhiḥ eva

original: sā. evaṃ yā saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ viśuddhiḥ phalaviśuddhir eva sā.
analyzed: sā evam yā saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣyāṇām dharmāṇām viśuddhiḥ phala viśuddhiḥ eva sā

original: evam āryasatyānām apramāṇānāṃ dhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ yā viśuddhiḥ phalaviśuddhir
analyzed: evam ārya satyānām apramāṇānām dhyāna ārūpya samāpattīnām yā viśuddhiḥ phala viśuddhiḥ

original: eva sā. yā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānāṃ viśuddhiḥ phalaviśuddhir eva sā. yāṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ
analyzed: eva sā yā śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihitānām viśuddhiḥ phala viśuddhiḥ eva sā yā aṣṭānām vimokṣāṇām

original: navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ viśuddhiḥ phalaviśuddhir eva sā. yā ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ
analyzed: nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattīnām viśuddhiḥ phala viśuddhiḥ eva sā yā ṣaṇṇām abhijñānām

original: viśuddhiḥ phalaviśuddhir eva sā. evaṃ yā sarvasamādhīnāṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ viśuddhiḥ
analyzed: viśuddhiḥ phala viśuddhiḥ eva sā evam yā sarva samādhīnām sarva dhāraṇī mukhānām viśuddhiḥ

original: phalaviśuddhir eva sā. yā daśānāṃ bodhisattvabhūmīnāṃ viśuddhiḥ phalaviśuddhir eva
analyzed: phala viśuddhiḥ eva sā yā daśānām bodhisattva bhūmīnām viśuddhiḥ phala viśuddhiḥ eva

original: sā. yā daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ viśuddhiś caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ
analyzed: sā yā daśānām tathāgata balānām viśuddhiḥ caturṇām vaiśāradyānām catasṛṇām pratisaṃvidām

original: yāvad aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ viśuddhiḥ phalaviśuddhir eva sā. yā
analyzed: yāvat aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānām buddha dharmāṇām viśuddhiḥ phala viśuddhiḥ eva sā yā

original: bodher viśuddhiḥ phalaviśuddhir eva sā.
analyzed: bodheḥ viśuddhiḥ phala viśuddhiḥ eva sā

original: punar aparaṃ subhūte yā rūpaviśuddhiḥ phalaviśuddhir eva sā,
analyzed: punar aparam subhūte yā rūpa viśuddhiḥ phala viśuddhiḥ eva sā

original: yā phalaviśuddhiḥ prajñāpāramitāviśuddhiḥ sā,
analyzed: yā phala viśuddhiḥ prajñāpāramitā viśuddhiḥ sā

original: yā prajñāpāramitāviśuddhiḥ rāpaviśuddhiḥ. (PSP_2-3:156)
analyzed: yā prajñāpāramitā viśuddhiḥ rāpa viśuddhiḥ

original: sā iti hi rūpaviśuddhiś ca phalaviśuddhiś ca prajñāpāramitāviśuddhiś cādvayam etad
analyzed: sā iti hi rūpa viśuddhiḥ ca phala viśuddhiḥ ca prajñāpāramitā viśuddhiḥ ca advayam etat

original: advaidhīkāram abhinnam acchinnam. evaṃ yāvad yā sarvākārajñatāviśuddhiḥ prajñāpāramitāviśuddhiḥ sā,
analyzed: a dvaidhīkāram a bhinnam a chinnam evam yāvat yā sarva ākāra jña tā viśuddhiḥ prajñāpāramitā viśuddhiḥ sā

original: yā prajñāpāramitāviśuddhiḥ. sarvākārajñatāviśuddhiḥ. sā iti hi sarvākārajñatāviśuddhiś
analyzed: yā prajñāpāramitā viśuddhiḥ sarva ākāra jña tā viśuddhiḥ sā iti hi sarva ākāra jña tā viśuddhiḥ

original: ca prajñāpāramitāviśuddhiś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram abhinnam acchinnam. iti viśuddhisāmānyam
analyzed: ca prajñāpāramitā viśuddhiḥ ca advayam etat a dvaidhīkāram a bhinnam a chinnam iti viśuddhi sāmānyam

original: punar aparaṃ subhūte yā ātmaviśuddhiḥ rūpaviśuddhiḥ sā,
analyzed: punar aparam subhūte yā ātma viśuddhiḥ rūpa viśuddhiḥ sā

original: yā rūpaviśuddhir ātmaviśuddhiḥ sā iti hy ātmaviśuddhiś ca rūpaviśuddhiś cādvayam
analyzed: yā rūpa viśuddhiḥ ātma viśuddhiḥ sā iti hi ātma viśuddhiḥ ca rūpa viśuddhiḥ ca advayam

original: etad advaidhikāram abhinnam acchinnam. evaṃ yā sattvajīvapoṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajānakapaśyakaviśuddhiḥ rūpaviśuddhiḥ sā,
analyzed: etat a dvaidhikāram a bhinnam a chinnam evam yā sattva jīva poṣa puruṣa pudgala manuja mānava kāraka vedaka jānaka paśyaka viśuddhiḥ rūpa viśuddhiḥ sā

original: yā rūpaviśuddhir yāvat paśyakaviśuddhiḥ sā iti hi yāvat paśyakaviśuddhiś ca rūpaviśuddhiś
analyzed: yā rūpa viśuddhiḥ yāvat paśyaka viśuddhiḥ sā iti hi yāvat paśyaka viśuddhiḥ ca rūpa viśuddhiḥ

original: cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram abhinnam acchinnam. evaṃ yāvad yā paśyakaviśuddhiḥ sarvajñatāviśuddhiḥ sā,
analyzed: ca advayam etat a dvaidhīkāram a bhinnam a chinnam evam yāvat yā paśyaka viśuddhiḥ sarvajña tā viśuddhiḥ sā

original: yā sarvajñatāviśuddhiḥ paśyakaviśuddhiḥ sā iti hi paśyakaviśuddhiś ca sarvajñatāviśuddhiś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram abhinnam acchinnam.
analyzed: yā sarvajña tā viśuddhiḥ paśyaka viśuddhiḥ sā iti hi paśyaka viśuddhiḥ ca sarvajña tā viśuddhiḥ ca advayam etat a dvaidhīkāram a bhinnam a chinnam

original: punar aparaṃ subhūte ātmapariśuddhyā rūpaviśuddhī rūpaviśuddhyā ātmapariśuddhir iti
analyzed: punar aparam subhūte ātma pariśuddhyā rūpa viśuddhī rūpa viśuddhyā ātma pariśuddhiḥ iti

original: hy ātmapariśuddhiś ca rūpapariśuddhiś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram abhinnam acchinnam.
analyzed: hi ātma pariśuddhiḥ ca rūpa pariśuddhiḥ ca advayam etat a dvaidhīkāram a bhinnam a chinnam

original: evaṃ sattvajīvapoṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajānakapaśyakapariśuddhyā
analyzed: evam sattva jīva poṣa puruṣa pudgala manuja mānava kāraka vedaka jānaka paśyaka pariśuddhyā

original: rūpaviśuddhiḥ rūpapariśuddhyā yāvat paśyakapariśuddhir iti hi paśyakapariśuddhiś
analyzed: rūpa viśuddhiḥ rūpa pariśuddhyāḥ yāvat paśyaka pariśuddhiḥ iti hi paśyaka pariśuddhiḥ

original: ca rūpapariśuddhiś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram abhinnam acchinnam. evaṃ yāvat paśyakapariśuddhyā

original: sarvajñatāpariśuddhiḥ sarvajñatāviśuddhyā paśyakapariśuddhir iti hi paśyakaviśuddhiś
analyzed: sarvajña tā pariśuddhiḥ sarvajña tā viśuddhyā paśyaka pariśuddhiḥ iti hi paśyaka viśuddhiḥ

original: ca sarvajñatāpariśuddhiś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram abhinnam acchinnam.
analyzed: ca sarvajña tā pariśuddhiḥ ca advayam etat a dvaidhīkāram a bhinnam a chinnam

analyzed: acchinnam evam doṣa moha pariśuddhyā rūpa pariśuddhiḥ yāvat sarvajña tā pariśuddhiḥ iti

analyzed: iti śrāvakasya kleśa āvaraṇa viśuddhiḥ

original: vedanāviśuddhiḥ vedanāviśuddhyā tṛṣṇāviśuddhiḥ tṛṣṇāviśuddhyā upādānaviśuddhir upādānaviśuddhyā
analyzed: vedanā viśuddhiḥ vedanā viśuddhyā tṛṣṇā viśuddhiḥ tṛṣṇā viśuddhyā upādāna viśuddhiḥ upādāna viśuddhyā

original: jarāmaranaḍokaparidevaduṣkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaviśuddhyā sarvajñatāviśuddhir iti hi

analyzed: etat a dvaidhīkāram a bhinnam a chinnam

analyzed: pratisaṃvid viśuddhiḥ pratisaṃvid viśuddhyāḥ āveṇika buddha dharma viśuddhiḥ āveṇika buddha dharma viśuddhyā

original: sarvajñatāviśuddhir (PSP_2-3:158)
iti hi sarvajñatāviśuddhiś cāveṇikabuddhadharmaviśuddhiś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram abhinnam acchinnam.
analyzed: iti hi sarvajña tā viśuddhiḥ ca āveṇika buddha dharma viśuddhiḥ ca advayam etat a dvaidhīkāram a bhinnam a chinnam

original: iti bodhisattvasya yānatrayamārgaviśuddhiḥ

analyzed: sā sarva ākāra jña tā viśuddhiḥ iti hi dāna pāramitā viśuddhiḥ ca vijñāna viśuddhiḥ ca sarva ākāra jña tā viśuddhiḥ

analyzed: ca advayam etat a dvaidhīkāram a bhinnam a chinnam

original: punar aparaṃ subhūte sarvākāpajñatāviśuddhiś ca prajñārāramitāviśuddhiś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram abhinnam acchinnam. iti mṛdumadhyamārgaḥ

original: cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram abhinnam acchinnam.

analyzed: dhyāna pāramitāyām carati iti saṅgaḥ

original: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti saṅgaḥ. smṛtyupasthāneṣu caratīti saṅgaḥ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgeṣu
analyzed: prajñāpāramitāyām carati iti saṅgaḥ smṛti upasthāneṣu carati iti saṅgaḥ samyak prahāṇa ṛddhipāda indriya bala bodhyaṅga mārgeṣu

original: caratīti saṅgaḥ. evam apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattisu caratīti saṅgaḥ. āryasatyeṣu
analyzed: carati iti saṅgaḥ evam apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattisu carati iti saṅgaḥ ārya satyeṣu

original: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣv aṣṭavimokṣeṣu (PSP_2-3:167)
analyzed: śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihiteṣu aṣṭa vimokṣeṣu

original: navānupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣv abhijñāsu sarvaśūnyatāsu sarvasamādhiṣu sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu caratīti saṅgaḥ. daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu  #
analyzed: nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattiṣu abhijñāsu sarva śūnyatāsu sarva samādhiṣu sarva dhāraṇī mukheṣu carati iti saṅgaḥ daśa bala vaiśāradya pratisaṃvid āveṇika buddha dharmeṣu

original: caratīti saṅagḥ,
analyzed: carati iti saṅagḥ

original: yāvat sarvajñatāyāṃ caratīti saṅgaḥ. iti vipakṣaḥ

original: yat punar āyuṣman śāriputraivaṃ vadasi,
analyzed: yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evam vadasi

original: katamo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratām asaṅga iti. na khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ  #
analyzed: katamaḥ bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām prajñāpāramitāyām caratām asaṅgaḥ iti na khalu punar śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyām

analyzed: na hi kauśika rūpasya prakṛtiḥ śakyā pariṇāmayitum

analyzed: evam vyasta samastānām skandha dhātu āyatanānām pratītyasamutpādasya na ca śakyā prakṛtiḥ

analyzed: apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattīnām śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihitānām aṣṭānām vimokṣāṇām nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattīnām

analyzed: pratisaṃvidām āveṇikānām buddha dharmāṇām na śakyā prakṛtiḥ pariṇāmayitum na hi kauśika

analyzed: saṃdarśayitavyaḥ samādāpayitavyaḥ samuttejayitavyaḥ saṃpraharṣayitavyaḥ evam hi kula putreṇa vā kula duhitrā vā sarvāḥ saṅga koṭyaḥ parivarjitā  /

analyzed: bhaviṣyanti iti punar pratipakṣaḥ

original: sādhu sādhu subhūte yas tvaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām imāḥ saṅgakoṭir uddiśasi.

analyzed: aparāḥ te subhūte saṅga koṭīḥ sūkṣmatarāḥ nirdekṣyāmi tāḥ śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru

analyzed: bhāṣiṣye ham te evam bhagavan iti āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt

original: bhagavān etad avocat:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avocat

original: iha subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitas
analyzed: iha subhūte kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitaḥ

original: tathāgatān nimittato manasikaroti yāvat subhūte nimittaṃ tāvat saṅgaḥ. yad api teṣāṃ
analyzed: tathāgatān nimittataḥ manasikaroti yāvat subhūte nimittam tāvat saṅgaḥ yat api teṣām

original: tathāgatānāṃ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvac cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhānāṃ
analyzed: tathāgatānām prathama citta utpādam upādāya yāvat ca anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhānām

original: yāvad anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtānāṃ yāvat saddharmasthitir etasminn antare
analyzed: yāvat an upadhi śeṣe nirvāṇa dhātau parinirvṛtānām yāvat saddharma sthitiḥ etasmin antare

original: yat kiṃcit kuśalamūlaṃ tat sarvaṃ nimittato manasikaroti manasikṛtvā anuttarāyai
analyzed: yat kiṃcid kuśala mūlam tat sarvam nimittataḥ manasikaroti manasikṛtvā anuttarāyai

original: samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
analyzed: samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati

original: yāvat subhūte nimittato manasikaroti tāvat saṅgaḥ. yāny api teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ sarvasaṅgāpagatānāṃ sarvasaṅgāpagatāni kuśalamūlāni,
analyzed: yāvat subhūte nimittataḥ manasikaroti tāvat saṅgaḥ yāni api teṣām tathāgatānām sarva saṅga apagatānām sarva saṅga apagatāni kuśala mūlāni

original: tato 'nyeṣām api sattvānāṃ yāni kuśalamulāni tāny api nimittato manasikaroti manasikṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
analyzed: tatas nyeṣām api sattvānām yāni kuśala mulāni tāni api nimittataḥ manasikaroti manasikṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati

original: yāvat subhūte nimittato manasikaroti tāvat saṅgaḥ. tat kasya hetor?

analyzed: na anātmā iti carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām vijñānam na śubham na aśubham iti carati

analyzed: daśa bala vaiśāradya pratisaṃvid āveṇika buddha dharmāḥ yāvat sarvajña tā na nityā na anityā iti

analyzed: carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām

analyzed: sarvajña tā na ātmā na anātmā iti carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām

analyzed: sarvajña tā na śubhā na aśubhā iti carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām tat kasya hetoḥ

original: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni

original: daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmā yāvan na sā sarvajñatā tathā saṃvidyate
analyzed: daśa bala vaiśāradya pratisaṃvid āveṇika buddha dharmāḥ yāvat na sā sarvajña tā tathā saṃvidyate

original: yasyā nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā ātmā vā anātmā vā śubhaṃ vā aśubhaṃ

analyzed: vā iti rūpa ādi anitya ādi prayogaḥ

original: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran saced rūpam aparipūrṇaṃ paripūrṇam iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,

analyzed: evam skandha dhātu āyatana pratītyasamutpāda aṅgāni a paripūrṇāni paripūrṇāni iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām evam sarva pāramitāḥ

analyzed: a paripūrṇāḥ paripūrṇāḥ iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām evam ārya satyāni a pramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattayaḥ

original: iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yāvat sarvajñatā aparipūrṇāḥ paripūrṇā iti

original: na carati carati prajñāpārainitāyāṃ. tat kasya hetoḥ?

original: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyāparipūrṇatā paripūrṇatā vā yā na tad vijñānam

original: rūpādyaparipūriprayoga.
analyzed: rūpa ādya paripūri prayoga

original: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ saṅgam asaṅgam iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
analyzed: punar aparam subhūte bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran rūpam saṅgam asaṅgam iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām

original: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānaṃ saṅgam asaṅgam iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām. cakṣuḥ saṅgam asaṅgam iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām,
analyzed: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānam saṅgam asaṅgam iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām cakṣuḥ saṅgam asaṅgam iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām

original: evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo manaḥ saṅgam asaṅgam iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām. evaṃ sarvāyataneṣu dhātuṣu ca dānapāramitā sasaṅgāsaṅgeti  #
analyzed: evam śrotram ghrāṇam jihvā kāyaḥ manaḥ saṅgam asaṅgam iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām evam sarva āyataneṣu dhātuṣu ca dāna pāramitā sa saṅgā asaṅgā iti

original: na carati,
analyzed: na carati

original: carati prajñāpāramitāyām,
analyzed: carati prajñāpāramitāyām

original: evaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñāpāramitā sasaṅgāsaṅgeti na carati carati
analyzed: evam śīlam kṣāntim vīryam dhyānam prajñāpāramitā sa saṅgā asaṅgā iti na carati carati

original: prajñāpāramitāyām. evaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmā āryasatyāny apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ
analyzed: prajñāpāramitāyām evam saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣyāḥ dharmāḥ ārya satyāni a pramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattayaḥ

original: sasaṅgā asaṅgā iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
analyzed: sa saṅgāḥ asaṅgāḥ iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām

original: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāny abhijñāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sasaṅgā asaṅgā iti na carati caṛati
analyzed: śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihitāni abhijñāḥ sarva śūnyatāḥ sa saṅgāḥ asaṅgāḥ iti na carati caṛati

original: prajñāpāramitāyām. evaṃ daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido
analyzed: prajñāpāramitāyām evam daśa tathāgata balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ

original: 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni saṛvajñatā sasaṅgāsaṅgeti (PSP_2-3:173)
analyzed: ṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ sarva samādhayaḥ sarva dhāraṇī mukhāni sa ṛvajña tā sa saṅgā asaṅgā iti

original: na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām.
analyzed: na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām

original: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpaṃ sasaṅgam asaṅgam iti,
analyzed: evam caran subhūte bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ na rūpam sa saṅgam asaṅgam iti

original: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ sasaṅgam asaṅgam iti saṃjānīte. evaṃ
analyzed: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ na vijñānam sa saṅgam asaṅgam iti saṃjānīte evam

original: skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādapāramitāśūnyatābodhipakṣyā dharmā āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo
analyzed: skandha dhātu āyatana pratītyasamutpāda pāramitā śūnyatā bodhi pakṣyāḥ dharmāḥ ārya satya apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattayaḥ

original: 'bhijñāśūnyatānimittāpraṇihitasamādhidhāraṇīmukhadaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmā
analyzed: bhijñā śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita samādhi dhāraṇī mukha daśa bala vaiśāradya pratisaṃvid āveṇika buddha dharmā

original: na sasaṅgā asaṇgā iti saṃjānīte. prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvajñatā na sasaṅgāsaṅgeti
analyzed: na sa saṅgāḥ asaṇgāḥ iti saṃjānīte prajñāpāramitāyām caran sarvajña tā na sa saṅgā asaṅgā iti

original: saṃjānīte. na srotaāpattiphalaṃ na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānāgāmiphalaṃ nārhattvaṃ na
analyzed: saṃjānīte na srotaāpatti phalam na sakṛdāgāmi phalam na anāgāmi phalam na arhat tvam na

original: pratyekabodhir nānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ. sasaṅgāsaṅgeti saṃjānīte. iti rūpādiṣv asaṅgaprayogaḥ
analyzed: pratyeka bodhiḥ na anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ sa saṅgā asaṅgā iti saṃjānīte iti rūpa ādiṣu asaṅga prayogaḥ

original: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: āścaryam etad bhagavan yāvad iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā deśyamānāpi na hīyate,
analyzed: āścaryam etat bhagavan yāvat iyam gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā deśyamānā api na hīyate

original: adeśyamānāpi na hīyate,
analyzed: a deśyamānā api na hīyate

original: deśyamānāpi na vardhate,
analyzed: deśyamānā api na vardhate

original: adeśyamānāpi na vardhate.
analyzed: a deśyamānā api na vardhate

original: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
analyzed: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam subhūtim etat avocat

original: evam etat subhūte prajñāpāramitā deśyamānāpi na hīyate,
analyzed: evam etat subhūte prajñāpāramitā deśyamānā api na hīyate

original: adeśyamānāpi na hīyate,
analyzed: a deśyamānā api na hīyate

original: deśyamānāpi na vardhate,
analyzed: deśyamānā api na vardhate

original: adeśyamānāpi na vardhate. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭhann ākāśasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeta avarṇaṃ vā,
analyzed: a deśyamānā api na vardhate tat yathā api nāma subhūte tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ yāvajjīvam tiṣṭhan ākāśasya varṇam bhāṣeta avarṇam vā

original: na khalu punar ākāśasya varṇe bhāṣyamāṇe vṛddhir avarṇe bhāṣyamāṇe hāniḥ,
analyzed: na khalu punar ākāśasya varṇe bhāṣyamāṇe vṛddhiḥ a varṇe bhāṣyamāṇe hāniḥ

original: na cākāśaṃ varṇena vardhate avarṇena hīyate.
analyzed: na ca ākāśam varṇena vardhate a varṇena hīyate

original: ity adhikāraprayogaḥ
analyzed: iti adhikāra prayogaḥ

original: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte māyāpuruṣo varṇe bhāṣyamāṇe na vardhate,
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma subhūte māyā puruṣaḥ varṇe bhāṣyamāṇe na vardhate

original: avarṇe bhāṣyamāṇe na parihīyate,
analyzed: avarṇe bhāṣyamāṇe na parihīyate

original: varṇe bhāṣyamāṇe nānunīyate,
analyzed: varṇe bhāṣyamāṇe na anunīyate

original: avarṇe bhāṣyamāṇena pratihanyate. evam eva subhūte yā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā deśitāpi tāvaty eva,
analyzed: avarṇe bhāṣyamāṇena pratihanyate evam eva subhūte yā dharmāṇām dharma tā sā deśitā api tāvatī eva

original: adeśitāpi tāvaty eva. ity akartṛprayogaḥ
analyzed: a deśitā api tāvatī eva iti a kartṛ prayogaḥ

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: duṣkarakārako bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ na saṃsīdati,
analyzed: duṣkara kārakaḥ bhagavan bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran prajñāpāramitāyām bhāṣyamāṇāyām na saṃsīdati

original: na vipṛṣṭhībhavati mānasam,
analyzed: na vipṛṣṭhībhavati mānasam

original: atra ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate,
analyzed: atra ca prajñāpāramitāyām yogam āpadyate

original: na ca pratyudāvartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: na ca pratyudāvartate nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: ākāśabhāvanaiṣā bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitābhāvanā,
analyzed: ākāśa bhāvanā eṣā bhagavan yat uta prajñāpāramitā bhāvanā

original: na cākāśe prajñāpāramitā prajñāyate,
analyzed: na ca ākāśe prajñāpāramitā prajñāyate

original: na dhyānapāramitā na vīryapāramitā na kṣāntipāramitā na śīlapāramitā na dānapāramitā prajñāyate. nākāśe rūpaṃ prajñāyate,
analyzed: na dhyāna pāramitā na vīrya pāramitā na kṣānti pāramitā na śīla pāramitā na dāna pāramitā prajñāyate na ākāśe rūpam prajñāyate

original: na vedanā na saṃjñā na (PSP_2-3:174)
analyzed: na vedanā na saṃjñā na

original: saṃskārā nākāśe vijñāyate. nākāśe 'dhyātmaśūnyatā prajñāyate,
analyzed: saṃskārāḥ na ākāśe vijñāyate na ākāśe dhyā ātma śūnyatā prajñāyate

original: na bahirdhāśūnyatā prajñāyate,
analyzed: na bahirdhā śūnyatā prajñāyate

original: nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā prajñāyate,
analyzed: na adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā prajñāyate

original: yāvan nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā prajñāyate. nākāśe smṛtyupasthānāni prajñāyante. nākāśe
analyzed: yāvat na abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā prajñāyate na ākāśe smṛti upasthānāni prajñāyante na ākāśe

original: samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgāḥ prajñāyante. nākāśa āryasatyāni prajñāyante.
analyzed: samyakprahāṇa ṛddhipāda indriya bala bodhyaṅga mārgāḥ prajñāyante na ākāśe ārya satyāni prajñāyante

original: nākāśe 'pramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ prajñāyante. nākāśe 'ṣṭavimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ
analyzed: na ākāśe pramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattayaḥ prajñāyante na ākāśe ṣṭa vimokṣāḥ nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattayaḥ

original: prajñāyante. nākāśe śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñāḥ prajñāyante. nākāśe samādhidhāraṇīmukhāni
analyzed: prajñāyante na ākāśe śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita abhijñāḥ prajñāyante na ākāśe samādhi dhāraṇī mukhāni

original: prajñāyante. nākāśe samādhidhāraṇīmukhāni prajñāyante. nākāśe śamathavipaśyanā prajñāyate.
analyzed: prajñāyante na ākāśe samādhi dhāraṇī mukhāni prajñāyante na ākāśe śamatha vipaśyanā prajñāyate

original: nākāśe daśatathāgatabalāni prajñāyante. nākāśe catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ
analyzed: na ākāśe daśa tathāgata balāni prajñāyante na ākāśe catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ

original: prajñāyante. nākāśe 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ prajñāyante. nākāśe srotaāpattiphalaṃ
analyzed: prajñāyante na ākāśe ṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ prajñāyante na ākāśe srotaāpatti phalam

original: prajñāyate. nākāśe sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prajñāyate. nākāśe 'nāgāmiphalaṃ prajñāyate.
analyzed: prajñāyate na ākāśe sakṛdāgāmi phalam prajñāyate na ākāśe na āgāmi phalam prajñāyate

original: nākāśe 'rhattvaṃ prajñāyate. nākāśe pratyekabodhiḥ prajñāyate. nākāśe 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ prajñāyate.
analyzed: na ākāśe rhat tvam prajñāyate na ākāśe pratyeka bodhiḥ prajñāyate na ākāśe nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ prajñāyate

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: namaskaromi bhagavan bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyo yair ayaṃ saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ.
analyzed: namaskaromi bhagavan bodhisattvebhyaḥ mahāsattvebhyaḥ yaiḥ ayam saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ

original: ākāśasya te bhagavan kṛtaśaḥ prayoktukāmā yatitukāmā dhyāyatukāmā ye sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ
analyzed: ākāśasya te bhagavan kṛtaśas prayoktu kāmāḥ yatitu kāmāḥ dhyāyatu kāmāḥ ye sattvānām kṛtaśas

original: saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyante. ākāśaṃ te bhagavan parimocayitukāmā ye sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ
analyzed: saṃnāham saṃnahyante ākāśam te bhagavan parimocayitu kāmāḥ ye sattvānām kṛtaśas saṃnāham

original: saṃnahyante. mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhās te bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye ākāśasamānāṃ
analyzed: saṃnahyante mahā saṃnāha saṃnaddhāḥ te bhagavan bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ ye ākāśa samānām

original: dharmāṇāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyante. ity uddeśaduṣkaratāprayogaḥ
analyzed: dharmāṇām kṛtaśas saṃnāham saṃnahyante iti uddeśa duṣkara tā prayogaḥ

original: ākāśaṃ te bhagavann antarīkṣam utkṣeptukāmā ye sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyante. iti prayogaduṣkaratāprayogaḥ
analyzed: ākāśam te bhagavan antarīkṣam utkṣeptu kāmāḥ ye sattvānām kṛtaśas saṃnāham saṃnahyante iti prayoga duṣkara tā prayogaḥ

original: mahāvīryapāramitāprāptās te bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhukāmāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: mahā vīrya pāramitā prāptāḥ te bhagavan bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ ye sattvānām anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhu kāmāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: saced bhagavann ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātus tathāgataiḥ paripūrṇaḥ syāt,
analyzed: saced bhagavan ayam tri sāhasra mahā sāhasraḥ lokadhātuḥ tathāgataiḥ paripūrṇaḥ syāt

original: tadyathāpi nāma naḍasvanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā ikṣuvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ vā śālivanaṃ vā,
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma naḍa svanam vā veṇu vanam vā ikṣu vanam vā śara vanam vā śāli vanam vā

original: te tathāgatāḥ kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā dharmaṃ deśayeyuḥ,
analyzed: te tathāgatāḥ kalpam vā kalpa avaśeṣam vā dharmam deśayeyuḥ

original: ekaikaś ca tathāgato 'prameyān asaṃkhyeyān aparimānān sattvān parinirvāpayet,
analyzed: ekaikaḥ ca tathāgataḥ prameyān asaṃkhyeyān aparimānān sattvān parinirvāpayet

original: na ca bhagavan sattvadhātor ūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: na ca bhagavan sattvadhātoḥ ūna tvam vā pūrṇa tvam vā prajñāyate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: sattvāsadbhūtatām upādāya,
analyzed: sattva asat bhūta tām upādāya

original: sattvaviviktatām upādāya. evam ekaikasyāṃ diśi yāvad daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātavas tathāgataiḥ paripūrṇā (PSP_2-3:175)
analyzed: sattva vivikta tām upādāya evam ekaikasyām diśi yāvat daśasu dikṣu sarva lokadhātavaḥ tathāgataiḥ paripūrṇā

original: bhaveyuḥ, tadyathāpi nāma naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā ikṣuvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ vā śālivanaṃ vā,
analyzed: bhaveyuḥ tat yathā api nāma naḍa vanam vā veṇu vanam vā ikṣu vanam vā śara vanam vā śāli vanam vā

original: te ca tathāgatās tiṣṭhantaḥ kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā dharmaṃ deśayeyuḥ,
analyzed: te ca tathāgatāḥ tiṣṭhantaḥ kalpam vā kalpa avaśeṣam vā dharmam deśayeyuḥ

original: ekaikaś ca tathāgato 'prameyān asaṃkhyeyān aparimāṇān sattvān parinirvāpayet,
analyzed: ekaikaḥ ca tathāgataḥ prameyān asaṃkhyeyān aparimāṇān sattvān parinirvāpayet

original: na ca bhagavan sattvadhātor ūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: na ca bhagavan sattvadhātoḥ ūna tvam vā pūrṇa tvam vā prajñāyate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: sattvāsadbhūtatām upādāya,
analyzed: sattva asat bhūta tām upādāya

original: sattvaviviktatām upādāya. anena bhagavan paryāyeṇaivaṃ vadāmi;
analyzed: sattva vivikta tām upādāya anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa evam vadāmi

original: ākāśaṃ te bhagavan parimocayitukāmā ye sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhukāmāḥ. iti kāritraduṣkaratāprayogaḥ.
analyzed: ākāśam te bhagavan parimocayitu kāmāḥ ye sattvānām abhisaṃbodhu kāmāḥ iti kāritra duṣkara tā prayogaḥ

original: atha khalv anyatarasya bhikṣor etad abhavat:
analyzed: atha khalu anyatarasya bhikṣoḥ etat abhavat

original: namaskaromi bhagavan bhagavatyai prajñāpāramitāyai yatra na kaścid dharma upalabhyate na nirudhyate,
analyzed: namaskaromi bhagavan bhagavatyai prajñāpāramitāyai yatra na kaścid dharmaḥ upalabhyate na nirudhyate

original: śīlaskandhaś ca prajñāyate,
analyzed: śīla skandhaḥ ca prajñāyate

original: samādhiskandhaś ca prajñāyate,
analyzed: samādhi skandhaḥ ca prajñāyate

original: prajñāskandhaś ca prajñāyate,
analyzed: prajñā skandhaḥ ca prajñāyate

original: vimuktiskandhaś ca prajñāyate,
analyzed: vimukti skandhaḥ ca prajñāyate

original: vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaś ca prajñāyate,
analyzed: vimukti jñāna darśana skandhaḥ ca prajñāyate

original: srotaāpattiphalaṃ prajñāyate,
analyzed: srotaāpatti phalam prajñāyate

original: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prajñāyate,
analyzed: sakṛdāgāmi phalam prajñāyate

original: anāgāmiphalaṃ prajñāyate,
analyzed: anāgāmi phalam prajñāyate

original: arhattvaṃ prajñāyate,
analyzed: arhat tvam prajñāyate

original: pratyekabuddhatvaṃ prajñāyate,
analyzed: pratyekabuddha tvam prajñāyate

original: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ prajñāyate,
analyzed: tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ prajñāyate

original: trīṇi ratnāni prajñāyante,
analyzed: trīṇi ratnāni prajñāyante

original: buddhadharmasaṃgharatnāni prajñayante,
analyzed: buddha dharma saṃgha ratnāni prajñayante

original: dharmacakrapravartanaṃ prajñāyate. ity avandhyaprayogaḥ
analyzed: dharma cakra pravartanam prajñāyate iti avandhya prayogaḥ

original: atha khalu śakro devānām indra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu śakraḥ devānām indraḥ āyuṣmantam subhūtim etat avocat

original: yo bhadanta subhūte gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yogam āpatsyate kva yogam āpatsyate?
analyzed: yaḥ bhadanta subhūte gambhīrāyām prajñāpāramitāyām bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ yogam āpatsyate kva yogam āpatsyate

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: ākāśe sa kauśika yogam āpatsyate yo 'tra gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ maṃsyate.
analyzed: ākāśe sa kauśika yogam āpatsyate yaḥ tra gambhīrāyām prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam maṃsyate

original: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu śakraḥ devānām indraḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: yo bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati
analyzed: yaḥ bhagavan kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā imām prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati

original: vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati kāmam ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tasya rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyāmi.
analyzed: vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśas ca manasi kariṣyati kāmam aham bhagavan tasya rakṣā āvaraṇa guptim saṃvidhāsyāmi

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: samanupaśyasi tvaṃ kauśika taṃ dharmaṃ yasya rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātum icchasi?
analyzed: samanupaśyasi tvam kauśika tam dharmam yasya rakṣā āvaraṇa guptim saṃvidhātum icchasi

original: śakra āha: nāhaṃ bhadanta subhūte taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yasya rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyāmi.
analyzed: śakraḥ āha na aham bhadanta subhūte tam dharmam samanupaśyāmi yasya rakṣā āvaraṇa guptim saṃvidhāsyāmi

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: sacet kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthāsyanti saivaiṣāṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptir bhaviṣyati. atha (PSP_2-3:176)
analyzed: saced kauśika kula putrāḥ vā kula duhitaraḥ vā yathā upadiṣṭāyām prajñāpāramitāyām sthāsyanti sā eva eṣām rakṣā āvaraṇa guptiḥ bhaviṣyati atha

original: virahitā bhaviṣyanti yathopadiṣṭayā prajñāpāramitayā lapsyante teṣāṃ manuṣyāś cāmanuṣyāś cāvatāram. ākāśasya sa kauśika rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātavyāṃ
analyzed: virahitāḥ bhaviṣyanti yathā upadiṣṭayā prajñāpāramitayā lapsyante teṣām manuṣyāḥ ca amanuṣyāḥ ca avatāram ākāśasya sa kauśika rakṣā āvaraṇa guptim saṃvidhātavyām

original: yo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātavyāṃ manyeta. tat kiṃ manyase?
analyzed: yaḥ bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām prajñāpāramitāyām caratām rakṣā āvaraṇa guptim saṃvidhātavyām manyeta tat kim manyase

original: kauśika pratibalas tvaṃ māyāmarīcisvapnapratiśrutkāpratibhāsaprativiṃbagandharvanagarāṇāṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātum.
analyzed: kauśika pratibalaḥ tvam māyā marīci svapna pratiśrutkā pratibhāsa prativiṃba gandharvanagarāṇām rakṣā āvaraṇa guptim saṃvidhātum

original: śakra āha: no bhadanta subhūte.
analyzed: śakraḥ āha naḥ bhadanta subhūte

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: evam eva kauśika yo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātavyāṃ manyeta,
analyzed: evam eva kauśika yaḥ bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām prajñāpāramitāyām caratām rakṣā āvaraṇa guptim saṃvidhātavyām manyeta

original: sa yāvad eva vighātasya klamathasya ca bhāgī syāt tat kiṃ manyase?
analyzed: sa yāvat eva vighātasya klamathasya ca bhāgī syāt tat kim manyase

original: kauśika pratibalas tvaṃ tathāgatasya vā tathāgatanirmitasya vā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātum.
analyzed: kauśika pratibalaḥ tvam tathāgatasya vā tathāgata nirmitasya vā rakṣā āvaraṇa guptim saṃvidhātum

original: śakra āha: no bhadanta subhūte.
analyzed: śakraḥ āha naḥ bhadanta subhūte

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

analyzed: evam etat kauśika yaḥ bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām prajñāpāramitāyām caratām rakṣā āvaraṇa guptim

original: saṃvidhātavyāṃ manyeta sa yāvad eva vighatasya klamathasya ca bhāgī syāt. tat kiṃ manyase?
analyzed: saṃvidhātavyām manyeta sa yāvat eva vighatasya klamathasya ca bhāgī syāt tat kim manyase

original: kauśika pratibalastvaṃ dharmadhātor bhūtakoṭes tathatāyā acintyadhāto rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātum.
analyzed: kauśika pratibalaḥ tvam dharmadhātoḥ bhūtakoṭeḥ tathatāyāḥ acintya dhātoḥ rakṣā āvaraṇa guptim saṃvidhātum

original: śakra āha: no bhadanta subhūte.
analyzed: śakraḥ āha naḥ bhadanta subhūte

original: subhūtir āha:

analyzed: evam eva kauśika yaḥ bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām prajñāpāramitāyām caratām rakṣā āvaraṇa guptim

original: dharmaṃ deśayamānam ebhir evākṣarair ebhir eva nāmadheyaiḥ subhūtināmadheyair bhikṣubhir imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ paripraśnīkṛtāṃ,

analyzed: deśayamānam śakrāḥ ca devānām indrāḥ paripraśnayanti imām eva prajñāpāramitām evam

analyzed: pūrvasyām diśi dakṣiṇasyām paścimāyām uttarasyām ūrdhvam adhas dikṣu sarvatra buddha sahasram samanvāharanti sma

analyzed: abhisaṃbudhya imām eva prajñāpāramitām bhāṣiṣyate asmin eva pṛthivī pradeśe ye pi

analyzed: te pi anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya imām eva prajñāpāramitām bhāṣiṣyante iti ṣoḍaśa kṣaṇa darśana mārga sākṣi bhāva jñāpanam

original: na sukhaṃ na duḥkhaṃ nātmā nānātmā,

original: deśayiṣyati. evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā na vijñānaṃ nityam anityaṃ veti dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati.
analyzed: deśayiṣyati evam vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ na vijñānam nityam anityam vā iti dharmam deśayiṣyati

original: pratyutpannam iti dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati. evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānam
analyzed: pratyutpannam iti dharmam deśayiṣyati evam na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ na vijñānam

original: atītaṃ nānāgataṃ na pratyutpannam iti dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati. evaṃ vyastasamasteṣu skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu
analyzed: atītam na anāgatam na pratyutpannam iti dharmam deśayiṣyati evam vyasta samasteṣu skandha dhātu āyatana pratītyasamutpādeṣu

original: sarvapāramitāsu sarvaśūnyatāsu sarvasamādhiṣu sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣeṣu

original: dharmeṣv āryasatyeṣv apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣv aṣṭasu vimokṣeṣu navānupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu
analyzed: dharmeṣu ārya satyeṣu apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattiṣu aṣṭasu vimokṣeṣu nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattiṣu

original: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣv abhijñāsu daśabaleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsv āveṇikeṣu
analyzed: śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihiteṣu abhijñāsu daśa baleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsu āveṇikeṣu

original: buddhadharmeṣu yāvat sarvajñatā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpanneti evaṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati.
analyzed: buddha dharmeṣu yāvat sarvajña tā na atītā na anāgatā na pratyutpannā iti evam dharmam deśayiṣyati

original: iti duṣkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ
analyzed: iti duṣkhe dharma jñāna kṣāntiḥ

original: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: kathaṃ punar bhagavan maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyatīti?

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: rūpam atyantaviśuddham atyantaviśuddham iti dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati,

analyzed: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānam atyanta viśuddham atyanta viśuddham iti dharmam deśayiṣyati

original: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādapāramitā śūnyatā bodhipakṣyadharmāryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo
analyzed: evam skandha dhātu āyatana pratītyasamutpāda pāramitā śūnyatā bodhi pakṣya dharma ārya satya apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattayaḥ

original: 'ṣṭavimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇitābhijñā daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikā
analyzed: ṣṭa vimokṣāḥ nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattayaḥ śūnyatā nimitta a praṇita abhijñāḥ daśa bala vaiśāradya pratisaṃvid āveṇikā

original: buddhadharmāḥ samādhidhāraṇīmukhāni yāvat sarvajñatātyantaviśuddhātyantaviśuddḥśti

original: 'ṣṭavimokṣanavānupūrvavīhārasamāpattayaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñā daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddadharmā

original: 'ṣṭavimokṣanavānupūrvavihārasamāpattayḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñā daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
analyzed: ṣṭa vimokṣa nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattayaḥ śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita abhijñāḥ daśa bala vaiśāradya pratisaṃvid āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ

analyzed: yāvān na eva saṃjñā na asaṃjñā āyataneṣu upapadayiṣyati iyam prajñāpāramitā srotaāpatti phalasya dātrī sakṛdāgāmi phalasya anāgāmi phalasya arhat tvasya pratyeka bodheḥ

original: dharmaratnaṃ prajñāyate,
